atk-s0515a0:187_0: Puna upakāravasena ca aparihīnavasena ca guṇavasena ca apare tayo catukkā vuttā.
atk-s0515a0:187_1: Tattha asatiparivajjanāyāti na sati asati, sati ettha natthīti vā asati, muṭṭhassatiyā
atk-s0515a0:187_2: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Parivajjanāyāti samantato vajjanena. Bhattanikkhittakākasadise
atk-s0515a0:187_4: satisamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāracittatāya ca sati uppajjati. Satikaraṇīyānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:187_5: dhammānanti satiyā kātabbānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Katattāti katabhāvena. Catunnaṃ maggānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:187_6: katattā, bhāvitattāti attho. Satiparibandhānaṃ dhammānaṃ hatattāti kāmacchandādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:187_7: nāsitabhāvena. Satinimittānaṃ dhammānaṃ asammuṭṭhattāti satiyā kāraṇānaṃ kāyādiārammaṇānaṃ anaṭṭhabhāvena.
atk-s0515a0:188_0: Satiyā samannāgatattāti satiyā sammā āgatattā aparihīnattā ca. Vasitattāti vasibhāvappattena.
atk-s0515a0:189_0: Sattattāti sabhāvena vijjamānattā. Santattāti nibbutasabhāvattā. Samitattāti kilesānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:189_2: heṭṭhā vuttanayā eva. Saraṇakavasena sati, idaṃ satiyā sabhāvapadaṃ. Punappunaṃ saraṇato
atk-s0515a0:189_3: anussaraṇavasena anussati. Abhimukhaṃ gantvā viya saraṇato paṭisaraṇavasena paṭissati.
atk-s0515a0:189_4: Upasaggavasena vā vaḍḍhitamattameva. Saraṇākāro saraṇatā. Yasmā pana saraṇatāti tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:189_5: saraṇānampi nāmaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetuṃ puna satiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Satisaṅkhātā saraṇatāti
atk-s0515a0:189_6: ayañhettha attho. Sutapariyattassa dhāraṇabhāvato dhāraṇatā. Anupavisanasaṅkhātena
atk-s0515a0:189_7: ogāhanaṭṭhena apilāpanabhāvo apilāpanatā. Yathā hi udake lābukaṭāhādīni palavanti,
atk-s0515a0:189_8: na anupavisanti, na tathā ārammaṇe sati. Ārammaṇañhi esā anupavisati, tasmā “apilāpanatā”ti
atk-s0515a0:189_9: vuttā. Cirakatacirabhāsitānaṃ na sammussanabhāvato asammussanatā. Upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a0:189_10: jotanalakkhaṇe ca indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti indriyaṃ, satisaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ satindriyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:189_11: Pamāde na kampatīti satibalaṃ. Yāthāvasati niyyānasati kusalasatīti sammāsati. Bujjhanakassa
atk-s0515a0:189_12: aṅgoti bojjhaṅgo, pasaṭṭho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo, satiyeva sambojjhaṅgo satisambojjhaṅgo.
atk-s0515a0:190_0: Ekāyanamaggoti ekamaggo, ayaṃ maggo na dvedhāpathabhūtoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Atha
atk-s0515a0:190_1: vā ekena ayitabboti ekāyano. Ekenāti gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vūpakaṭṭhena pavivittacittena.
atk-s0515a0:190_2: Ayitabbo paṭipajjitabbo, ayanti vā etenāti ayano, saṃsārato nibbānaṃ gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:190_3: Ekassa ayano ekāyano. Ekassāti seṭṭhassa. Sabbasattānaṃ seṭṭhova bhagavā, tasmā “bhagavato”ti
atk-s0515a0:190_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Kiñcāpi hi tena aññepi ayanti, evaṃ santepi bhagavatova so ayano tena
atk-s0515a0:190_5: uppāditattā. Yathāha “so hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādi.
atk-s0515a0:190_6: Ayatīti vā ayano, gacchati pavattatīti attho. Ekasmiṃ ayano ekāyano. Imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0515a0:190_7: dhammavinaye pavattati, na aññatthāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha “imasmiṃ kho, subhadda,
atk-s0515a0:190_8: dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhatī”ti. Desanābhedoyeva heso, atthato
atk-s0515a0:190_9: pana ekova. Api ca ekaṃ ayatīti ekāyano. Pubbabhāge nānāmukhabhāvanānayena pavattopi
atk-s0515a0:190_10: aparabhāge ekaṃ nibbānameva gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathāha brahmā sahampati –
atk-s0515a0:192: Etena maggena tariṃsu pubbe, tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. ;
atk-s0515a0:193_0: Maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo? Nibbānaṃ gamanaṭṭhena, nibbānatthikehi magganīyaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:193_1: ca. Upetoti āsannaṃ gato. Samupetoti tato āsannataraṃ gato. Ubhayenapi satiyā aparihīnoti
atk-s0515a0:193_2: attho. Upagatoti upagantvā ṭhito. Samupagatoti sampayutto hutvā ṭhito. “Upāgato samupāgato”tipi
atk-s0515a0:193_3: pāḷi. Ubhayenāpi satisamīpaṃ āgatoti attho. Upapannoti aviyogāpanno. Samupapannoti
atk-s0515a0:193_4: paripuṇṇo. Samannāgatoti avikalo vijjamāno. “Upeto samupetoti dvīhi padehi pavattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:193_5: kathitaṃ. Upagato samupagatoti dvīhi padehi paṭivedho. Upapanno samupapanno samannāgatoti
atk-s0515a0:193_6: tīhi padehi paṭilābho kathito”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:194_0: Loke vā sā visattikāti yā esā anekappakārena vuttā visattikā, sā khandhaloke eva,
atk-s0515a0:194_1: na aññatra khandhehi pavattatīti attho. Loke vā taṃ visattikanti khandhaloke eva
atk-s0515a0:194_2: pavattaṃ etaṃ visattikasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ. Tarati kāme parivajjento. Uttarati kilese
atk-s0515a0:194_3: pajahanto. Patarati tesaṃ patiṭṭhāhetuṃ chindanto. Samatikkamati saṃsāraṃ atikkamanto.
atk-s0515a0:194_4: Vītivattati paṭisandhiabhabbuppattikaṃ karonto. Atha vā tarati uttarati kāyānupassanena.
atk-s0515a0:194_5: Patarati vedanānupassanena. Samatikkamati cittānupassanena. Atha vā tarati sīlena.
atk-s0515a0:194_6: Uttarati samādhinā. Patarati vipassanāya. Samatikkamati maggena. Vītivattati phalenāti
atk-s0515a0:195_0: 4. Catutthagāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yo ekaṃ sālikhettādikhettaṃ vā gharavatthādivatthuṃ
atk-s0515a0:195_1: vā kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ hiraññaṃ vā goassādibhedaṃ gavāssaṃ vā antojātādidāse vā bhatakādikammakare
atk-s0515a0:195_2: vā itthisaññitā thiyo vā ñātibandhavādibandhū vā aññe vā manāpiyarūpādike puthukāme
atk-s0515a0:195_3: anugijjhatīti. Sālikkhettanti yattha sāliyo viruhanti. Vīhikkhettādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:195_4: Vīhīti avasesavīhayo. Modayatīti muggo. Gharavatthunti gharapatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ katākatabhūmibhāgo.
atk-s0515a0:195_5: Koṭṭhakavatthādīsupi eseva nayo. Koṭṭhakoti dvārakoṭṭhādi. Pureti gharassa purato.
atk-s0515a0:195_6: Pacchāti gharassa pacchato. Ettha ārāmenti cittaṃ tosentīti ārāmo, pupphenapi phalenapi
atk-s0515a0:196_0: Pasukādayoti eḷakādayo. Antojātakoti antogharadāsiyā kucchimhi jāto. Dhanakkītakoti
atk-s0515a0:196_1: dhanena kīṇitvā parivattetvā gahito. Sāmaṃ vāti sayaṃ vā. Dāsabyanti dāsassa bhāvo
atk-s0515a0:196_2: dāsabyaṃ, taṃ dāsabyaṃ. Upetīti upagacchati. Akāmako vāti attano aruciyā vā karamarānīto.
atk-s0515a0:197_0: Te cattāro punapi dassetuṃ “āmāya dāsāpi bhavanti heke”ti āha. Āmāya dāsāti antojātadāsā.
atk-s0515a0:197_1: “Yattha dāso āmajāto ṭhito thullāni gacchatī”ti etthāpi eteva vuttā. Dhanena kītāti
atk-s0515a0:197_2: dhanadāsā. Sāmañca eketi sayaṃ dāsā. Bhayāpaṇunnāti akāmadāsā. Bhayena paṇunnā khipitā.
atk-s0515a0:198: Bhatakāti bhatiyā jīvanakā. Kasikammādikammaṃ karontīti kammakarā. Upajīvinoti sammantanādinā upagantvā nissayaṃ katvā jīvantīti upajīvino.
atk-s0515a0:199_0: Itthīti thiyati etissaṃ gabbhoti itthī. Pariggahoti sahāyī sassāmikā. Mātāpitibandhavāpi
atk-s0515a0:199_1: ñātibandhu. Sagotto gottabandhu. Ekācariyakule vā ekajātimantaṃ vā uggahitamanto
atk-s0515a0:200_0: Gijjhatīti kilesakāmena pattheti. Anugijjhatīti anu anu gijjhati punappunaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0515a0:200_1: Paligijjhatīti samantato pattheti. Palibajjhatīti visesena pattheti. “Oḷārikattena
atk-s0515a0:200_2: nimittaggāhavasena gijjhati, anugijjhati, anubyañjanaggāhavasena paligijjhati, palibajjhatī”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:201_0: 5. Pañcamagāthāyaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – taṃ puggalaṃ abalakhyā kilesā balīyanti sahanti
atk-s0515a0:201_1: maddanti. Saddhābalādivirahena vā abalaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ abalā kilesā balīyanti, abalattā
atk-s0515a0:201_2: balīyantīti attho. Atha vā taṃ kāmagiddhaṃ kāmarattaṃ kāmapariyesantañca sīhādayo
atk-s0515a0:201_3: ca pākaṭaparissayā, kāyaduccaritādayo ca apākaṭaparissayā maddanti. Tato apākaṭaparissayehi
atk-s0515a0:201_4: abhibhūtaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ viya anveti.
atk-s0515a0:202_0: Abalāti natthi etesaṃ balanti abalā, balavirahitā. Dubbalāti mandapayogābalena kattabbakiccavirahitā.
atk-s0515a0:202_1: Appabalāti appaṃ parittaṃ etesaṃ balanti appabalā, yujjhituṃ asamatthā. Appathāmakāti
atk-s0515a0:202_2: appo paritto thāmo etesaṃ vāyāmo ussāhoti appathāmakā. Hīnā nihīnā payogahīnena.
atk-s0515a0:202_3: Omakā thāmahīnena. Lāmakā paccayahīnena. Chatukkā ajjhāsayahīnena. Parittā pattihīnena.
atk-s0515a0:202_4: Sahantīti maddanti ghaṭṭanaṃ uppādenti. Parisahantīti sabbato maddanti. Abhibhavanti
atk-s0515a0:202_5: aparāparaṃ uppattivasena. Ajjhottharanti punappunaṃ uppattivasena. Pariyādiyanti
atk-s0515a0:203_0: Saddhābalanti saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā.
atk-s0515a0:203_1: Sā saddahanalakkhaṇā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā, sampasādanarasā udakappasādakamaṇi viya.
atk-s0515a0:203_2: Pakkhandanarasā vā oghuttaraṇo viya. Akālusiyapaccupaṭṭhānā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-s0515a0:203_3: vā. Saddheyyavatthupadaṭṭhānā, sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānā vā. Sā hatthavittabījāni
atk-s0515a0:203_4: viya daṭṭhabbā. Asaddhiye na kampatīti saddhābalaṃ. Vīriyabalanti vīrassa bhāvo vīriyaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:203_5: vīrānaṃ vā kammaṃ vīriyaṃ, vidhinā vā nayena upāyena īrayitabbaṃ pavattayitabbanti
atk-s0515a0:203_6: vīriyaṃ. Taṃ panetaṃ upatthambhanalakkhaṇañca paggahaṇalakkhaṇañca vīriyaṃ, sahajātānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:203_8: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānaṃ, vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Sammā āraddhaṃ sabbasampattīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:203_9: mūlanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kosajje na kampatīti vīriyabalaṃ. Satiyā lakkhaṇādīni vuttāneva.
atk-s0515a0:204_0: Muṭṭhassacce na kampatīti satibalaṃ. Sahajātāni sammā ādhīyati ṭhapetīti samādhi.
atk-s0515a0:204_1: So pāmokkhalakkhaṇo avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā, sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇe sampiṇḍanaraso
atk-s0515a0:204_2: nhāniyacuṇṇānaṃ udakaṃ viya, upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno, ñāṇapaccupaṭṭhāno vā. “Samāhito
atk-s0515a0:204_3: yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti passatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Visesato sukhapadaṭṭhāno nivāte padīpaccīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:204_4: ṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitīti daṭṭhabbo. Uddhacce na kampatīti samādhibalaṃ. Pajānātīti
atk-s0515a0:204_5: paññā. Kiṃ pajānāti? “Idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā nayena ariyasaccāni. Sā yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā,
atk-s0515a0:204_7: padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā araññagatasudesako viya. Avijjāya na kampatīti
atk-s0515a0:204_8: paññābalaṃ. Hiribalaṃ ottappabalanti ahirike na kampatīti hiribalaṃ. Anottappe na
atk-s0515a0:204_9: kampatīti ottappabalaṃ. Ayaṃ ubhayavasena atthavaṇṇanā hoti. Kāyaduccaritādīhi hirīyatīti
atk-s0515a0:204_10: hirī, lajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tehi eva ottappatīti ottappaṃ, pāpato ubbegassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:205_0: Tesaṃ nānākaraṇadīpanatthaṃ – “samuṭṭhānaṃ adhipati, lajjādilakkhaṇena cā”ti imaṃ
atk-s0515a0:205_1: mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayaṃ vitthārakathā vuttā – ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī nāma, bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:205_2: ottappaṃ nāma. Attādhipati hirī nāma, lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma. Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā
atk-s0515a0:205_3: hirī nāma, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ nāma. Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī nāma, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappaṃ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:206_0: Tattha ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti – jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā,
atk-s0515a0:206_1: vayaṃ paccavekkhitvā, sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā, bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a0:206_2: “Pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ na jātisampannānaṃ kammaṃ, hīnajaccānaṃ kevaṭṭādīnaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:206_3: mādisassa jātisampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ tāva jātiṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0515a0:206_4: pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakaraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ daharehi
atk-s0515a0:206_5: kattabbaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa vaye ṭhitassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ vayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:206_6: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:206_7: dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti
atk-s0515a0:206_8: evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā
atk-s0515a0:206_9: “pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ andhabālānaṃ kammaṃ, na paṇḍitānaṃ. Mādisassa paṇḍitassa bahussutassa
atk-s0515a0:206_10: idaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ na yutta”nti evaṃ bāhusaccaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto
atk-s0515a0:206_11: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānaṃ hiriṃ catūhi kāraṇehi samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0515a0:206_12: Samuṭṭhāpetvā ca pana attano citte hiriṃ pavesetvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā
atk-s0515a0:206_13: hirī nāma hoti. Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma? “Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi,
atk-s0515a0:209: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti, evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a0:210_0: Kathaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto attānaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā
atk-s0515a0:210_1: “mādisassa saddhāpabbajitassa bahussutassa dhutaṅgadharassa na yuttaṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:210_2: kātu”nti pāpaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ attādhipati hirī nāma hoti. Tenāha bhagavā “so attānaṃyeva
atk-s0515a0:210_3: adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:211: Kathaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma? Idhekacco kulaputto lokaṃ adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:212_0: “Mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso, mahantasmiṃ kho pana lokasannivāse santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā
atk-s0515a0:212_1: iddhimanto dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduno, te dūratopi passanti, āsannāpi na dissanti,
atk-s0515a0:212_2: cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti. Tepi maṃ evaṃ jāneyyuṃ ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ saddhāya
atk-s0515a0:212_3: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehī’ti.
atk-s0515a0:212_4: Devatāpi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhukā paracittaviduniyo, tā dūratopi passanti,
atk-s0515a0:212_5: āsannāpi na dissanti, cetasāpi cittaṃ jānanti. Tāpi maṃ evaṃ jāneyyuṃ ‘passatha bho
atk-s0515a0:212_6: imaṃ kulaputtaṃ saddhāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito samāno vokiṇṇo viharati pāpakehi
atk-s0515a0:212_7: akusalehi dhammehī’ti. So iti paṭisañcikkhati ‘āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ bhavissati
atk-s0515a0:212_8: asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:212_9: ekagga’nti. So lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā akusalaṃ pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:212_10: pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:213_0: Evaṃ lokādhipati ottappaṃ nāma hoti. “Lajjāsabhāvasaṇṭhitā hirī, bhayasabhāvasaṇṭhitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:213_1: ottappa”nti ettha pana lajjāti lajjanākāro, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitā hirī. Bhayanti
atk-s0515a0:213_2: apāyabhayaṃ, tena sabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ ottappaṃ. Tadubhayampi pāpaparivajjane pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0515a0:213_3: hoti. Ekacco hi yathā nāma eko kulaputto uccārapassāvādīni karonto lajjitabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:213_4: ekaṃ disvā lajjanākārappatto bhaveyya hīḷito, evameva ajjhattaṃ lajjīdhammaṃ okkamitvā
atk-s0515a0:213_5: pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Ekacco apāyabhayabhīto hutvā pāpakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0515a0:214_0: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – yathā hi dvīsu ayoguḷesu eko sītalo bhaveyya gūthamakkhito, eko
atk-s0515a0:214_1: uṇho āditto. Tattha paṇḍito sītalaṃ gūthamakkhitattā jigucchanto na gaṇhāti, itaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:214_2: ḍāhabhayena. Tattha sītalassa gūthamakkhanajigucchāya agaṇhanaṃ viya ajjhattaṃ lajjīdhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:214_3: okkamitvā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, uṇhassa ḍāhabhayena agaṇhanaṃ viya apāyabhayena pāpassa
atk-s0515a0:215_1: dvayaṃ pāpaparivajjane eva pākaṭaṃ hoti. Ekacco hi jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā satthumahattapaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0515a0:215_3: hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpaṃ na karoti. Ekacco attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:215_5: pāpaṃ na karoti. Tattha jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇādīni ceva attānuvādabhayādīni ca
atk-s0515a0:215_6: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni. Evaṃ vuttaṃ sattavidhaṃ balaṃ yassa puggalassa natthi,
atk-s0515a0:215_7: te kilesā taṃ puggalaṃ sahanti…pe… pariyādiyanti maddantīti.
atk-s0515a0:216_0: Dve parissayāti pākaṭāpākaṭavasena dve eva upaddavā, na ekaṃ, na tīṇi. Te vibhāgato
atk-s0515a0:216_1: dassetuṃ “katame pākaṭaparissayā”tiādimāha. Tattha kokāti kekā. Ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0515a0:216_2: Corāti coriyakammehi yuttā. Māṇavāti sāhasikakammehi yuttā. Katakammāti sandhicchedādikatacorikakammā.
atk-s0515a0:216_3: Akatakammāti taṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ nikkhantā. Ettha assūti bhaveyyunti attho. Cakkhurogoti
atk-s0515a0:216_4: cakkhusmiṃ uppannarogo, rujatīti rogo. Cakkhurogotiādayo vatthuvasena veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:216_5: Nibbattitapasādānañhi rogo nāma natthi. Kaṇṇarogoti bahikaṇṇarogo. Mukharogoti mukhe
atk-s0515a0:216_6: uppannarogo. Dantarogoti dantasūlaṃ. Kāsoti khayarogo. Sāsoti svāso uggārarogo. Pināsoti
atk-s0515a0:216_7: bahināsikāya rogo. Ḍāhoti abbhantare uppajjanako uṇho. Mucchāti sativissajjanakā.
atk-s0515a0:216_8: Pakkhandikāti lohitapakkhandikā atisāro. Sūlāti āmasūlā kucchivāto. Visūcikāti mahanto
atk-s0515a0:216_9: virecanako. Kilāsoti sabalo. Sosoti sukkhanako sosabyādhi. Apamāroti amanussaggāho
atk-s0515a0:216_10: veriyakkhābādho. Daddūti daddupīḷakā. Kaṇḍūti khuddakapīḷakā. Kacchūti mahākacchu.
atk-s0515a0:216_11: Rakhasāti nakhehi vilikhitaṭṭhāne rogo. “Nakhasā”tipi pāḷi. Vitacchikāti hatthatalapādatalesu
atk-s0515a0:216_12: hīraṃ hīraṃ katvā phālento uppajjanakarogo. Lohitapittanti soṇitapittaṃ, rattapittanti
atk-s0515a0:216_13: vuttaṃ hoti. Madhumehoti sarīrabbhantare ukkaṭṭharogo. Vuttañhetaṃ “api ca madhumeho ābādho ukkaṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0515a0:217_0: Aṃsāti arisarogo. Pīḷakāti lohitapīḷakā. Bhagaṃ dālayatīti bhagandalā, vaccamaggaṃ
atk-s0515a0:217_1: phāletīti attho. Pittasamuṭṭhānāti pittena samuṭṭhānaṃ uppatti etesanti pittasamuṭṭhānā.
atk-s0515a0:217_2: Te kira dvattiṃsa honti. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Sannipātikāti vātapittasemhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:217_3: sannipātena ekībhāvena uppannā. Ābādhaṭṭhena ābādhā. Utupariṇāmajāti utupariṇāmena.
atk-s0515a0:217_4: Accuṇhāti sītena uppajjanakarogā. Visamaparihārajāti atiṭṭhānanisajjādinā visamaparihārena
atk-s0515a0:217_5: jātā. Opakkamikāti vadhabandhanādinā upakkamena jātā. Kammavipākajāti balavakammavipākasambhūtā.
atk-s0515a0:217_6: Sītaṃ uṇhaṃ…pe… samphassoti ime pākaṭā eva. Iti vāti evaṃ vā. Ime vuccantīti nigamento āha.
atk-s0515a0:218_0: Katame paṭicchannaparissayāti apākaṭā acchāditaupaddavā katameti pucchati. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:218_3: veditabbā. Kāye pavattaṃ, kāyato vā pavattaṃ, duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesapūtikattā vā
atk-s0515a0:218_4: duṭṭhu caritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Vacīmanoduccaritesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:219_0: Kāmīyantīti kāmā, pañca kāmaguṇā. Kāmesu chando kāmacchando. Kāmayatīti vā kāmo,
atk-s0515a0:219_1: kāmo eva chando, kāmacchando na kattukamyatāchando, na dhammacchando vā. Kāmataṇhāva
atk-s0515a0:219_2: evaṃnāmikā. Kusaladhamme nīvaratīti nīvaraṇaṃ, kāmacchando eva nīvaraṇaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:219_3: Evaṃ sesesupi. Byāpajjati tena cittaṃ pūtibhāvaṃ upagacchati, byāpādayati vā vinayācārarūpasampattihitasukhādīnīti
atk-s0515a0:219_4: vā byāpādo. Thinanatā thinaṃ. Middhanatā middhaṃ, anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighātatā
atk-s0515a0:219_5: cāti attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ. Tattha thinaṃ anussāhanalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:220_0: Uddhatassa bhāvo uddhaccaṃ. Taṃ avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ
atk-s0515a0:220_2: viya, cetaso avūpasamo ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:220_3: Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:220_4: vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uddhaccañca
atk-s0515a0:220_5: kukkuccañca uddhaccakukkuccaṃ. Vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā, sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto
atk-s0515a0:220_6: etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā, sā saṃsayalakkhaṇā, saṃsappanarasā, anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0515a0:221_0: Rajjanalakkhaṇo rāgo. Dussanalakkhaṇo doso. Muyhanalakkhaṇo moho. Kujjhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0515a0:221_1: kodho, caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo vā, āghātakaraṇaraso, dūsanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Upanandhanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0515a0:222_0: Paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho. Tesaṃ vināsanaraso, tadacchādanapaccupaṭṭhāno. Yugaggāhalakkhaṇo
atk-s0515a0:222_1: paḷāso, paraguṇehi attano guṇānaṃ samīkaraṇaraso, paresaṃ guṇappamāṇena upaṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0515a0:223_0: Parasampattikhīyanalakkhaṇā issā, tassa akkhamanalakkhaṇā vā, tattha anabhiratirasā,
atk-s0515a0:223_1: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano sampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ macchariyaṃ, attano
atk-s0515a0:224_0: Katapāpapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, tassa nigūhanarasā, tadāvaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā. Attano
atk-s0515a0:225: Cittassa uddhumātabhāvalakkhaṇo thambho, appatissavavuttiraso, amaddavapaccupaṭṭhāno. Karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho, vipaccanīkatāraso, agāravapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0515a0:226: Uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno, ahaṃkāraraso, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno. Abbhuṇṇatilakkhaṇo atimāno, ativiya ahaṃkāraraso, accuddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno.
atk-s0515a0:227_0: Mattabhāvalakkhaṇo mado, madaggahaṇaraso, ummādapaccupaṭṭhāno. Pañcasu kāmaguṇesu
atk-s0515a0:227_2: evaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
atk-s0515a0:228_0: Visesato cettha āmisagiddho attanā alabhanto aññassa lābhino kujjhati, tassa sakiṃ
atk-s0515a0:228_1: uppanno kodho kodhoyeva. Taduttari upanāho. So evaṃ kuddho upanayhanto ca santepi
atk-s0515a0:228_2: aññassa lābhino guṇaṃ makkheti “ahampi tādiso”ti ca yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti. Ayamassa
atk-s0515a0:228_3: makkho ca palāso ca, so evaṃ makkhī palāsī tassa lābhasakkārādīsu “kiṃ imassa iminā”ti
atk-s0515a0:228_4: issati padussati, ayamassa issā. Sace panassa kāci sampatti hoti, tassā tena sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:228_5: na sahati, idamassa maccheraṃ. Lābhahetu kho pana attano santepi dose paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0515a0:228_6: ayamassa māyā. Asantepi guṇe pakāseti, idamassa sāṭheyyaṃ. So evaṃ paṭipanno sace
atk-s0515a0:228_7: pana yathādhippāyaṃ lābhaṃ labhati, tena thaddho hoti amuducitto “na idaṃ evaṃ kātabba”nti
atk-s0515a0:228_8: ovadituṃ asakkuṇeyyo, ayamassa thambho. Sace pana naṃ koci kiñci vadati “na idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:228_9: evaṃ kātabba”nti, tena sāraddhacitto hoti, bhākuṭikamukho “ko me tva”nti pasayhabhāṇī,
atk-s0515a0:228_10: ayamassa sārambho. Tato thambhena “ahameva seyyo”ti attānaṃ maññanto mānī hoti. Sārambhena
atk-s0515a0:228_11: “ke ime”ti pare atimaññanto atimānī, ayamassa māno ca atimāno ca. So tehi mānātimānehi
atk-s0515a0:228_12: jātimadādianekarūpaṃ madaṃ janeti, matto samāno kāmaguṇādibhedesu vatthūsu pamajjati,
atk-s0515a0:228_13: ayamassa mado ca pamādo cāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:229_0: Sabbe kilesāti sabbepi akusalā dhammā. Upatāpanaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena ca kilesā.
atk-s0515a0:229_2: pariḷāhā. Sadā tāpanaṭṭhena santāpā. Akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:230_0: Kenaṭṭhenāti kena atthena. Abhibhavanāditividhaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ “parisahantīti parissayā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:230_1: Parisahantīti dukkhaṃ uppādenti abhibhavanti. Parihānāya saṃvattantīti kusalānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:230_2: dhammānaṃ pariccajanāya saṃvattanti. Tatrāsayāti tasmiṃ sarīre akusalā dhammā āsayanti
atk-s0515a0:230_3: nivasanti uppajjantīti attho. Te parissayāti kāyaduccaritādayo upaddavā. Kusalānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:230_4: dhammānaṃ antarāyāyāti upari vattabbānaṃ sammāpaṭipadādito kosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:230_5: antaradhānāya adassanatthāya saṃvattanti. Sammāpaṭipadāyāti sundarāya pasaṭṭhāya
atk-s0515a0:230_6: vā paṭipadāya, na micchāpaṭipadāya. Anulomapaṭipadāyāti aviruddhapaṭipadāya, na paṭilomapaṭipadāya.
atk-s0515a0:230_8: atthaanugatāya paṭipadāya, uparūpari vaḍḍhitāya paṭipadāya. Yathā attho, tathā paṭipajjitabbāya
atk-s0515a0:230_9: paṭipadāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Attatthapaṭipadāyā”tipi pāḷi, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Dhammānudhammapaṭipadāyāti
atk-s0515a0:230_10: dhammo nāma navalokuttaradhammo. Anudhammo nāma vipassanādi. Tassa dhammassa anurūpā
atk-s0515a0:231_0: Sīlesu paripūrikāritāyāti pātimokkhasīlesu pāripūriṃ katvā ṭhitatāya. Indriyesu guttadvāratāyāti
atk-s0515a0:231_1: “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādinā nayena vuttesu manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu sugopitadvārabhāvassa.
atk-s0515a0:231_2: Bhojane mattaññutāyāti paṭiggahaṇādīsu pamāṇayuttatāya. Alaṃsāṭakādiṃ muñcitvā mitabhojanatāya.
atk-s0515a0:232_0: Jāgariyānuyogassāti “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehī”ti evamādinā
atk-s0515a0:232_1: nayena pañca jāgaraṇadhamme anuyogassa. Satisampajaññassāti sabbakammaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyuttānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:233_0: Satipaṭṭhānānanti ārammaṇesu okkantitvā pakkanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva
atk-s0515a0:234_0: Catunnaṃ sammappadhānānanti padahanti etenāti padhānaṃ, sobhanaṃ padhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:234_1: sammā vā padahanti etenāti sammappadhānaṃ, sobhanaṃ vā taṃ kilesavirūpattavirahato,
atk-s0515a0:234_3: sammappadhānaṃ, vīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Uppannuppannānaṃ anuppannuppannānañca catunnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:235_0: Catunnaṃ iddhipādānanti ettha chandavīriyacittavīmaṃsāsu ekeko ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati
atk-s0515a0:235_1: nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
atk-s0515a0:235_2: Paṭhamena atthena iddhiyeva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Dutiyena atthena
atk-s0515a0:235_3: iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo, pādoti patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti attho. Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0515a0:235_4: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti, tasmā pādoti vuccati. Tesaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:236_0: Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānanti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a0:236_1: yā esā dhammasāmaggī yāya lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:236_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā “bodhī”ti vuccati, bujjhatīti kilesasantānaniddāya
atk-s0515a0:236_4: uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikaroti, tassā
atk-s0515a0:236_5: dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādīni viya. Yo
atk-s0515a0:236_6: panesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti
atk-s0515a0:236_7: vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu aṭṭhakathācariyā
atk-s0515a0:236_8: “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā”ti. Tesaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:237_0: Ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti ariyoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ārakattā ariyabhāvakarattā
atk-s0515a0:237_1: ariyaphalapaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Aṭṭhaṅgāni assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko. Svāyaṃ caturaṅgikā
atk-s0515a0:237_2: viya senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ viya ca tūriyaṃ aṅgamattameva hoti, aṅgavinimutto natthi.
atk-s0515a0:237_3: Nibbānaṃ maggati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo, tassa ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa
atk-s0515a0:237_4: maggassa bhāvanānuyogassa. Imesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānanti vuttappakārānaṃ lokiyalokuttarakusaladhammānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:237_5: Antarāyāyāti lokuttarakusaladhammānaṃ antarāyāya antaradhānāya lokiyakusaladhammānaṃ pariccāgāya.
atk-s0515a0:238_0: Tesu lokuttarakusaladhammānaṃ uppajjituṃ appadānaṭṭhena parissayā nāma. Te hi uppajjitvā
atk-s0515a0:238_1: nirujjhamānā upaddavaṃ nāvahanti. Tattheteti tasmiṃ attabhāve ete. Pāpakāti lāmakā.
atk-s0515a0:238_2: Attabhāvasannissayāti attabhāvaṃ upanissāya ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjantīti attabhāvasannissayā. Daketi udake.
atk-s0515a0:239: Vuttaṃ hetanti kathitañhi etaṃ. Sāntevāsikoti antevāsikasaṅkhātena kilesena saha vasatīti sāntevāsiko. Sācariyakoti samudācaraṇasaṅkhātena kilesena saha vasatīti sācariyako.
atk-s0515a0:240_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvā. Upari sotena saddaṃ sutvātiādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:240_1: eseva nayo. Uppajjantīti samudācaranti. Sarasaṅkappāti nānārammaṇe saṃsaraṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:240_2: uppannā parikappā. Saṃyojaniyāti ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā saṃyojanasambandhanena
atk-s0515a0:240_3: saṃyojanānaṃ hitā. Tyassāti te pāpakā assa puggalassa. Anto vasantīti abbhantare
atk-s0515a0:240_4: citte nivasanti. Anvāsavantīti kilesasantānaṃ anugantvā bhusaṃ savanti anubandhanti.
atk-s0515a0:240_5: Te nanti taṃ puggalaṃ ete akusalā dhammā. Samudācarantīti sammā ācaranti pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:241_0: Kilissanaṭṭhena malā. Sattuatthena amittā. Veriatthena sapattā. Hananaṭṭhena vadhakā.
atk-s0515a0:241_1: Paccāmittaṭṭhena paccatthikā. Atha vā malā sūriyassopakkilesavalāhakā viya. Amittā
atk-s0515a0:241_2: sūriyassa dhūmaṃ viya. Sapattā sūriyassa himaṃ viya. Vadhakā sūriyassa rajaṃ viya.
atk-s0515a0:241_3: Paccatthikā sūriyassa rāhu viya. “Malā suvaṇṇassa malaṃ viya cittappabhānāsakā. Amittā
atk-s0515a0:241_4: kāḷalohamalaṃ viya citte siniddhabhāvanāsakā, sapattā yuganaddhaṃ yujjhantā sapattā
atk-s0515a0:241_5: viya citte patiṭṭhitadhammadhaṃsakā. Vadhakā manussaghātakā viya dhammaghātakā. Paccatthikā
atk-s0515a0:241_6: raññā upagatassa vināso viya mokkhamaggassa paṭisedhakā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:242_0: Anatthajananoti na atthaṃ anatthaṃ, taṃ anatthaṃ uppādetīti anatthajanano. Ko so?
atk-s0515a0:242_1: Lobho. Cittappakopanoti cittassa pakopano calano, kusalaṃ nivāretvā cittaṃ rundhatīti
atk-s0515a0:242_2: attho. Bhayamantarato jātanti abbhantare attano citteyeva jātaṃ, anatthajananādibhayahetu.
atk-s0515a0:242_3: Taṃ jano nāvabujjhatīti taṃ bhayaṃ bālamahājano avagantvā otaritvā na jānāti. Atthanti
atk-s0515a0:242_4: luddho puggalo lokiyalokuttaraatthaṃ na jānāti. Dhammanti tassa hetuṃ. Andhatamanti
atk-s0515a0:242_5: bahalandhakāraṃ. Yanti yasmā, yaṃ naraṃ vā. Sahateti abhibhavati.
atk-s0515a0:243_0: Ajjhattanti sakasantāne. Uppajjamānā uppajjantīti pubbantato uddhaṃ uppajjamānā ahitāya
atk-s0515a0:243_1: uppajjanti dukkhāya. Tadubhayena aphāsuvihārāya. Ahitāyāti cetasikadukkhatthāya.
atk-s0515a0:243_2: Dukkhāyāti kāyikadukkhatthāya. Aphāsuvihārāyāti tadubhayena na sukhavihāratthāya.
atk-s0515a0:243_3: Atha vā “uppajjamānā uppajjantīti bhavaṅgacalanato paṭṭhāya yāva voṭṭhabbanā, tāva
atk-s0515a0:243_4: uppajjamānā nāma. Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana patvā anivattanabhāvena uppajjanti nāmā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:244_0: Tacasāraṃva samphalanti attano phalena nāsitaṃ tacasārasaṅkhātaṃ veḷu viya. Aratīti
atk-s0515a0:244_1: kusalesu dhammesu ukkaṇṭhitatā. Ratīti pañcakāmaguṇe abhirati. Lomahaṃsoti kaṇṭakasadiso
atk-s0515a0:244_2: hutvā uddhaggalomo. Itonidānāti ayaṃ attabhāvo nidānaṃ paccayo etesanti itonidānā.
atk-s0515a0:244_3: Itojāti ito attabhāvato jātā. Ito samuṭṭhāya manovitakkāti yathā dīghasuttakena pāde
atk-s0515a0:244_4: baddhaṃ kākaṃ kumārakā tassa suttassa pariyantaṃ aṅguliṃ veṭhetvā ossajjanti, so
atk-s0515a0:244_5: dūraṃ gantvāpi puna tesaṃ pādamūleyeva patati, evameva ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya
atk-s0515a0:245_2: ajānanavasena ca. “Tayo kho, mahārāja, purisassa dhammā ajjhattaṃ uppajjamānā”tiādikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:245_3: tatiyaṃ attano nissayaghātanavasena. “Rāgo ca doso ca itonidānā”tiādikaṃ catutthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:246_0: Tato tato parissayatoti tamhā tamhā upaddavā. Taṃ puggalanti vuttappakārakilesasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:246_1: Dukkhaṃ anvetīti dukkhaṃ anu eti mātu pacchato khīrapivako viya. Anugacchatīti samīpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:246_2: gacchati coraghātako viya vajjhappattassa. Anvāyikaṃ hotīti sampattaṃ hoti dhammaganthikāya
atk-s0515a0:246_3: paricchedo viya. Jātidukkhanti jātisaddassa tāva aneke atthā paveditā. Yathā –
atk-s0515a0:247: Bhavo kulaṃ nikāyo ca, sīlaṃ paññatti lakkhaṇaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:249_0: Tathā hissa “ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo”tiādīsu bhavo attho. “Akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho
atk-s0515a0:249_1: jātivādenā”ti ettha kulaṃ. “Atthi, visākhe, nigaṇṭhā nāma samaṇajātī”ti ettha nikāyo.
atk-s0515a0:249_2: “Yatohaṃ, bhagini, ariyāya jātiyā jāto nābhijānāmī”ti ettha ariyasīlaṃ. “Tiriyā nāma
atk-s0515a0:249_3: tiṇajāti nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṃ āhacca ṭhitā ahosī”ti ettha paññatti. “Jāti dvīhi
atk-s0515a0:249_4: khandhehi saṅgahitā”ti ettha saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ. “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto”ti
atk-s0515a0:249_5: ettha pasūti. “Bhavapaccayā jātī”ti ca, “jātipi dukkhā”ti ca ettha pariyāyato paṭisandhikkhaṇo,
atk-s0515a0:249_6: nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ ye ye khandhā pātubhavanti,
atk-s0515a0:250_0: Kasmā panesā jāti dukkhāti ce? Anekesaṃ dukkhānaṃ vatthubhāvato. Anekāni hi dukkhāni.
atk-s0515a0:251: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhavedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā “dukkhadukkha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:252: Sukhavedanā vipariṇāmena dukkhuppattihetuto vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ. Upekkhāvedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:253: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosamohajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṃ. Apākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:254: Dvattiṃsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṃ. Pākaṭadukkhantipi vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:255: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṃ sesaṃ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṃ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana nippariyāyadukkhanti vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:256_0: Tatrāyaṃ jāti yaṃ taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṃ āpāyikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:256_1: dukkhaṃ, yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0515a0:257_0: Tatridaṃ gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṃ dukkhaṃ – ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno
atk-s0515a0:257_1: na uppalapadumapuṇḍarikādīsu nibbattati, atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa
atk-s0515a0:257_4: kimi viya nibbattati. So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṃ
atk-s0515a0:257_5: viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno samiñjanapasāraṇādivirahito adhimattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:257_6: dukkhaṃ paccanubhotīti, idaṃ tāva gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:258_0: Yaṃ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato
atk-s0515a0:258_1: eḷako viya ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhunanaddhunanādinā
atk-s0515a0:258_2: upakkamena adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavati, yañca mātu sītudakapānakāle sītanarakupapanno
atk-s0515a0:258_4: khārāpaṭicchakādikammakāraṇapatto viya tibbaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhoti, idaṃ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:259: Yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ gabbhavipattimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:260_0: Yaṃ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṃ viya atibhayānakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:260_1: yonimaggaṃ paṭipātiyamānassa paramasambādhena ca yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya
atk-s0515a0:260_2: mahānāgassa nikaḍḍhiyamānassa narakasattassa viya ca saṅghātapabbatehi vicuṇṇiyamānassa
atk-s0515a0:261_1: sūcimukhakhuradhārāhi vijjhanaphālanasadisaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ mātukucchito
atk-s0515a0:262_0: Yaṃ pana tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ attanāva attānaṃ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa
atk-s0515a0:262_1: kodhavasena abhuñjantassa ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṃ hoti, idaṃ attūpakkamamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:263: Yaṃ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati, idaṃ parūpakkamamūlakaṃ dukkhanti.
atk-s0515a0:264: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṃ jāti vatthumeva hoti, idaṃ jātidukkhaṃ anveti.
atk-s0515a0:265_0: Jarādukkhanti duvidhā jarā – saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca khaṇḍiccādisammato santatiyaṃ ekabhavapariyāpanno
atk-s0515a0:265_1: khandhapurāṇabhāvo ca, sā idha adhippetā. Sā panesā dukkhā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato
atk-s0515a0:265_2: ceva dukkhavatthuto ca. Yaṃ hidaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasithilabhāvato indriyavikāravirūpatā
atk-s0515a0:265_4: dukkhamuppajjati, jarā tassa vatthu. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:270: “Pappoti dukkhaṃ yaṃ macco, kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ tathā;
atk-s0515a0:271: Sabbametaṃ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:272: Idaṃ jarādukkhaṃ anvetīti sambandho. Byādhīti vividhaṃ dukkhaṃ ādahati vidahatīti byādhi. Byādhayati tāpayati kampayatīti vā byādhi.
atk-s0515a0:273_0: Maraṇadukkhanti etthāpi duvidhaṃ maraṇaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:273_2: ca, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “niccaṃ maraṇato bhaya”nti. Taṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Jātipaccayā
atk-s0515a0:273_3: maraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇaṃ sarasamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva
atk-s0515a0:273_4: nāmaṃ. Puna khaṇikamaraṇaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ samucchedamaraṇanti ayampi bhedo veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:273_5: Pavatte rūpārūpadhammānaṃ bhedo khaṇikamaraṇaṃ nāma. Tisso mato phusso matoti idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:273_6: paramatthato sattassa abhāvā, sassaṃ mataṃ, rukkho matoti idampi jīvitindriyassa
atk-s0515a0:273_7: abhāvā sammutimaraṇaṃ nāma. Khīṇāsavassa appaṭisandhikā kālakiriyā samucchedamaraṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:273_8: nāma. Bāhirasammutimaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā itaraṃ sammutimaraṇañca idha yathāvuttappabandhavicchedanabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:273_9: saṅgahitaṃ, dukkhassa pana vatthubhāvato dukkhaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:281_1: phuṭṭhassa antonijjhānalakkhaṇo cittasantāpo. Dukkho panassa dukkhadukkhattā ceva
atk-s0515a0:285: Dukkhampi vividhaṃ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:286: Paridevo nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa vacīpalāpo. Dukkho panassa saṃsāradukkhabhāvato dukkhavatthuto ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:288: Bhiyyodhimattamadhigacchatiyeva dukkhaṃ, dukkhoti tena bhagavā paridevamāhā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:289: Dukkhaṃ nāma kāyapīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ panassa dukkhadukkhattā ceva mānasadukkhāvahanato ca. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:291: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti. ;
atk-s0515a0:292_0: Domanassaṃ nāma cittapīḷanalakkhaṇaṃ mānasaṃ dukkhaṃ. Dukkhaṃ panassa dukkhadukkhattā
atk-s0515a0:292_1: ceva kāyikadukkhāvahanato ca. Cetodukkhasamappitā hi kese pakiriya kandanti, urāni
atk-s0515a0:292_2: patipisenti, āvaṭṭanti, vivaṭṭanti, chinnapapātaṃ papatanti, satthaṃ āharanti, visaṃ
atk-s0515a0:292_3: khādanti, rajjuyā ubbandhanti, aggiṃ pavisanti, nānappakāraṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavanti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:293: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṃ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṃ samāvahati;
atk-s0515a0:295_0: Upāyāso nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito dosoyeva. Saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno
atk-s0515a0:295_1: eko dhammoti eke. Dukkho panassa saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaṃ paridahanato kāyassa
atk-s0515a0:296: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa vihananato ca adhimattaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:297: Yaṃ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:298_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko, tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato
atk-s0515a0:298_1: bahi nikkhamanaṃ viya paridevo, bahi nikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamitumpi appahontassa
atk-s0515a0:298_2: antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:299: Nerayikaṃ dukkhanti niraye pañcavidhabandhanādikaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti, taṃ devadūtasuttena dīpetabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:301: Labhetha dukkhaṃ nu kuhiṃ patiṭṭhaṃ, iccāha dukkhāti munīdha jāti”nti. ;
atk-s0515a0:302: Tiracchānayonikaṃ dukkhanti tiracchānesu kasāpatodatāḷanavijjhanādikaṃ anekavidhaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti, taṃ bālapaṇḍitasuttato gahetabbaṃ. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:304: Yaṃ taṃ kathaṃ tattha bhaveyya jātiṃ, vinā tahiṃ jāti tatopi dukkhā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:305: Pettivisayikaṃ dukkhanti petesu pana khuppipāsa vātātapādinibbattaṃ dukkhañca lokantare tibbandhakāre asayhasītādidukkhañca anveti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:307: Yasmā ajātassa na tattha atthi, tasmāpi dukkhaṃ muni jātimāha.
atk-s0515a0:308: “Tibbandhakāre ca asayhasīte, lokantare yaṃ asuresu dukkhaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:309: Na taṃ bhave tattha na cassa jāti, yato ayaṃ jāti tatopi dukkhā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:310_0: Mānusikaṃ dukkhanti manussesu vadhabandhanādikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0515a0:310_1: “ayañhi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarikādīsu nibbattatī”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:310_2: nayena yaṃ jātidukkhaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ tāva gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Gabbhe
atk-s0515a0:310_3: ṭhitimūlakaṃ dukkhanti yaṃ pana “so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanā”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:310_4: nayena yaṃ tibbaṃ dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ gabbhe ṭhitimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Gabbhā
atk-s0515a0:310_5: vuṭṭhānamūlakaṃ dukkhanti “yaṃ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi
atk-s0515a0:310_6: adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne”tiādinā nayena yaṃ dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ, idaṃ mātukucchito
atk-s0515a0:310_7: bahi nikkhantamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:314: Jātiṃ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
atk-s0515a0:319_1: anveti. Jātassa parādheyyakaṃ dukkhanti parassa aññassa āyattaṃ issariyadukkhaṃ anveti.
atk-s0515a0:319_2: “Sabbaṃ paravasaṃ dukkha”nti hi vuttaṃ. Attūpakkamaṃ dukkhanti yaṃ attanāva attānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:319_4: ubbandhantassa ca dukkhaṃ hoti, idaṃ attūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Parūpakkamaṃ dukkhanti
atk-s0515a0:319_5: yaṃ parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati, idaṃ parūpakkamaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:319_6: anveti. Dukkhadukkhanti kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanā sabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā
atk-s0515a0:319_7: dukkhadukkhaṃ, idaṃ dukkhadukkhaṃ anveti. Saṅkhāradukkhanti upekkhāvedanā ceva avasesā
atk-s0515a0:319_8: ca tebhūmakasaṅkhārā udayabbayapīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṃ, idaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ anveti.
atk-s0515a0:319_9: Vipariṇāmadukkhanti sukhavedanā vipariṇāmadukkhassa hetuto vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:320_0: Mātumaraṇanti mātuyā maraṇaṃ. Pitumaraṇanti pituno maraṇaṃ. Bhātumaraṇanti jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātūnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:320_1: maraṇaṃ. Bhaginimaraṇanti jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ maraṇaṃ. Puttamaraṇanti puttānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:320_2: maraṇaṃ. Dhītumaraṇanti dhītūnaṃ maraṇaṃ. Ñātibyasanaṃ dukkhanti ñātīnaṃ byasanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:320_3: corarogabhayādīhi ñātikkhayo, ñātivināsoti attho. Tena ñātibyasanena phuṭṭhassa ajjhotthaṭassa
atk-s0515a0:320_4: abhibhūtassa uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ ñātibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ, taṃ ñātibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti.
atk-s0515a0:320_5: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – bhogānaṃ byasanaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ, rājacorādivasena
atk-s0515a0:320_6: bhogakkhayo, bhogavināsoti attho. Vuttanayena taṃ bhogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Rogabyasananti
atk-s0515a0:320_7: rogo eva byasanaṃ rogabyasanaṃ. Rogo hi ārogyaṃ byasati vināsetīti byasanaṃ, vuttanayena
atk-s0515a0:320_8: taṃ rogabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Sīlabyasanaṃ dukkhanti sīlassa byasanaṃ sīlabyasanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:320_9: dussīlyassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Vuttanayena taṃ sīlabyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ vināsayamānā
atk-s0515a0:320_10: uppannā diṭṭhiyeva byasanaṃ diṭṭhibyasanaṃ, vuttanayena taṃ diṭṭhibyasanaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:320_11: anveti. Ettha ca purimāni dve anipphannāni, pacchimāni tīṇi nipphannāni tilakkhaṇāhatāni.
atk-s0515a0:320_12: Purimāni ca tīṇi neva kusalāni nākusalāni. Sīladiṭṭhibyasanadvayaṃ akusalaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:321_0: Yathāti opamme. Bhinnaṃ nāvanti sithilabandhanaṃ nāvaṃ, jajjarībhūtaṃ vā padarugghāṭimaṃ
atk-s0515a0:321_1: vā. Dakamesinti udakadāyiṃ udakappavesaniṃ. Tato tato udakaṃ anvetīti tato tato bhinnaṭṭhānato
atk-s0515a0:321_2: udakaṃ pavisati. Puratopīti nāvāya purimabhāgatopi. Pacchatopīti tassā pacchimabhāgatopi.
atk-s0515a0:321_3: Heṭṭhatopīti adhobhāgatopi. Passatopīti ubhayapassatopi. Yaṃ antarantarā na vuttaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:322_0: Tasmā kāyagatāsatiādibhāvanāya jantu, sadā sato hutvā vikkhambhanasamucchedavasena
atk-s0515a0:322_1: rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu sabbappakārampi kilesakāmaṃ parivajjento kāmāni parivajjeyya.
atk-s0515a0:322_2: Evaṃ te kāme pahāya tappahānakaramaggeneva catubbidhampi oghaṃ tareyya tarituṃ sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0515a0:322_3: Tato yathā puriso garukaṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā lahukāya nāvāya appakasireneva pāragū
atk-s0515a0:322_4: bhaveyya pāraṃ gaccheyya, evamevaṃ attabhāvanāvaṃ kilesūdakagarukaṃ siñcitvā lahukena
atk-s0515a0:322_5: attabhāvena pāragū bhaveyya. Sabbadhammapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato bhaveyya, arahattappattiyā
atk-s0515a0:322_6: gaccheyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānenāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0515a0:323_0: Tasmāti yasmā jātiādikaṃ dukkhaṃ etaṃ puggalaṃ anveti, tasmā. Taṃkāraṇā taṃhetūtiādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:323_1: eseva nayo. Yasmā vuttappakāradukkhaṃ etaṃ anveti, taṃhetu. Yasmā anveti tappaccayā,
atk-s0515a0:323_2: yasmā anveti taṃnidānanti evaṃ padayojanā kātabbā. Hetūtiādīni kāraṇavevacanāni.
atk-s0515a0:323_3: Kāraṇañhi tena tassa phalaṃ hinoti pavattatīti hetu. Taṃ taṃ paṭicca phalaṃ eti pavattatīti
atk-s0515a0:323_4: paccayo. “Handa naṃ gaṇhathā”ti dassentaṃ viya attano phalaṃ nidetīti nidānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:324_1: appaccayena saddhiṃ asādhāraṇapaccayapaṭisedho. Taṃnidānāti anidānena saha āgamādhigamanidānapaṭisedho”ti
atk-s0515a0:324_2: evameke vaṇṇayanti. Etaṃ ādīnavaṃ sampassamānoti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ upaddavaṃ vipassanāñāṇena
atk-s0515a0:325_0: Sadāti mūlapadaṃ. Puna sadāti atthapadaṃ. Sadāti sabbadivase. Sabbadāti sabbasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:325_1: kāle. Sabbakālanti pubbaṇhādisabbakālaṃ. Niccakālanti divase divase. Dhuvakālanti
atk-s0515a0:325_2: abbocchinnakālaṃ. Satatanti nirantaraṃ. Samitanti ekībhūtaṃ. Abbokiṇṇanti aññena
atk-s0515a0:325_3: asammissaṃ. Poṅkhānupoṅkhanti paṭipāṭiyā ghaṭitaṃ “poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ avirādhitaṃ upaṭṭhātī”tiādīsu
atk-s0515a0:325_4: viya. Udakūmikajātanti nibbattaudakaūmitaraṅgaṃ viya. Avīcīti aviraḷaṃ. Santatīti
atk-s0515a0:325_5: anupacchinnaṃ. Sahitanti ghaṭitaṃ ekībhūtaṃ vā “sahitaṃ me, asahitaṃ te”tiādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:325_6: Phassitanti phusitaṃ “nivāte phusitaggale”tiādīsu viya. Purebhattaṃ pacchābhattanti
atk-s0515a0:325_7: dve padāni divākālavibhāgavasena. Purimaṃ yāmaṃ majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ pacchimaṃ yāmanti
atk-s0515a0:325_8: tīṇi rattivibhāgavasena. Kāḷe juṇheti aḍḍhamāsavasena. Vasse…pe… gimheti tīṇi utuvasena.
atk-s0515a0:325_9: Purime vayokhandhe…pe… pacchime vayokhandheti tīṇi vayovibhāgavasena vuttānīti ñātabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:326_0: Satoti catūhi kāraṇehi sato. “Kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvento sato”tiādīni
atk-s0515a0:326_1: “evaṃ samucchedato kāme parivajjeyyā”ti pariyosānāni vuttatthāneva. Api ca sattattā
atk-s0515a0:326_2: satoti tīsu vatthūsu sattabhāvena vā tayo kilese paṭikkamāpetuṃ sattibhāvena vā satattā
atk-s0515a0:326_3: sato. Santattāti kilesopakkilese palāpetvā ṭhānena ca ārammaṇena ca pamocetvā santattā
atk-s0515a0:326_4: sato. Samitattāti iṭṭhaphaladāyakapuññena ca aniṭṭhaphaladāyakapāpena ca samitattā
atk-s0515a0:326_5: sato. Santadhammasamannāgatoti sappurisadhamme bhajanato buddhādiariyapuggale sevanato
atk-s0515a0:327_0: Vatthukāme parijānitvāti ete vuttappakāre tebhūmake vatthukāme tīraṇapariññāya jānitvā.
atk-s0515a0:327_1: Pahāyāti kilesakāme pahānapariññāya pariccajitvā. Pajahitvāti chaḍḍetvā. Kiṃ kacavaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:327_2: viya piṭakenāti? Na hi, api ca kho taṃ vinodetvā taritvā vijjhitvā nīharitvā. Kiṃ
atk-s0515a0:327_3: balibaddamiva patodenāti? Na hi, atha kho taṃ byantiṃ karitvā vigatantaṃ karitvā.
atk-s0515a0:327_4: Yathāssa antopi nāvasissati, antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, tathā taṃ karitvā. Kathaṃ pana
atk-s0515a0:327_5: taṃ tathā katanti? Anabhāvaṃ gahetvā anu abhāvaṃ gametvā. Samucchedappahānena yathā
atk-s0515a0:327_6: samucchinnā hoti, tathā karitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Esa nayo kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīsu.
atk-s0515a0:328_1: rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti ca. Diṭṭhoghoti sassatadiṭṭhādisahagatā bhave
atk-s0515a0:328_2: patthanāyeva, diṭṭhogho bhavoghe eva samodhānaṃ gacchati. Avijjogho catūsu saccesu
atk-s0515a0:328_3: aññāṇaṃ. Tattha kāmaguṇe assādato manasi karoto anuppanno ca kāmogho uppajjati, uppanno
atk-s0515a0:328_4: ca kāmogho saṃvaḍḍhati. Mahaggatadhamme assādato manasi karoto anuppanno ca bhavogho
atk-s0515a0:328_5: uppajjati, uppanno ca saṃvaḍḍhati. Tebhūmakadhammesu catuvipallāsapadaṭṭhānabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:328_6: anuppanno ca avijjogho uppajjati, uppanno ca saṃvaḍḍhatīti veditabbo. Vuttanayapaccanīkato
atk-s0515a0:329_0: Appaṇihitavimokkhaṃ paṭipanno kāmoghaṃ, animittavimokkhaṃ paṭipanno bhavoghaṃ, suññatavimokkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:329_1: paṭipanno avijjoghañca tareyya. Paṭhamamaggavasena tareyya, dutiyamaggavasena uttareyya,
atk-s0515a0:329_2: tatiyamaggavasena patareyya, catutthamaggavasena samatikkameyya, phalavasena vītivatteyyāti.
atk-s0515a0:329_3: Atha vā “kāmoghavasena tareyya, bhavoghavasena uttareyya, diṭṭhoghavasena patareyya,
atk-s0515a0:329_4: avijjoghavasena samatikkameyya, sabboghavasena vītivatteyyā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:330_0: Garukanti na sallahukaṃ. Bhārikanti bhārabhaṇḍaṃ ettha ṭhapayantīti bhārikaṃ. Udakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:330_1: sitvāti udakaṃ siñcitvā. Osiñcitvāti atirekaṃ siñcitvā. Chaḍḍetvāti pātetvā. Lahukāyāti
atk-s0515a0:330_2: sallahukāya. Khippanti sīghaṃ. Lahunti taṃkhaṇaṃ. Appakasirenevāti nidukkheneva.
atk-s0515a0:330_3: Pāraṃ vuccati amataṃ nibbānanti sakkāyaorato pārabhūtaṃ pāraṃ. Taṇhāvānato nikkhantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:330_4: nibbānaṃ kathīyati. Yosoti yo eso. Sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādi sabbaṃ nibbānameva.
atk-s0515a0:330_5: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni samanti vūpasamanti, tasmā “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti
atk-s0515a0:330_6: vuccati. Yasmā cetaṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti, sabbā taṇhā khīyanti,
atk-s0515a0:330_7: sabbe kilesarajjā virajjanti, sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nirujjhati, tasmā “sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo,
atk-s0515a0:330_8: taṇhakkhayo, virāgo, nirodho”ti vuccati. Yā panesā taṇhā bhavena bhavaṃ, phalena
atk-s0515a0:330_9: vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati, tato nikkhantaṃ vānatoti
atk-s0515a0:330_10: nibbānaṃ. Pāraṃ gaccheyya nimittavasena ekato vuṭṭhānagotrabhuñāṇena nibbānapāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:330_12: visesena pāpuṇeyya. Phuseyya nibbānārammaṇaphalacittavasena nibbānapāraṃ phuseyya.
atk-s0515a0:330_13: Sacchikareyya guṇavasena phusitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena nibbānapāraṃ paccakkhaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0515a0:330_14: Atha vā “paṭhamamaggena pāraṃ gaccheyya, dutiyena adhigaccheyya, tatiyena phuseyya,
atk-s0515a0:330_15: catutthena sacchi kareyyā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Yopi pāraṃ gantukāmoti yo koci vipassanāñāṇe
atk-s0515a0:330_16: ṭhito puggalo nibbānapāraṃ gantukāmo, sopi avassaṃ tattha gamissatīti pāragū. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:330_17: – “otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehī”tiādi.
atk-s0515a0:330_18: Pubbabhāge ajjhāsayavasena vipassanāyogena ca, sopi pāragū nāma. Yopi pāraṃ gacchatīti
atk-s0515a0:330_19: yopi maggasamaṅgī nibbānapāraṃ gacchati, sopi pāragū nāma. Yopi pāraṃ gatoti yopi
atk-s0515a0:330_20: maggena kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā phale ṭhito nibbānapāraṅgato, sopi pāragū nāma.
atk-s0515a0:331_0: Taṃ jinavacanena dassetuṃ “vuttampi hetaṃ bhagavatā – tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati
atk-s0515a0:331_1: brāhmaṇo”tiādimāha. Abhiññāpāragūti adhigatena ñāṇena ñātapariññāya nibbānapāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:331_2: gantukāmo gacchati, gatoti pāragū. Pariññāpāragūti sabbadhammānaṃ tīraṇapariññāya
atk-s0515a0:331_3: samatikkamitvā vuttanayena pāragū. Pahānapāragūti samudayapakkhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānapariññāya
atk-s0515a0:331_4: samatikkamitvā vuttanayena pāragū. Yo hi sabbadhammaṃ parijānāti, so tīhi pariññāhi
atk-s0515a0:331_5: parijānāti ñātapariññāya tīraṇapariññāya pahānapariññāyāti. Tattha katamā ñātapariññā?
atk-s0515a0:331_6: Sabbadhammaṃ jānāti “ime ajjhattikā, ime bāhirā, idamassa lakkhaṇaṃ, imāni rasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī”ti,
atk-s0515a0:331_7: ayaṃ ñātapariññā. Katamā tīraṇapariññā? Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā labbhamānavasena sabbadhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:331_8: tīreti “aniccato dukkhato rogato”tiādinā, ayaṃ tīraṇapariññā. Katamā pahānapariññā?
atk-s0515a0:331_9: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena dhammesu chandarāgaṃ pajahati, ayaṃ pahānapariññāti. Imā
atk-s0515a0:331_10: pariññāyo sandhāya “so abhiññāpāragū pariññāpāragū pahānapāragū”ti āha.
atk-s0515a0:332_0: Bhāvanāpāragūti bhāvanāya koṭiṃ patvā maggavasena nibbānapāraṃ gato. Sacchikiriyāpāragūti
atk-s0515a0:332_1: phalanibbānavasena sacchi kiriyāphalanibbānapāraṃ gato. Samāpattipāragūti aṭṭhannaṃ
atk-s0515a0:332_2: samāpattīnaṃ pāraṃ patto. Sabbadhammānanti pañcakkhandhādisabbadhammānaṃ. Sabbadukkhānanti
atk-s0515a0:332_5: sabbāsampi aṭṭhannaṃ rūpārūpasamāpattīnaṃ. Soti so ariyo. Vasippattoti vasībhāvappatto.
atk-s0515a0:332_6: Atha vā kantabhāvaṃ issariyabhāvaṃ nipphannabhāvaṃ patto. Pāramippattoti pāramīti
atk-s0515a0:332_7: avasānaṃ niṭṭhānaṃ, uttamabhāvaṃ vā taṃ patto. Kattha pattoti āha “ariyasmiṃ sīlasmi”ntiādi.
atk-s0515a0:332_8: Tattha ariyasmiṃ sīlasminti niddose sīlasmiṃ. Ariyasmiṃ samādhisminti niddose samādhismiṃ.
atk-s0515a0:332_9: Ariyāya paññāyāti niddosāya paññāya. Ariyāya vimuttiyāti niddosāya phalavimuttiyā.
atk-s0515a0:332_10: Purimena vācākammantājīvā gahitā, dutiyena vāyāmasatisamādhayo gahitā, tatiyena vitakkasammādiṭṭhiyo
atk-s0515a0:332_11: gahitā, catutthena taṃsampayuttā sesadhammā gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:333_0: Antagatoti maggena saṅkhāralokantaṃ gato. Antappattoti tameva lokantaṃ phalena patto.
atk-s0515a0:333_1: Koṭigatoti maggena saṅkhārakoṭiṃ gato. Koṭippattoti tameva koṭiṃ phalena patto. Pariyantagatoti
atk-s0515a0:333_2: maggena khandhāyatanādilokapariyantaṃ paricchedaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā gato. Pariyantappattoti
atk-s0515a0:333_3: tameva lokaṃ phalena pariyantaṃ katvā patto. Vosānagatoti maggena avasānaṃ gato.
atk-s0515a0:333_4: Vosānappattoti phalena avasānaṃ patto. Tāṇagatoti maggena tāyanaṃ gato. Tāṇappattoti
atk-s0515a0:333_5: phalena tāyanaṃ patto. Leṇagatoti maggena nilīyanaṃ gato. Leṇappattoti taṃ phalena
atk-s0515a0:333_6: nilīyanaṃ patto. Saraṇagatoti maggena patiṭṭhaṃ gato. Saraṇappattoti phalena saraṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:333_7: patto. Abhayagatoti maggena nibbhayaṃ gato. Abhayappattoti phalena nibbhayaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:333_8: patto. Accutagatoti cutivirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Accutappattoti taṃ phalena
atk-s0515a0:333_9: patto. Amatagatoti maraṇarahitaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Amatappattoti taṃ phalena
atk-s0515a0:333_10: patto. Nibbānagatoti taṇhāvānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ maggena gato. Nibbānappattoti
atk-s0515a0:333_11: tameva phalena patto. So vuṭṭhavāsoti so arahā dasasu ariyavāsesu vasi parivasi vuṭṭho
atk-s0515a0:333_12: vuṭṭhāti ca vuṭṭhavāso. Ciṇṇacaraṇoti sīlena saha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasīti
atk-s0515a0:333_13: ciṇṇacaraṇo. Gataddhoti saṃsāraddhānaṃ atikkanto. Gatadisoti supinantenapi agatapubbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:333_14: nibbānadisaṃ gato. Gatakoṭikoti anupādisesanibbānakoṭiṃ gato hutvā ṭhito. Pālitabrahmacariyoti
atk-s0515a0:333_15: rakkhitabrahmacariyo. Uttamadiṭṭhippattoti uttamaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ patto. Paṭividdhākuppoti
atk-s0515a0:333_16: akuppaṃ acalanaṃ arahattaphalaṃ paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. Sacchikatanirodhoti nirodhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:334_0: Dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātanti tividhaṃ dukkhaṃ tena samatikkamitvā paricchinnaṃ. Abhiññeyyanti
atk-s0515a0:334_1: sabhāvalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena sobhanena ākārena jānitabbaṃ. Abhiññātanti adhikena
atk-s0515a0:334_2: ñāṇena ñātaṃ. Pariññeyyanti sāmaññalakkhaṇāvabodhavasena kiccasamāpannavasena ca
atk-s0515a0:334_3: byāpitvā parijānitabbaṃ. Pariññātanti samantato ñātaṃ. Bhāvetabbanti vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:334_4: Sacchikātabbanti paccakkhaṃ kātabbaṃ. Duvidhā hi sacchikiriyā paṭilābhasacchikiriyā
atk-s0515a0:335_0: Ukkhittapalighoti ettha palighoti vaṭṭamūlikā avijjā. Ayañhi dukkhipanaṭṭhena “paligho”ti
atk-s0515a0:335_1: vuccati. Tenesa tassā ukkhittattā “ukkhittapaligho”ti vutto. Saṃkiṇṇaparikhoti parikhā
atk-s0515a0:335_2: vuccati punabbhavadāyako bhavesu jāyanavasena ceva saṃsaraṇavasena ca “jātisaṃsāro”ti
atk-s0515a0:335_3: laddhanāmānaṃ punabbhavakkhandhānaṃ paccayo kammābhisaṅkhāro. So hi punappunaṃ uppattikaraṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:335_4: parikkhipitvā ṭhitattā “parikhā”ti vuccati. Tenesa tassā saṃkiṇṇattā vikiṇṇattā “saṃkiṇṇaparikho”ti
atk-s0515a0:335_5: vutto. Abbūḷhesikoti esikāti vaṭṭamūlikā taṇhā. Ayañhi gambhīrānugataṭṭhena “esikā”ti
atk-s0515a0:335_6: vuccati. Tenesa tassā abbūḷhattā luñcitvā chaḍḍitattā “abbūḷhesiko”ti vuccati. Niraggaḷoti
atk-s0515a0:335_7: aggaḷaṃ vuccanti orambhāgajanakāni kāmabhave uppattipaccayāni orambhāgiyāni. Etāni
atk-s0515a0:335_8: hi mahākavāṭaṃ viya nagaradvāraṃ cittaṃ pidahitvā ṭhitattā “aggaḷa”nti vuccanti.
atk-s0515a0:335_9: Tenesa tesaṃ niraggaḷattā bhinnattā “niraggaḷo”ti vutto. Ariyoti nikkileso parisuddho.
atk-s0515a0:335_11: pannā oropitā assāti pannabhāro. Api ca idha mānabhārasseva oropitattā “pannabhāro”ti
atk-s0515a0:335_12: adhippeto. Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi ca visaṃyutto. Idha pana mānayogeneva
atk-s0515a0:336_0: Ettāvatā therena maggena kilese khepetvā nirodhasayanavaragatassa khīṇāsavassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_1: phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharaṇakālo dassito. Yathā hi dve nagarāni ekaṃ coranagaraṃ,
atk-s0515a0:336_2: ekaṃ khemanagaraṃ. Atha ekassa mahāyodhassa evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya “yāvimaṃ coranagaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_3: tiṭṭhati, tāva khemanagaraṃ bhayato na muccati. Coranagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti
atk-s0515a0:336_4: sannāhaṃ katvā khaggaṃ gahetvā coranagaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nagaradvāre ussāpite esikatthambhe
atk-s0515a0:336_5: khaggena chinditvā saddhiṃ dvārabāhāhi kavāṭaṃ bhinditvā palighaṃ ukkhipitvā pākāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_6: bhindanto parikhaṃ saṃkiritvā nagarasobhanatthāya ussāpite dhaje pātetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_7: agginā jhāpetvā khemanagaraṃ pavisitvā uparipāsādamāruyha ñātigaṇaparivuto surasabhojanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_8: bhuñjeyya. Evaṃ coranagaraṃ viya sakkāyo, khemanagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ, mahāyodho viya
atk-s0515a0:336_9: yogāvacaro. Tassevaṃ hoti “yāva sakkāyavaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭati, tāva dvattiṃsakammakāraṇehi
atk-s0515a0:336_10: aṭṭhanavutirogehi pañcavīsatimahabbhayehi ca parimuccanaṃ natthī”ti. So mahāyodho
atk-s0515a0:336_11: viya sannāhaṃ sīlasannāhaṃ katvā paññātiṇhakhaggaṃ gahetvā khaggena esikatthambhe
atk-s0515a0:336_12: viya arahattamaggena taṇhesikaṃ chinditvā, so yodho sadvārabāhakaṃ nagarakavāṭaṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_13: viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanaggaḷaṃ ugghoṭetvā, so yodho palighaṃ viya avijjāpalighaṃ
atk-s0515a0:336_14: ukkhipitvā, so yodho pākāraṃ bhindanto parikhaṃ viya kammābhisaṅkhārapākāraṃ bhindanto
atk-s0515a0:336_15: jātisaṃsāraparikhaṃ saṃkiritvā, so yodho nagarasobhanatthāya ussāpite dhaje viya
atk-s0515a0:336_16: mānaddhaje pātetvā sakkāyanagaraṃ jhāpetvā, so yodho khemanagaraṃ pavisitvā uparipāsāde
atk-s0515a0:336_17: surasabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto viya nibbānanagaraṃ pavisitvā amatanirodhārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattisukhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:337_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ukkhittapaligho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjā
atk-s0515a0:337_1: pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:338: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃkiṇṇaparikho hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ponobhaviko jātisaṃsāro pahīno hoti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṃkiṇṇaparikho hoti.
atk-s0515a0:339: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbūḷhesiko hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbūḷhesiko hoti.
atk-s0515a0:340: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggaḷo hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni pahīnāni honti…pe… evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu niraggaḷo hoti.
atk-s0515a0:341_0: “Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaṃyutto hoti? Idha,
atk-s0515a0:341_1: bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato
atk-s0515a0:341_2: āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo. Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaṃyutto hoti.
atk-s0515a0:342: “Evaṃ vimuttacittaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṃ saindā devā sabrahmakā sapajāpatikā anvesaṃ nādhigacchanti ‘idaṃnissitaṃ tathāgatassa viññāṇa”’nti.
atk-s0515a0:343: Pañcaṅgavippahīnoti kāmacchandādipañcaṅgāni vividhehi upāyehi pajahitvā ṭhito. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:344_0: “Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hoti? Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno kāmacchando pahīno
atk-s0515a0:344_1: hoti, byāpādo pahīno hoti, thinamiddhaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a0:344_2: vicikicchā pahīnā hoti. Evaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu pañcaṅgavippahīno hotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:345_0: Chaḷaṅgasamannāgatoti channaṃ aṅgānaṃ pūretvā chasu dvāresu rūpādiārammaṇe paṭighānunayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:345_1: vajjetvā upekkhāvasena sato sampajāno hutvā viharaṇavasena chaḷaṅgāni pūretvā paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:346_0: “Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hoti? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:346_1: disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Sotena saddaṃ
atk-s0515a0:346_2: sutvā…pe… ghānena gandhaṃ ghāyitvā, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyitvā, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusitvā,
atk-s0515a0:346_3: manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
atk-s0515a0:346_4: Evaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu chaḷaṅgasamannāgato hotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:347: Ekārakkhoti satiārakkhena eko uttamo ārakkho assāti ekārakkho. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:348: “Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu ekārakkho hoti? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu satārakkhena cetasā samannāgato viharati. Evaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu ekārakkho hotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:349_1: apassayānaṃ ito cito ca aparivattamānānaṃ vasena caturāpasseno, tesaṃ pāpuṇitvā ṭhito. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:350_0: “Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu caturāpasseno hoti? Idhāvuso, bhikkhu saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati,
atk-s0515a0:350_1: saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti. Saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ pajahatī”tiādinā nayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:351: Paṇunnapaccekasaccoti “idameva dassanaṃ saccaṃ, idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni paṇunnāni nihaṭāni pahīnāni assāti paṇunnapaccekasacco.
atk-s0515a0:352_0: Samavayasaṭṭhesanoti ettha avayāti anūnā. Saṭṭhāti vissaṭṭhā. Sammā avayā saṭṭhā
atk-s0515a0:352_1: esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano. Sammā vissaṭṭhasabbaesanoti attho. Kevalīti paripuṇṇo.
atk-s0515a0:352_2: Vusitavāti vusitabrahmacariyo, garusaṃvāse ariyamaggepi dasasu ariyavāsesupi vusitavanto.
atk-s0515a0:352_3: Uttamapurisoti khīṇakilesattā visesapuriso ājaññapuriso. Paramapurisoti uttamapuriso,
atk-s0515a0:352_4: paramaṃ vā paṭilābhaṃ pattattā uttamaṃ pattabbaṃ arahattapaṭilābhaṃ patto anuttarapuññakkhettabhūto
atk-s0515a0:352_5: uttamapuriso, tenevatthena paramapuriso. Anuttaraṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ amataṃ
atk-s0515a0:352_6: paṭilābhaṃ pattattā paramapattippatto. Atha vā “gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā sāsanapavisanavasena
atk-s0515a0:352_7: uttamapuriso. Attabhāve ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā vipassanāpavisanavasena paramapuriso.
atk-s0515a0:352_8: Kilese ādīnavaṃ sañjānitvā ariyabhūmantaraṃ paviṭṭho paramapattippattoti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:353_0: Nevācinatīti kusalākusalānaṃ pahīnattā tesaṃ vipākaṃ na vaḍḍheti. Nāpacinatīti phale
atk-s0515a0:353_1: ṭhitattā na viddhaṃseti. Apacinitvā ṭhitoti paṭippassaddhipahāne ṭhitattā kilese
atk-s0515a0:353_2: viddhaṃsetvā ṭhito. Ito paraṃ tīhipi padehi maggaphalavaseneva yojetabbaṃ. Neva pajahatīti
atk-s0515a0:353_3: pahātabbābhāvena kilese na pajahati. Na upādiyatīti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi gahetabbābhāvato
atk-s0515a0:353_4: tehi na gaṇhāti. Pajahitvā ṭhitoti cajitvā ṭhito. Neva saṃsibbatīti taṇhāvasena neva
atk-s0515a0:353_5: saṃsibbati. Na ussinetīti mānavasena na ukkaṃsati. Visinitvā ṭhitoti taṇhāsaṃsīvanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:353_6: akatvā ṭhitoti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Neva vidhūpetīti kilesaggiṃ na nibbāpeti. Na sandhūpetīti
atk-s0515a0:353_7: kilesaggiṃ na jālāpeti. Vidhūpetvā ṭhitoti taṃ nibbāpetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0515a0:354_1: sīlarāsinā samannāgatattā ṭhito, aparihīnabhāvena ṭhito. Samādhikkhandhenāti vāyāmasatīhi
atk-s0515a0:354_3: paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. Saccaṃ sampaṭipādiyitvāti catuariyasaccaṃ sabhāvavasena sakasantāne
atk-s0515a0:354_4: sampādiyitvā paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito. Ejaṃ samatikkamitvāti kampanataṇhaṃ atikkamitvā.
atk-s0515a0:354_5: Kilesagginti rāgādikilesaggiṃ. Pariyādiyitvāti khepetvā nibbāpetvā. Aparigamanatāyāti
atk-s0515a0:354_6: saṃsāre agamanabhāvena punāgamanābhāvenāti attho. Kaṭaṃ samādāyāti jayaggāhaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0515a0:354_7: Muttipaṭisevanatāyāti sabbakilesehi muccitvā rūpādiārammaṇasevanavasena. Atha vā
atk-s0515a0:354_9: parisuddhabhāve ṭhitāya mettāya ṭhito. Karuṇādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:355_0: Accantapārisuddhiyāti atikkantaparisuddhabhāvena parisuddhiyā antaṃ pāpuṇitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0515a0:355_1: Atammayatāyāti taṇhādiṭṭhimānā “tammayā”ti vuccanti. Tesaṃ abhāvo atammayatā, tāya
atk-s0515a0:356_0: “So tādiso lokavidū sumedho, sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munī”ti. Etthāpi taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivirahitoti
atk-s0515a0:357_0: Khandhapariyanteti ekacatupañcakkhandhānaṃ tīhi pariññaggīhi jhāpetvā ante avasāne
atk-s0515a0:357_1: ṭhito, natthi etassa antoti vā pariyantaṃ, tasmiṃ pariyante. Dhātupariyantādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:357_2: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – dhātupariyanteti aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ pariyante.
atk-s0515a0:357_3: Āyatanapariyanteti dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ. Gatipariyanteti nirayādipañcannaṃ gatīnaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:357_7: kammavipākakilesavaṭṭānaṃ pariyante. Antime bhaveti avasāne upapattibhave. Antime
atk-s0515a0:357_8: samussaye ṭhitoti avasāne samussaye sarīre ṭhito. Antimadehadharoti antimaṃ avasānadehaṃ
atk-s0515a0:357_9: sarīraṃ dhāretīti antimadehadharo. Arahāti ārakattā arīnaṃ, arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:358_0: Tassāyaṃ pacchimakoti tassa khīṇāsavassa ayaṃ samussayo attabhāvo avasāno. Carimoti
atk-s0515a0:358_1: appo mando carimo ālopo, carimaṃ kabaḷaṃ viya. Puna paṭisandhiyā natthibhāvaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0515a0:358_2: “jātimaraṇasaṃsāro, natthi tassa punabbhavo”ti āha. Jananaṃ jāti, maranti tenāti
atk-s0515a0:358_3: maraṇaṃ, khandhādīnaṃ abbocchinnā saṃsārapavatti ca tassa khīṇāsavassa puna natthīti
atk-s0515a0:358_4: vuttaṃ gāthaṃ nigamento āha tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0515a0:360: Imasmiṃ sutte yaṃ antarantarā na vuttaṃ, taṃ pāṭhānusārena gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:364_0: 7. Dutiye – sattoti laggo. Guhāyanti kāye. Kāyo hi rāgādīnaṃ vāḷānaṃ vasanokāsato
atk-s0515a0:364_1: “guhā”ti vuccati. Bahunābhichannoti bahunā rāgādikilesajātena abhicchanno. Etena
atk-s0515a0:364_2: ajjhattabandhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tiṭṭhanti rāgādivasena tiṭṭhanto. Mohanasmiṃ pagāḷhoti
atk-s0515a0:364_3: mohanaṃ vuccati kāmaguṇo. Ettha hi devamanussā muyhanti tesu ajjhogāḷhā hutvā; etena
atk-s0515a0:364_4: bāhirabandhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho soti so tathārūpo naro tividhāpi
atk-s0515a0:364_5: kāyavivekādivivekā dūre, anāsanne. Kiṃkāraṇā? Kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyāti yasmā
atk-s0515a0:364_6: loke kāmā suppahāyā na honti, tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:365_0: Sattoti hi kho vuttanti “satto, naro, mānavo”ti evamādinā nayena kathitoyeva. Guhā
atk-s0515a0:365_1: tāva vattabbāti guhā tāva kathetabbā. Kāyoti vātiādīsu ayaṃ tāva padayojanā – kāyo
atk-s0515a0:365_2: iti vā guhā iti vā…pe… kumbho iti vāti. Tattha kāyoti “kucchitānaṃ āyoti kāyo”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:365_3: heṭṭhā satipaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva. Rāgādivāḷānaṃ vasanokāsaṭṭhena guhā, “paṭicchādanaṭṭhenā”tipi
atk-s0515a0:365_4: eke. “Dūraṅgamaṃ ekacaraṃ, asarīraṃ guhāsaya”ntiādīsu viya. Rāgādīhi jhāpanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:365_5: deho “te hitvā mānusaṃ deha”ntiādīsu viya. Pamattakaraṇaṭṭhena sandeho “bhijjati
atk-s0515a0:365_6: pūtisandeho, maraṇantañhi jīvita”ntiādīsu viya. Saṃsāre sañcaraṇaṭṭhena nāvā “siñca
atk-s0515a0:365_7: bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessatī”tiādīsu viya. Iriyāpathassa atthibhāvaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:365_8: ratho “ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu viya. Accuggataṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:366_0: Kimikulānaṃ āvāsabhāvena vammiko “vammikoti kho, bhikkhu, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa
atk-s0515a0:366_1: kāyassa adhivacana”ntiādīsu viya. Yatheva hi bāhirako vammiko, vamati vantako vantussayo
atk-s0515a0:366_2: vantasinehasambaddhoti catūhi kāraṇehi “vammiko”ti vuccati. So hi ahinakulaundūragharagoḷikādayo
atk-s0515a0:366_3: nānappakāre pāṇake vamatīti vammiko. Upacikāhi vantakoti vammiko. Upacikāhi vamitvā
atk-s0515a0:366_4: mukhatuṇḍakehi ukkhittapaṃsucuṇṇena kaṭippamāṇenapi porisappamāṇenapi ussitoti vammiko.
atk-s0515a0:366_5: Upacikāhi vantakheḷasinehena ābaddhatāya sattasattāhaṃ deve vassantepi na vippakirīyati,
atk-s0515a0:366_6: nidāghepi tato paṃsumuṭṭhiṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ muṭṭhinā pīḷiyamāne sineho nikkhamati,
atk-s0515a0:366_7: evaṃ vantasinehena sambaddhoti vammiko. Evamayaṃ kāyopi “akkhimhā aggigūthako”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:366_8: nayena nānappakāraṃ asucikalimalaṃ vamatīti vammiko. Buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā
atk-s0515a0:366_9: imasmiṃ attabhāve nikantipariyādānena attabhāvaṃ chaḍḍetvā gatāti ariyehi vantakotipi
atk-s0515a0:366_10: vammiko. Yehi cāyaṃ tīhi aṭṭhisatehi ussito nahārusambaddho maṃsāvalepano allacammapariyonaddho
atk-s0515a0:366_11: chavirañjito satte vañceti, taṃ sabbaṃ ariyehi vantamevāti vantussayotipi vammiko.
atk-s0515a0:366_12: “Taṇhā janeti purisaṃ, cittamassa vidhāvatī”ti evaṃ taṇhāya janitattā ariyehi vanteneva
atk-s0515a0:366_13: taṇhāsinehena sambaddho ayanti vantasinehena sambaddhotipi vammiko. Yathā ca vammikassa
atk-s0515a0:366_14: anto nānappakārā pāṇakā tattheva jāyanti, uccārapassāvaṃ karonti, gilānā sayanti,
atk-s0515a0:366_15: matā nipatanti. Iti so tesaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:366_17: kāyo”ti acintetvā chavinissitā pāṇā cammanissitā pāṇā maṃsanissitā pāṇā nahārunissitā
atk-s0515a0:366_18: pāṇā aṭṭhinissitā pāṇā aṭṭhimiñjanissitā pāṇāti evaṃ kulagaṇanāya asītimattāni kimikulasahassāni
atk-s0515a0:366_19: antokāyasmiṃyeva jāyanti, uccārapassāvaṃ karonti, gelaññena āturitāni sayanti, matāmatā
atk-s0515a0:366_20: nipatanti. Iti ayampi tesaṃ pāṇānaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā susānañca hotīti
atk-s0515a0:367_1: kulāvakabhāvena nīḷaṃ “roganīḷaṃ pabhaṅgura”ntiādīsu viya. Paṭisandhiyā nivāsagehaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:367_2: kuṭi “pañcadvārāyaṃ kuṭikāyaṃ pasakkiyā”tiādīsu viya. Pūtibhāvena gaṇḍo “rogoti bhikkhave,
atk-s0515a0:367_3: gaṇḍoti bhikkhave, salloti bhikkhave, kāyassetaṃ adhivacana”ntiādīsu viya. Bhijjanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:367_4: kumbho “kumbhūpamaṃ kāyamimaṃ viditvā”tiādīsu viya. Kāyassetaṃ adhivacananti etaṃ
atk-s0515a0:367_5: vuttappakāraṃ catumahābhūtamayassa kucchitadhammānaṃ āyassa adhivacanaṃ, kathananti
atk-s0515a0:367_6: attho. Guhāyanti sarīrasmiṃ. Sattoti allīno. Visattoti vaṇṇarāgādivasena vividho
atk-s0515a0:367_7: allīno. Saṇṭhānarāgavasena āsatto. Tattheva “subhaṃ sukha”nti gahaṇavasena laggo.
atk-s0515a0:367_8: Attaggahaṇavasena laggito. Palibuddhoti phassarāgavasena amuñcitvā ṭhito. Bhittikhileti
atk-s0515a0:367_9: bhittiyaṃ ākoṭitakhāṇuke. Nāgadanteti tatheva hatthidantasadise vaṅkadaṇḍake. Sattanti
atk-s0515a0:367_10: bhittikhile laggaṃ. Visattanti nāgadante laggaṃ. Āsattanti cīvaravaṃse laggaṃ. Lagganti
atk-s0515a0:367_11: cīvararajjuyā laggaṃ. Laggitanti pīṭhapāde laggaṃ. Palibuddhanti mañcapāde lagganti
atk-s0515a0:368_0: Lagganādhivacananti visesena allīyanakathanaṃ. Channoti vuttappakārehi kilesehi chādito.
atk-s0515a0:368_1: Punappunaṃ uppattivasena uparūpari channoti ucchanno. Āvutoti āvarito. Nivutoti vārito.
atk-s0515a0:368_2: Ophutoti avattharitvā chādito. Pihitoti bhājanena ukkhalimukhaṃ viya paliguṇṭhito.
atk-s0515a0:368_3: Paṭicchannoti āvaṭo. Paṭikujjitoti adhomukhaṃ ṭhapito. Tattha tiṇapaṇṇādīhi chāditaṃ
atk-s0515a0:368_4: viya channo. Ucchanno nadiṃ āvaraṇasetu viya. Āvuto janasañcaraṇamaggāvaraṇaṃ viya.
atk-s0515a0:369_0: Vinibaddho mānavasenāti nānāvidhena mānātimānavasena nānāvidhe ārammaṇe baddho hutvā
atk-s0515a0:369_1: tiṭṭhati. Parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhivasenāti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena parāmaṭṭho āmasitvā
atk-s0515a0:369_2: gahito. Vikkhepagato uddhaccavasenāti ārammaṇe asantiṭṭhanavasena cittavikkhepaṃ
atk-s0515a0:369_3: patto upagato. Aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchāvasenāti ratanattayādīsu kaṅkhāsaṅkhātāya vicikicchāya
atk-s0515a0:369_4: vasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ appatto. Thāmagato anusayavasenāti dunnīharaṇaappahīnānusayavasena
atk-s0515a0:370_0: Rūpūpayanti taṇhādiṭṭhūpayavasena rūpaṃ upagantvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:370_1: tiṭṭhatīti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe rūpārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhantaṃ tiṭṭhati. Rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:370_2: rūpapatiṭṭhanti rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā rūpameva patiṭṭhaṃ katvā. Nandūpasecananti
atk-s0515a0:370_3: sappītikataṇhodakena āsittaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Vuddhinti vuddhibhāvaṃ. Virūḷhinti javanavasena
atk-s0515a0:371_0: Atthi rāgotiādīni lobhasseva nāmāni. So hi rañjanavasena rāgo, nandanavasena nandī,
atk-s0515a0:371_1: taṇhāyanavasena taṇhāti vuccati. Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā
atk-s0515a0:371_3: bhummaṃ. Sabbattha vā purimapade etaṃ bhummaṃ. Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti
atk-s0515a0:371_4: idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyatiṃ vaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ. Yattha
atk-s0515a0:371_5: atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0515a0:371_6: Tattha purimasuttaṃ rūpādiārammaṇalagganavasena vuttaṃ, dutiyasuttaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:371_7: abhinandanavasena vuttaṃ, tatiyaṃ viññāṇapatiṭṭhānavasena vuttaṃ, catutthaṃ catubbidhaāhāravasena,
atk-s0515a0:372_0: Yebhuyyenāti pāyena. Muyhantīti mohaṃ āpajjanti. Sammuyhantīti visesena muyhanti.
atk-s0515a0:372_1: Sampamuyhantīti sabbākārena muyhanti. Atha vā rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭicca muyhanti, saddārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:372_2: paṭicca sammuyhanti, mutārammaṇaṃ paṭicca sampamuyhanti. Avijjāya andhīkatāti aṭṭhasu
atk-s0515a0:372_3: ṭhānesu aññāṇāya avijjāya andhīkatā. “Gatā”ti vā pāṭho, andhabhāvaṃ upagatāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:372_4: Pagāḷhoti paviṭṭho. Ogāḷhoti heṭṭhābhāgaṃ paviṭṭho. Ajjhogāḷhoti adhiogāhitvā avattharitvā
atk-s0515a0:372_5: visesena paviṭṭho nimuggoti adhomukhaṃ hutvā paviṭṭho. Atha vā dassanasaṃsaggena
atk-s0515a0:372_6: ogāḷho. Savanasaṃsaggena ajjhogāḷho. Vacanasaṃsaggena nimuggo. Sappurisasaṃsaggavirahito
atk-s0515a0:372_7: vā ogāḷho. Saddhammasevanavirahito vā ajjhogāḷho. Dhammānudhammapaṭipattivirahito vā nimuggo.
atk-s0515a0:373_0: Vivekāti vivitti, viviccanaṃ vā viveko. Tayoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Kāyavivekoti kāyena
atk-s0515a0:373_1: vivitti, vinā apasakkanaṃ. Cittavivekādīsupi eseva nayo. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane.
atk-s0515a0:373_2: Saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanato bhikkhu. Vivittanti suññaṃ, appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho.
atk-s0515a0:373_3: Etadeva hi sandhāya vibhaṅge “vivittanti santike cepi senāsanaṃ hoti, tañca anākiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:373_4: gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi, tena taṃ vivitta”nti vuttaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:374_0: “Senāsananti mañcopi senāsanaṃ, pīṭhampi… bhisipi… bibbohanampi… vihāropi… aḍḍhayogopi…
atk-s0515a0:374_1: pāsādopi… aṭṭopi… māḷopi… leṇampi… guhāpi… rukkhamūlampi… veḷugumbopi… yattha vā
atk-s0515a0:375_0: Api ca vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhāti idaṃ vihārasenāsanaṃ nāma. Mañco pīṭhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:375_1: bhisi bibbohananti idaṃ mañcapīṭhasenāsanaṃ nāma. Cimilikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro
atk-s0515a0:375_2: paṇṇasanthāroti idaṃ santhatasenāsanaṃ nāma. Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamanti,
atk-s0515a0:375_3: idaṃ okāsasenāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubbidhaṃ senāsanaṃ hoti. Taṃ sabbampi senāsanaggahaṇena gahitameva.
atk-s0515a0:376_0: Idha panassa sakuṇasadisassa cātuddisassa bhikkhuno anucchavikasenāsanaṃ dassento
atk-s0515a0:376_1: “araññaṃ rukkhamūla”ntiādimāha. Tattha araññanti “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ
atk-s0515a0:376_2: arañña”nti idaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgataṃ. “Āraññakaṃ nāma senāsanaṃ pañcadhanusatikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:376_3: pacchima”nti idaṃ pana imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇaṃ visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese
atk-s0515a0:376_4: vuttaṃ. Rukkhamūlanti yaṃkiñci santacchāyaṃ vivittaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ. Pabbatanti selaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:376_5: Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṃ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa nānādisāsu
atk-s0515a0:376_6: khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati
atk-s0515a0:376_7: udakaṃ, tena dāritaṃ, udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ. Yaṃ “nadītumba”ntipi “nadīkuñja”ntipi
atk-s0515a0:376_8: vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālukā hoti, matthake maṇivitānaṃ viya vanagahanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:376_9: maṇikhandhasadisaṃ udakaṃ sandati. Evarūpaṃ kandaraṃ oruyha pānīyaṃ pivitvā gattāni
atk-s0515a0:376_10: sītāni katvā vālukaṃ ussāpetvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:376_11: karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṃ pabbatānaṃ antaraṃ, ekasmiṃyeva vā
atk-s0515a0:377_0: Vanapatthanti gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ yattha na kasanti
atk-s0515a0:377_1: na vapanti. Tenevāha “vanapatthanti dūrānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”ntiādi. Abbhokāsanti
atk-s0515a0:377_2: acchannaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsiṃ.
atk-s0515a0:377_3: Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi
atk-s0515a0:377_4: upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṃ karonti. Sabbametaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0515a0:377_5: vuttaṃ “kāyena vivitto viharatī”tiādi. Eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti pavattayatīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:377_6: hoti. Iriyatīti iriyāpathaṃ vattayati. Vattatīti iriyāpathavuttiṃ uppādeti. Pāletīti
atk-s0515a0:377_7: iriyāpathaṃ rakkhati. Yapetīti yapayati. Yāpetīti yāpayati.
atk-s0515a0:378_0: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassāti kusalajjhānasamaṅgissa. Nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ vivittanti
atk-s0515a0:378_1: upacārena nīvaraṇehi vivittampi samānaṃ antoappanāyaṃ suṭṭhu vivittaṃ nāma hotīti
atk-s0515a0:378_2: dassetuṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa nīvaraṇehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:378_6: paṭighasaññāya ca. Nānattasaññāyāti nānārammaṇe pavattāya catucattālīsakāmāvacarasaññāya
atk-s0515a0:378_7: ca cittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti suññaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:379_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassāti ettha nāssa antoti anantaṃ, ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsānantaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:379_1: ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ, taṃ ākāsānañcaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassa sasampayuttadhammassa
atk-s0515a0:379_3: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa kusalakiriyajhānaṃ samāpannassa.
atk-s0515a0:379_4: Rūpasaññāyāti saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajjhānato ceva tadārammaṇato ca. Rūpāvacarajjhānampi
atk-s0515a0:379_5: hi “rūpa”nti vuccati “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu, tassa ārammaṇampi “bahiddhā rūpāni
atk-s0515a0:379_6: passati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”tiādīsupi. Tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena
atk-s0515a0:379_7: rūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Rūpe saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpamassa nāmanti
atk-s0515a0:379_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:379_9: Etāya kusalavipākakiriyāvasena pañcadasavidhāya jhānasaṅkhātāya rūpasaññāya. Etāya
atk-s0515a0:380_0: Paṭighasaññāyāti cakkhādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ rūpādīnaṃ ārammaṇānañca paṭighātena samuppannā
atk-s0515a0:380_1: saññā paṭighasaññā, rūpasaññādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yathāha – “tattha katamā paṭighasaññā?
atk-s0515a0:380_2: Rūpasaññā saddasaññā gandhasaññā rasasaññā phoṭṭhabbasaññā, imā vuccanti paṭighasaññāyo”ti.
atk-s0515a0:380_3: Tā kusalavipākā pañca akusalavipākā pañcāti etāya paṭighasaññāya.
atk-s0515a0:381_0: Nānattasaññāyāti nānatte gocare pavattāya saññāya, nānattāya vā saññāya. Yathāha
atk-s0515a0:381_1: – “tattha katamā nānattasaññā? Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa
atk-s0515a0:381_2: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ, imā vuccanti nānattasaññāyo”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge vibhajitvā
atk-s0515a0:381_3: vuttā. Tā idha adhippetā. Asamāpannassa manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātusaṅgahitā saññā
atk-s0515a0:381_4: rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve gocare pavattanti. Yasmā cesā aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalasaññā,
atk-s0515a0:381_5: dvādasa akusalasaññā, ekādasa kāmāvacarakusalavipākasaññā, dve akusalavipākasaññā,
atk-s0515a0:381_6: ekādasa kāmāvacarakiriyasaññāti evaṃ catucattālīsampi saññā nānattā nānāsabhāvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0515a0:382_1: saññāhi jhānacittaṃ vivittaṃ hoti vinā hoti apasakkanaṃ hoti. Viññāṇañcāyatananti
atk-s0515a0:382_2: etadeva viññāṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, ākāse pavattaviññāṇārammaṇassa
atk-s0515a0:382_3: jhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vuttappakārāya ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya
atk-s0515a0:383_0: Ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha pana nāssa kiñcananti akiñcanaṃ, antamaso bhaṅgamattampi
atk-s0515a0:383_1: assa avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇāpagamassetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:383_2: adhivacanaṃ. Taṃ ākiñcaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanamassāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, ākāse
atk-s0515a0:384_0: Nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ettha pana yāya saññāya bhāvato taṃ “nevasaññānāsaññāyatana”nti
atk-s0515a0:384_1: vuccati, yathāpaṭipannassa sā saññā hoti, taṃ tāva dassetuṃ vibhaṅge “nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti
atk-s0515a0:384_2: uddharitvā taññeva “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karoti, saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:384_3: bhāveti, tena vuccati nevasaññīnāsaññī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha santato manasi karotīti
atk-s0515a0:384_4: “santovatāyaṃ samāpatti, yatra hi nāma natthibhāvampi ārammaṇaṃ karitvā vasatī”ti
atk-s0515a0:384_5: evaṃ santārammaṇatāya naṃ “santā”ti manasi karoti. Taṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ appetvā
atk-s0515a0:384_6: nisinnassa tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya jhānacittaṃ suññaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:385_0: Sotāpannassāti sotāpattiphalaṃ pattassa. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyāti vīsativatthukāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā.
atk-s0515a0:385_1: Vicikicchāyāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu kaṅkhāya. Sīlabbataparāmāsāti “sīlena suddhi, vatena
