atk-s0515a0:385_2: suddhī”ti parāmasitvā uppajjanakadiṭṭhi. Diṭṭhānusayāti appahīnaṭṭhena santāne anusayakā
atk-s0515a0:385_3: diṭṭhānusayā. Tathā vicikicchānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti tehi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīhi ekato
atk-s0515a0:385_4: ṭhitehi ca. Upatāpenti vibādhenti cāti kilesā, tehi sakkāyadiṭṭhiyādikilesehi cittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:385_5: vivittaṃ suññaṃ hoti. Ettha “tadekaṭṭha”nti duvidhaṃ ekaṭṭhaṃ pahānekaṭṭhaṃ sahajekaṭṭhañca.
atk-s0515a0:385_6: Apāyagamanīyā hi kilesā yāva sotāpattimaggena na pahīyanti, tāva diṭṭhivicikicchāhi
atk-s0515a0:385_7: saha ekasmiṃ puggale ṭhitāti pahānekaṭṭhā. Dasasu hi kilesesu idha diṭṭhivicikicchā
atk-s0515a0:385_8: eva āgatā. Anusayesu diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayā āgatā. Sesā pana apāyagamanīyo
atk-s0515a0:385_9: lobho doso moho māno thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti aṭṭha kilesā diṭṭhivicikicchāhi
atk-s0515a0:385_10: saha pahānekaṭṭhā hutvā dvīhi anusayehi saddhiṃ sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti. Rāgadosamohapamukhesu
atk-s0515a0:385_11: vā diyaḍḍhesu kilesasahassesu sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhiyā pahīyamānāya diṭṭhiyā saha
atk-s0515a0:385_12: vicikicchā pahīnā, diṭṭhānusayavicikicchānusayehi saha apāyagamanīyā sabbakilesā
atk-s0515a0:385_13: pahānekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti. Sahajekaṭṭhā pana diṭṭhiyā saha vicikicchāya ca saha
atk-s0515a0:386_0: Sotāpattimaggena hi cattāri diṭṭhisahagatāni vicikicchāsahagatañcāti pañca cittāni
atk-s0515a0:386_1: pahīyanti. Tattha dvīsu diṭṭhisampayuttaasaṅkhārikacittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajāto
atk-s0515a0:386_2: lobho moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti,
atk-s0515a0:386_3: dvīsu diṭṭhisampayuttasasaṅkhārikacittesu pahīyamānesu tehi sahajāto lobho moho thinaṃ
atk-s0515a0:386_4: uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena pahīyanti, vicikicchāsahagatacitte
atk-s0515a0:386_5: pahīyamāne tena sahajāto moho uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti ime kilesā sahajekaṭṭhavasena
atk-s0515a0:386_6: pahīyanti. Tehi duvidhekaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ hotīti maggacittaṃ viviccati,
atk-s0515a0:386_7: phalacittaṃ vivittaṃ viyuttaṃ apasakkitaṃ suññaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:387_0: Sakadāgāmissa oḷārikā kāmarāgasaññojanāti oḷārikabhūtā kāyadvāre vītikkamassa paccayabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:387_1: thūlabhūtā methunarāgasaṅkhātā saññojanā. So hi kāmabhave saññojetīti “saññojana”nti
atk-s0515a0:387_2: vuccati. Paṭighasaññojanāti byāpādasaññojanā. So hi ārammaṇe paṭihaññatīti “paṭigha”nti
atk-s0515a0:387_3: vuccati. Te eva thāmagataṭṭhena santāne anusentīti anusayā. Aṇusahagatāti sukhumabhūtā
atk-s0515a0:387_4: kāmarāgasaññojanā paṭighasaññojanā aṇusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayāti appahīnaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:387_5: santāne anusayanavasena sukhumabhūtā kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti vuttatthehi
atk-s0515a0:387_6: duvidhekaṭṭhehi kilesehi cittaṃ vivittaṃ suññaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:388_0: Arahatoti kilesārīnaṃ hatattā “arahā”ti laddhanāmassa. Rūparāgāti rūpabhave chandarāgā.
atk-s0515a0:388_1: Arūparāgāti arūpabhave chandarāgā. Mānāti arahattamaggavajjhā mānā eva. Tathā uddhaccaavijjāmānānusayādayo
atk-s0515a0:388_2: arahattamaggavajjhā. Etesu uṇṇatilakkhaṇo māno. Avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ uddhaccaṃ. Andhabhāvalakkhaṇā
atk-s0515a0:388_3: avijjā. Rūparāgaarūparāgavasena pavattā bhavarāgānusayā. Tadekaṭṭhehi cāti tehi ekato
atk-s0515a0:388_4: ṭhitehi ca kilesehi. Bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehīti ajjhattacittasantāne akusalakkhandhe
atk-s0515a0:388_5: upādāya “bahiddhā”ti saṅkhaṃ gatehi ajjhattaṃ muñcitvā bahiddhā pavattehi sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi
atk-s0515a0:388_6: maggacittaṃ viviccati vinā hoti apasakkati, phalacittaṃ vivittaṃ viyuttaṃ apasakkitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:389_0: Tattha kilesapaṭipāṭiyā maggapaṭipāṭiyā cāti dvidhā anusayānaṃ abhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:389_1: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā hi kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tatiyamaggena abhāvo hoti, mānānusayassa
atk-s0515a0:389_4: abhāvo hoti, dutiyamaggena kāmarāgānusayapaṭighānusayānaṃ tanubhāvo, tatiyamaggena
atk-s0515a0:389_5: sabbaso abhāvo, catutthamaggena mānānusayabhavarāgānusayāvijjānusayānaṃ abhāvo hoti.
atk-s0515a0:389_6: Cittavivekoti mahaggatalokuttaracittānaṃ kilesehi suññabhāvo, tucchabhāvoti attho.
atk-s0515a0:390_1: tāva dassetuṃ “upadhi vuccanti kilesā cā”tiādimāha. Rāgādayo yassa uppajjanti, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:390_2: upatāpenti vibādhentīti kilesā ca. Upādānagocarā rūpādayo pañcakkhandhā ca. Upādānasambhūtā
atk-s0515a0:390_3: puññāpuññaāneñjābhisaṅkhārā ca. Amatanti natthi etassa maraṇasaṅkhātaṃ matanti amataṃ,
atk-s0515a0:390_5: saṃsibbati vinatīti taṇhā “vāna”nti vuccati, taṃ tattha natthīti nibbānaṃ. Vivekaṭṭhakāyānanti
atk-s0515a0:390_6: gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya apagatasarīrānaṃ. Nekkhammābhiratānanti nekkhamme kāmādito nikkhante
atk-s0515a0:390_10: paramavodānappattāna”nti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Nirūpadhīnanti vigatūpadhīnaṃ. Visaṅkhāragatānanti
atk-s0515a0:390_11: saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ cajitvā vigatasaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇavasena upagatānaṃ. Visaṅkhāragataṃ
atk-s0515a0:391_0: Vidūreti vividhe dūre. Suvidūreti suṭṭhu vidūre. Na santiketi na samīpe. Na sāmantāti
atk-s0515a0:391_1: na ekapasse. Anāsanneti anaccantasamīpe. Vivekaṭṭheti atidūre, vigateti attho. Tādisoti
atk-s0515a0:391_2: taṃsadiso. Tassaṇṭhitoti tena ākārena ṭhito. Tappakāroti tena pakārena ṭhito. Tappaṭibhāgoti
atk-s0515a0:391_3: taṃkoṭṭhāsiko. Atha vā “attabhāvaguhāya laggabhāvena tādiso. Kilesehi channabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:391_4: tassaṇṭhito. Mohanasmiṃ pagāḷhabhāvena tappakāro. Tīhi vivekehi dūrabhāvena tappaṭibhāgoti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:392_0: Duppahāyāti sukhena pahātabbā na honti. Duccajjāti sukhena jahituṃ na sakkā. Duppariccajjāti
atk-s0515a0:392_1: sabbākārena jahituṃ na sakkā. Dunnimmadayāti nimmadaṃ amadaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā. Dubbiniveṭhayāti
atk-s0515a0:392_2: viniveṭhanaṃ mocanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā. Duttarāti uttaritvā atikkantuṃ na sakkā. Duppatarāti
atk-s0515a0:392_3: visesetvā tarituṃ na sakkā. Dussamatikkamāti dukkhena atikkamitabbā. Dubbinivattāti
atk-s0515a0:392_4: nivattetuṃ dukkhā. Atha vā “pakativasena duppariccajjā. Goṇapatāsaṃ viya dunnimmadayā.
atk-s0515a0:392_5: Nāgapāsaṃ viya dubbiniveṭhayā. Gimhasamaye marukantāraṃ viya duttarā duppatarā. Byagghapariggahitā
atk-s0515a0:392_6: aṭavī viya dussamatikkamā. Samuddavīci viya dubbinivattāti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:393_0: 8. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho”ti sādhetvā puna tathāvidhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:393_1: sattānaṃ dhammataṃ āvi karonto “icchānidānā”tiādigāthamāha. Tattha icchānidānāti
atk-s0515a0:393_2: taṇhāhetukā. Bhavasātabaddhāti sukhavedanādimhi bhavasātena baddhā. Te duppamuñcāti
atk-s0515a0:393_3: te bhavasātavatthubhūtā dhammā. Te vā tattha baddhā icchānidānā sattā duppamocayā.
atk-s0515a0:393_4: Na hi aññamokkhāti aññe ca mocetuṃ na sakkonti. Kāraṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ. Te sattā duppamuñcā.
atk-s0515a0:393_5: Kasmā? Yasmā aññena mocetabbā na honti. Yadi sattā muñceyyuṃ, sakena thāmena muñceyyunti
atk-s0515a0:393_6: ayamassa attho. Pacchā pure vāpi apekkhamānāti anāgate atīte vā kāme apekkhamānā.
atk-s0515a0:393_7: Ime va kāme purime va jappanti ime vā paccuppanne kāme purime vā duvidhepi atītānāgate
atk-s0515a0:393_8: balavataṇhāya patthayamānā. Imesañca dvinnaṃ padānaṃ “te duppamuñcā na hi aññamokkhā”ti
atk-s0515a0:393_9: imināva saha sambandho veditabbo. Itarathā apekkhamānā jappaṃ kiṃ karonti, kiṃ vā
atk-s0515a0:394_0: Bhavasātabaddhāti bhave sātaṃ bhavasātaṃ, tena bhavasātena sukhassādena baddhā hutvā
atk-s0515a0:394_1: ṭhitā. Taṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ “ekaṃ bhavasātaṃ – sukhā vedanā”tiādimāha. Yobbanabhāvo
atk-s0515a0:394_2: yobbaññaṃ. Arogabhāvo ārogyaṃ. Jīvitindriyassa pavattabhāvo jīvitaṃ. Lābhoti catunnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:394_3: paccayānaṃ lābho. Yasoti parivāro. Pasaṃsāti kitti. Sukhanti kāyikacetasikaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:394_4: Manāpikā rūpāti manavaḍḍhanakā rūpā. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:395_0: Cakkhusampadāti cakkhussa sampadā. “Mayhaṃ cakkhu sampannaṃ maṇivimāne ugghāṭitasīhapañjaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:395_1: viya khāyatī”ti uppannaṃ sukhassādaṃ sandhāya “cakkhusampadā”ti vuttaṃ. Sotasampadādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:395_2: eseva nayo. Sukhāya vedanāya sātabaddhā…pe… vibaddhāti vividhākārena baddhā. Ābaddhāti
atk-s0515a0:395_3: visesena ādito baddhā. Laggāti ārammaṇena saddhiṃ appitā. Laggitāti nāgadante phāṇitavārako
atk-s0515a0:395_4: viya laggitā. Yamettha ca avuttaṃ, taṃ satto visattotiādimhi vuttanayena gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:396_0: Na hi aññamokkhāti na parehi mokkhā. Te vā bhavasātavatthū duppamuñcāti bhave sukhassādavatthubhūtā
atk-s0515a0:396_1: dhammā te muñcituṃ dukkhā. Sattā vā etto dummocayāti sattā eva vā etasmā bhavasātavatthuto mocetuṃ dukkhā.
atk-s0515a0:397_0: Duruddharāti uddharituṃ dukkhā. Dussamuddharāti samantato chinnataṭe narakāvāṭe patito
atk-s0515a0:397_1: viya uddhaṃ katvā uddharituṃ dukkhā. Dubbuṭṭhāpayāti uṭṭhāpetuṃ dukkhā. Dussamuṭṭhāpayāti
atk-s0515a0:397_2: sukhumaattabhāvaṃ pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ viya ussāpetuṃ ativiya dukkhā.
atk-s0515a0:398_0: Te attanā palipapalipannāti gambhīrakaddame yāva sīsato nimuggā na sakkonti. Paraṃ
atk-s0515a0:398_1: palipapalipannaṃ uddharitunti aparaṃ tatheva nimuggaṃ hatthe vā sīse vā gahetvā uddharitvā
atk-s0515a0:398_2: thale patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti. So vata cundāti soti vattabbākārapuggalaniddeso.
atk-s0515a0:398_3: Tassa “yo”ti imaṃ uddesavacanaṃ āharitvā yo attanā palipapalipanno, so vata, cunda,
atk-s0515a0:398_4: paraṃ palipapalipannaṃ uddharissatīti. Evaṃ sesapadesu sambandho veditabbo. Palipapalipannoti
atk-s0515a0:398_5: gambhīrakaddame nimuggo vuccati. Yathā, cunda, koci puriso yāva sīsato gambhīrakaddame
atk-s0515a0:398_6: nimuggo, parampi tatheva nimuggaṃ hatthe vā sīse vā gahetvā uddharissatīti netaṃ
atk-s0515a0:398_7: ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Na hi taṃ kāraṇamatthi, yena so taṃ uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpeyyāti.
atk-s0515a0:398_8: Adanto avinīto aparinibbutoti ettha pana anibbisevanatāya adanto. Asikkhitavinayatāya
atk-s0515a0:398_9: avinīto. Anibbutakilesatāya aparinibbutoti veditabbo. So tādiso paraṃ damessati nibbisevanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:398_10: karissati, vinessati tisso sikkhā sikkhāpessati. Parinibbāpessati tassa kilese nibbāpessati.
atk-s0515a0:399_0: Natthañño kocīti añño koci puggalo mocetuṃ samattho natthi. Sakena thāmenāti attano
atk-s0515a0:399_1: ñāṇathāmena. Balenāti ñāṇabalena. Vīriyenāti ñāṇasampayuttacetasikavīriyena. Purisaparakkamenāti
atk-s0515a0:400: Nāhaṃ sahissāmīti ahaṃ na sahissāmi na sakkomi, na vāyamissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. Pamocanāyāti pamocetuṃ. Kathaṃkathinti sakaṅkhaṃ. Dhotakāti ālapanaṃ. Taresīti tareyyāsi.
atk-s0515a0:403: Suddhī asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ visodhaye”ti. –
atk-s0515a0:404_0: Etthāyamattho – yena attanā akusalaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti, so catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:404_1: anubhavanto attanāva saṃkilissati. Yena pana attanā akataṃ pāpaṃ, so sugatiñceva
atk-s0515a0:404_2: agatiñca gacchanto attanāva visujjhati. Kusalakammasaṅkhātā suddhi akusalakammasaṅkhātā
atk-s0515a0:404_3: ca asuddhi paccattaṃ kārakasattānaṃ attaniyeva vipaccati. Añño puggalo aññaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:404_4: na visodhaye neva visodheti, na kilesetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:405_0: Tiṭṭhateva nibbānanti amatamahānibbānaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva. Nibbānagāmimaggoti pubbabhāgavipassanāto
atk-s0515a0:405_1: paṭṭhāya ariyamaggo. Tiṭṭhāmahaṃ samādapetāti ahaṃ gaṇhāpetā patiṭṭhāpetā tiṭṭhāmi.
atk-s0515a0:405_2: Evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānāti mayā evaṃ ovadiyamānā evaṃ anusāsiyamānā. Ettha
atk-s0515a0:405_3: uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma, anuppanne vatthusmiṃ anusāsanto “ayasopi
atk-s0515a0:405_4: te bhavissatī”tiādivasena anāgataṃ dassento anusāsati nāma. Sammukhā vadantopi ovadati
atk-s0515a0:405_5: nāma, parammukhā dūtasāsanaṃ vā pesento anusāsati nāma. Sakiṃ vadantopi ovadati nāma,
atk-s0515a0:405_6: punappunaṃ vadanto anusāsati nāma. Ovadanto eva vā anusāsati nāma. Appekacceti api
atk-s0515a0:405_7: ekacce, eketi attho. Accantaniṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādhentīti khayavayasaṅkhātaṃ antaṃ
atk-s0515a0:405_8: atītanti accantaṃ, accantañca taṃ sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ appavattiṭṭhānattā niṭṭhañcāti
atk-s0515a0:405_9: accantaniṭṭhaṃ, ekantaniṭṭhaṃ, satataniṭṭhanti attho. Taṃ accantanibbānaṃ ārādhenti
atk-s0515a0:405_10: sampādenti. Nārādhentīti na sampādenti, na paṭilabhantīti attho. Ettha kyāhanti etesu
atk-s0515a0:405_11: kiṃ ahaṃ, kiṃ karomīti attho. Maggakkhāyīti paṭipadāmaggakkhāyī. Ācikkhati katheti.
atk-s0515a0:405_12: Attanā paṭipajjamānā muñceyyunti paṭipajjantā mayaṃ muñceyyuṃ.
atk-s0515a0:406_0: Atītaṃ upādāyāti atītaṃ paṭicca. Kathaṃ pure apekkhaṃ karotīti kena pakārena ikkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:406_1: olokanaṃ karoti. Evaṃrūpo ahosinti dīgharassaaṇukathūlādivasena evaṃjātiko evarūpo
atk-s0515a0:406_2: abhaviṃ. Tattha nandiṃ samannānetīti tasmiṃ rūpārammaṇe taṇhaṃ sammā ānayati upaneti.
atk-s0515a0:407_0: “Iti me cakkhū”tiādayo vatthuārammaṇavasena taṇhuppattiṃ dassento āha. Iti rūpātīti
atk-s0515a0:407_1: evaṃ rūpā iti. Tattha chandarāgapaṭibaddhanti tesu cakkhurūpesu dubbalasaṅkhāto chando
atk-s0515a0:407_2: ca balavasaṅkhāto rāgo ca, tena chandarāgena paṭibaddhaṃ allīnaṃ. Viññāṇanti javanacittaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:407_3: Chandarāgapaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassāti tassa javanaviññāṇassa chandarāgena baddhabhāvā.
atk-s0515a0:408_0: Yānissa tānīti yāni assa tāni. Pubbeti atīte. Saddhinti ekato. Hasitalapitakīḷitānīti
atk-s0515a0:408_1: dantavidaṃsādihasitāni ca, vacībhedaṃ katvā lapitāni ca, kāyakhiḍḍādikīḷitāni ca.
atk-s0515a0:408_2: Tadassādetīti taṃ assādayati assādaṃ vindati sādiyati. Taṃ nikāmetīti taṃ nikāmayati
atk-s0515a0:409: Siyanti bhaveyyaṃ. Appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāyāti appattassa pāpuṇanatthāya. Cittaṃ paṇidahatīti cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Cetaso paṇidhānapaccayāti cittassa ṭhapanakāraṇā.
atk-s0515a0:410_0: Sīlena vāti pañcasīlādisīlena vā. Vatena vāti dhutaṅgasamādānena vā. Tapena vāti
atk-s0515a0:410_1: vīriyasamādānena vā. Brahmacariyena vāti methunaviratiyā vā. Devo vāti mahānubhāvo
atk-s0515a0:410_2: devarājā vā. Devaññataro vāti tesaṃ aññataro vā.
atk-s0515a0:411: Jappantāti guṇavasena kathentā. Pajappantāti pakārena kathentā. Abhijappantāti visesena kathentā, upasaggavasena vā vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:412: 9. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho”ti sādhetvā dutiyagāthāya ca tathāvidhānaṃ dhammataṃ āvi katvā idāni tesaṃ pāpakaraṇaṃ āvi karonto “kāmesu giddhā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:413_0: Tassattho – te sattā kāmesu paribhogataṇhāya giddhā, pariyesanādimanuyuttattā pasutā,
atk-s0515a0:413_1: sammohamāpannattā pamūḷhā, avagamanatāya macchariyatāya buddhādīnaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyatāya
atk-s0515a0:413_2: ca avadāniyā, kāyavisamādimhi visame niviṭṭhā, antakāle maraṇadukkhūpanītā, “kiṃsu
atk-s0515a0:414_0: Giddhāti kāmarāgena giddhā. Gadhitāti saṅkapparāgena paccāsīsamānā hutvā gadhitā.
atk-s0515a0:414_1: Mucchitāti kāmataṇhāya mucchāparetā. Ajjhosannāti kāmanandiyā adhiosannā ajjhotthaṭā.
atk-s0515a0:414_2: Laggāti kāmasinehena allīnā. Laggitāti kāmapariḷāhena ekībhūtā. Palibuddhāti kāmasaññāya
atk-s0515a0:414_3: āvaṭṭitā. Atha vā “diṭṭhidassane giddhā. Abhiṇhadassane gadhitā. Saṃsaggakiriyasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:414_4: mucchitā. Vissāsakiriyasmiṃ ajjhosannā. Sinehavaḷañjasmiṃ laggā. Dvayaṃdvayasamāpattimhi
atk-s0515a0:414_5: laggitā. Aparāparaṃ amuñcamānā hutvā palibuddhā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:415_0: Esantīti paccāsīsanti. Gavesantīti maggayanti. Pariyesantīti sabbākārena icchanti
atk-s0515a0:415_1: patthenti. Atha vā diṭṭhārammaṇe subhāsubhaṃ atthi, natthīti esanti. Subhāsubhārammaṇe
atk-s0515a0:415_2: paccakkhaṃ katvā vaḷañjanatthāya piyaṃ karontā gavesanti. Cittavasena esanti. Payogavasena
atk-s0515a0:415_3: gavesanti. Karaṇavasena pariyesanti. Te duvidhe kāme paṭicca otaritvā carantīti taccaritā.
atk-s0515a0:415_4: Te ca kāme bahulaṃ yebhuyyena vaḍḍhenti pavattayantīti tabbahulā. Te ca kāme garuṃ
atk-s0515a0:415_5: katvā rahantīti taggarukā. Tesu kāmesu ninnā namitā hutvā vasantīti tanninnā. Tesu
atk-s0515a0:415_6: kāmesu sanninnā hutvā vasantīti tappoṇā. Tesu kāmesu avalambitā hutvā tesuyeva namitā
atk-s0515a0:415_7: vasantīti tappabbhārā. Tesu kāmesu avattharitvā mucchāparetappasaṅgā hutvā vadantīti
atk-s0515a0:415_8: tadadhimuttā. Te ca kāme adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā vasantīti tadadhipateyyā. Atha
atk-s0515a0:415_9: vā “ārammaṇassa iṭṭhabhāvena taccaritā. Ārammaṇassa kantabhāvena tabbahulā. Ārammaṇassa
atk-s0515a0:415_10: manāpabhāvena taggarukā. Ārammaṇassa piyabhāvena tanninnā. Ārammaṇassa kāmupasaṃhitabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:415_11: tappoṇā. Ārammaṇassa rajanīyabhāvena tappabbhārā. Ārammaṇassa mucchanīyabhāvena tadadhimuttā.
atk-s0515a0:416_0: Rūpe pariyesantītiādīsu pariyesantīti aladdhassa lābhāya esanavasena. Paṭilabhantīti
atk-s0515a0:416_1: hatthagatavasena. Paribhuñjantīti vaḷañjanavasena vuttanti ñātabbaṃ. Kalahaṃ vivādaṃ
atk-s0515a0:416_2: karotīti kalahakārako. Tasmiṃ niyuttoti kalahapasuto. Kammakārakādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:416_3: Gocare carantoti vesiyādigocare, satipaṭṭhānādigocare vā caramāno. Tesu niyutto gocarapasuto.
atk-s0515a0:416_4: Ārammaṇūpanijjhānavasena jhānaṃ assa atthīti jhāyī. Tasmiṃ niyutto jhānapasuto.
atk-s0515a0:417_0: Avagacchantīti apāyaṃ gacchanti. Maccharinoti sakasampattiṃ niguhantā. Vacananti
atk-s0515a0:417_1: kathanaṃ. Byapathanti vākyapathaṃ. Desananti vissajjanaovādaṃ. Anusiṭṭhinti anusāsaniṃ.
atk-s0515a0:417_2: Nādiyantīti na gaṇhanti na garuṃ karonti. “Na paṭissantī”ti vā pāṭho, soyeva attho.
atk-s0515a0:417_4: Tattha āvāse macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:418_0: Āvāso nāma sakalārāmopi pariveṇampi ekovarakopi rattiṭṭhānādīnipi. Tesu vasantā sukhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:418_1: vasanti, paccaye labhanti. Eko bhikkhu vattasampannasseva pesalassa bhikkhuno tattha
atk-s0515a0:418_2: āgamanaṃ na icchati, āgatopi “khippaṃ gacchatū”ti cintesi, idaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:418_3: nāma. Bhaṇḍanakārakādīnaṃ pana tattha vāsaṃ anicchato āvāsamacchariyaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0515a0:419_0: Kulanti upaṭṭhākakulampi ñātikulampi. Tattha aññassa upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato kulamacchariyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:419_1: hoti. Pāpapuggalassa pana upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchatopi macchariyaṃ nāma na hoti. So
atk-s0515a0:419_2: hi tesaṃ pasādabhedāya paṭipajjati. Pasādaṃ rakkhituṃ samatthasseva pana bhikkhuno
atk-s0515a0:419_3: tattha upasaṅkamanaṃ anicchato macchariyaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a0:420_0: Lābhoti catupaccayalābhova. Taṃ aññasmiṃ sīlavanteyeva labhante “mā labhatū”ti cintentassa
atk-s0515a0:420_1: lābhamacchariyaṃ hoti. Yo pana saddhādeyyaṃ vinipāteti, aparibhogadupparibhogādivasena
atk-s0515a0:420_2: vināseti, pūtibhāvaṃ gacchantampi aññassa na deti, taṃ disvā “sace imaṃ esa na labheyya,
atk-s0515a0:420_3: añño sīlavā labheyya, paribhogaṃ gaccheyyā”ti cintentassa macchariyaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0515a0:421_0: Vaṇṇo nāma sarīravaṇṇopi guṇavaṇṇopi. Tattha sarīravaṇṇe maccharī “paro pāsādiko
atk-s0515a0:421_1: rūpavā”ti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo hoti. Guṇavaṇṇamaccharī parassa sīlena dhutaṅgena
atk-s0515a0:421_2: paṭipadāya ācārena vaṇṇaṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.
atk-s0515a0:422_0: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo ca paṭivedhadhammo ca. Tattha ariyasāvakā paṭivedhadhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:422_1: na maccharāyanti, attanā paṭividdhadhamme sadevakassa lokassa paṭivedhaṃ icchanti.
atk-s0515a0:422_2: Taṃ pana paṭivedhaṃ “pare jānantū”ti icchanti, tantidhammeyeva pana dhammamacchariyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:422_3: nāma hoti. Tena samannāgato puggalo yaṃ guḷhaṃ ganthaṃ vā kathāmaggaṃ vā jānāti,
atk-s0515a0:422_4: taṃ aññe na jānāpetukāmo hoti. Yo pana puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena dhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:422_5: vā upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena na deti, ayaṃ dhammamaccharī nāma na hoti. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:422_6: ekacco puggalo lolo hoti, kālena samaṇo hoti, kālena brāhmaṇo, kālena nigaṇṭho. Yo
atk-s0515a0:422_7: hi bhikkhu “ayaṃ puggalo paveṇiāgataṃ tantiṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ bhinditvā
atk-s0515a0:422_8: āluḷessatī”ti na deti, ayaṃ puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena na deti nāma.
atk-s0515a0:422_9: Yo pana “ayaṃ dhammo saṇho sukhumo, sacāyaṃ puggalo gaṇhissati, aññaṃ byākaritvā
atk-s0515a0:422_10: attānaṃ āvi katvā nassissatī”ti na deti, ayaṃ dhammaṃ upaparikkhitvā puggalānuggahena
atk-s0515a0:422_11: na deti nāma. Yo pana “sacāyaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ gaṇhissati, amhākaṃ samayaṃ bhindituṃ
atk-s0515a0:422_12: samattho bhavissatī”ti na deti, ayaṃ dhammamaccharī nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a0:423_0: Imesu pañcasu macchariyesu āvāsamacchariyena tāva yakkho vā peto vā hutvā tasseva
atk-s0515a0:423_1: āvāsassa saṅkāraṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā vicarati. Kulamacchariyena tasmiṃ kule aññesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:423_2: dānamānanādīni karonte disvā “bhinnaṃ vatidaṃ kulaṃ mamā”ti cintayato lohitampi mukhato
atk-s0515a0:423_3: uggacchati, kucchivirecanampi hoti, antānipi khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni hutvā nikkhamanti. Lābhamacchariyena
atk-s0515a0:423_4: saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā santake lābhe maccharāyitvā puggalikaparibhogaṃ viya paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0515a0:423_5: yakkho vā peto vā mahāajagaro vā hutvā nibbattati. Sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇamaccharena
atk-s0515a0:423_6: pana pariyattidhammamacchariyena ca attanova vaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇeti, paresaṃ vaṇṇe “kiṃ vaṇṇo
atk-s0515a0:423_7: eso”ti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattidhammañca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgo ca hoti.
atk-s0515a0:424_0: Api ca āvāsamacchariyena lohagehe paccati, kulamacchariyena appalābho hoti, lābhamacchariyena
atk-s0515a0:424_1: gūthaniraye nibbattati, vaṇṇamacchariyena bhave bhave nibbattassa vaṇṇo nāma na hoti,
atk-s0515a0:425_0: Maccharāyanavasena macchariyaṃ. Maccharāyanākāro maccharāyanā. Maccharena ayitassa
atk-s0515a0:425_1: maccherasamaṅgino bhāvo maccharāyitattaṃ. “Mayhameva hontu, mā aññassā”ti sabbāpi
atk-s0515a0:425_2: attano sampattiyo byāpetuṃ na icchatīti viviccho, vivicchassa bhāvo vevicchaṃ, mudumacchariyassetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:425_3: nāmaṃ. Kadariyo vuccati anādaro, tassa bhāvo kadariyaṃ, thaddhamacchariyassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:425_4: Tena hi samannāgato puggalo parampi paresaṃ dadamānaṃ nivāreti. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:428_0: Yācake disvā kaṭukabhāvena cittaṃ añcati saṅkocetīti kaṭukañcuko, tassa bhāvo kaṭukañcukatā.
atk-s0515a0:428_1: Aparo nayo – kaṭukañcukatā vuccati kaṭacchuggāho. Samatittikapuṇṇāya hi ukkhaliyā
atk-s0515a0:428_2: bhattaṃ gaṇhanto sabbatobhāgena saṅkuṭitena aggakaṭacchunā gaṇhāti pūretvā gahetuṃ
atk-s0515a0:428_3: na sakkoti, evaṃ maccharipuggalassa cittaṃ saṅkucati, tasmiṃ saṅkucite kāyopi tatheva
atk-s0515a0:428_4: saṅkucati paṭikuṭati paṭinivaṭṭati na sampasārīyatīti maccheraṃ “kaṭukañcukatā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:429_0: Aggahitattaṃ cittassāti paresaṃ upakārakaraṇe dānādinā ākārena yathā na sampasārīyati,
atk-s0515a0:429_1: evaṃ āvaritvā gahitabhāvo cittassa. Yasmā pana maccharipuggalo attano santakaṃ paresaṃ
atk-s0515a0:429_2: adātukāmo hoti, parasantakaṃ gaṇhitukāmo. Tasmā “idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu,
atk-s0515a0:429_3: mā aññassā”ti pavattivasenassa attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇatā parasampattiggahaṇalakkhaṇatā ca veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:430_0: Khandhamacchariyampi macchariyanti attano pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātaṃ upapattibhavaṃ aññehi
atk-s0515a0:430_1: asādhāraṇaṃ “acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu, mā aññassā”ti pavattaṃ macchariyaṃ khandhamacchariyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:430_2: nāma. Dhātuāyatanamacchariyesupi eseva nayo. Gāhoti gāhanicchayavasena gahaṇaṃ. Avadaññutāyāti
atk-s0515a0:430_3: sabbaññubuddhānampi kathitaṃ ajānanabhāvena. Yācakānaṃ adadamāno hi tehi kathitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:430_4: na jānāti nāma. Janā pamattāti sativippavāsā janā. Vacananti saṅkhepavacanaṃ. Byappathanti
atk-s0515a0:430_5: vitthāravacanaṃ. Desananti upamaṃ dassetvā atthasandassanavacanaṃ. Anusiṭṭhinti punappunaṃ
atk-s0515a0:430_6: saṃlakkhāpanavacanaṃ. Atha vā dassetvā kathanaṃ vacanaṃ nāma. Gaṇhāpetvā kathanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:430_7: byappathaṃ nāma. Tosetvā kathanaṃ desanaṃ nāma. Padassetvā kathanaṃ anusiṭṭhi nāma.
atk-s0515a0:430_8: Atha vā paritāpadukkhaṃ nāsetvā kathanaṃ vacanaṃ nāma. Pariḷāhadukkhaṃ nāsetvā kathanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:430_9: byappathaṃ nāma. Apāyadukkhaṃ nāsetvā kathanaṃ desanaṃ nāma. Bhavadukkhaṃ nāsetvā
atk-s0515a0:430_10: kathanaṃ anusiṭṭhi nāma. Atha vā dukkhasaccapariññāpaṭivedhayuttaṃ vacanaṃ. Samudayasaccapahānapaṭivedhayuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:431_0: Na sussusantīti na suṇanti. Na sotaṃ odahantīti savanatthaṃ kaṇṇasotaṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0515a0:431_1: Na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentīti jānanatthaṃ cittaṃ na patiṭṭhapenti. Anassavāti ovādaṃ
atk-s0515a0:431_2: asuṇamānā. Avacanakarāti suṇamānāpi vacanaṃ na karontīti avacanakarā. Paṭilomavuttinoti
atk-s0515a0:431_3: paṭāṇī hutvā pavattanakā. Aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti karontāpi mukhaṃ na dentīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:432_0: Visameti kāyasucaritādisammatassa samassa paṭipakkhattā visamaṃ, tasmiṃ visame. Niviṭṭhāti
atk-s0515a0:432_1: paviṭṭhā dunnīharā. Kāyakammeti kāyato pavatte, kāyena vā pavatte kāyakamme. Vacīkammādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:433_0: Tattha kāyakammavacīkammamanokammāni duccaritavasena vibhattāni, pāṇātipātādayo dasaakusalakammapathavasena
atk-s0515a0:433_1: vibhattāti ñātabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāvettha sādhāraṇapadavaṇṇanā, asādhāraṇesu pana pāṇassa
atk-s0515a0:433_2: atipāto pāṇātipāto, pāṇavadho pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti cettha vohārato satto,
atk-s0515a0:433_3: paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpitā
atk-s0515a0:433_4: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārapavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. So guṇavirahitesu
atk-s0515a0:433_5: tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā?
atk-s0515a0:433_6: Payogamahantatāya, payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe
atk-s0515a0:433_7: pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:433_8: upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:434_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – pāṇo pāṇasaññitā vadhakacittaṃ upakkamo tena maraṇanti.
atk-s0515a0:434_1: Chappayogā – sāhatthiko āṇattiko nissaggiyo thāvaro vijjāmayo iddhimayoti. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:434_2: panatthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco hoti, tasmā naṃ na vitthārayissāma. Aññañca evarūpaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:434_3: atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:435_0: Adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ, parassa haraṇaṃ theyyaṃ corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:435_1: adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo
atk-s0515a0:435_2: ca hoti, tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0515a0:435_3: theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parasantake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:435_4: Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya, vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:435_5: Taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:436_0: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ parapariggahitasaññitā theyyacittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:436_1: upakkamo tena haraṇanti. Chappayogā sāhatthikādayova. Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro
atk-s0515a0:436_2: pasayhāvahāro paṭicchannāvahāro parikappāvahāro kusāvahāroti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ avahārānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:436_3: vasena pavattanti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0515a0:437_0: Kāmesumicchācāroti ettha pana kāmesūti methunasamācāresu. Micchācāroti ekantanindito
atk-s0515a0:437_1: lāmakācāro. Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammasevanādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0515a0:438_0: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā
atk-s0515a0:438_1: bhāturakkhitā bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sārakkhā
atk-s0515a0:438_2: saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa, dhanakkītā chandavāsinī bhogavāsinī paṭavāsinī
atk-s0515a0:438_3: odapattakinī obhatacumbaṭakā dāsī ca bhariyā kammakārī ca bhariyā dhajāhaṭā muhuttikāti
atk-s0515a0:438_4: etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo. Itthīsu pana dvīnnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:438_5: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā, idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:439_0: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne
atk-s0515a0:439_1: mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ sevanapayogo
atk-s0515a0:439_2: maggena maggapaṭipattiadhivāsananti. Eko payogo sāhatthiko eva.
atk-s0515a0:440_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena
atk-s0515a0:440_1: panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo. Aparo nayo – musāti
atk-s0515a0:440_2: abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. Lakkhaṇato pana
atk-s0515a0:440_3: atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0515a0:440_4: So yamatthaṃ bhañjati, tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Api ca
atk-s0515a0:440_6: sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ
atk-s0515a0:440_7: vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena
atk-s0515a0:440_8: pavatto appasāvajjo, adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
atk-s0515a0:441_0: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu visaṃvādanacittaṃ tajjo vāyāmo parassa
atk-s0515a0:441_1: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo sāhatthikova. So ca kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā
atk-s0515a0:441_2: vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:441_3: jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati.
atk-s0515a0:442_0: Pisuṇavācātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:442_1: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇavācā. Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
atk-s0515a0:442_2: karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ pharusavācā.
atk-s0515a0:442_3: Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtāpi cetanā pisuṇavācādināmameva
atk-s0515a0:443_0: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0515a0:443_1: cetanā pisuṇavācā. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti, tassa appaguṇāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā.
atk-s0515a0:444_0: Tassā cattāro sambhārā honti – bhinditabbo paro “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti
atk-s0515a0:444_1: bhedapurekkhāratā vā, “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti viyakamyatā vā, tajjo
atk-s0515a0:445_1: Mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti. Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake
atk-s0515a0:445_2: evampi vadanti “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti, uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari
atk-s0515a0:445_3: patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime ahirikā
atk-s0515a0:445_4: anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne”ti. Atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ icchanti.
atk-s0515a0:445_5: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi
atk-s0515a0:445_6: na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti,
atk-s0515a0:445_7: cittapharusatāya panesā pharusavācāva, sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā. Tassa appaguṇatāya
atk-s0515a0:445_8: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro kupitacittaṃ akkosananti.
atk-s0515a0:446_0: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā samphappalāpo. So āsevanamandatāya
atk-s0515a0:446_1: appasāvajjo, āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā honti – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā
atk-s0515a0:447_0: Abhijjhāyatīti abhijjhā, parabhaṇḍābhimukhī hutvā tanninnatāya pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:447_1: Sā “aho vata idaṃ mamāssā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā. Adinnādānaṃ viya
atk-s0515a0:447_2: appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā honti – parabhaṇḍaṃ attano pariṇāmanañcāti.
atk-s0515a0:447_3: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti, yāva “aho vatidaṃ
atk-s0515a0:448_0: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti byāpādo, so paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo. Pharusavācā
atk-s0515a0:448_1: viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā honti – parasatto ca tassa ca
atk-s0515a0:448_2: vināsacintāti. Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0515a0:448_3: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ na cintesi.
atk-s0515a0:449: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena micchā passatīti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā “natthi dinna”ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. Samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0515a0:450_0: Saññī, asaññī, nevasaññīnāsaññī bhavissāmāti rūpādivasena kaṅkhanti. Bhavissāma nu
atk-s0515a0:450_1: kho mayantiādinā attānaṃ kaṅkhanti. Tattha bhavissāma nu kho. Na nu kho bhavissāmāti
atk-s0515a0:450_2: tassa sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attānaṃ vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca
atk-s0515a0:450_3: kaṅkhanti. Kiṃ nu kho bhavissāmāti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyā nu kho bhavissāma,
atk-s0515a0:450_5: kho bhavissāmāti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīghā nu kho bhavissāma, rassaodātakaṇhapamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:450_6: aññatarā”ti kaṅkhanti. Keci pana “issaranimmānādīni nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena
atk-s0515a0:450_7: bhavissāmā’ti hetuto kaṅkhantī”ti vadanti. Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāma nu kho mayanti
atk-s0515a0:450_8: jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyā hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇā bhavissāma…pe… devā hutvā manussā”ti
atk-s0515a0:450_9: attano paramparaṃ kaṅkhanti. Sabbattheva pana addhānanti kālādhivacanametaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:451_0: 10. Yasmā etadeva tasmā hi sikkhetha…pe… āhu dhīrāti. Tattha sikkhethāti tisso sikkhā
atk-s0515a0:451_1: āvajjeyya. Idhevāti imasmiṃyeva sāsane. Tattha sikkhitabbāti sikkhā. Tissoti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0515a0:451_2: Adhisīlasikkhāti adhikaṃ uttamaṃ sīlanti adhisīlaṃ, adhisīlañca taṃ sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:451_3: sikkhā cāti adhisīlasikkhā. Esa nayo adhicittaadhipaññāsikkhāsu.
atk-s0515a0:452_0: Katamaṃ panettha sīlaṃ, katamaṃ adhisīlaṃ, katamaṃ cittaṃ, katamaṃ adhicittaṃ, katamā
atk-s0515a0:452_1: paññā, katamā adhipaññāti? Vuccate – pañcaṅgadasaṅgasīlaṃ tāva sīlameva. Tañhi buddhe
atk-s0515a0:452_2: uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati. Uppanne buddhe tasmiṃ sīle buddhāpi sāvakāpi
atk-s0515a0:452_3: mahājanaṃ samādapenti, anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino ca dhammikā
atk-s0515a0:452_4: samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti, sāmampi
atk-s0515a0:452_5: paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādiyanti. Te taṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paripūretvā devesu ca
atk-s0515a0:453_0: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ pana “adhisīla”nti vuccati. Tañhi sūriyo viya pajjotānaṃ sineru
atk-s0515a0:453_1: viya pabbatānaṃ sabbalokiyasīlānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca, buddhuppādeyeva ca pavattati,
atk-s0515a0:453_2: na vinā buddhuppādā. Na hi taṃ paññattiṃ uddharitvā añño satto ṭhapetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0515a0:453_3: Buddhāyeva pana sabbaso kāyavacīdvāraajjhācārasotaṃ chinditvā tassa tassa vītikkamassa
atk-s0515a0:453_4: anucchavikaṃ taṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ paññapenti. Pātimokkhasaṃvaratopi ca maggaphalasampayuttameva sīlaṃ adhisīlaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:454_0: Kāmāvacarāni pana aṭṭha kusalacittāni lokiyaaṭṭhasamāpatticittāni ca ekajjhaṃ katvā
atk-s0515a0:454_1: cittamevāti veditabbāni. Buddhuppādānuppāde cassa pavatti, samādapanaṃ samādānañca
atk-s0515a0:455_0: Vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ pana “adhicitta”nti vuccati. Tañhi adhisīlaṃ
atk-s0515a0:455_1: viya sīlānaṃ, sabbalokiyacittānaṃ adhikañceva uttamañca, buddhuppādeyeva ca hoti,
atk-s0515a0:455_2: na vinā buddhuppādā. Tatopi ca maggaphalacittameva adhicittaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:456_0: “Atthi dinnaṃ atthi yiṭṭha”ntiādinayappavattaṃ pana kammassakatāñāṇaṃ paññā. Sā hi
atk-s0515a0:456_1: buddhe uppannepi anuppannepi loke pavattati. Uppanne buddhe tassā paññāya buddhāpi
atk-s0515a0:456_2: sāvakāpi mahājanaṃ samādapenti, anuppanne buddhe paccekabuddhā ca kammavādino ca
atk-s0515a0:456_3: dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca cakkavattī ca mahārājāno mahābodhisattā ca samādapenti,
atk-s0515a0:456_4: sāmampi paṇḍitā sattā samādiyanti. Tathā hi aṅkuro dasavassasahassāni mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0515a0:456_5: Velāmo vessantaro aññe ca bahū paṇḍitamanussā mahādānāni adaṃsu. Te taṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:456_6: paripūretvā devesu ca manussesu ca sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0515a0:457_0: Tilakkhaṇākāraparicchedakaṃ pana vipassanāñāṇaṃ “adhipaññā”ti vuccati. Sā hi adhisīlaadhicittāni
atk-s0515a0:457_1: viya sīlacittānaṃ, sabbalokiyapaññānaṃ adhikā ceva uttamā ca, na ca vinā buddhuppādā
atk-s0515a0:457_2: loke pavattati. Tatopi ca maggaphalapaññāva adhipaññā.
atk-s0515a0:458_0: Idāni ekekaṃ dassento “katamā adhisīlasikkhā – idha bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto
atk-s0515a0:458_1: viharatī”tiādimāha. Idhāti vacanaṃ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa sabbapakārasīlaparipūrakassa
atk-s0515a0:458_3: Vuttañhetaṃ – “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:458_4: Bhikkhūti tassa sīlassa paripūrakassa puggalassa paridīpanaṃ. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutoti
atk-s0515a0:458_5: idamassa pātimokkhasaṃvare patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Viharatīti idamassa tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:458_7: vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti
atk-s0515a0:458_8: idamassa sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhatīti idamassa sikkhāya
atk-s0515a0:459_0: Tattha bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhu. Sīlamassa atthīti sīlavāti ettha
atk-s0515a0:459_1: sīlanti sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ vā, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena
atk-s0515a0:459_2: avippakiṇṇatāti attho. Upadhāraṇaṃ vā, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ patiṭṭhāvasena ādhārabhāvoti
atk-s0515a0:459_3: attho. Etadeva hi ettha atthadvayaṃ saddalakkhaṇavidū anujānanti. Aññe pana “adhisevanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:459_4: ācāraṭṭhena sīlanaṭṭhena siraṭṭhena sītalaṭṭhena sivaṭṭhena sīla”nti vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:462_0: Yathā hi nīlapītādibhedenanekadhā bhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:462_1: nīlādibhedena bhinnassāpi sanidassanabhāvānatikkamanato. Tathā sīlassa cetanādibhedena
atk-s0515a0:462_2: anekadhā bhinnassāpi yadetaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ samādhānavasena, kusalānañca dhammānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:462_3: patiṭṭhāvasena vuttaṃ sīlanaṃ, tadeva lakkhaṇaṃ cetanādibhedena bhinnassāpi samādhānapatiṭṭhābhāvānatikkamanato.
atk-s0515a0:465: Tasmā idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma kiccaṭṭhena rasena dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, sampattiatthena rasena anavajjarasanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:468_0: Tañhidaṃ sīlaṃ “kāyasoceyyaṃ vacīsoceyyaṃ manosoceyya”nti evaṃ vuttasoceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:468_1: soceyyabhāvena paccupaṭṭhāti gahaṇabhāvaṃ gacchati. Hirottappañca pana tassa viññūhi
atk-s0515a0:468_2: padaṭṭhānanti vaṇṇitaṃ, āsannakāraṇanti attho. Hirottappe hi sati sīlaṃ uppajjati
atk-s0515a0:468_3: ceva tiṭṭhati ca, asati neva uppajjati ceva na tiṭṭhati cāti evaṃvidhena sīlena sīlavā
atk-s0515a0:468_4: hoti. Etaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa, vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa
atk-s0515a0:468_5: cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “kiṃ sīlanti? Cetanā sīlaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:468_6: cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīla”nti.
atk-s0515a0:469_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa
atk-s0515a0:469_1: cetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati. Api ca cetanā sīlaṃ
atk-s0515a0:469_2: nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa sattakammapathacetanā. Cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma “abhijjhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:469_3: pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī”tiādinā nayena saṃyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhābyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-s0515a0:469_4: Saṃvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṃvaro veditabbo – pātimokkhasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro
atk-s0515a0:469_5: ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaro. Tassa nānākaraṇaṃ upari āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0515a0:469_6: Avītikkamo sīlanti samādinnasīlassa kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. Ettha ca saṃvarasīlaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:469_7: avītikkamasīlanti idameva nippariyāyato sīlaṃ. Cetanāsīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ sīlanti pariyāyato sīlanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:470_0: Pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi
atk-s0515a0:470_2: samannāgato. Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ceva gocarena ca sampanno. Aṇumattesūti
atk-s0515a0:470_3: appamattakesu. Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassī. Samādāyāti sammā
atk-s0515a0:470_4: ādiyitvā. Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati. Api ca
atk-s0515a0:470_5: samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:470_6: kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā, taṃ sabbaṃ samādāya sikkhati.
atk-s0515a0:471_0: Khuddako sīlakkhandhoti saṅghādisesādisāvaseso sīlakkhandho. Mahantoti pārājikādiniravaseso.
atk-s0515a0:471_1: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma, tasmā taṃ “patiṭṭhā”ti
atk-s0515a0:471_2: vuttaṃ. Patiṭṭhahati vā ettha bhikkhu, kusalā dhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti
atk-s0515a0:471_3: patiṭṭhā. Ayamattho “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti ca, “patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0515a0:471_4: sīlaṃ sabbesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti ca, “sīle patiṭṭhito kho, mahārāja…pe… sabbe
atk-s0515a0:471_5: kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī”ti ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:472_0: Tadetaṃ pubbuppattiatthena ādi. Vuttampi cetaṃ “tasmātiha tvaṃ uttiya ādimeva visodhehi
atk-s0515a0:472_1: kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhi ca ujukā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:472_2: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṃ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṃ nagaraṭṭhānaṃ sodheti, tato aparabhāge
atk-s0515a0:472_3: vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvāva nagaraṃ māpeti. Evameva yogāvacaro
atk-s0515a0:472_4: ādito sīlaṃ visodheti, tato aparabhāge samādhivipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni sacchikaroti.
atk-s0515a0:472_5: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṃ tīhi khārehi vatthaṃ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:472_6: raṅgajātaṃ upaneti, yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṃ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:472_7: karoti, tato aparabhāge rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0515a0:472_8: aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti. Tasmā sīlaṃ “ādī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:473_0: Tadetaṃ caraṇasarikkhatāya caraṇaṃ. Caraṇāti hi pādā vuccanti. Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa
atk-s0515a0:473_1: purisassa disaṃ gamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati, paripuṇṇapādasseva jāyati, evameva yassa
atk-s0515a0:473_2: sīlaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti khaṇḍaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ, tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0515a0:473_3: Yassa pana taṃ abhinnaṃ hoti akhaṇḍaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ, tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:474_0: Tadetaṃ saṃyamanavasena saṃyamo. Saṃvaraṇavasena saṃvaroti ubhayenāpi sīlasaṃyamo
atk-s0515a0:474_1: ceva sīlasaṃvaro ca kathito. Vacanattho panettha saṃyameti vītikkamavipphandanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:474_2: puggalaṃ vā saṃyameti vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṃ na detīti saṃyamo. Vītikkamassa
atk-s0515a0:475_0: Mokkhanti uttamaṃ mukhabhūtaṃ vā. Yathā hi sattānaṃ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā
atk-s0515a0:475_1: aṅgamaṅgāni pharati, evaṃ yoginopi catubhūmakakusalaṃ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṃ
atk-s0515a0:475_2: sampādeti. Tena “mokkha”nti. Pamukhe sādhūti pāmokkhaṃ, pubbaṅgamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ padhānanti
atk-s0515a0:475_3: attho. Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:476_0: Vivicceva kāmehīti kāmehi vivicca vinā hutvā apakkamitvā. Yo panāyamettha evakāro,
atk-s0515a0:476_1: so niyamatthoti veditabbo. Yasmā ca niyamattho, tasmā tasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0515a0:476_2: viharaṇasamaye avijjamānānampi kāmānaṃ tassa paṭhamajjhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ kāmapariccāgeneva
atk-s0515a0:476_3: cassa adhigamaṃ dīpeti. Kathaṃ? “Vivicceva kāmehī”ti evañhi niyame kariyamāne idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:476_4: paññāyati, nūnimassa jhānassa kāmā paṭipakkhabhūtā, yesu sati idaṃ na pavattati andhakāre
atk-s0515a0:476_5: sati padīpobhāso viya, tesaṃ pariccāgeneva cassa adhigamo hoti orimatīrapariccāgena
atk-s0515a0:477_0: Tattha siyā “kasmā panesa pubbapadeyeva vutto na uttarapade, kiṃ akusalehi dhammehi
atk-s0515a0:477_1: aviviccāpi jhānaṃ upasampajja vihareyyā”ti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Taṃnissaraṇato
atk-s0515a0:477_2: hi pubbapade eva esa vutto. Kāmadhātusamatikkamanato hi kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato ca idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:477_3: jhānaṃ kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. Yathāha – “kāmānametaṃ nissaraṇaṃ yadidaṃ nekkhamma”nti.
atk-s0515a0:477_4: Uttarapadepi pana yathā “idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo”ti ettha evakāro
atk-s0515a0:477_5: ānetvā vuccati, evaṃ vattabbo. Na hi sakkā ito aññehipi nīvaraṇasaṅkhātehi akusalehi
atk-s0515a0:477_6: dhammehi avivicca jhānaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ. Tasmā vivicceva kāmehi vivicceva
atk-s0515a0:477_7: akusalehi dhammehīti evaṃ padadvayepi esa daṭṭhabbo. Padadvayepi ca kiñcāpi viviccāti
atk-s0515a0:477_8: iminā sādhāraṇavacanena tadaṅgavivekādayo kāyavivekādayo ca sabbepi vivekā saṅgahaṃ
atk-s0515a0:478_0: Kāmehīti iminā pana padena ye ca idha “katame vatthukāmā manāpikā rūpā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0515a0:478_1: vatthukāmā vuttā, ye ca idheva vibhaṅge “chando kāmo rāgo kāmo chandarāgo kāmo saṅkappo
atk-s0515a0:478_2: kāmo rāgo kāmo saṅkapparāgo kāmo”ti evaṃ kilesakāmā vuttā, te sabbepi saṅgahitā icceva
atk-s0515a0:478_3: daṭṭhabbā. Evañhi sati vivicceva kāmehīti vatthukāmehipi viviccevāti attho yujjati.
atk-s0515a0:479_0: Vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti kilesakāmehi sabbākusalehi vā viviccāti attho yujjati.
atk-s0515a0:479_1: Tena cittaviveko vutto hoti. Purimena cettha vatthukāmehi vivekavacanato eva kāmasukhapariccāgo,
atk-s0515a0:479_2: dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato nekkhammasukhapariggaho vibhāvito hoti. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:479_4: dutiyena saṃkilesappahānaṃ. Paṭhamena lolabhāvassa hetupariccāgo, dutiyena bālabhāvassa.
atk-s0515a0:479_5: Paṭhamena ca payogasuddhi, dutiyena āsayaposanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ hotīti ñātabbaṃ. Esa
atk-s0515a0:480_0: Kilesakāmapakkhe pana chandoti ca rāgoti ca evamādīhi anekabhedo kāmacchandova “kāmo”ti
atk-s0515a0:480_1: adhippeto. So ca akusalapariyāpannopi samāno “tattha katamo kāmacchando, kāmo”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:480_2: nayena vibhaṅge jhānapaṭipakkhato visuṃ vutto. Kilesakāmattā vā purimapade vutto,
atk-s0515a0:480_3: akusalapariyāpannattā dutiyapade. Anekabhedato cassa kāmatoti avatvā kāmehīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:480_4: Aññesampi ca dhammānaṃ akusalabhāve vijjamāne “tattha katame akusalā dhammā, kāmacchando”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:480_5: nayena vibhaṅge uparijhānaṅgānaṃ paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanato nīvaraṇāneva vuttāni.
atk-s0515a0:480_6: Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni tesaṃ jhānaṅgāneva paṭipakkhāni, viddhaṃsakāni
atk-s0515a0:480_7: vighātakānīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tathā hi “samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkho, pīti byāpādassa,
atk-s0515a0:480_8: vitakko thinamiddhassa, sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāyā”ti peṭake vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:481_0: Evamettha vivicceva kāmehīti iminā kāmacchandassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hoti,
atk-s0515a0:481_1: vivicca akusalehi dhammehīti iminā pañcannampi nīvaraṇānaṃ. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana
atk-s0515a0:481_2: paṭhamena kāmacchandassa, dutiyena sesanīvaraṇānaṃ. Tathā paṭhamena tīsu akusalamūlesu
atk-s0515a0:481_6: dutiyena avijjāya taṃsampayuttakānañca. Api ca paṭhamena lobhasampayuttaaṭṭhacittuppādānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:481_7: dutiyena sesānaṃ catunnaṃ akusalacittuppādānaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:482_0: Ettāvatā ca paṭhamassa jhānassa pahānaṅgaṃ dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
atk-s0515a0:482_1: “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0515a0:482_2: vitakko, ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo vicāro. Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci aviyoge oḷārikaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:482_3: pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇḍābhighāto viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko, sukhumaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:482_4: anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇḍānuravo viya anupabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko
atk-s0515a0:482_5: paṭhamuppattikāle paripphandanabhūto cittassa, ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo
atk-s0515a0:482_6: viya, padumābhimukhapāto viya ca gandhānubandhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro
atk-s0515a0:482_7: nātiparipphandanabhāvo cittassa, ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya,
atk-s0515a0:482_8: paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
atk-s0515a0:483_0: Dukanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0515a0:483_1: pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko,
atk-s0515a0:483_2: vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto
atk-s0515a0:483_3: vicāro”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ anuppabandhena pavattiyaṃ yujjati. So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu
atk-s0515a0:483_4: pākaṭo hoti. Api ca malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena
atk-s0515a0:483_5: hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena parimajjantassa daḷhaggahaṇahattho viya vitakko.
atk-s0515a0:483_6: Parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā
atk-s0515a0:483_7: bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko. Ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya
atk-s0515a0:483_8: vicāro. Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano
atk-s0515a0:483_9: vitakko. Bahi paribbhamanakaṇṭako viya anumajjamāno vicāro. Iti iminā ca vitakkena
atk-s0515a0:483_10: iminā ca vicārena saha vattati rukkho viya pupphena ca phalena cāti idaṃ jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ
atk-s0515a0:484_0: Vivekajanti ettha vivitti viveko, nīvaraṇavigamoti attho. Vivittoti vā viveko, nīvaraṇavivitto
atk-s0515a0:484_1: jhānasampayuttadhammarāsīti attho. Tasmā vivekā, tasmiṃ vā viveke jātanti vivekajaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:484_2: Pītisukhanti ettha piṇayatīti pīti, sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā. Sā panesā khuddikāpīti,
atk-s0515a0:484_3: khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti, ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
atk-s0515a0:485_0: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti khaṇe khaṇe
atk-s0515a0:485_1: vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti samuddatīraṃ vīci viya, kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā
atk-s0515a0:485_2: bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti, kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇapattā.
atk-s0515a0:486_0: Pharaṇāpīti atibalavatī hoti. Tāya hi uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi
atk-s0515a0:486_1: viya mahatā udakoghena pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti. Sā panesā
atk-s0515a0:486_2: pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti
atk-s0515a0:486_3: kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca, passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī
atk-s0515a0:486_4: duvidhampi sukhaṃ paripūreti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca, sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ
atk-s0515a0:486_5: gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiñcāti.
atk-s0515a0:486_6: Tāsu yā appanāsamādhissa mūlaṃ hutvā vaḍḍhamānā samādhisampayogaṅgatā pharaṇāpīti,
atk-s0515a0:487_0: Itaraṃ pana sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, yassa uppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Sukhanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:487_1: vā sukhaṃ, suṭṭhu vā khādati khaṇati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ, somanassavedanāyetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:487_2: nāmaṃ. Taṃ sātalakkhaṇaṃ. Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci avippayoge iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi
atk-s0515a0:487_3: pīti, paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ sukhaṃ. Yattha pīti, tattha sukhaṃ, yattha sukhaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:487_4: tattha na niyamato pīti. Saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā pīti, vedanākkhandhasaṅgahitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:487_5: sukhaṃ. Kantārakhinnassa vanantodakadassanasavanesu viya pīti, vanacchāyappavesanaudakaparibhogesu
atk-s0515a0:487_6: viya sukhaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye pākaṭabhāvato cetaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Iti ayañca
atk-s0515a0:487_7: pīti idañca sukhaṃ assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti idaṃ jhānaṃ “pītisukha”nti vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:488_0: Atha vā pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ dhammavinayādayo viya. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ assa
atk-s0515a0:488_1: jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne atthīti evampi vivekajaṃpītisukhaṃ. Yatheva hi jhānaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:488_2: pītisukhampettha vivekajameva hoti, tañcassa atthi, tasmā alopasamāsaṃ katvā ekapadeneva
atk-s0515a0:489_0: Paṭhamanti gaṇanānupubbatā paṭhamaṃ, idaṃ paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ. Jhānanti
atk-s0515a0:489_1: duvidhaṃ jhānaṃ ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānañcāti. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0515a0:489_2: pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyantīti ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti saṅkhyaṃ gatā. Vipassanāmaggaphalāni
atk-s0515a0:489_3: pana lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ nāma. Tattha vipassanā aniccādilakkhaṇassa upanijjhānato
atk-s0515a0:489_4: lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. Vipassanāya katakiccassa maggena ijjhanato maggo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:489_5: phalaṃ pana nirodhasaccaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ. Tesu
atk-s0515a0:489_6: idha pubbabhāge ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ, lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:489_7: Tasmā ārammaṇūpanijjhānato ca lakkhaṇūpanijjhānato ca paccanīkajhāpanato ca jhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:490_0: Upasampajjāti upagantvā, pāpuṇitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasampādayitvā vā, nipphādetvāti
atk-s0515a0:490_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Viharatīti tadanurūpena iriyāpathavihārena iriyati, vuttappakārajhānasamaṅgī
atk-s0515a0:491_0: Taṃ panetaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ tividhakalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:491_1: dasalakkhaṇasampannaṃ. Tattha kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ
atk-s0515a0:491_2: vicikicchāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānavasena pañcaṅgavippahīnatā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:491_3: Na hi etesu appahīnesu jhānaṃ uppajjati. Tenassetāni pahānaṅgānīti vuccanti. Kiñcāpi
atk-s0515a0:491_4: hi jhānakkhaṇe aññepi akusalā dhammā pahīyanti, tathāpi etāneva visesena jhānantarāyakarāni.
atk-s0515a0:491_5: Kāmacchandena hi nānāvisayappalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati, kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ
atk-s0515a0:491_6: vā, taṃ na kāmadhātuppahānāya paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati. Byāpādena vā ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:491_7: na nirantaraṃ pavattati. Thinamiddhābhibhūtaṃ akammaññaṃ hoti. Uddhaccakukkuccaparetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:491_8: avūpasantameva hutvā paribbhamati. Vicikicchāya upahataṃ jhānādhigamasādhikaṃ paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0515a0:491_9: nārohati. Iti visesena jhānantarāyakarattā etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
atk-s0515a0:492_0: Yasmā pana vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti, vicāro anupabandhati, tehi avikkhepāya
atk-s0515a0:492_1: sampāditapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisambhavā pīti pīṇanaṃ sukhañca upabrūhanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:492_3: anuggahitā ekaggatā ekattārammaṇe samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyati. Tasmā vitakko vicāro pīti
atk-s0515a0:492_4: sukhaṃ cittekaggatāti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ uppattivasena pañcaṅgasamannāgatatā veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:492_5: Uppannesu hi etesu pañcasu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti. Tenassa etāni pañcaṅgasamannāgatānīti
atk-s0515a0:492_6: vuccanti. Tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0515a0:492_7: pana aṅgamattavaseneva caturaṅginī senā, pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgiko ca maggoti
atk-s0515a0:492_8: vuccati, evamidampi aṅgamattavaseneva pañcaṅgikanti vā pañcaṅgasamannāgatanti vā
atk-s0515a0:493_0: Etāni ca pañcaṅgāni kiñcāpi upacārakkhaṇepi atthi, atha kho upacāre pakaticittato
atk-s0515a0:493_1: balavatarāni. Idha pana upacāratopi balavatarāni rūpāvacaralakkhaṇappattāni nipphannāni.
atk-s0515a0:493_2: Ettha hi vitakko suvisadena ākārena ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropayamāno uppajjati. Vicāro
atk-s0515a0:493_3: ativiya ārammaṇaṃ anumajjamāno. Pītisukhaṃ sabbāvantampi kāyaṃ pharamānaṃ. Tenevāha
atk-s0515a0:493_4: – “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṃ hotī”ti. Cittekaggatāpi
atk-s0515a0:493_5: heṭṭhimamhi samuggapaṭale uparimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ viya ārammaṇesu phusitā hutvā uppajjati,
atk-s0515a0:493_6: ayametesaṃ itarehi viseso. Tattha cittekaggatā kiñcāpi “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti imasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:493_7: pāṭhe na niddiṭṭhā, tathāpi vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittekaggatā”ti
atk-s0515a0:493_8: evaṃ vuttattā aṅgameva. Yena hi adhippāyena bhagavatā uddeso kato, soyeva tena vibhaṅge pakāsitoti.
atk-s0515a0:495_1: Tesaṃyeva ca ādimajjhapariyosānānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena dasalakkhaṇasampannatā veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ pāḷi –
atk-s0515a0:496_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi, upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe, sampahaṃsanā
atk-s0515a0:496_1: pariyosānaṃ, paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi ādi. Ādissa kati lakkhaṇāni? Ādissa
atk-s0515a0:496_2: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni – yo tassa paripantho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati, visuddhattā cittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:496_3: majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Yañca
atk-s0515a0:496_4: paripanthato cittaṃ visujjhati, yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:496_5: paṭipajjati, yañca paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa paṭipadāvisuddhi
atk-s0515a0:496_6: ādi, ādissa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati – ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva
atk-s0515a0:497_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe. Majjhassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Majjhassa
atk-s0515a0:497_1: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni – visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati,
atk-s0515a0:497_2: ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Yañca visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca samathapaṭipannaṃ
atk-s0515a0:497_3: ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Paṭhamassa jhānassa upekkhānubrūhanā
atk-s0515a0:497_4: majjhe, majjhassa imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati – ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva
atk-s0515a0:498_0: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ. Pariyosānassa kati lakkhaṇāni? Pariyosānassa
atk-s0515a0:498_1: cattāri lakkhaṇāni – tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā, indriyānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:498_3: sampahaṃsanā. Paṭhamassa jhānassa sampahaṃsanā pariyosānaṃ, pariyosānassa imāni cattāri
atk-s0515a0:498_4: lakkhaṇāni. Tena vuccati ‘paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti catulakkhaṇasampannañcā”’ti.
atk-s0515a0:499_0: “Tatra paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma sasambhāriko upacāro. Upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā.
atk-s0515a0:499_1: Sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti evameke vaṇṇayanti. Yasmā pana “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:499_2: paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena ca sampahaṃsita”nti
atk-s0515a0:499_3: pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā antoappanāyameva āgamanavasena paṭipadāvisuddhi, tatramajjhattupekkhāya
atk-s0515a0:500_0: Kathaṃ? Yasmiñhi vāre appanā uppajjati, tasmiṃ yo nīvaraṇasaṅkhāto kilesagaṇo tassa
atk-s0515a0:500_1: jhānassa paripantho, tato cittaṃ visujjhati. Visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā majjhimaṃ
atk-s0515a0:500_2: samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati. Majjhimasamathanimittaṃ nāma samappavatto appanāsamādhiyeva.
atk-s0515a0:500_3: Tadanantaraṃ pana purimacittaṃ ekasantatipariṇāmanayena tathattaṃ upagacchamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:500_4: majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati nāma, evaṃ paṭipannattā tathattupagamanena
atk-s0515a0:500_5: tattha pakkhandati nāma. Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākāranipphādikā paṭhamassa
atk-s0515a0:501_0: Evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhetabbābhāvato visodhane byāpāraṃ akaronto
atk-s0515a0:501_1: visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathabhāvūpagamanena samathapaṭipannassa puna
atk-s0515a0:501_2: samādhāne byāpāraṃ akaronto samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Samathapaṭipannabhāvato
atk-s0515a0:501_3: eva cassa kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:501_4: akaronto ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhati nāma. Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena
atk-s0515a0:502_0: Ye panete evaṃ upekkhānubrūhite tattha jātā samādhipaññāsaṅkhātā yuganaddhadhammā
atk-s0515a0:502_1: aññamaññaṃ anativattamānā hutvā pavattā, yāni ca saddhādīni indriyāni nānākilesehi
atk-s0515a0:502_2: vimuttattā vimuttirasena ekarasāni hutvā pavattāni, yañcesa tadupagaṃ tesaṃ anativattanaekarasabhāvānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:502_3: anucchavikaṃ vīriyaṃ vāhayati, yā cassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā, sabbepi te
atk-s0515a0:502_4: ākārā yasmā ñāṇena saṃkilesavodānesu taṃ taṃ ādīnavañca ānisaṃsañca disvā tathā tathā
atk-s0515a0:502_5: sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā pariyodāpitattā nipphannāva, tasmā “dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena
atk-s0515a0:502_6: pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena sampahaṃsanā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:503_0: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamāti vitakkassa ca vicārassa cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vūpasamā
atk-s0515a0:503_1: samatikkamā, dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe apātubhāvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne
atk-s0515a0:503_2: sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi, aññeyeva hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo, aññe
atk-s0515a0:503_3: idha. Oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:503_4: adhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:503_5: Ajjhattanti idha niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, vibhaṅge pana “ajjhattaṃ paccatta”nti
atk-s0515a0:503_6: ettakameva vuttaṃ. Yasmā niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ, tasmā attani jātaṃ, attano santāne
atk-s0515a0:504_0: Sampasādananti sampasādanaṃ vuccati saddhā. Sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:504_1: nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya. Yasmā vā taṃ jhānaṃ sampasādanasamannāgatattā vitakkavicārakkhobhavūpasamanena
atk-s0515a0:504_2: ca ceto sampasādayati, tasmāpi “sampasādana”nti vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca atthavikappe sampasādanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:504_3: cetasoti evaṃ padasambandho veditabbo. Purimasmiṃ pana atthavikappe cetasoti etaṃ
atk-s0515a0:505_0: Tatrāyaṃ atthayojanā – eko udetīti ekodi, vitakkavicārehi anajjhārūḷhattā aggo seṭṭho
atk-s0515a0:505_1: hutvā udetīti attho. Seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccati. Vitakkavicāravirahito vā eko
atk-s0515a0:505_2: asahāyo hutvātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Atha vā sampayuttadhamme udāyatīti udi, uṭṭhāpetīti
atk-s0515a0:505_3: attho. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena eko ca so udi cāti ekodi, samādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Iti imaṃ
atk-s0515a0:505_4: ekodiṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti idaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ ekodibhāvaṃ. So panāyaṃ ekodi yasmā
atk-s0515a0:505_5: cetaso, na sattassa, na jīvassa. Tasmā etaṃ “cetaso ekodibhāva”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:506_0: Nanu cāyaṃ saddhā paṭhamajjhānepi atthi, ayañca ekodināmako samādhi, atha kasmā idameva
atk-s0515a0:506_1: “sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva”nti vuttanti? Vuccate – aduñhi paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena
atk-s0515a0:506_2: vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti, tasmā satiyāpi saddhāya sampasādananti
atk-s0515a0:506_3: na vuttaṃ. Na suppasannattāyeva cettha samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo, tasmā ekodibhāvantipi
atk-s0515a0:506_4: na vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana jhāne vitakkavicārapalibodhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
atk-s0515a0:506_5: balavasaddhāsahāyapaṭilābheneva ca samādhipi pākaṭo. Tasmā idameva evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:507_0: Avitakkaṃ avicāranti bhāvanāya pahīnattā etasmiṃ, etassa vā vitakko natthīti avitakkaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:507_1: Imināva nayena avicāraṃ. Etthāha “nanu ca ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā’ti imināpi ayamattho
atk-s0515a0:507_2: siddho. Atha kasmā puna vuttaṃ ‘avitakkaṃ avicāra”’nti? Vuccate – evametaṃ, siddhovāyamattho.
atk-s0515a0:507_3: Na panetaṃ tadatthadīpakaṃ, nanu avocumha “oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā
atk-s0515a0:507_4: paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ samadhigamo hotīti dassanatthaṃ ‘vitakkavicārānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:508_0: Api ca vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ sampasādanaṃ, na kilesakālussiyassa. Vitakkavicārānañca
atk-s0515a0:508_1: vūpasamā ekodibhāvaṃ, na upacārajjhānamiva nīvaraṇappahānā, na paṭhamajjhānamiva
atk-s0515a0:508_2: ca aṅgapātubhāvāti evaṃ sampasādanaekodibhāvānaṃ hetuparidīpakamidaṃ vacanaṃ. Tathā
atk-s0515a0:508_3: vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā idaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ, na tatiyacatutthajjhānāni viya
atk-s0515a0:508_4: cakkhuviññāṇādīni viya ca abhāvāti, evaṃ avitakkaavicārabhāvassa hetuparidīpakañca,
atk-s0515a0:508_6: “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ. Tasmā purimaṃ vatvāpi puna vattabbamevāti.
atk-s0515a0:509_0: Samādhijanti paṭhamajjhānasamādhito sampayuttasamādhito vā jātanti attho. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:509_1: kiñcāpi paṭhamampi sampayuttasamādhito jātaṃ, atha kho ayameva samādhi “samādhī”ti
atk-s0515a0:509_2: vattabbataṃ arahati, vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahena ativiya acalattā suppasannattā
atk-s0515a0:509_3: ca. Tasmā imassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ idameva “samādhija”nti vuttaṃ. Pītisukhanti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0515a0:510: Dutiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā dutiyaṃ. Idaṃ dutiyaṃ uppannantipi dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:511_0: Pītiyā ca virāgāti virāgo nāma vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā.
atk-s0515a0:511_1: Ubhinnaṃ pana antarā ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, so vūpasamaṃ vā sampiṇḍeti vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ
atk-s0515a0:511_2: vā. Tattha yadā vūpasamameva sampiṇḍeti, tadā pītiyā virāgā ca, kiñca bhiyyo vūpasamā
atk-s0515a0:511_3: cāti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo jigucchanattho hoti, tasmā
atk-s0515a0:511_4: pītiyā jigucchanā ca samatikkamā cāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo. Yadā pana vitakkavicāravūpasamaṃ
atk-s0515a0:511_5: sampiṇḍeti, tadā pītiyā ca virāgā, kiñca bhiyyo vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:511_6: yojanā veditabbā. Imissā ca yojanāya virāgo samatikkamanattho hoti, tasmā pītiyā
atk-s0515a0:511_7: ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamāti ayamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:512_0: Kāmañcete vitakkavicārā dutiyajjhāneyeva vūpasantā, imassa pana jhānassa maggaparidīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:512_1: vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañcetaṃ vuttaṃ. “Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti hi vutte idaṃ paññāyati
atk-s0515a0:512_2: “nūna vitakkavicāravūpasamo maggo imassa jhānassā”ti. Yathā ca tatiye ariyamagge
atk-s0515a0:512_4: evaṃ pahānaṃ vuccamānaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti, tadadhigamāya ussukkānaṃ ussāhajanakaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:512_5: evameva idha avūpasantānampi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo vuccamāno vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a0:512_6: tenāyamattho vutto “pītiyā ca samatikkamā vitakkavicārānañca vūpasamā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:513_0: Upekkhako ca viharatīti ettha upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā, samaṃ passati, apakkhapatitā
atk-s0515a0:513_1: hutvā passatīti attho. Tāya visadāya vipulāya thāmagatāya samannāgatattā tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī
atk-s0515a0:514_0: Upekkhā pana dasavidhā hoti – chaḷaṅgupekkhā brahmavihārupekkhā bojjhaṅgupekkhā vīriyupekkhā
atk-s0515a0:514_1: saṅkhārupekkhā vedanupekkhā vipassanupekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhā jhānupekkhā pārisuddhupekkhāti.
atk-s0515a0:515_0: Tattha yā “idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
atk-s0515a0:515_1: upekkhako ca viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
atk-s0515a0:516: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ brahmavihārupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:517: Yā pana “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ bojjhaṅgupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:518: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā, ayaṃ vīriyupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:519_0: Yā pana “kati saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, kati saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
atk-s0515a0:519_1: uppajjanti? Aṭṭha saṅkhārupekkhā samathavasena uppajjanti, dasa saṅkhārupekkhā vipassanāvasena
atk-s0515a0:520: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā, ayaṃ vedanupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:521: Yā pana “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:522: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:523: Yā pana “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā, ayaṃ jhānupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:524: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ pārisuddhupekkhā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:525_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā
atk-s0515a0:525_1: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā, tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti. Tena
atk-s0515a0:525_2: tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo. Ekassāpi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena
atk-s0515a0:525_3: bhedo viya, tasmā tāsu yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā, na tattha bojjhaṅgupekkhādayo. Yattha
atk-s0515a0:525_4: vā pana bojjhaṅgupekkhā, na tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhādayo hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:526_0: Yathā cetāsaṃ atthato ekībhāvo, evaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāvipassanupekkhānampi. Paññā eva
atk-s0515a0:526_1: hi esā, kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā, yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ
atk-s0515a0:526_2: ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu
atk-s0515a0:526_3: kho no”ti avalokentassa sovatthikattayaṃ disvā nibbematikassa “sappo na sappo”ti
atk-s0515a0:526_4: vicinane majjhattatā uppajjati, evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye
atk-s0515a0:526_5: diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati, ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā.
atk-s0515a0:526_6: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadadaṇḍakena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kintāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0515a0:526_7: sappaṃ aviheṭhento attānañca iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato
atk-s0515a0:526_8: gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti, evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave
atk-s0515a0:526_9: passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā, ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā. Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya
atk-s0515a0:526_10: saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti. Iminā panesā vicinanaggahaṇesu majjhattatāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0515a0:526_11: kiccena dvidhā bhinnāti. Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi
atk-s0515a0:530: Duve paññā tato dvīhi, catassova bhavantimā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:531_0: Iti imāsu upekkhāsu jhānupekkhā idha adhippetā. Sā majjhattalakkhaṇā, anābhogarasā,
atk-s0515a0:531_1: abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā, pītivirāgapadaṭṭhānāti. Etthāha – “nanu cāyaṃ atthato tatramajjhattupekkhāva
atk-s0515a0:531_2: hoti, sā ca paṭhamadutiyajjhānesupi atthi. Tasmā tatrāpi ‘upekkhako ca viharatī’ti
atk-s0515a0:531_3: evamayaṃ vattabbā siyā, sā kasmā na vuttā”ti? Aparibyattakiccato. Aparibyattañhi
atk-s0515a0:531_4: tassā tattha kiccaṃ, vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā. Idha panāyaṃ vitakkavicārapītīhi anabhibhūtattā
atk-s0515a0:531_5: ukkhittasirā viya hutvā paribyattakiccā jātā, tasmā vuttāti.
atk-s0515a0:532_0: Sato ca sampajānoti ettha saratīti sato. Sampajānātīti sampajāno. Iti puggalena sati
atk-s0515a0:532_1: ca sampajaññañca vuttaṃ. Tattha saraṇalakkhaṇā sati, asammussanarasā ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0515a0:533_0: Tattha kiñcāpi idaṃ satisampajaññaṃ purimajjhānesupi atthi, muṭṭhassatissa hi asampajānassa
atk-s0515a0:533_1: upacāramattampi na sampajjati, pageva appanā. Oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānānaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:533_2: viya purisassa cittassa gati sukhā hoti, abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ. Oḷārikaṅgappahānena
atk-s0515a0:533_3: pana sukhumattā imassa jhānassa purisassa khuradhārāyaṃ viya satisampajaññakiccapariggahitā
atk-s0515a0:533_4: eva cittassa gati icchitabbāti idheva vuttaṃ. Kiñca bhiyyo – yathā dhenupago vaccho
atk-s0515a0:533_5: dhenuto apanīto arakkhiyamāno punadeva dhenuṃ upagacchati, evamidaṃ tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:533_6: pītito apanītampi satisampajaññārakkhena arakkhiyamānaṃ punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyya,
atk-s0515a0:533_7: pītisampayuttameva siyā, sukhe vāpi sattā sārajjanti. Idañca atimadhurasukhaṃ, tato
atk-s0515a0:533_8: paraṃ sukhābhāvā. Satisampajaññānubhāvena panettha sukhe asārajjanā hoti, no aññathāti
atk-s0515a0:533_9: imampi atthavisesaṃ dassetuṃ idamidheva vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:534_0: Idāni sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti ettha kiñcāpi tatiyajjhānasamaṅgino sukhapaṭisaṃvedanābhogo
atk-s0515a0:534_1: natthi, evaṃ santepi yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. Yaṃ vā taṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:534_2: sukhaṃ, taṃsamuṭṭhānenassa yasmā atipaṇītena rūpena rūpakāyo phuṭo, yassa phuṭattā
atk-s0515a0:534_3: jhānā vuṭṭhitopi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena
atk-s0515a0:535_0: Idāni yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti ettha yaṃjhānahetu
atk-s0515a0:535_1: yaṃjhānakāraṇā taṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgīpuggalaṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti desenti
atk-s0515a0:535_2: paññapenti paṭṭhapenti vivaranti vibhajanti uttānīkaronti pakāsenti, pasaṃsantīti
atk-s0515a0:535_3: adhippāyo. Kinti? Upekkhako satimā sukhavihārīti. Taṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti
atk-s0515a0:536_0: Kasmā pana taṃ te evaṃ pasaṃsantīti? Pasaṃsārahato. Ayañhi yasmā atimadhurasukhe
atk-s0515a0:536_1: sukhapāramippattepi tatiyajjhāne upekkhako, na tattha sukhābhisaṅgena ākaḍḍhīyati.
atk-s0515a0:536_2: Yathā ca pīti na uppajjati, evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya satimā. Yasmā ca ariyakantaṃ ariyajanasevitameva
atk-s0515a0:536_3: ca asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedeti, tasmā pasaṃsāraho. Iti pasaṃsārahato
atk-s0515a0:536_4: naṃ ariyā te evaṃ pasaṃsāhetubhūte guṇe pakāsento “upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī”ti
atk-s0515a0:536_5: evaṃ pasaṃsantīti veditabbaṃ. Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbatā tatiyaṃ, idaṃ tatiyaṃ uppannantipi tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:537_0: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa ca kāyikadukkhassa ca pahānā.
atk-s0515a0:537_1: Pubbevāti tañca kho pubbeva, na catutthajjhānakkhaṇe. Somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāti
atk-s0515a0:537_2: cetasikasukhassa ca cetasikadukkhassa cāti imesampi dvinnaṃ pubbeva atthaṅgamā, pahānā icceva vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:538_0: Kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti? Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe. Somanassañhi catutthajjhānassa
atk-s0515a0:538_2: Evametesaṃ pahānakkamena avuttānaṃ, indriyavibhaṅge pana indriyānaṃ uddesakkameneva
atk-s0515a0:539_0: Yadi panetāni tassa tassa jhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, atha kasmā “kattha
atk-s0515a0:539_1: cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva
atk-s0515a0:539_2: kāmehi…pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati, ettha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:539_3: nirujjhati. Kattha cuppannaṃ domanassindriyaṃ… sukhindriyaṃ… somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:539_4: nirujjhati? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu, sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
atk-s0515a0:539_5: viharati. Ettha cuppannaṃ somanassindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti evaṃ jhānesveva
atk-s0515a0:539_6: nirodho vuttoti. Atisayanirodhattā. Atisayanirodho hi nesaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīsu, na
atk-s0515a0:540_0: Tathā hi nānāvajjane paṭhamajjhānūpacāre niruddhassāpi dukkhindriyassa ḍaṃsamakasādisamphassena
atk-s0515a0:540_1: vā visamāsanupatāpena vā siyā uppatti, na tveva antoappanāyaṃ. Upacāre vā niruddhampetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:540_2: na suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti, paṭipakkhena avihatattā. Antoappanāyaṃ pana pītipharaṇena
atk-s0515a0:540_3: sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hoti, sukhokkantakāyassa ca suṭṭhu niruddhaṃ hoti dukkhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:540_4: paṭipakkhena vihatattā. Nānāvajjaneyeva ca dutiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi domanassindriyassa
atk-s0515a0:540_5: yasmā etaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayepi kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicārābhāve
atk-s0515a0:540_6: neva uppajjati. Yattha pana uppajjati, tattha vitakkavicārabhāve. Appahīnāyeva ca
atk-s0515a0:540_7: dutiyajjhānūpacāre vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti, na tveva dutiyajjhāne,
atk-s0515a0:540_8: pahīnappaccayattā. Tathā tatiyajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
atk-s0515a0:540_9: siyā uppatti, na tveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
atk-s0515a0:540_10: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānūpacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā,
atk-s0515a0:540_11: appanāpattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca siyā uppatti, na tveva catutthajjhāne.
atk-s0515a0:540_12: Tasmā eva ca “etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”ti tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
atk-s0515a0:541_0: Etthāha – “athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā”ti?
atk-s0515a0:541_1: Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ. Yā hi ayaṃ adukkhamasukhanti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
atk-s0515a0:541_2: sā sukhumā dubbiññeyyā, na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ, tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
atk-s0515a0:541_3: vā tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa sukhagahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:541_4: vaje sabbā gāvo samāharati, athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ “ayaṃ so gaṇhatha
atk-s0515a0:541_5: na”nti tampi gāhāpeti, evameva bhagavā sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ sabbā etā samāharīti. Evañhi
atk-s0515a0:541_6: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā “yaṃ neva sukhaṃ, na dukkhaṃ, na somanassaṃ, na domanassaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:541_7: ayaṃ adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
atk-s0515a0:542_0: Api ca adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:542_1: Dukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
atk-s0515a0:542_2: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:542_3: upasampajja viharati. Ime kho, āvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā
atk-s0515a0:542_4: samāpattiyā”ti. Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:542_5: “tattha pahīnā”ti vuttā, evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttātipi
atk-s0515a0:542_6: veditabbā. Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti
atk-s0515a0:542_7: veditabbā. Etāsu hi sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa, dukkhaṃ domanassassa,
atk-s0515a0:542_8: domanassaṃ dosassa. Sukhādighātena ca te sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
atk-s0515a0:543_0: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṃ, sukhābhāvena asukhaṃ. Etenettha sukhadukkhapaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
atk-s0515a0:543_1: tatiyavedanaṃ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṃ. Tatiyavedanā nāma adukkhamasukhā,
atk-s0515a0:543_2: upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0515a0:544_0: Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti upekkhāya janitasatipārisuddhiṃ. Imasmiñhi jhāne suparisuddhā
atk-s0515a0:544_1: sati, yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā, na aññena. Tasmā etaṃ “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti
atk-s0515a0:544_2: vuccati. Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti, sā atthato tatramajjhattatāti
atk-s0515a0:544_3: veditabbā. Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā, api ca kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā,
atk-s0515a0:545_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati, yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
atk-s0515a0:545_1: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
atk-s0515a0:545_2: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā, evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
atk-s0515a0:545_4: vijjamānāpi paṭhamajjhānādibhedesu aparisuddhā hoti. Tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā
atk-s0515a0:545_5: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti. Tasmā
atk-s0515a0:545_6: tesu ekampi “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti na vuttaṃ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
atk-s0515a0:545_7: sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā ativiya
atk-s0515a0:545_8: parisuddhā, tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo
atk-s0515a0:545_9: parisuddhā honti pariyodātā. Tasmā idameva “upekkhāsatipārisuddhi”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:545_10: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṃ. Idaṃ catutthaṃ uppannantipi catutthaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:546_0: Paññavā hotīti paññā assa atthīti paññavā. Udayatthagāminiyāti udayagāminiyā ceva
atk-s0515a0:546_1: atthagāminiyā ca. Samannāgatoti paripuṇṇo. Ariyāyāti niddosāya. Nibbedhikāyāti nibbedhapakkhikāya.
atk-s0515a0:546_2: Dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti nibbānagāminiyā. So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu “ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:546_3: na ito bhiyyo”ti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti
atk-s0515a0:546_4: paṭivijjhati. Tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti. Tadubhayampi
atk-s0515a0:546_5: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā nirujjhati, taṃ tesaṃ appavattiṃ nibbānaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodho”ti.
atk-s0515a0:546_6: Tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
