atk-s0515a0:547_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento “ime āsavā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:547_1: Te vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Evaṃ tisso sikkhāyo dassetvā idāni tāsaṃ pāripūrikkamaṃ
atk-s0515a0:547_2: dassetuṃ “imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkheyyā”tiādimāha. Tassattho – paccekaṃ
atk-s0515a0:547_3: paripūretuṃ āvajjantopi sikkheyya, āvajjitvāpi “ayaṃ nāma sikkhā”ti jānantopi sikkheyya,
atk-s0515a0:547_4: jānitvā punappunaṃ passantopi sikkheyya, passitvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ paccavekkhantopi sikkheyya,
atk-s0515a0:547_5: paccavekkhitvā tattheva cittaṃ acalaṃ katvā patiṭṭhapentopi sikkheyya, taṃtaṃsikkhāsampayuttasaddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāhi
atk-s0515a0:547_6: sakasakakiccaṃ karontopi sikkheyya, abhiññeyyābhijānanakālepi taṃ taṃ kiccaṃ karontopi
atk-s0515a0:547_7: tisso sikkhāyo sikkheyya, adhisīlaṃ ācareyya, adhicittaṃ sammā careyya, adhipaññaṃ samādāya vatteyya.
atk-s0515a0:548_0: Idhāti mūlapadaṃ. Imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva
atk-s0515a0:548_1: kathitaṃ. Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati. Tasseva khamanavasena
atk-s0515a0:548_2: khanti, ruccanavasena ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo, sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo, sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:548_3: vinayo, tadubhayenapi dhammavinayo, pavuttavasena pāvacanaṃ, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:548_4: anusiṭṭhidānavasena satthusāsananti vuccati. Tasmā “imissā diṭṭhiyā”tiādīsu imissā
atk-s0515a0:548_5: buddhadiṭṭhiyā imissā buddhakhantiyā imissā buddharuciyā imasmiṃ buddhaādāye imasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:549_0: “Ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi ‘ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti, no virāgāya,
atk-s0515a0:549_1: saññogāya saṃvattanti, no visaññogāya, ācayāya saṃvattanti, no apacayāya, mahicchatāya
atk-s0515a0:549_2: saṃvattanti, no appicchatāya, asantuṭṭhiyā saṃvattanti, no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0515a0:549_3: saṃvattanti, no pavivekāya, kosajjāya saṃvattanti, no vīriyārambhāya, dubbharatāya
atk-s0515a0:549_4: saṃvattanti, no subharatāyā’ti. Ekaṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo,
atk-s0515a0:550_0: “Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti, no sarāgāya…pe…
atk-s0515a0:550_1: subharatāya saṃvattanti, no dubbharatāyā’ti. Ekaṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi ‘eso dhammo,
atk-s0515a0:551: Evaṃ vutte imasmiṃ buddhadhammavinaye imasmiṃ buddhapāvacane imasmiṃ buddhabrahmacariye imasmiṃ buddhasāsaneti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:552_0: Api cetaṃ sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā
atk-s0515a0:552_1: sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi. Bhagavato khamanavasena khanti. Ruccanavasena
atk-s0515a0:552_2: ruci. Gahaṇavasena ādāyo. Attano kārakaṃ apāyesu apatamānaṃ katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
atk-s0515a0:552_3: Sova saṃkilesapakkhaṃ vinetīti vinayo. Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo. Kusaladhammehi
atk-s0515a0:552_4: vā akusaladhammānaṃ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo. Teneva vuttaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:553: “Ye ca kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṃvattanti, no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṃsena gotami dhāreyyāsi ‘eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṃ satthusāsana”’nti.
atk-s0515a0:554: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:559_0: Dhammāya vā vinayo dhammavinayo. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogāmisatthaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:559_1: Tenāha bhagavā “nayidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati janakuhanattha”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0515a0:559_2: Puṇṇattheropi āha “anupādāparinibbānatthaṃ kho, āvuso, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussatī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:559_3: Visiṭṭhaṃ vā nayatīti vinayo. Dhammato vinayo dhammavinayo. Saṃsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato
atk-s0515a0:559_4: vā esa visiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ nayati. Dhammassa vā vinayo, na titthakarānanti dhammavinayo.
atk-s0515a0:560_0: Yasmā vā dhammā eva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā sacchikātabbā ca,
atk-s0515a0:560_1: tasmā esa dhammesu vinayo, na sattesu na jīvesu cāti dhammavinayo. Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi
atk-s0515a0:560_2: aññesaṃ vacanato padhānaṃ vacananti pavacanaṃ, pavacanameva pāvacanaṃ. Sabbacariyāhi
atk-s0515a0:560_3: visiṭṭhacariyabhāvena brahmacariyaṃ. Devamanussānaṃ satthubhūtassa bhagavato sāsananti
atk-s0515a0:560_4: satthusāsanaṃ. Satthubhūtaṃ vā sāsanantipi satthusāsanaṃ. “So vo mamaccayena satthāti
atk-s0515a0:560_5: hi dhammavinayova satthā”ti vuttoti evametesaṃ padānaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:561: Yasmā pana imasmiṃyeva sāsane sabbappakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati, na aññatra, tasmā tattha tattha “imissā”ti ca “imasmi”nti ca ayaṃ niyamo katoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:562_0: Jīvanti tena taṃsampayuttakā dhammāti jīvitaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
atk-s0515a0:562_1: indriyaṃ. Jīvitameva indriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Taṃ pavattasantatādhipateyyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:562_2: Lakkhaṇādīhi pana attanā avinibhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:562_4: Santepi ca anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti,
atk-s0515a0:562_5: udakaṃ viya uppalādīni. Yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppannepi ca dhamme pāleti, dhāti viya
atk-s0515a0:562_6: kumāraṃ, sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva ca pavattati, niyāmako viya nāvaṃ. Na
atk-s0515a0:562_7: bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattayati, attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā. Na bhaṅgakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a0:562_8: ṭhapeti, sayaṃ bhijjamānattā, khīyamāno viya vaṭṭisineho padīpasikhaṃ, na ca anupālanapavattanaṭṭhapanānubhāvavirahitaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:562_9: yathāvuttakkhaṇe tassa tassa sādhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ṭhitiparittatāya vāti ṭhitikkhaṇassa
atk-s0515a0:562_10: mandatāya thokatāya. Appakanti mandaṃ lāmakaṃ. Sarasaparittatāya vāti attano paccayabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:563_0: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ “kathaṃ ṭhitiparittatāyā”tiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:563_1: “atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvitthāti evamādi pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃ cittassa nirujjhanakāle
atk-s0515a0:563_2: sabbasmiṃ rūpārūpadhamme anirujjhantepi rūpato arūpassa paṭṭhānabhāvena arūpajīvitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:563_3: sandhāya, cuticittena vā saddhiṃ sabbesaṃ rūpārūpānaṃ nirujjhanabhāvena pañcavokārabhave
atk-s0515a0:563_4: cuticittaṃ sandhāya, catuvokārabhave rūpassa abhāvena catuvokārabhavaṃ sandhāya kathita”nti
atk-s0515a0:563_5: veditabbaṃ. Atīte cittakkhaṇeti atītacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgīkāle taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo
atk-s0515a0:563_6: “jīvittha” iti vattuṃ labbhati. Na jīvatīti “jīvatī”tipi vattuṃ na labbhati. Na jīvissatīti
atk-s0515a0:563_7: “jīvissatī”tipi vattuṃ na labbhati. Anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissatīti anāgatacittassa
atk-s0515a0:563_9: vattuṃ na labbhati. Na jīvitthāti “jīvittha”itipi vattuṃ na labbhati. Paccuppanne
atk-s0515a0:563_11: labbhati. Na jīvitthāti “jīvittha”iti vattuṃ na labbhati. Na jīvissatīti “jīvissatī”tipi vattuṃ na labbhati.
atk-s0515a0:564_0: Jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca sukhadukkhā cāti ayaṃ gāthā pañcavokārabhavaṃ amuñcitvā labbhamānāya
atk-s0515a0:564_1: dukkhāya vedanāya gahitattā pañcavokārabhavameva sandhāya vuttāti veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0515a0:564_2: Jīvitanti jīvitasīsena saṅkhārakkhandho. Attabhāvoti rūpakkhandho. “Upekkhā pana
atk-s0515a0:564_3: santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā”ti vuttattā upekkhāvedanā antokaritvā sukhadukkhā
atk-s0515a0:564_4: cāti vedanākkhandho, cittaṃ iti viññāṇakkhandho vutto. Imesaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:564_6: kathitoti veditabbo. Evaṃ vuttesu pañcasu khandhesu arūpadhammaṃ muñcitvā kammasamuṭṭhānādirūpassa
atk-s0515a0:564_7: appavattanabhāvena ekacittasamāyuttāti arūpapadhānabhāvo kathito hoti. Kathaṃ? Asaññasatte
atk-s0515a0:564_8: rūpampi idhupacitakammabalaṃ amuñcitvāva pavattati, nirodhasamāpannānaṃ rūpampi paṭhamasamāpannasamāpattibalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:564_9: amuñcitvāva pavattati. Evaṃ attano appavattiṭṭhānepi rūpapavattiṃ attano santakameva
atk-s0515a0:564_10: katvā pavattanasabhāvassa arūpadhammassa attano pavattiṭṭhāne rūpapavattiyā padhānakāraṇabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:565_0: Evaṃ pañcavokārabhave pavattiyaṃ rūpapavattiyā padhānabhūtacittanirodhena rūpe dharamāneyeva
atk-s0515a0:565_1: pavattānaṃ nirodho nāma hotīti arūpadhammavasena eva “lahuso vattate khaṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:565_2: Atha vā pañcavokārabhave cuticittaṃ sandhāya kathitāti veditabbā. Evaṃ kathiyamāne
atk-s0515a0:565_3: sukhadukkhā cāti kāyikacetasikasukhavedanā ca kāyikacetasikadukkhavedanā ca cuticittakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a0:565_4: ahontīpi ekasantativasena cuticittena saddhiṃ nirujjhatīti kathitā. Catuvokārabhavaṃ
atk-s0515a0:565_5: vā sandhāya kathitātipi veditabbā. Kathaṃ? Aññasmiṃ ṭhāne attabhāvoti saññākkhandhassa
atk-s0515a0:565_6: vuttabhāvena attabhāvoti saññākkhandhova gahito. Brahmaloke kāyikasukhadukkhadomanassaṃ
atk-s0515a0:565_7: ahontampi sukhadukkhā cāti vedanāsāmaññato labbhamāno vedanākkhandho gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:565_8: Sesaṃ vuttasadisameva. Imesu ca tīsu vikappesu kevalāti dhuvasukhasubhaattā natthi,
atk-s0515a0:565_9: kevalaṃ tehi avomissā. Lahuso vattati khaṇoti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko
atk-s0515a0:566_0: Ekato dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ appavattiṃ dassento “cullāsītisahassānī”ti gāthamāha. Cullāsītisahassāni,
atk-s0515a0:566_1: kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marūti ye devagaṇā caturāsīti kappasahassāni āyuṃ gahetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatane
atk-s0515a0:566_2: tiṭṭhanti. “Ye narā”tipi pāḷi. Na tveva tepi jīvanti, dvīhi cittasamohitāti tepi
atk-s0515a0:566_3: devā dvīhi cittehi samohitā ekato hutvā yuganaddhena cittena na tu eva jīvanti, ekenekena
atk-s0515a0:567_0: Idāni maraṇakālaṃ dassento “ye niruddhā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha ye niruddhāti ye khandhā
atk-s0515a0:567_1: niruddhā atthaṅgatā. Marantassāti matassa. Tiṭṭhamānassa vāti dharamānassa vā. Sabbepi
atk-s0515a0:567_2: sadisā khandhāti cutito uddhaṃ niruddhakkhandhā vā pavatte niruddhakkhandhā vā puna
atk-s0515a0:567_3: ghaṭetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṭṭhena sabbepi khandhā sadisā. Gatā appaṭisandhikāti niruddhakkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:567_4: puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena gatā appaṭisandhikāti vuccanti.
atk-s0515a0:568_0: Idāni tīsu kālesu niruddhakkhandhānaṃ nānattaṃ natthīti dassetuṃ “anantarā”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:568_1: Tattha anantarā ca ye bhaggā, ye ca bhaggā anāgatāti ye khandhā anantarātītā hutvā
atk-s0515a0:568_2: bhinnā niruddhā, ye ca anāgatā khandhā bhijjissanti. Tadantareti tesaṃ antare niruddhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:568_3: paccuppannakhandhānaṃ. Vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇeti visamassa bhāvo vesamaṃ, taṃ vesamaṃ
atk-s0515a0:568_4: natthi, tehi nānattaṃ natthīti attho. Lakkhīyatīti lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ lakkhaṇe.
atk-s0515a0:569_1: na jāto”ti gāthamāha. Anibbattena na jātoti ajātena apātubhūtena anāgatakkhandhena
atk-s0515a0:569_2: na jāto na nibbatto. Etena anāgatakkhandhassa vattamānakkhandhena asammissabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:569_3: kathesi. Paccuppannena jīvatīti khaṇapaccuppannena vattamānakkhandhena jīvati. Etena
atk-s0515a0:569_4: ekakkhaṇe dvīhi cittehi na jīvatīti kathitaṃ. Cittabhaggā matoti dvīhi cittehi ekakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a0:569_5: ajīvanabhāvena cittabhaṅgena mato. “Uparito cittabhaṅgā”tipi pāḷi, taṃ ujukameva.
atk-s0515a0:569_6: Paññatti paramatthiyāti “rūpaṃ jīrati maccānaṃ, nāmagottaṃ na jīratī”ti vacanakkamena
atk-s0515a0:569_7: paṇṇattimattaṃ na jīraṇasabhāvena paramā ṭhiti etissāti paramatthiyā, sabhāvaṭṭhitikāti
atk-s0515a0:569_8: attho. “Datto mato, mitto mato”ti paṇṇattimattameva hi tiṭṭhati. Atha vā paramatthiyāti
atk-s0515a0:569_9: paramatthikā. Paramo attho etissāti paramatthikā. Ajaṭākāsoti paññattiyā natthidhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:569_10: paṭicca kathanaṃ viya matoti paññatti natthidhammaṃ paṭicca na kathiyati, jīvitindriyabhaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0515a0:570_0: Anidhānagatā bhaggāti ye khandhā bhinnā, te nidhānaṃ nihitaṃ nicayaṃ na gacchantīti
atk-s0515a0:570_1: anidhānagatā. Puñjo natthi anāgateti anāgatepi nesaṃ puñjabhāvo rāsibhāvo natthi.
atk-s0515a0:570_2: Nibbattāyeva tiṭṭhantīti paccuppannavasena uppannā ṭhitikkhaṇe vayadhammāva hutvā
atk-s0515a0:570_3: tiṭṭhanti. Kimiva? Āragge sāsapūpamāti sūcimukhe sāsapo viya.
atk-s0515a0:571_0: Idāni khandhānaṃ dassanabhāvaṃ dassento “nibbattāna”nti gāthamāha. Tattha nibbattānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:571_1: dhammānanti paccuppannānaṃ khandhānaṃ. Bhaṅgo nesaṃ purakkhatoti etesaṃ bhedo purato
atk-s0515a0:571_2: katvā ṭhapito. Palokadhammāti nassanasabhāvā. Purāṇehi adhissitāti pure uppannehi
atk-s0515a0:572_0: Idāni khandhānaṃ adassanabhāvaṃ dassento “adassanato āyantī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:572_1: adassanato āyantīti adissamānāyeva āgacchanti uppajjanti. Bhaṅgā gacchantidassananti
atk-s0515a0:572_2: bhedā bhaṅgato uddhaṃ adassanabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Vijjuppādova ākāseti vivaṭākāse vijjulatāniccharaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:572_3: viya. Uppajjanti vayanti cāti pubbantato uddhaṃ uppajjanti ca bhijjanti ca, nassantīti
atk-s0515a0:572_4: attho. “Udeti āpūrati veti cando”ti evamādīsu viya.
atk-s0515a0:573_0: Evaṃ ṭhitiparittataṃ dassetvā idāni sarasaparittataṃ dassento “kathaṃ sarasaparittatāyā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:573_3: catusamuṭṭhānikānaṃ pathavīāpatejavāyānaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ paṭibaddhaṃ jīvitaṃ. Kabaḷīkārāhārūpanibandhanti
atk-s0515a0:573_5: Viññāṇūpanibandhanti bhavaṅgaviññāṇūpanibandhaṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “āyu usmā ca
atk-s0515a0:574_0: Idāni nesaṃ dubbalakāraṇaṃ dassento “mūlampi imesaṃ dubbala”ntiādimāha. Tattha mūlampīti
atk-s0515a0:574_1: patiṭṭhaṭṭhena mūlabhūtampi. Assāsapassāsānañhi karajakāyo mūlaṃ. Mahābhūtādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:574_3: vuttānaṃ. Etesu hi ekekasmiṃ asati jīvitindriyaṃ na tiṭṭhati. Dubbalanti appathāmaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:574_4: Pubbahetūpīti atītajātiyaṃ imassa vipākavaṭṭassa hetubhūtā kāraṇasaṅkhātā avijjāsaṅkhārataṇhupādānabhavāpi.
atk-s0515a0:574_5: Imesaṃ dubbalā ye paccayā tepi dubbalāti ye ārammaṇādisādhāraṇapaccayā. Pabhāvikāti
atk-s0515a0:574_6: padhānaṃ hutvā uppādikā bhavataṇhā. Sahabhūmīti sahabhavikāpi rūpārūpadhammā. Sampayogāpīti
atk-s0515a0:574_7: ekato yuttāpi arūpadhammā. Sahajāpīti saddhiṃ ekacitte uppannāpi. Yāpi payojikāti
atk-s0515a0:574_8: cutipaṭisandhivasena yojetuṃ niyuttāti payojikā, vaṭṭamūlakā taṇhā. Vuttañhetaṃ “taṇhādutiyo
atk-s0515a0:574_9: puriso”ti. Niccadubbalāti nirantarena dubbalā. Anavaṭṭhitāti na avaṭṭhitā, otaritvā
atk-s0515a0:574_10: na ṭhitā. Paripātayanti imeti ime aññamaññaṃ pātayanti khepayanti. Aññamaññassāti
atk-s0515a0:574_11: añño aññassa, eko ekassāti attho. Hi-iti kāraṇatthe nipāto. Natthi tāyitāti tāyano
atk-s0515a0:574_12: rakkhako natthi. Na cāpi ṭhapenti aññamaññanti aññe aññaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkonti. Yopi
atk-s0515a0:574_13: nibbattako so na vijjatīti yopi imesaṃ uppādako dhammo, so idāni natthi.
atk-s0515a0:575_0: Na ca kenaci koci hāyatīti koci ekopi kassaci vasena na parihāyati. Gandhabbā ca
atk-s0515a0:575_1: ime hi sabbasoti sabbe hi ime khandhā sabbākārena bhaṅgaṃ pāpuṇituṃ yuttā. Purimehi
atk-s0515a0:575_2: pabhāvitā imeti pubbahetupaccayehi ime vattamānakā uppādikā. Yepi pabhāvikāti yepi
atk-s0515a0:575_3: ime vattamānakā uppādakā pubbahetupaccayā. Te pure matāti te vuttappakārapaccayā
atk-s0515a0:575_4: vattamānaṃ apāpuṇitvā paṭhamameva maraṇaṃ pattā. Purimāpi ca pacchimāpi cāti purimā
atk-s0515a0:575_5: pubbahetupaccayāpi ca pacchimā vattamāne paccayasamuppannā ca. Aññamaññaṃ na kadāci
atk-s0515a0:575_6: maddasaṃsūti aññamaññaṃ kismiñci kāle na diṭṭhapubbā. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto.
atk-s0515a0:576_1: issarā etesanti cātumahārājikā. Rūpādīhi dibbanti kīḷantīti devā. Te sinerupabbatassa
atk-s0515a0:576_2: vemajjhe honti. Tesu atthi pabbataṭṭhakāpi, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakāpi. Tesaṃ paramparā
atk-s0515a0:576_3: cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Khiḍḍāpadosikā manopadosikā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā candimā
atk-s0515a0:576_4: devaputto sūriyo devaputtoti ete sabbepi cātumahārājikadevalokaṭṭhā eva tesaṃ cātumahārājikānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:576_5: jīvitaṃ. Upādāyāti paṭicca. Parittakanti vuddhipaṭisedho. Thokanti mandakālaṃ, dīghadivasapaṭisedho.
atk-s0515a0:576_6: Khaṇikanti mandakālaṃ, kālantarapaṭisedho. Lahukanti sallahukaṃ, alasapaṭisedho.
atk-s0515a0:576_7: Itaranti sīghabalavapaṭisedho. Anaddhanīyanti kālavasena na addhānakkhamaṃ. Naciraṭṭhitikanti
atk-s0515a0:576_8: divasena ciraṃ na tiṭṭhatīti naciraṭṭhitikaṃ, divasapaṭisedho.
atk-s0515a0:577_0: Tāvatiṃsānanti tettiṃsajanā tattha upapannāti tāvatiṃsā. Api ca tāvatiṃsāti tesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:577_1: devānaṃ nāmamevātipi vuttaṃ. Tepi atthi pabbataṭṭhakā, atthi ākāsaṭṭhakā, tesaṃ paramparā
atk-s0515a0:577_2: cakkavāḷapabbataṃ pattā. Tathā yāmādīnaṃ. Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ
atk-s0515a0:577_3: appattā nāma natthi. Dibbasukhaṃ yātā payātā sampattāti yāmā. Tuṭṭhā pahaṭṭhāti tusitā.
atk-s0515a0:577_4: Pakatipaṭiyattārammaṇato atirekena nimmitukāmakāle yathārucite bhoge nimminitvā ramantīti
atk-s0515a0:577_5: nimmānaratī. Cittācāraṃ ñatvā parehi nimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti paranimmitavasavattī.
atk-s0515a0:577_6: Brahmakāye brahmaghaṭāya niyuttāti brahmakāyikā. Sabbepi pañcavokārabrahmāno gahitā.
atk-s0515a0:578_0: Gamaniyoti gandhabbo. Samparāyoti paraloko. Yo bhikkhave ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasatanti
atk-s0515a0:578_1: yo ciraṃ tiṭṭhamāno, so vassasatamattaṃ tiṭṭhati. Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato upari
atk-s0515a0:578_2: tiṭṭhamāno dve vassasatāni tiṭṭhamāno nāma natthi. Hīḷeyya nanti naṃ jīvitaṃ avaññātaṃ
atk-s0515a0:578_3: kareyya, lāmakato cinteyya. “Hīḷeyyāna”nti ca paṭhanti. Accayantīti atikkamanti.
atk-s0515a0:578_4: Ahorattāti rattindivaparicchedā. Uparujjhatīti jīvitindriyaṃ nirujjhati, abhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:578_5: upagacchati. Āyu khiyyati maccānanti sattānaṃ āyusaṅkhāro khayaṃ yāti. Kunnadīnaṃva
atk-s0515a0:578_6: odakanti yathā udakacchinnāya kunnadiyā udakaṃ, evaṃ maccānaṃ āyu khiyyati. Paramatthato
atk-s0515a0:578_7: hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittakkhaṇikamattoyeva. Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ
atk-s0515a0:578_8: pavattamānampi ekeneva nemipadesena pavattati, tiṭṭhamānampi ekeneva tiṭṭhati, evameva
atk-s0515a0:578_9: ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte satto niruddhoti vuccati.
atk-s0515a0:579_0: Dhīrāti dhīrā iti. Puna dhīrāti paṇḍitā. Dhitimāti dhiti assa atthīti dhitimā. Dhitisampannāti
atk-s0515a0:579_1: paṇḍiccena samannāgatā. Dhīkatapāpāti garahitapāpā. Taṃyeva pariyāyaṃ dassetuṃ “dhī
atk-s0515a0:579_2: vuccati paññā”tiādimāha. Tattha pajānātīti paññā. Kiṃ pajānāti? “Idaṃ dukkha”ntiādinā
atk-s0515a0:579_3: nayena ariyasaccāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “paññāpanavasena paññā”ti vuttā. Kinti paññāpeti?
atk-s0515a0:579_4: “Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti paññāpeti. Sāva avijjāya abhibhavanato adhipatiyaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:579_5: indriyaṃ, dassanalakkhaṇe vā indaṭṭhaṃ kāretītipi indriyaṃ, paññāva indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:579_6: Sā panesā obhāsanalakkhaṇā, pajānanalakkhaṇā ca; yathā hi catubhittike gehe rattibhāge
atk-s0515a0:579_7: dīpe jalite andhakāraṃ nirujjhati, āloko pātubhavati, evameva obhāsanalakkhaṇā paññā.
atk-s0515a0:579_8: Paññobhāsasamo obhāso nāma natthi. Paññavato hi ekapallaṅkena nisinnassa dasasahassilokadhātu
atk-s0515a0:580_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, puriso andhakāre gehe telappadīpaṃ paveseyya, paviṭṭho padīpo andhakāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:580_1: viddhaṃseti, obhāsaṃ janeti, ālokaṃ vidaṃseti, pākaṭāni ca rūpāni karoti; evameva
atk-s0515a0:580_2: kho, mahārāja, paññā uppajjamānā avijjandhakāraṃ viddhaṃseti, vijjobhāsaṃ janeti,
atk-s0515a0:580_3: ñāṇālokaṃ vidaṃseti, pākaṭāni ariyasaccāni karoti. Evaṃ kho, mahārāja, obhāsanalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:581_0: Yathā pana cheko bhisakko āturānaṃ sappāyāsappāyāni bhojanādīni jānāti, evaṃ paññā
atk-s0515a0:581_2: dhamme pajānāti. Vuttampi cetaṃ dhammasenāpatinā “pajānāti pajānātīti kho, āvuso,
atk-s0515a0:581_3: tasmā paññavāti vuccati. Kiñca pajānāti? Idaṃ dukkhanti pajānātī”ti vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:582_0: Aparo nayo – yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā paññā, akkhalitapaṭivedhalakkhaṇā vā,
atk-s0515a0:582_1: kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya. Visayobhāsarasā, padīpo viya. Asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0515a0:583_0: Khandhadhīrāti pañcasu khandhesuñāṇaṃ pavattentīti khandhadhīrā. Aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu
atk-s0515a0:583_1: ñāṇaṃ pavattentīti dhātudhīrā. Sesesupi iminā nayena attho netabbo. Te dhīrā evamāhaṃsūti
atk-s0515a0:583_2: ete paṇḍitā evaṃ kathayiṃsu. Kathentīti “appakaṃ parittaka”nti kathayanti. Bhaṇantīti
atk-s0515a0:583_3: “thokaṃ khaṇika”nti bhāsanti. Dīpayantīti “lahukaṃ ittara”nti patiṭṭhapenti. Voharantīti
atk-s0515a0:584_0: 11. Idāni ye tathā na karonti, tesaṃ byasanuppattiṃ dassento “passāmī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:584_1: Tattha passāmīti maṃsacakkhuādīhi pekkhāmi. Loketi apāyādimhi. Pariphandamānanti
atk-s0515a0:584_2: ito cito ca phandamānaṃ. Pajaṃ imanti imaṃ sattakāyaṃ. Taṇhāgatanti taṇhāya gataṃ
atk-s0515a0:584_3: abhibhūtaṃ nipātitanti adhippāyo. Bhavesūti kāmabhavādīsu. Hīnā narāti hīnakammantā
atk-s0515a0:584_4: narā. Maccumukhe lapantīti antakāle sampatte maraṇamukhe paridevanti. Avītataṇhāseti
atk-s0515a0:584_5: avigatataṇhā. Bhavāti kāmabhavādikā. Bhavesūti kāmabhavādikesu. Atha vā bhavābhavesūti
atk-s0515a0:585_0: Passāmīti maṃsacakkhunāpi passāmīti duvidhaṃ maṃsacakkhu – sasambhāracakkhu pasādacakkhūti.
atk-s0515a0:585_1: Tattha yoyaṃ akkhikūpake patiṭṭhito heṭṭhā akkhikūpakaṭṭhikena upari bhamukaṭṭhikena
atk-s0515a0:585_2: ubhato akkhikūṭehi bahiddhā akkhilomehi paricchinno akkhikūpakamajjhā nikkhantena
atk-s0515a0:585_3: nhārusuttakena matthaluṅge ābaddho setakaṇhamaṇḍalavicitto maṃsapiṇḍo, idaṃ sasambhāracakkhu
atk-s0515a0:585_4: nāma. Yo pana ettha sito ettha paṭibaddho catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:585_5: pasādacakkhu nāma. Idamadhippetaṃ. Tadetaṃ tassa sasambhāracakkhuno setamaṇḍalaparikkhittassa
atk-s0515a0:585_6: kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe abhimukhe ṭhitānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānuppattipadese diṭṭhamaṇḍale
atk-s0515a0:585_7: sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ picupaṭalāni viya sattakkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā pamāṇato
atk-s0515a0:585_8: ūkāsiramattaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0515a0:586_0: Taṃ cakkhatīti cakkhu, tena maṃsacakkhunā passāmi. Dibbacakkhunāti “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:586_1: bhikkhave, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhenā”ti evaṃvidhena dibbacakkhunā. Paññācakkhunāti
atk-s0515a0:586_2: “virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ āgatena paññācakkhunā. Buddhacakkhunāti
atk-s0515a0:586_3: “addasaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento”ti evamāgatena buddhacakkhunā.
atk-s0515a0:586_5: Passāmīti maṃsacakkhunā hatthatale ṭhapitāmalakaṃ viya rūpagataṃ maṃsacakkhunā. Dakkhāmīti
atk-s0515a0:586_6: sañjānāmi dibbena cakkhunā cutūpapātaṃ. Olokemīti avalokemi paññācakkhunā catusaccaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:586_7: Nijjhāyāmīti cintemi buddhacakkhunā saddhāpañcamakāni indriyāni. Upaparikkhāmīti
atk-s0515a0:586_8: samantato ikkhāmi pariyesāmi samantacakkhunā pañca neyyapathe.
atk-s0515a0:587_0: Taṇhāphandanāya phandamānanti taṇhācalanāya calamānaṃ. Ito paraṃ diṭṭhiphandanādidiṭṭhibyasanena
atk-s0515a0:587_1: dukkhena phandamānapariyosānaṃ vuttanayattā uttānameva. Samphandamānanti punappunaṃ
atk-s0515a0:587_2: phandamānaṃ. Vipphandamānanti nānāvidhena calamānaṃ. Vedhamānanti kampamānaṃ. Pavedhamānanti
atk-s0515a0:587_3: padhānena kampamānaṃ. Sampavedhamānanti punappunaṃ kampamānaṃ. Upasaggena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:588_0: Taṇhānugatanti taṇhāya anupaviṭṭhaṃ. Taṇhāyānusaṭanti taṇhāya anupatthaṭaṃ. Taṇhāyāsannanti
atk-s0515a0:588_1: taṇhāya nimuggaṃ. Taṇhāya pātitanti taṇhāya khittaṃ. “Paripātita”nti vā pāṭho. Abhibhūtanti
atk-s0515a0:588_2: taṇhāya madditaṃ ajjhotthaṭaṃ. Pariyādinnacittanti khepetvā gahitacittaṃ. Atha vā
atk-s0515a0:588_3: oghena gataṃ viya taṇhāgataṃ. Upādiṇṇakarūpapaccayehi patitvā gataṃ viya taṇhānugataṃ.
atk-s0515a0:588_4: Udakapiṭṭhiṃ chādetvā patthaṭanīlikā udakapiṭṭhi viya taṇhānusaṭaṃ. Vaccakūpe nimuggaṃ
atk-s0515a0:588_5: viya taṇhāyāsannaṃ. Rukkhaggato patitvā narake patitaṃ viya taṇhāpātitaṃ. Upādiṇṇakarūpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:588_6: saṃyogaṃ viya taṇhāya abhibhūtaṃ. Upādiṇṇakarūpapariggāhakassa uppannavipassanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:588_7: viya taṇhāya pariyādinnacittaṃ. Atha vā kāmacchandena taṇhāgataṃ. Kāmapipāsāya taṇhānugataṃ.
atk-s0515a0:588_8: Kāmāsavena taṇhānusaṭaṃ. Kāmapariḷāhena taṇhāyāsannaṃ. Kāmajjhosānena taṇhāya pātitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:588_9: Kāmoghena taṇhāya abhibhūtaṃ. Kāmupādānena taṇhāya pariyādinnacittanti evameke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:588_10: Kāmabhaveti kāmāvacare. Rūpabhaveti rūpāvacare. Arūpabhaveti arūpāvacare. Tesaṃ nānattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:589_0: Bhavābhavesūti bhavābhaveti bhavoti kāmadhātu. Abhavoti rūpārūpadhātu. Atha vā bhavoti
atk-s0515a0:589_1: kāmadhātu rūpadhātu. Abhavoti arūpadhātu. Tesu bhavābhavesu. Kammabhaveti kammavaṭṭe.
atk-s0515a0:589_2: Punabbhaveti ponobhavike vipākavaṭṭe. Kāmabhaveti kāmadhātuyā. Kammabhaveti kammavaṭṭe.
atk-s0515a0:589_3: Tattha kammabhavo bhāvayatīti bhavo. Kāmabhave punabbhaveti kāmadhātuyā upapattibhave
atk-s0515a0:589_4: vipākavaṭṭe. Vipākabhavo bhavatīti bhavo. Rūpabhavādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca “kāmabhave
atk-s0515a0:589_5: rūpabhave arūpabhave”ti okāsabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tīsupi “kammabhave”ti kammabhavaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:589_6: tathā “punabbhave”ti upapattibhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Punappunabbhaveti aparāparaṃ
atk-s0515a0:589_7: uppattiyaṃ. Gatiyāti pañcagatiyā aññatarāya. Attabhāvābhinibbattiyāti attabhāvānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:589_8: abhinibbattiyā. Avītataṇhāti mūlapadaṃ. Avigatataṇhāti khaṇikasamādhi viya khaṇikappahānābhāvena
atk-s0515a0:589_9: na vigatā taṇhā etesanti avigatataṇhā. Acattataṇhāti tadaṅgappahānābhāvena apariccattataṇhā.
atk-s0515a0:589_10: Avantataṇhāti vikkhambhanappahānābhāvena na vantataṇhāti avantataṇhā. Amuttataṇhāti
atk-s0515a0:589_12: na pahīnataṇhā. Appaṭinissaṭṭhataṇhāti nissaraṇappahānābhāvena bhave patiṭṭhitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:590_0: 12. Idāni yasmā avigatataṇhā evaṃ phandanti ca lapanti ca, tasmā taṇhāvinaye samādapento
atk-s0515a0:590_2: vatthusmiṃ. Passathāti sotāre ālapanto āha. Etampīti etampi ādīnavaṃ. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0515a0:591_0: Dve mamattāti dve ālayā. Yāvatāti paricchedaniyamatthe nipāto. Taṇhāsaṅkhātenāti
atk-s0515a0:591_1: taṇhākoṭṭhāsena, saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekaṃ “saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā”tiādīsu
atk-s0515a0:591_2: viya. Sīmakatanti aparicchedadosavirahitaṃ mariyādakataṃ “tiyojanaparamaṃ sīmaṃ sammannitu”nti
atk-s0515a0:591_3: ādīsu viya. Odhikatanti vacanaparicchedadosavirahitaṃ paricchedakataṃ sīmantarikarukkho
atk-s0515a0:591_4: viya. Pariyantakatanti paricchedakataṃ. Sīmantarikarukkho pana dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:591_5: ayaṃ pana ekābaddhatālapanti viya katanti pariyantakataṃ. Pariggahitanti kālantarepi
atk-s0515a0:591_6: parāyattaṃ muñcitvā sabbākārena gahitaṃ. Mamāyitanti ālayakataṃ vassūpagataṃ senāsanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:591_7: viya. Idaṃ mamanti samīpe ṭhitaṃ. Etaṃ mamanti dūre ṭhitaṃ. Ettakanti parikkhāraniyamanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:591_9: kho mahānāmā”ti viya. Kevalampi mahāpathavinti sakalampi mahāpathaviṃ.
atk-s0515a0:592_1: kathaṃ hotīti ce? Rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti evaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyā
atk-s0515a0:592_2: pavattā taṇhā “seṭṭhiputto, brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu pitito laddhanāmā viya pitusadisārammaṇe
atk-s0515a0:592_3: bhūtā. Ettha ca rūpārammaṇā rūpe taṇhāti rūpataṇhā. Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī
atk-s0515a0:592_4: pavattamānā kāmataṇhā. Sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti
atk-s0515a0:592_5: evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā. Ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ ucchijjati
atk-s0515a0:592_6: vinassati pacchedaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:592_7: tividhā hoti. Yathā ca rūpataṇhā, tathā saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni
atk-s0515a0:592_8: honti. Tāni ajjhattarūpādīsu aṭṭhārasa, bahiddhārūpādīsu aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa, iti
atk-s0515a0:592_9: atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti aṭṭhasataṃ. Ajjhattikassa
atk-s0515a0:592_10: upādāya “asmī”ti hoti, “itthasmī”ti hotīti vā evamādīni ajjhattikarūpādinissitāni
atk-s0515a0:592_11: aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya iminā “asmī”ti hoti, iminā “itthasmī”ti hotīti bāhirarūpādinissitāni
atk-s0515a0:592_12: aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa. Iti atītāni chattiṃsa, anāgatāni chattiṃsa, paccuppannāni
atk-s0515a0:593_0: Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhīti rūpādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ ekekampi “rūpaṃ attato
atk-s0515a0:593_1: samanupassatī”tiādinā nayena catudhā gāhavasena pavattāni vatthūni katvā uppannā
atk-s0515a0:593_2: vijjamānaṭṭhena sati khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye diṭṭhīti sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Dasavatthukā
atk-s0515a0:593_3: micchādiṭṭhīti “natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭha”ntiādinayappavattā micchādiṭṭhi, ayāthāvadiṭṭhi
atk-s0515a0:593_4: virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi, anatthāvahattā paṇḍitehi kucchitā
atk-s0515a0:593_5: diṭṭhītipi micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0515a0:593_7: diṭṭhīti sassato loko, asassato loko, antavā loko”ti ādinayappavattā ekekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_8: patiṭṭhaṃ katvā gahaṇavasena evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi dasavatthukā antaggāhikā diṭṭhi.
atk-s0515a0:593_9: Yā evarūpā diṭṭhīti yā evaṃjātikā diṭṭhi. Diṭṭhigatanti diṭṭhīsu gataṃ. Idaṃ dassanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_13: vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vilomanaṭṭhena ca diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ. Micchādassanañhi uppajjamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_14: sammādassanaṃ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca. Kadāci sassatassa, kadāci ucchedassa
atk-s0515a0:593_15: gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṃ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ. Diṭṭhigatiko hi ekasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_16: patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. Kadāci sassataṃ anussarati, kadāci ucchedaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva bandhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:593_17: saṃyojananti diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ. Susumārādayo viya purisaṃ ārammaṇaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti
atk-s0515a0:593_18: gāho. Patiṭṭhahanato patiṭṭhāho. Ayañhi balavapavattibhāvena patiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0515a0:593_19: Niccādivasena abhinivisatīti abhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā niccādivasena
atk-s0515a0:593_20: parato āmasatīti parāmāso. Anatthāvahattā kucchito maggo, kucchitānaṃ vā apāyānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_21: maggoti kummaggo. Ayāthāvapathato micchāpatho. Yathā hi disāmūḷhena “ayaṃ asukagāmassa
atk-s0515a0:593_22: nāma patho”ti gahitopi taṃ gāmaṃ na sampāpeti, evaṃ diṭṭhigatikena “sugatipatho”ti
atk-s0515a0:593_23: gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṃ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato micchāpatho. Micchāsabhāvato
atk-s0515a0:593_24: micchattaṃ. Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti titthaṃ, titthañca taṃ anatthānañca
atk-s0515a0:593_25: āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ, titthiyānaṃ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ca
atk-s0515a0:593_26: āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ. Vipariyesabhūto gāho, vipariyesato vā gāhoti vipariyesaggāho.
atk-s0515a0:593_28: gāho vipallāsaggāho. Anupāyagāho micchāgāho. Ayāthāvakasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ na sabhāvasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:593_29: vatthusmiṃ tathaṃ yāthāvakaṃ sabhāvanti gāho “ayāthāvakasmiṃ yāthāvaka”nti gāho.
atk-s0515a0:593_30: Yāvatāti yattakā. Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānīti brahmajāle āgatāni dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni.
atk-s0515a0:594_0: Acchedasaṃkinopi phandantīti acchinditvā pasayha balakkārena gaṇhissantīti uppannasaṃkinopi
atk-s0515a0:594_1: calanti. Acchindantepīti vuttanayena acchijjantepi. Acchinnepīti vuttanayena acchinditvā
atk-s0515a0:594_2: gahitepi. Vipariṇāmasaṃkinopīti parivattetvā aññathābhāvena āsaṃkinopi. Vipariṇāmantepīti
atk-s0515a0:594_3: viparivattanakālepi. Vipariṇatepīti viparivattitepi. Phandantīti calanti. Samphandantīti
atk-s0515a0:594_4: sabbākārena calanti. Vipphandantīti vividhākārena phandanti. Vedhantīti bhayaṃ disvā
atk-s0515a0:594_5: kampanti. Pavedhantīti chambhitattā bhayena visesena kampanti. Sampavedhantīti lomahaṃsanabhayena
atk-s0515a0:594_6: sabbākārena kampanti. Phandamāneti upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Appodaketi mandodake. Parittodaketi
atk-s0515a0:594_7: luḷitodake. Udakapariyādāneti khīṇodake. Balākāhi vāti vuttāvasesāhi pakkhijātīhi.
atk-s0515a0:594_8: Paripātiyamānāti vihiṃsiyamānā ghaṭṭiyamānā. Ukkhipiyamānāti kaddamantarato nīhariyamānā
atk-s0515a0:594_9: giliyamānā vā. Khajjamānāti khādiyamānā. Phandanti kākehi. Samphandanti kulalehi.
atk-s0515a0:594_10: Vipphandanti balākāhi. Vedhanti tuṇḍena gahitakāle maraṇavasena. Pavedhanti vijjhanakāle.
atk-s0515a0:595_0: Passitvāti aguṇaṃ passitvā. Tulayitvāti guṇāguṇaṃ tulayitvā. Tīrayitvāti guṇāguṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:595_1: vitthāretvā. Vibhāvayitvāti vatthuhānabhāgiṃ muñcitvā vajjetvā. Vibhūtaṃ katvāti
atk-s0515a0:595_2: nipphattiṃ pāpetvā āveṇikaṃ katvā. Atha vā saṃkiṇṇadosaṃ mocetvā vatthuvibhāgakaraṇena
atk-s0515a0:595_3: passitvā. Aparicchedadosaṃ mocetvā pamāṇakaraṇavasena tulayitvā. Vatthudosaṃ mocetvā
atk-s0515a0:595_4: vibhāgakaraṇavasena tīrayitvā. Sammohadosaṃ mocayitvā aggavibhāgakaraṇavasena vibhāvayitvā.
atk-s0515a0:595_5: Ghanadosaṃ mocetvā pakativibhāgakaraṇena vibhūtaṃ katvā. Pahāyāti pajahitvā. Paṭinissajjitvāti
atk-s0515a0:595_6: nissajjitvā. Amamāyantoti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ālayaṃ akaronto. Agaṇhantoti diṭṭhiyā pubbabhāge
atk-s0515a0:595_7: paññāya taṃ na gaṇhanto. Aparāmasantoti vitakkena ūhanaṃ akaronto. Anabhinivesantoti
atk-s0515a0:596_1: ajanayamāno. Asañjanayamānoti visesena asañjanayamāno. Anibbattayamānoti patthanātaṇhāvasena
atk-s0515a0:596_2: na nibbattayamāno. Anabhinibbattayamānoti sabbākārena na abhinibbattayamāno. Upasaggavasena
atk-s0515a0:596_3: vā etāni padāni vaḍḍhitāni. Evamettha paṭhamagāthāya assādaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:597_0: 13. Tato parāhi catūhi gāthāhi ādīnavañca dassetvā idāni saupāyaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nissaraṇānisaṃsañca
atk-s0515a0:597_1: dassetuṃ, sabbāhi vā etāhi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesañca dassetvā idāni nekkhamme
atk-s0515a0:597_2: ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ “ubhosu antesū”ti gāthādvayamāha. Tattha ubhosu antesūti phassaphassasamudayādīsu
atk-s0515a0:597_3: dvīsu, dvīsu paricchedesu. Vineyya chandanti chandarāgaṃ vinetvā. Phassaṃ pariññāyāti
atk-s0515a0:597_4: cakkhusamphassādiphassaṃ, phassānusārena vā taṃsampayutte sabbepi arūpadhamme, tesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:597_5: vatthudvārārammaṇavasena rūpadhamme cāti sakalampi nāmarūpaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0515a0:597_6: Anānugiddhoti rūpādīsu sabbadhammesu agiddho. Yadattagarahī tadakubbamānoti yaṃ attanā
atk-s0515a0:597_7: garahati, taṃ akurumāno. Na limpatī diṭṭhasutesu dhīroti so evarūpo dhitisampanno
atk-s0515a0:597_8: dhīro diṭṭhesu ca sutesu ca dhammesu dvinnaṃ lepānaṃ ekenāpi lepena na limpati, ākāsamiva
atk-s0515a0:598_0: Phasso eko antoti phasso ekaparicchedo. Phusatīti phasso. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo,
atk-s0515a0:598_2: samāno ārammaṇe phusanākāreneva pavattatīti phusanalakkhaṇo. Ekadeseneva anallīyamānopi
atk-s0515a0:598_3: rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ, saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭetīti saṅghaṭṭanaraso,
atk-s0515a0:599_0: “Catubhūmakaphasso no phusanalakkhaṇo nāma natthi, saṅghaṭṭanaraso pana pañcadvārikova
atk-s0515a0:599_1: hoti. Pañcadvārikassa hi phusanalakkhaṇotipi saṅghaṭṭanarasotipi nāmaṃ. Manodvārikassa
atk-s0515a0:601_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, dve meṇḍā yujjheyyuṃ, yathā eko meṇḍo, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:601_1: Yathā dutiyo meṇḍo, evaṃ rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:601_2: Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo ca phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso ca. Yathā, mahārāja, dve sammā vajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0515a0:601_3: dve pāṇī vajjeyyuṃ. Yathā eko pāṇi, evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā dutiyo pāṇi, evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:601_4: rūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā tesaṃ sannipāto, evaṃ phasso daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0515a0:602_0: Yathā vā “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇādīni cakkhuādināmena vuttāni,
atk-s0515a0:602_1: evamidhāpi tāni cakkhuādināmeneva vuttānīti veditabbāni. Tasmā “evaṃ cakkhu daṭṭhabba”ntiādīsu
atk-s0515a0:602_2: evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbanti iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Evaṃ sante cittārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanato
atk-s0515a0:602_3: imasmimpi sutte kiccaṭṭheneva rasena “saṅghaṭṭanaraso”ti siddho hoti. Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0515a0:602_4: pana attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno. Ayañhi tattha tattha
atk-s0515a0:602_5: “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti evaṃ kāraṇasseva vasena paveditoti. Imassa ca suttapadassa
atk-s0515a0:602_6: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phassoti ayamattho, na saṅgatimattameva phasso.
atk-s0515a0:603_0: Evaṃ paveditattā pana tenevākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti “sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti vutto.
atk-s0515a0:603_1: Phalaṭṭhena pana paccupaṭṭhānenesa vedanāpaccupaṭṭhāno nāma hoti. Vedanaṃ hesa paccupaṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0515a0:603_2: uppādetīti attho. Uppādayamāno ca yathā bahiddhā uṇhapaccayāpi samānā lākhāsaṅkhātadhātunissitā
atk-s0515a0:603_3: usmā attano nissaye mudubhāvakārī hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi bahiddhā vītaccitaṅgārasaṅkhāte
atk-s0515a0:603_4: uṇhabhāve. Evaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅkhātaaññapaccayopi samāno cittanissitattā attano
atk-s0515a0:603_5: nissayabhūte citte eva esa vedanuppādako hoti, na attano paccayabhūtepi vatthumhi
atk-s0515a0:603_6: ārammaṇevāti veditabbo. Tajjena samannāhārena pana indriyena ca parikkhate visaye
atk-s0515a0:604_0: Phasso yato samudeti uppajjati, so “phassasamudayo”ti vuccati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “saḷāyatanapaccayā
atk-s0515a0:604_1: phasso”ti. Atītaduko kālavasena vutto. Vedanāduko “upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva
atk-s0515a0:604_2: bhāsitā”ti vuttattā upekkhāvedanaṃ sukhameva katvā sukhadukkhavasena, nāmarūpaduko
atk-s0515a0:604_4: vuttoti veditabbo. Tattha sukhayatīti sukhā. Vedayatīti vedanā. Dukkhayatīti dukkhā.
atk-s0515a0:604_5: Namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ. Cakkhāyatanādīni cha ajjhattikāni.
atk-s0515a0:604_6: Rūpāyatanādīni cha bāhirāni. Rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā vijjamānaṭṭhena sakkāyo.
atk-s0515a0:605_0: Cakkhusamphassoti cakkhatīti cakkhu, rūpaṃ assādeti vibhāveti cāti attho. Cakkhuto
atk-s0515a0:605_1: pavatto samphasso cakkhusamphasso. So pana attanā sampayuttāya vedanāya sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
atk-s0515a0:605_2: aṭṭhadhā paccayo hoti. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārasotabilassa anto tanutambalomācite
atk-s0515a0:605_3: aṅguliveṭhakasaṇṭhāne padese sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:605_4: tiṭṭhati. Sotato pavatto samphasso sotasamphasso. Ghānasamphassādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:605_5: Ghāyatīti ghānaṃ. Taṃ sasambhārabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:605_6: yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati. Jīvitamavhāyatīti jivhā, sāyanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:605_7: vā jivhā. Sā sasambhārajivhāya atiaggamūlapassāni vajjetvā uparimatalamajjhe bhinnauppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne
atk-s0515a0:605_8: padese jivhāviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānā tiṭṭhati. Kucchitānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:605_9: sāsavadhammānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Āyoti uppattideso. Yāvatā imasmiṃ kāye upādiṇṇapavatti
atk-s0515a0:605_10: nāma atthi, tattha yebhuyyena kāyappasādo kāyaviññāṇādīnaṃ yathārahaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:605_11: sādhayamāno tiṭṭhati. Munātīti mano, vijānātīti attho. Manoti sahāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:606_0: Chabbidhampi phassaṃ duvidhameva hotīti dassetuṃ “adhivacanasamphasso paṭighasamphasso”ti
atk-s0515a0:606_1: āha. Manodvāriko adhivacanasamphasso. Pañcadvāriko vatthārammaṇādipaṭighena uppajjanato paṭighasamphasso.
atk-s0515a0:607_0: Sukhavedanāya ārammaṇe sukhavedanīyo. Dukkhavedanāya ārammaṇe dukkhavedanīyo. Adukkhamasukhavedanāya
atk-s0515a0:607_1: ārammaṇe adukkhamasukhavedanīyo. Tattha sukhayatīti sukhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:607_2: karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khanati, khādati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ. Dukkhayatīti
atk-s0515a0:607_3: dukkhaṃ, yassuppajjati, taṃ dukkhitaṃ karotīti attho. Na dukkhaṃ na sukhanti adukkhamasukhaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:608: Kusalotiādayo jātivasena vuttā. Tattha kusaloti ekavīsatikusalacittasampayutto. Akusaloti dvādasākusalacittasampayutto. Abyākatoti avasesavipākakiriyābyākatacittasampayutto.
atk-s0515a0:609_1: kāmāvacaro. Kāmaṃ pahāya rūpe avacaratīti rūpāvacaro, kusalābyākatavasena pañcadasarūpāvacaracittasampayutto.
atk-s0515a0:609_2: Kāmañca rūpañca pahāya arūpe avacaratīti arūpāvacaro, kusalābyākatavasena dvādasārūpāvacaracittasampayutto.
atk-s0515a0:610_0: Idāni abhinivesavasena dassento “suññato”tiādimāha. Tattha suññatoti rāgadosamohehi
atk-s0515a0:610_1: suññattā suññato. Rāgadosamohanimittehi animittattā animitto. Rāgadosamohapaṇidhīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:611_1: lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ, tasmiṃ pariyāpannabhāvena loke niyuttoti lokiyo. Uttiṇṇoti
atk-s0515a0:611_2: uttaro, loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttaroti lokuttaro. Phusanāti phusanākāro.
atk-s0515a0:612_0: Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvāti evaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā jānanto tīreti tīrayati, upari vattabbākārena
atk-s0515a0:612_1: cinteti. Aniccantikatāya ādiantavantatāya ca aniccato tīreti. Uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāya
atk-s0515a0:612_2: dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhato. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogitāya
atk-s0515a0:612_4: Pīḷājanakatāya antotudanatāya dunnīharaṇīyatāya ca sallato. Vigarahaṇīyatāya avaḍḍhiāvahanatāya
atk-s0515a0:612_5: aghavatthutāya ca aghato. Aseribhāvajanakatāya ābādhapadaṭṭhānatāya ca ābādhato.
atk-s0515a0:612_6: Avasatāya avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi lujjanapalujjanatāya palokato.
atk-s0515a0:612_7: Anekabyasanāvahanatāya ītito. Aviditānaṃyeva vipulānaṃ anatthānaṃ āvahanato sabbūpaddavavatthutāya
atk-s0515a0:612_8: ca upaddavato. Sabbabhayānaṃ ākaratāya ca dukkhavūpasamasaṅkhātassa paramassāsassa
atk-s0515a0:612_9: paṭipakkhabhūtatāya ca bhayato. Anekehi anatthehi anubaddhatāya dosūpasaṭṭhatāya,
atk-s0515a0:612_10: upasaggo viya anadhivāsanārahatāya ca upasaggato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi ceva lābhādīhi
atk-s0515a0:612_11: ca lokadhammehi pacalitatāya calato. Upakkamena ceva sarasena ca pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatāya
atk-s0515a0:612_12: pabhaṅguto. Sabbāvatthāvinipātitāya, thirabhāvassa ca abhāvatāya adhuvato. Atāyanatāya
atk-s0515a0:612_13: ceva alabbhaneyyakhematāya ca atāṇato. Allīyituṃ anarahatāya, allīnānampi ca leṇakiccākāritāya
atk-s0515a0:612_14: aleṇato. Nissitānaṃ bhayasārakattābhāvena asaraṇato. Yathāparikappitehi dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvehi
atk-s0515a0:612_15: rittatāya rittato. Rittatāyeva tucchato, appakattā vā. Appakampi hi loke “tuccha”nti
atk-s0515a0:613_0: Sayañca asāmikabhāvāditāya anattato. Pavattidukkhatāya, dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāya
atk-s0515a0:613_1: ādīnavato. Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti gacchati pavattatīti ādīnavo, kapaṇamanussassetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:613_2: adhivacanaṃ. Khandhāpi ca kapaṇāyevāti ādīnavasadisatāya ādīnavato. Jarāya ceva maraṇena
atk-s0515a0:613_3: cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato. Dubbalatāya, pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya
atk-s0515a0:613_4: ca asārakato. Aghahetutāya aghamūlato. Mittamukhasapatto viya vissāsaghātitāya vadhakato.
atk-s0515a0:613_5: Vigatabhavatāya vibhavasambhūtatāya ca vibhavato. Āsavapadaṭṭhānatāya sāsavato. Hetupaccayehi
atk-s0515a0:613_6: abhisaṅkhatatāya saṅkhatato. Maccumārakilesamārānaṃ āmisabhūtatāya mārāmisato. Jātijarābyādhimaraṇapakatitāya
atk-s0515a0:613_9: uppattito samudayato. Tesaṃ abhāvena atthaṅgamato. Phasse chandarāgavasena madhurassādena
atk-s0515a0:613_10: assādato. Phassassa vipariṇāmena ādīnavato. Ubhinnaṃ nissaraṇena nissaraṇato tīretīti
atk-s0515a0:614_0: Pajahatīti sakasantānato nīharati. Vinodetīti tudati. Byantiṃ karotīti vigatantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:614_1: karoti. Anabhāvaṃ gametīti anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti. Ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāavijjāmayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:614_2: mūlametesanti ucchinnamūlā. Tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā.
atk-s0515a0:614_3: Yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna
atk-s0515a0:614_4: tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati, evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā
atk-s0515a0:614_5: tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate sabbepi te “tālāvatthukatā”ti
atk-s0515a0:614_6: vuccanti. Yassesoti yassa puggalassa eso gedho. Samucchinnoti ucchinno. Vūpasantoti
atk-s0515a0:614_7: phalena vūpasanto. Paṭipassaddhoti paṭipassaddhippahānena paṭipassambhito. Upasaggena
atk-s0515a0:614_8: vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Abhabbuppattikoti puna uppajjituṃ abhabbo. Ñāṇagginā daḍḍhoti
atk-s0515a0:614_9: maggañāṇagginā jhāpito. Atha vā visanikkhittaṃ bhājanena saha chaḍḍitaṃ viya vatthunā
atk-s0515a0:614_10: saha pahīno. Mūlacchinnavisavalli viya samūlacchinnoti samucchinno. Uddhane udakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:614_11: siñcitvā nibbāpitaaṅgāraṃ viya vūpasanto. Nibbāpitaaṅgāre patitaudakaphusitaṃ viya
atk-s0515a0:614_12: paṭipassaddho. Aṅkuruppattiyā hetucchinnabījaṃ viya abhabbuppattiko. Asanipātavisarukkho
atk-s0515a0:615_0: Vītagedhoti idaṃ sakabhāvapariccajanavasena vuttaṃ. Vigatagedhoti idaṃ ārammaṇe sālayabhāvapariccajanavasena.
atk-s0515a0:615_1: Cattagedhoti idaṃ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena. Muttagedhoti idaṃ santatito vinimocanavasena.
atk-s0515a0:615_2: Pahīnagedhoti idaṃ muttassāpi kvaci anavaṭṭhānadassanavasena. Paṭinissaṭṭhagedhoti
atk-s0515a0:615_3: idaṃ ādinnapubbassa nissaggadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Vītarāgo vigatarāgo cattarāgoti
atk-s0515a0:615_4: vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Tattha gijjhanavasena gedho. Rañjanavasena rāgo. Nicchātoti
atk-s0515a0:615_5: nittaṇho. “Nicchado”tipi pāṭho, taṇhāchadanavirahitoti attho. Nibbutoti nibbutasabhāvo.
atk-s0515a0:616_0: Katattā cāti pāpakammānaṃ katabhāvena ca. Akatattā cāti kusalānaṃ akatabhāvena ca.
atk-s0515a0:616_1: Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritaṃ, akataṃ me kāyasucaritantiādayo dvāravasena avirativirativasena
atk-s0515a0:616_2: kammapathavasena ca vuttā. Sīlesumhi na paripūrakārītiādayo catupārisuddhisīlavasena.
atk-s0515a0:616_4: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānātiādayo bodhipakkhiyadhammā lokiyalokuttaravasena. Dukkhaṃ me
atk-s0515a0:616_5: apariññātantiādayo cattāro ariyasaccavasena vuttāti veditabbaṃ. Te atthato tattha
atk-s0515a0:617_0: Dhīro paṇḍitoti satta padā vuttatthāyeva. Api ca dukkhe akampiyaṭṭhena dhīro. Sukhe
atk-s0515a0:617_2: Attatthaparatthe niccalaṭṭhena buddhimā. Gambhīrauttānatthe apaccosakkanaṭṭhena ñāṇī.
atk-s0515a0:617_4: medhāvī. Na limpatīti sajātiyā na limpati ākāse lekhā viya. Na palimpatīti visesena
atk-s0515a0:617_5: na limpati. Na upalimpatīti saññogo hutvāpi na limpati hatthatale lekhā viya. Alittoti
atk-s0515a0:617_6: saññogo hutvāpi na kilissati kāsikavatthe ṭhapitamaṇiratanaṃ viya. Apalittoti visesena
atk-s0515a0:617_7: na kilissati maṇiratane paliveṭhitakāsikavatthaṃ viya. Anupalittoti upagantvāpi na
atk-s0515a0:617_8: allīyati pokkharapatte udakabindu viya. Nikkhantoti bahi nikkhanto bandhanāgārato
atk-s0515a0:617_9: palāto viya. Nissaṭoti pāpapahīno amittassa paṭicchāpitakiliṭṭhavatthu viya. Vippamuttoti
atk-s0515a0:617_10: suṭṭhu mutto gayhūpage vatthumhi ratiṃ nāsetvā puna nāgamanaṃ viya. Visaññuttoti
atk-s0515a0:617_11: kilesehi ekato na yutto byādhinā muttagilāno viya. Vimariyādikatena cetasāti vigatamariyādakatena
atk-s0515a0:617_12: cittena, sabbabhavena sabbārammaṇena sabbakilesehi muttacittenāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:618_0: 14. Saññaṃ pariññāti gāthāya pana ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – na kevalañca phassameva, api
atk-s0515a0:618_1: ca kho pana kāmasaññādibhedaṃ saññaṃ, saññānusārena vā pubbe vuttanayeneva nāmarūpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:618_2: tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā imāya paṭipadāya catubbidhampi vitareyya oghaṃ, tato so
atk-s0515a0:618_4: rāgādisallānaṃ abbūḷhattā abbūḷhasallo, sativepullappattiyā appamatto caraṃ, pubbabhāge
atk-s0515a0:618_5: vā appamatto caranto tena appamādacārena abbūḷhasallo hutvā sakaparattabhāvādibhedaṃ
atk-s0515a0:618_6: nāsīsati lokamimaṃ parañca, aññadatthu carimacittanirodhā nirupādānova jātavedo parinibbātīti
atk-s0515a0:618_7: arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, dhammanettiṭhapanameva karonto; na tu imāya
atk-s0515a0:618_8: desanāya maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādesi, khīṇāsavassa desitattāti.
atk-s0515a0:619_0: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā paccābhiññāṇarasā.
atk-s0515a0:619_1: Catubhūmikasaññā hi nosañjānanalakkhaṇā nāma natthi, sabbā sañjānanalakkhaṇāva. Yā
atk-s0515a0:619_2: panettha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti, sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti. Tassā vaḍḍhakissa
atk-s0515a0:619_3: dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena taṃ paccābhijānanakāle, purisassa
atk-s0515a0:619_4: kāḷatilakādiabhiññāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena “asuko nāma eso”ti tassa
atk-s0515a0:619_5: paccābhijānanakāle, rañño piḷandhanagopakabhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piḷandhane
atk-s0515a0:619_6: nāmapaṇṇakaṃ bandhitvā “asukaṃ piḷandhanaṃ nāma āharā”ti vutte dīpaṃ jāletvā sāragabbhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:619_7: pavisitvā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā tassa tasseva piḷandhanassa āharaṇakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:620_0: Aparo nayo – sabbasaṅgāhikavasena hi sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā, punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā
atk-s0515a0:620_2: hatthidassakaandho viya, ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā vijju
atk-s0515a0:620_3: viya, yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ purisāti uppannasaññā
atk-s0515a0:620_4: viya. Yā panettha ñāṇasampayuttā hoti, sā ñāṇameva anuvattati, sasambhārapathavīādīsu
atk-s0515a0:621_0: Kāmapaṭisaññuttā saññā kāmasaññā. Byāpādapaṭisaññuttā saññā byāpādasaññā. Vihiṃsāpaṭisaññuttā
atk-s0515a0:621_1: saññā vihiṃsāsaññā. Tesu dve sattesupi saṅkhāresupi uppajjanti. Kāmasaññā hi piye
atk-s0515a0:621_2: manāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati. Byāpādasaññā appiye amanāpe
atk-s0515a0:621_3: satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva vināsanā uppajjati. Vihiṃsāsaññā
atk-s0515a0:621_4: saṅkhāresu na uppajjati. Saṅkhāro hi dukkhāpetabbo nāma natthi. “Ime sattā haññantu
atk-s0515a0:621_5: vā, ucchijjantu vā, vinassantu vā, mā vā ahesu”nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati.
atk-s0515a0:621_6: Nekkhammapaṭisaññuttā saññā nekkhammasaññā, sā asubhapubbabhāge kāmāvacarā hoti,
atk-s0515a0:621_7: asubhajhāne rūpāvacarā, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttarā.
atk-s0515a0:621_8: Abyāpādapaṭisaññuttā saññā abyāpādasaññā, sā mettāpubbabhāge kāmāvacarā hoti, mettājhāne
atk-s0515a0:621_9: rūpāvacarā, taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttarā. Avihiṃsāpaṭisaññuttā
atk-s0515a0:621_10: saññā avihiṃsāsaññā, sā karuṇāpubbabhāge kāmāvacarā, karuṇājhāne rūpāvacarā, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:621_11: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttarā. Yadā alobho sīsaṃ hoti, tadā
atk-s0515a0:621_12: itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti. Yadā mettā sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā
atk-s0515a0:621_13: bhavanti. Yadā karuṇā sīsaṃ hoti, tadā itare dve tadanvāyikā bhavanti. Rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:621_14: ārabbha uppannā saññā rūpasaññā. Saddasaññādīsupi eseva nayo. Idaṃ tassāyeva ārammaṇato
atk-s0515a0:621_15: nāmaṃ. Ārammaṇānaṃ vuttattā cakkhusamphassajādivatthūnipi vuttāneva honti.
atk-s0515a0:622_0: Yā evarūpā saññāti aññāpi “paṭighasamphassajā saññā adhivacanasamphassajā saññā”ti
atk-s0515a0:622_1: evamādikā veditabbā. Tattha adhivacanasamphassajā saññātipi pariyāyena chadvārikāyeva.
atk-s0515a0:622_2: Tayo hi arūpino khandhā sayaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakā hutvā attanā sahajātasaññāya “adhivacanasamphassajā
atk-s0515a0:622_3: saññā”ti nāmaṃ karonti, nippariyāyena pana paṭighasamphassajā saññā nāma pañcadvārikā
atk-s0515a0:622_4: saññā, adhivacanasamphassajā saññā nāma manodvārikā saññā. Etā atirekasaññā pariggahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:623: Saññāti sabhāvanāmaṃ. Sañjānanāti sañjānanākāro. Sañjānitattanti sañjānitabhāvo.
atk-s0515a0:624_0: Avijjoghanti pūretuṃ ayuttaṭṭhena kāyaduccaritādi avindiyaṃ nāma, aladdhabbanti attho.
atk-s0515a0:624_1: Taṃ avindiyaṃ vindatīti avijjā. Tabbiparītato kāyasucaritādi vindiyaṃ nāma, taṃ vindiyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:624_2: na vindatīti avijjā. Khandhānaṃ rāsaṭṭhaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanaṭṭhaṃ, dhātūnaṃ suññaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:624_3: indriyānaṃ adhipatiyaṭṭhaṃ, saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Dukkhādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:624_4: pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā. Antavirahite
atk-s0515a0:624_5: saṃsāre yonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu satte javāpetīti avijjā. Paramatthato
atk-s0515a0:624_6: avijjamānesu itthipurisādīsu javati, vijjamānesu khandhādīsu na javatīti avijjā.
atk-s0515a0:624_8: dhammānaṃ chādanatopi avijjā, taṃ avijjoghaṃ. Kāmoghavasena uttareyya. Bhavoghavasena
atk-s0515a0:624_9: patareyya. Diṭṭhoghavasena samatikkameyya. Avijjoghavasena vītivatteyya. Atha vā
atk-s0515a0:624_10: sotāpattimaggena pahānavasena uttareyya. Sakadāgāmimaggena pahānavasena patareyya.
atk-s0515a0:624_11: Anāgāmimaggena pahānavasena samatikkameyya. Arahattamaggena pahānavasena vītivatteyya.
atk-s0515a0:624_12: Atha vā “tareyyādipañcapadaṃ tadaṅgādipañcapahānena yojetabba”nti keci vadanti.
atk-s0515a0:625_0: “Monaṃ vuccati ñāṇa”nti vatvā taṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “yā paññā pajānanā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:625_1: Taṃ vuttanayameva ṭhapetvā “amoho dhammavicayo”ti padaṃ. Amoho kusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0515a0:625_2: abhāvanāya paṭipakkho bhāvanāhetu. Amohena aviparītaṃ gaṇhāti mūḷhassa viparītaggahaṇato.
atk-s0515a0:625_3: Amohena yāthāvaṃ yāthāvato dhārento yathāsabhāve pavattati. Mūḷho hi “tacchaṃ atacchaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:625_4: atacchañca taccha”nti gaṇhāti; tathā icchitālābhadukkhaṃ na hoti. Amūḷhassa “taṃ
atk-s0515a0:625_5: kutettha labbhā”ti evamādipaccavekkhaṇasambhavato maraṇadukkhaṃ na hoti. Sammohamaraṇañhi
atk-s0515a0:625_6: dukkhaṃ, na ca taṃ amūḷhassa hoti. Pabbajitānaṃ sukhasaṃvāso hoti, tiracchānayoniyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:625_7: nibbatti na hoti. Mohena hi niccasammūḷhā tiracchānayoniṃ upapajjanti. Mohapaṭipakkho
atk-s0515a0:625_8: ca amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa abhāvakaro. Amohena avihiṃsāsaññā dhātusaññā
atk-s0515a0:625_9: majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ, pacchimaganthadvayassa pabhedanañca hoti. Pacchimāni
atk-s0515a0:625_10: dve satipaṭṭhānāni tasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya paccayo hoti.
atk-s0515a0:625_11: Amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjento hitañca paṭisevamāno dīghāyuko hoti,
atk-s0515a0:625_12: attasampattiyā aparihīno hoti. Amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti.
atk-s0515a0:625_13: Ariyavihārassa paccayo hoti, udāsinapakkhesu nibbuto hoti amūḷhassa sabbābhisaṅgatāya
atk-s0515a0:625_14: abhāvato. Amohena anattadassanaṃ hoti. Asammūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo apariṇāyakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:625_15: khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. Yathā ca etena anattadassanaṃ, evaṃ attadassanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:625_16: mohena. Ko hi nāma attasuññataṃ bujjhitvā puna sammohaṃ āpajjeyyāti.
atk-s0515a0:626_0: Tena ñāṇena samannāgatoti etena vuttappakārena ñāṇena samaṅgībhūto sekkhādayo muni.
atk-s0515a0:626_1: Monappattoti paṭiladdhañāṇo munibhāvaṃ patto. Tīṇīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Moneyyānīti
atk-s0515a0:626_2: munibhāvakarā moneyyakarā paṭipadā dhammā. Kāyamoneyyantiādīsu viññattikāyarūpakāyavasena
atk-s0515a0:626_5: pāṇātipātādividhānaṃ kāyato pavattānaṃ duṭṭhu caritānaṃ pajahanaṃ. Kāyasucaritanti
atk-s0515a0:626_6: kāyato pavattaṃ suṭṭhu caritaṃ. Kāyārammaṇe ñāṇanti kāyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā aniccādivasena
atk-s0515a0:626_7: pavattaṃ kāyārammaṇe ñāṇaṃ. Kāyapariññāti kāyaṃ ñātatīraṇappahānapariññāhi jānanavasena
atk-s0515a0:626_8: pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ. Pariññāsahagato maggoti ajjhattikaṃ kāyaṃ sammasitvā uppāditamaggo
atk-s0515a0:626_9: pariññāsahagato. Kāye chandarāgassa pahānanti kāye taṇhāchandarāgassa pajahanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:627_2: Moneyyasampannanti jānitabbaṃ jānitvā phale ṭhitattā moneyyasampannaṃ. Āhu sabbappahāyinanti
atk-s0515a0:628_0: Dutiyagāthāya ninhātapāpakanti yo ajjhattabahiddhasaṅkhāte sabbasmimpi āyatane ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:628_1: uppattirahāni sabbapāpakāni maggañāṇena ninhāya dhovitvā ṭhitattā ninhātapāpakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:628_2: āhūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. Agāramajjhe vasantā agāramunino. Pabbajjupagatā anagāramunino.
atk-s0515a0:628_3: Tattha sekkhā sekkhamunino. Arahanto asekkhamunino. Paccekabuddhā paccekamunino.
atk-s0515a0:629_0: Puna kathetukamyatāpucchāvasena “katame agāramunino”ti āha. Agārikāti kasigorakkhādiagārikakamme
atk-s0515a0:629_1: niyuttā. Diṭṭhapadāti diṭṭhanibbānā. Viññātasāsanāti viññātaṃ sikkhattayasāsanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:629_2: etesanti viññātasāsanā. Anagārāti kasigorakkhādiagāriyakammaṃ etesaṃ natthīti pabbajitā
atk-s0515a0:629_3: “anagārā”ti vuccanti. Satta sekkhāti sotāpannādayo satta. Tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhantīti
atk-s0515a0:629_4: sekkhā. Arahanto na sikkhantīti asekkhā. Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca ekakāva anācariyakāva
atk-s0515a0:630_0: Munimunino vuccanti tathāgatāti ettha aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato – tathā
atk-s0515a0:630_1: āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme
atk-s0515a0:630_2: yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato,
atk-s0515a0:631_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā tathā āgatoti tathāgato? Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā
atk-s0515a0:631_1: sammāsambuddhā āgatā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yenābhinīhārena purimakā bhagavanto āgatā,
atk-s0515a0:631_2: teneva amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Atha vā yathā purimakā bhagavanto dānasīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccādhiṭṭhānamettupekkhāsaṅkhātā
atk-s0515a0:631_3: dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0515a0:631_4: aṅgapariccāgaṃ nayanadhanarajjaputtadārapariccāganti ime pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā
atk-s0515a0:631_6: āgatā, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato. Yathā ca purimakā bhagavanto cattāro satipaṭṭhāne,
atk-s0515a0:631_7: cattāro sammappadhāne, cattāro iddhipāde, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅge,
atk-s0515a0:631_8: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvetvā pūretvā āgatā, tathā amhākampi bhagavā āgato.
atk-s0515a0:633: Tathā ayaṃ sakyamunīpi āgato, tathāgato vuccati tena cakkhumā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:634_0: Kathaṃ tathā gatoti tathāgato? Yathā sampatijātā purimakā bhagavanto gatā. Kathañca
atk-s0515a0:634_1: te gatā? Te hi sampatijātā samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya uttarābhimukhā sattapadavītihārena gatā. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:635_0: “Sampatijāto, ānanda, bodhisatto samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho
atk-s0515a0:635_1: sattapadavītihārena gacchati, setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā ca disā anuviloketi,
atk-s0515a0:635_2: āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsati – ‘aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi
atk-s0515a0:635_3: lokassa, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”’ti.
atk-s0515a0:636_0: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ anekesaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena.
atk-s0515a0:636_1: Yañhi so sampatijāto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhāti, idamassa caturiddhipādapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0515a0:636_2: pubbanimittaṃ. Uttaramukhabhāvo panassa sabbalokuttarabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ. Sattapadavītihāro
atk-s0515a0:636_6: appaṭivattiyavaradhammacakkapavattanassa pubbanimittaṃ. Tathā ayaṃ bhagavāpi gato.
atk-s0515a0:636_7: Tañcassa gamanaṃ tathaṃ ahosi avitathaṃ tesaṃyeva visesādhigamānaṃ pubbanimittabhāvena. Tenāhu porāṇā –
atk-s0515a0:637: “Muhuttajātova gavampatī yathā, samehi pādehi phusī vasundharaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:638: So vikkamī satta padāni gotamo, setañca chattaṃ anudhārayuṃ marū.
atk-s0515a0:639: “Gantvāna so satta padāni gotamo, disā vilokesi samā samantato;
atk-s0515a0:642_0: Atha vā yathā purimakā bhagavanto, ayampi bhagavā tatheva nekkhammena kāmacchandaṃ…pe…
atk-s0515a0:642_1: paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇe…pe… aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ…pe… arahattamaggena sabbakilese
atk-s0515a0:642_2: pahāya gato, evampi tathā gatoti tathāgato.
atk-s0515a0:643_0: Kathaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato? Pathavīdhātuyā kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0515a0:643_1: avitathaṃ, āpodhātuyā paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, tejodhātuyā uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, vāyodhātuyā
atk-s0515a0:644: Rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, saññāya sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:645: Vitakkassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇaṃ, vicārassa anumajjanalakkhaṇaṃ, pītiyā pharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, sukhassa sātalakkhaṇaṃ, cittekaggatāya avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:646: Saddhindriyassa adhimokkhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyindriyassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ, satindriyassa upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, samādhindriyassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, paññindriyassa pajānanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:647: Saddhābalassa assaddhiye akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyabalassa kosajje, satibalassa muṭṭhassacce, samādhibalassa uddhacce, paññābalassa avijjāya akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:649_2: sammāvāyāmassa paggahalakkhaṇaṃ, sammāsatiyā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, sammāsamādhissa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:650_0: Avijjāya aññāṇalakkhaṇaṃ, saṅkhārānaṃ cetanālakkhaṇaṃ, viññāṇassa vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:650_1: nāmassa namanalakkhaṇaṃ, rūpassa ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ, saḷāyatanassa āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:650_2: phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ, taṇhāya hetulakkhaṇaṃ, upādānassa
atk-s0515a0:650_3: gahaṇalakkhaṇaṃ, bhavassa āyūhanalakkhaṇaṃ, jātiyā nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ, jarāya jīraṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:651_0: Dhātūnaṃ suññatalakkhaṇaṃ, āyatanānaṃ āyatanalakkhaṇaṃ, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:651_1: sammappadhānānaṃ padahanalakkhaṇaṃ, iddhipādānaṃ ijjhanalakkhaṇaṃ, indriyānaṃ adhipatilakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:651_2: balānaṃ akampiyalakkhaṇaṃ, bojjhaṅgānaṃ niyyānalakkhaṇaṃ, maggassa hetulakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:652: Saccānaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ, samathassa avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ, vipassanāya anupassanālakkhaṇaṃ, samathavipassanānaṃ ekarasalakkhaṇaṃ, yuganaddhānaṃ anativattanalakkhaṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:653_1: dassanalakkhaṇaṃ, khaye ñāṇassa samucchedalakkhaṇaṃ, anuppāde ñāṇassa passaddhilakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:654_0: Manasikārassa samuṭṭhānalakkhaṇaṃ, phassassa samodhānalakkhaṇaṃ, vedanāya samosaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:654_1: samādhissa pamukhalakkhaṇaṃ, satiyā ādhipateyyalakkhaṇaṃ, paññāya tatuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:654_2: vimuttiyā sāralakkhaṇaṃ, amatogadhassa nibbānassa pariyosānalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:654_3: etaṃ tathalakkhaṇaṃ ñāṇagatiyā āgato avirajjhitvā patto anuppattoti tathāgato. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:655: Kathaṃ tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato? Tathadhammā nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:656: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri? ‘Idaṃ dukkha’nti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta”nti vitthāro.
atk-s0515a0:657: Tāni ca bhagavā abhisambuddhoti tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgatoti vuccati. Abhisambuddhattho hi ettha gatasaddo.
atk-s0515a0:658_0: Api ca jarāmaraṇassa jātipaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho…pe…
atk-s0515a0:658_1: saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho. Tathā avijjāya
atk-s0515a0:658_2: saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho…pe… jātiyā jarāmaraṇassa paccayaṭṭho tatho avitatho anaññatho.
atk-s0515a0:658_3: Taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavā abhisambuddho, tassāpi tathānaṃ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:659_0: Kathaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato? Bhagavā yaṃ sadevake loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya
atk-s0515a0:659_1: aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:659_2: nāma atthi, taṃ sabbākārena jānāti passati. Evaṃ jānatā passatā ca tena taṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādivasena
atk-s0515a0:659_3: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātesu labbhamānakapadavasena vā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ?
atk-s0515a0:659_4: Yaṃ rūpaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vaṇṇanibhā sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ nīlaṃ
atk-s0515a0:659_5: pītaka”ntiādinā nayena anekehi nāmehi terasahi vārehi dvipaññāsāya nayehi vibhajjamānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:659_6: tathameva hoti, vitathaṃ natthi. Esa nayo sotadvārādīsupi āpāthamāgacchantesu saddādīsu.
atk-s0515a0:660_0: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ
atk-s0515a0:660_1: viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi…pe… tamahaṃ abbhaññāsiṃ.
atk-s0515a0:660_2: Taṃ tathāgatassa viditaṃ, taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:661: Evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. Tattha tathadassīatthe tathāgatoti padasambhavo veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:662_0: Kathaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato? Yaṃ rattiṃ bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno
atk-s0515a0:662_1: catunnaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, yañca
atk-s0515a0:662_2: rattiṃ yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi, etthantare pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇe
atk-s0515a0:662_3: kāle paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:662_4: suttaṃ geyyaṃ…pe… vedallaṃ. Sabbaṃ taṃ atthato byañjanato ca anupavajjaṃ anūnamanadhikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:662_5: sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi
atk-s0515a0:662_6: pakkhalitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya, ekanāḷiyā mitaṃ viya, ekatulāya
atk-s0515a0:662_7: tulitaṃ viya ca tathameva hoti avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:663_0: “Yañca, cunda, rattiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhati, yañca rattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:663_1: anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati, yaṃ etasmiṃ antare bhāsati lapati niddisati,
atk-s0515a0:663_2: sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti no aññathā, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:664: Gadaattho hi ettha gatasaddo. Evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato.
atk-s0515a0:665: Api ca āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tatho aviparīto āgado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evametasmiṃ atthe padasiddhi veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:666_0: Kathaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato? Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassāpi vācā.
atk-s0515a0:666_1: Tasmā yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa cassa yathā
atk-s0515a0:666_2: vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavattoti attho. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti
atk-s0515a0:666_3: tathāgato. Tenevāha – “yathāvādī, bhikkhave, tathāgato tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī.
atk-s0515a0:666_4: Iti yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī. ‘Tasmā tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:667_0: Kathaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato? Upari bhavaggaṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pariyantaṃ katvā
atk-s0515a0:667_1: tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlena samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā
atk-s0515a0:667_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanena, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi, atha kho atulo appameyyo
atk-s0515a0:667_3: anuttaro rājātirājā devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā. Tenāha –
atk-s0515a0:668: “Sadevake, bhikkhave, loke…pe… sadevamanussāya pajāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, tasmā ‘tathāgato’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:669_0: Tatthevaṃ padasiddhi veditabbā – agado viya agado. Ko panesa? Desanāvilāso ceva puññussayo
atk-s0515a0:669_1: ca. Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko dibbāgadena sappe viya sabbaparappavādino sadevakañca
atk-s0515a0:669_2: lokaṃ abhibhavati. Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto desanāvilāsamayo ceva
atk-s0515a0:669_3: puññamayo ca agado assāti dakārassa takāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti veditabbo. Evaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato.
atk-s0515a0:670_0: Api ca tathāya gatotipi tathāgato, tathaṃ gatotipi tathāgato. Gatoti avagato, atīto
atk-s0515a0:670_1: patto paṭipannoti attho. Tattha sakalaṃ lokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya gato avagatoti
atk-s0515a0:670_2: tathāgato, lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato, lokanirodhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:670_3: sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato, lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ
atk-s0515a0:670_4: gato paṭipannoti tathāgato. Tena yaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0515a0:671_0: “Loko, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasmā tathāgato visaṃyutto. Lokasamudayo,
atk-s0515a0:671_1: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokasamudayo tathāgatassa pahīno. Lokanirodho,
atk-s0515a0:671_2: bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddho, lokanirodho tathāgatassa sacchikato. Lokanirodhagāminī
atk-s0515a0:671_3: paṭipadā, bhikkhave, tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā tathāgatassa
atk-s0515a0:671_4: bhāvitā. Yaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… anuvicaritaṃ manasā, sabbaṃ taṃ
atk-s0515a0:672_0: Tassa evampi attho veditabbo. Idampi ca tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvadīpena mukhamattameva.
atk-s0515a0:672_1: Sabbākārena pana tathāgatova tathāgatassa tathāgatabhāvaṃ vaṇṇeyya. Yasmā pana sabbabuddhā
atk-s0515a0:672_2: tathāgataguṇenāpi samasamā, tasmā sabbesaṃ vasena “tathāgatā”ti āha.
atk-s0515a0:673_0: Arahantoti kilesehi ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā, paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe
atk-s0515a0:673_1: rahābhāvā tathāgato arahaṃ. Ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi suvidūravidūre ṭhito maggena
atk-s0515a0:675: Asamaṅgī ca dosehi, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”.
atk-s0515a0:676: Te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:679_1: akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālappavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ, tassānena
atk-s0515a0:679_2: bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:679_3: ñāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arahaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:682_0: Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañca, teneva ca uppanne tathāgate
atk-s0515a0:682_1: ye keci mahesakkhā devamanussā, na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti. Tathā hi brahmā sahampati
atk-s0515a0:682_2: sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi, yathābalañca aññe devā ca manussā ca
atk-s0515a0:682_3: bimbisārakosalarājādayo. Parinibbutampi ca bhagavantaṃ uddissa channavutikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:682_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:683: “Pūjāvisesaṃ saha paccayehi, yasmā ayaṃ arahati lokanātho;
atk-s0515a0:684: Atthānurūpaṃ arahanti loke, tasmā jino arahati nāmametaṃ”.
atk-s0515a0:685: Yathā ca loke ye keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti, evamesa na kadāci pāpaṃ karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:691: Na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:692_0: Yasmā pana sabbe buddhā arahattaguṇenāpi samasamā, tasmā sabbesampi vasena “arahanto”ti
atk-s0515a0:692_1: āha. Sammāsambuddhāti sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho. Tathā
atk-s0515a0:692_2: hesa sabbadhamme sammāsambuddho, abhiññeyye dhamme abhiññeyyato, pariññeyye dhamme
atk-s0515a0:692_3: pariññeyyato, pahātabbe dhamme pahātabbato, sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikātabbato,
atk-s0515a0:694: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:695_0: Atha vā cakkhu dukkhasaccaṃ, tassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayasaccaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:695_1: ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evaṃ ekekapaduddhārenāpi
atk-s0515a0:695_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho. Esa nayo sotaghānajivhākāyamanesu. Eteneva ca nayena
atk-s0515a0:695_3: rūpādīni cha āyatanāni, cakkhuviññāṇādayo cha viññāṇakāyā, cakkhusamphassādayo cha
atk-s0515a0:695_4: phassā, cakkhusamphassajā vedanādayo cha vedanā, rūpasaññādayo cha saññā, rūpasañcetanādayo
atk-s0515a0:695_5: cha cetanā, rūpataṇhādayo cha taṇhākāyā, rūpavitakkādayo cha vitakkā, rūpavicārādayo
atk-s0515a0:695_6: cha vicārā, rūpakkhandhādayo pañcakkhandhā, dasa kasiṇāni, dasa anussatiyo, uddhumātakasaññādivasena
atk-s0515a0:695_7: dasa saññā, kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā, dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo, kāmabhavādayo
atk-s0515a0:695_8: nava bhavā, paṭhamādīni cattāri jhānāni, mettābhāvanādayo catasso appamaññāyo, catasso
atk-s0515a0:695_9: arūpasamāpattiyo, paṭilomato jarāmaraṇādīni, anulomato avijjādīni paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca yojetabbāni.
atk-s0515a0:696_0: Tatrāyaṃ ekapadayojanā – jarāmaraṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, jāti samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:696_1: nissaraṇaṃ nirodhasaccaṃ, nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccanti evaṃ ekekapaduddhārena
atk-s0515a0:696_2: sabbadhamme sammā sāmañca buddho anubuddho paṭividdho. Yaṃ vā pana kiñci atthi neyyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:696_3: nāma, sabbassa sammā sambuddhattā vimokkhantikañāṇavasena sammāsambuddho. Tesaṃ pana
atk-s0515a0:696_4: vibhāgo upari āvi bhavissati. Yasmā pana sabbabuddhā sammāsambuddhaguṇenāpi samasamā,
atk-s0515a0:697_0: Monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti, idha pana
atk-s0515a0:697_1: tuṇhībhāvaṃ sandhāya “na monenā”ti vuttaṃ. Mūḷharūpoti tuccharūpo. Aviddasūti aviññū.
atk-s0515a0:697_2: Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti. Atha vā moneyyamuni nāma na hoti, tucchabhāvo
atk-s0515a0:697_3: ca pana aññāṇī ca hotīti attho. Yo ca tulaṃva paggayhāti yathā hi tulaṃ gahetvā ṭhito
atk-s0515a0:697_4: atirekaṃ ce hoti, harati, ūnaṃ ce hoti, pakkhipati; evameva so atirekaṃ haranto viya
atk-s0515a0:697_5: pāpaṃ harati parivajjeti, ūnake pakkhipanto viya kusalaṃ paripūreti. Evañca pana
atk-s0515a0:697_7: pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti sa muni nāmāti attho. Tena so munīti kasmā pana
atk-s0515a0:697_8: so munīti ce? Yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇaṃ, tena so munīti attho. Yo munāti ubho loketi
atk-s0515a0:697_9: yo puggalo imasmiṃ khandhādiloke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
atk-s0515a0:697_10: ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti. Muni tena pavuccatīti tena pana
atk-s0515a0:698_0: Asatañcāti gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yvāyaṃ akusalakusalappabhedo, asatañca satañca
atk-s0515a0:698_1: dhammo, taṃ “ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā”ti imasmiṃ sabbaloke pavicayañāṇena asatañca satañca
atk-s0515a0:698_2: ñatvā dhammaṃ. Tassa ñātattā eva, rāgādibhedato sattavidhaṃ saṅgaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato
atk-s0515a0:698_3: duvidhaṃ jālañca aticca atikkamitvā ṭhito, so tena monasaṅkhātena pavicayañāṇena
atk-s0515a0:698_4: samannāgatattā muni. Devamanussehi pūjitoti idaṃ panassa thutivacanaṃ. So hi khīṇāsavamunittā
atk-s0515a0:698_5: devamanussānaṃ pūjāraho hoti, tasmā evaṃ vuttoti.
atk-s0515a0:699_0: Sallanti mūlapadaṃ. Satta sallānīti gaṇanaparicchedo. Rāgasallanti rañjanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:699_1: rāgo ca pīḷājanakatāya antotudanatāya dunnīharaṇatāya sallañcāti rāgasallaṃ. Dosasallādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:699_2: eseva nayo. Abbūḷhasalloti mūlapadaṃ. Abbahitasalloti nīhaṭasallo. Uddhatasalloti
atk-s0515a0:699_3: uddhaṃ haṭasallo uddharitasallo. Samuddhatasalloti upasaggavasena vutto. Uppāṭitasalloti
atk-s0515a0:700_0: Sakkaccakārīti dānādīnaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ bhāvanāya puggalassa vā deyyadhammassa vā
atk-s0515a0:700_2: aṭṭhitakārī. Yathā nāma kakaṇṭako thokaṃ gantvā thokaṃ tiṭṭhati, na nirantaraṃ gacchati;
atk-s0515a0:700_3: evameva yo puggalo ekadivasaṃ dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ vā katvā dhammaṃ vā sutvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:700_4: vā katvā puna cirassaṃ karoti, taṃ na nirantaraṃ pavatteti. So “asātaccakārī, anaṭṭhitakārī”ti
atk-s0515a0:700_5: vuccati. Ayaṃ evaṃ na karotīti aṭṭhitakārī. Anolīnavuttikoti nirantarakaraṇasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0515a0:700_6: vipphārassa bhāvena na līnavuttikoti anolīnavuttiko. Anikkhittacchandoti kusalakaraṇe
atk-s0515a0:700_8: anoropanena anikkhittadhuro, anosakkitamānasoti attho. Yo tattha chando ca vāyāmo
atk-s0515a0:700_9: cāti yo tesu kusaladhammesu kattukamyatādhammacchando ca payattasaṅkhāto vāyāmo ca.
atk-s0515a0:700_10: Ussahanavasena ussāho ca. Adhimattussahanavasena ussoḷhī ca. Vāyāmo ceso pāraṃ gamanaṭṭhena.
atk-s0515a0:700_11: Ussāho ceso pubbaṅgamanaṭṭhena. Ussoḷhī ceso adhimattaṭṭhena. Appaṭivāni cāti anivattanā
atk-s0515a0:700_12: ca. Sati ca sampajaññanti saratīti sati. Sampajānātīti sampajaññaṃ, samantato pakārehi
atk-s0515a0:700_13: jānātīti attho. Sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti
atk-s0515a0:700_14: imassa sampajānassa vasena bhedo veditabbo. Ātappanti kilesatāpanavīriyaṃ. Padhānanti
atk-s0515a0:700_15: uttamavīriyaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānanti kusalakaraṇe patiṭṭhābhāvo. Anuyogoti anuyuñjanaṃ. Appamādoti
atk-s0515a0:701_0: Imaṃ lokaṃ nāsīsatīti mūlapadaṃ. Sakattabhāvanti attano attabhāvaṃ. Parattabhāvanti
atk-s0515a0:701_1: paraloke attabhāvaṃ. Sakarūpavedanādayo attano pañcakkhandhe, pararūpavedanādayo
atk-s0515a0:701_2: ca paraloke pañcakkhandhe. Kāmadhātunti kāmabhavaṃ. Rūpadhātunti rūpabhavaṃ. Arūpadhātunti
atk-s0515a0:701_3: arūpabhavaṃ. Puna rūpārūpavasena dukaṃ dassetuṃ kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātuṃ ekaṃ katvā,
atk-s0515a0:701_4: arūpadhātuṃ ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. Gatiṃ vāti patiṭṭhānavasena pañcagati vuttā. Upapattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:701_5: vāti nibbattivasena catuyoni vuttā. Paṭisandhiṃ vāti tiṇṇaṃ bhavānaṃ ghaṭanavasena
atk-s0515a0:701_6: paṭisandhi vuttā. Bhavaṃ vāti kammabhavavasena. Saṃsāraṃ vāti khandhādīnaṃ abbocchinnavasena.
atk-s0515a0:705_0: 15. Duṭṭhaṭṭhake paṭhamagāthāyaṃ tāva tattha vadantīti bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca
atk-s0515a0:705_1: upavadanti. Duṭṭhamanāpi eke, athopi ve saccamanāti ekacce duṭṭhacittā, ekacce tathasaññinopi
atk-s0515a0:705_2: hutvā titthiyā tuṭṭhacittā, ye tesaṃ sutvā saddahiṃsu, te saccamanāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0515a0:705_3: Vādañca jātanti etaṃ akkosavādaṃ uppannaṃ. Muni no upetīti akārakatāya ca akuppanatāya
atk-s0515a0:705_4: ca buddhamuni na upeti. Tasmā munī natthi khilo kuhiñcīti tena kāraṇena ayaṃ muni,
atk-s0515a0:706_0: Duṭṭhamanāti uppannehi dosehi dūsitacittā. Viruddhamanāti tehi kilesehi kusalassa
atk-s0515a0:706_1: dvāraṃ adatvā āvaritacittā. Paṭiviruddhamanāti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Āhatamanāti
atk-s0515a0:706_2: paṭighena āhataṃ cittaṃ etesanti āhatamanā. Paccāhatamanāti upasaggavaseneva. Āghātitamanāti
atk-s0515a0:706_3: vihiṃsāvasena āghātitaṃ manaṃ etesanti āghātitamanā. Paccāghātitamanāti upasaggavaseneva.
atk-s0515a0:706_4: Atha vā “kodhavasena duṭṭhamanā, upanāhavasena paduṭṭhamanā, makkhavasena viruddhamanā,
atk-s0515a0:706_5: paḷāsavasena paṭiviruddhamanā, dosavasena āhatapaccāhatamanā, byāpādavasena āghātitapaccāghātitamanā.
atk-s0515a0:706_6: Paccayānaṃ alābhena duṭṭhamanā paduṭṭhamanā, ayasena viruddhamanā paṭiviruddhamanā,
atk-s0515a0:706_8: evamādinā nayena eke vaṇṇayanti. Upavadantīti garahaṃ uppādenti. Abhūtenāti asaṃvijjamānena.
atk-s0515a0:707_0: Saddahantāti pasādavasena saddhaṃ uppādentā. Okappentāti guṇavasena otaritvā avakappayantā.
atk-s0515a0:707_1: Adhimuccantāti sampasādanavasena sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tesaṃ kathaṃ adhivāsentā. Saccamanāti
atk-s0515a0:707_2: tacchamanā. Saccasaññinoti tacchasaññino. Tathamanāti aviparītamanā. Bhūtamanāti
atk-s0515a0:707_3: bhūtatthamanā. Yāthāvamanāti niccalamanā. Aviparītamanāti nicchayamanā. Tattha “saccamanā
atk-s0515a0:708_0: Paratoghosoti aññesaṃ santikā uppannasaddo. Akkosoti jātiādīsu dasasu akkosesu aññataro.
atk-s0515a0:708_1: Yo vādaṃ upetīti yo puggalo upavādaṃ upagacchati. Kārako vāti katadoso vā. Kārakatāyāti
atk-s0515a0:708_2: dosassa katabhāvena vuccamānoti kathiyamāno. Upavadiyamānoti dosaṃ upavajjamāno.
atk-s0515a0:709_1: jātaṃ assāti khilajāto, tassa bhāvo khilajātatā, tāpi natthi na santi. Pañcapi cetokhilāti
atk-s0515a0:709_2: kāme avītarāgo, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0515a0:709_3: seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya
atk-s0515a0:709_4: brahmacariyaṃ carati “imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo
atk-s0515a0:709_5: vā bhavissāmi, devaññataro vā”ti evarūpā pañcapi cittassa bandhabhāvakacavarabhāvasaṅkhātā cetokhilā natthi.
atk-s0515a0:710_0: 16. Imañca gāthaṃ vatvā bhagavā ānandattheraṃ pucchi – “evaṃ khuṃsetvā vambhetvā
atk-s0515a0:710_1: vuccamānā bhikkhū, ānanda, kiṃ vadantī”ti, “na kiñci bhagavā”ti. “Na, ānanda, ‘ahaṃ
atk-s0515a0:710_2: sīlavā’ti sabbattha tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ. Loke hi nābhāsamānaṃ jānanti, missaṃ bālehi
atk-s0515a0:710_3: paṇḍita”nti vatvā “bhikkhū, ānanda, te manusse evaṃ paṭicodentū”ti dhammadesanatthāya
atk-s0515a0:710_4: “abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi. Thero taṃ uggahetvā bhikkhū āha
atk-s0515a0:710_5: – “manussā tumhehi imāya gāthāya paṭicodetabbā”ti. Bhikkhū tathā akaṃsu. Paṇḍitamanussā
atk-s0515a0:710_6: tuṇhī ahesuṃ. Rājāpi rājapurise sabbattha pesetvā yesaṃ dhuttānaṃ lañjaṃ datvā titthiyā
atk-s0515a0:710_7: taṃ mārāpesuṃ, te gahetvā niggayha taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā titthiye paribhāsi. Manussāpi
atk-s0515a0:710_8: titthiye disvā leḍḍunā hananti, paṃsunā okiranti “bhagavato ayasaṃ uppādesu”nti.
atk-s0515a0:710_9: Ānandatthero taṃ disvā bhagavato ārocesi, bhagavā therassa imaṃ gāthamabhāsi “sakañhi
atk-s0515a0:711_0: Tassa attho – yāyaṃ diṭṭhi titthiyajanassa “sundariṃ māretvā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:711_1: avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā etenupāyena laddhaṃ sakkāraṃ sādiyissāmā”ti so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ kathaṃ
atk-s0515a0:711_2: atikkameyya? Atha kho so ayaso tameva titthiyajanaṃ paccāgato taṃ diṭṭhiṃ accetuṃ
atk-s0515a0:711_3: asakkontaṃ. Yo vā sassatādivādī, sopi sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ kathamaccayeyya, tena diṭṭhichandena
atk-s0515a0:711_4: anunīto tāya ca diṭṭhiruciyā niviṭṭho, api ca kho pana sayaṃ samattāni pakubbamāno
atk-s0515a0:711_5: attanāva paripuṇṇāni tāni diṭṭhigatāni karonto yathā jāneyya, tatheva vadeyyāti.
atk-s0515a0:712_0: Avaṇṇaṃ pakāsayitvāti aguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā. Sakkāranti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ sakkaccakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:712_1: Sammānanti cittena bahumānanaṃ. Paccāharissāmāti etaṃ lābhādiṃ nibbattessāma. Evaṃdiṭṭhikāti
atk-s0515a0:712_2: evaṃladdhikā. Yathā taṃ “lābhādiṃ nibbattessāmā”ti evaṃ ayaṃ laddhi tesaṃ atthi,
atk-s0515a0:712_3: tathā “atthi me vuttappakāro dhammo”ti etesaṃ khamati ceva ruccati ca, evaṃsabhāvameva
