atk-s0515a0:1087: Thambhayitvāti pūretvā. Brūhayitvāti vaḍḍhetvā. Imissā gāthāya niddeso uttānattho.
atk-s0515a0:1088_0: 65. Evaṃ unnamato ca “yā unnatī”ti gāthā. Tattha mānātimānaṃ vadate panesoti eso
atk-s0515a0:1088_1: pana taṃ unnatiṃ “vighātabhūmī”ti abujjhamāno mānañca atimānañca vadati. Evaṃ imissāpi
atk-s0515a0:1089_0: 66. Evaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa vādaṃ asampaṭicchanto “sūro”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:1089_1: Tattha rājakhādāyāti rājakhādanīyena, bhattavetanenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Abhigajjameti
atk-s0515a0:1089_2: paṭisūramicchanti yathā so paṭisūraṃ icchanto abhigajjanto eti, evaṃ diṭṭhigatiko
atk-s0515a0:1089_3: diṭṭhigatikanti dasseti. Yeneva so tena palehīti yena so tuyhaṃ paṭisūro, tena gaccha.
atk-s0515a0:1089_4: Pubbeva natthi yadidaṃ yudhāyāti yaṃ pana kilesajātaṃ yuddhāya siyā, taṃ idha pubbeva
atk-s0515a0:1090_0: Sūroti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Suṭṭhu uro sūro, vissaṭṭhauro ninnauroti attho. Vīroti
atk-s0515a0:1090_1: parakkamavanto. Vikkantoti saṅgāmaṃ pavisanto. Abhīrūtiādayo vuttanayā eva. Puṭṭhoti
atk-s0515a0:1090_2: niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Positoti thūlakato. Āpāditoti upaḍḍhabalito paṭipādito. Vaḍḍhitoti tato tato bhāvito.
atk-s0515a0:1091_0: Gajjantoti abyattasarena gajjanto. Uggajjantoti ukkuṭṭhiṃ karonto. Abhigajjantoti
atk-s0515a0:1091_1: sīhanādaṃ karonto. Etīti āgacchati. Upetīti tato samīpaṃ gacchati. Upagacchatīti
atk-s0515a0:1091_2: tato samīpaṃ gantvā na nivattati. Paṭisūranti nibbhayaṃ. Paṭipurisanti sattupurisaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1091_3: Paṭisattunti sattu hutvā abhimukhe ṭhitaṃ. Paṭimallanti paṭisedhaṃ hutvā yujjhantaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1092: Palehīti gaccha. Vajāti mā tiṭṭha. Gacchāti samīpaṃ upasaṅkama. Abhikkamāti parakkamaṃ karohi.
atk-s0515a0:1093_0: Bodhiyā mūleti mahābodhirukkhassa samīpe. Ye paṭisenikarā kilesāti ye kilesā paṭipakkhakarā.
atk-s0515a0:1093_1: Paṭilomakarāti paṭāṇīkarā. Paṭikaṇṭakakarāti vinivijjhanakarā. Paṭipakkhakarāti sattukarā.
atk-s0515a0:1094_0: 67. Ito paraṃ sesagāthā pākaṭasambandhā eva. Tattha vivādayantīti vivadanti. Paṭisenikattāti
atk-s0515a0:1094_1: paṭilomakārakā. “Na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādinā nayena viruddhavacanaṃ vivādo.
atk-s0515a0:1095_0: Sahitaṃ meti mama vacanaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ. Asahitaṃ teti tava vacanaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1095_1: Adhiciṇṇaṃ te viparāvattanti yaṃ taṃ adhiciṇṇaṃ cirakālasevanavasena paguṇaṃ, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1095_2: mama vādaṃ āgamma nivattaṃ. Āropito te vādoti tuyhaṃ upari mayā doso āropito. Cara
atk-s0515a0:1095_3: vādappamokkhāyāti bhattapuṭaṃ ādāya taṃ taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vādā pamokkhatthāya uttaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1095_4: pariyesamāno vicara. Nibbeṭhehi vāti atha vā mayā āropitadosato attānaṃ mocehi. Sace
atk-s0515a0:1096: Āveṭhiyāya āveṭhiyanti āveṭhetvā nivattanena nivattanaṃ. Nibbeṭhiyāya nibbeṭhiyanti dosato mocanena mocanaṃ. Chedena chedanti evamādi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathāyogaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1097_0: 68. Visenikatvāti kilesasenaṃ vināsetvā. Kiṃ labhethāti paṭimallaṃ kiṃ labhissasi.
atk-s0515a0:1097_1: Pasūrāti taṃ paribbājakaṃ ālapati. Yesīdha natthīti yesaṃ idha natthi. Imāyapi gāthāya
atk-s0515a0:1098_0: 69. Pavitakkanti “jayo nu kho me bhavissatī”tiādīni vitakkento. Dhonena yugaṃ samāgamāti
atk-s0515a0:1098_1: dhutakilesena buddhena saddhiṃ yugaggāhaṃ samāpanno. Na hi tvaṃ sakkhasi sampayātaveti
atk-s0515a0:1098_2: kotthuādayo viya sīhādīhi dhonena saha yugaṃ gahetvā ekapadampi sampayātuṃ yugaggāhameva
atk-s0515a0:1099_0: Manoti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Cittanti cittatāya cittaṃ. “Ārammaṇaṃ minamānaṃ jānātī”ti
atk-s0515a0:1099_1: mano. Mānasanti mano eva. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti hi ettha
atk-s0515a0:1102: Ettha arahattaṃ mānasanti vuttaṃ. Idha pana manova mānasaṃ, byañjanavasena hetaṃ padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1103_0: Hadayanti cittaṃ. “Cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmī”ti ettha uro
atk-s0515a0:1103_1: hadayanti vuttaṃ. “Hadayā hadayaṃ maññe aññāya tacchatī”ti ettha cittaṃ. “Vakkaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1103_2: hadaya”nti ettha hadayavatthu. Idha pana cittameva abbhantaraṭṭhena “hadaya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1103_3: Tameva parisuddhaṭṭhena paṇḍaraṃ, bhavaṅgaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Yathāha “pabhassaramidaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1103_4: bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭha”nti. Tato nikkhantattā
atk-s0515a0:1103_5: pana akusalampi gaṅgāya nikkhantā nadī gaṅgā viya godhāvarito nikkhantā godhāvari
atk-s0515a0:1104_0: Mano manāyatananti idha pana manogahaṇaṃ manasseva āyatanabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1104_1: dīpeti “nayidaṃ devāyatanaṃ viya manassa āyatanattā manāyatanaṃ, atha kho mano eva
atk-s0515a0:1104_2: āyatanaṃ manāyatana”nti. Tattha nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1104_3: sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1104_5: ākaro. Sāsane pana “manorame āyatane, sevanti naṃ vihaṅgamā”tiādīsu samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1104_7: pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ. Idha pana sañjātidesaṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1105_0: Phassādayo hi dhammā ettha sañjāyantīti sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi etaṃ āyatanaṃ. Bahiddhā
atk-s0515a0:1105_2: āyatanaṃ. Phassādīnaṃ pana sahajātādipaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇattā kāraṇaṭṭhenāpi āyatananti
atk-s0515a0:1106_0: Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Viññāṇameva khandho viññāṇakkhandho. Tassa rāsiādivasena attho
atk-s0515a0:1106_1: veditabbo. “Mahāudakakkhandhotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti ettha hi rāsaṭṭhena khandho
atk-s0515a0:1106_2: vutto. “Sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho”tiādīsu guṇaṭṭhena. “Addasa kho bhagavā mahantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1106_3: dārukkhandha”nti ettha paṇṇattimattaṭṭhena. Idha pana rūḷhito khandho vutto. Rāsaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1106_4: hi viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadeso ekaṃ viññāṇaṃ. Tasmā yathā rukkhassa ekadesaṃ chindanto
atk-s0515a0:1106_5: rukkhaṃ chindatīti vuccati, evameva viññāṇakkhandhassa ekadesabhūtaṃ ekampi viññāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1107_0: Tajjā manoviññāṇadhātūti tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ anucchavikā manoviññāṇadhātu.
atk-s0515a0:1107_1: Imasmiñhi pade ekameva cittaṃ minanaṭṭhena mano, vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ, sabhāvaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1107_2: nissattaṭṭhena vā dhātūti tīhi nāmehi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1108_0: Saddhiṃ yugaṃ samāgamanti ekappahārena saddhiṃ. Sammāgantvāti pāpuṇitvā. Yugaggāhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1108_1: gaṇhitvāti yugapaṭibhāgaṃ gahetvā. Sākacchetunti saddhiṃ kathetuṃ. Sallapitunti allāpasallāpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1108_2: kātuṃ. Sākacchaṃ samāpajjitunti saddhiṃ kathanaṃ paṭipajjituṃ. Na paṭibalabhāve kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1108_3: dassetuṃ “taṃ kissahetu, pasūro paribbājako hīno”tiādimāha. So hi bhagavā aggo cāti
atk-s0515a0:1108_4: asadisadānaaggattā asamānapaññattā aggo ca. Seṭṭho cāti sabbaguṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1108_5: seṭṭho ca. Mokkho cāti savāsanehi kilesehi muttattā mokkho ca. Uttamo cāti attano
atk-s0515a0:1108_6: uttaritaravirahitattā uttamo ca. Pavaro cāti sabbalokena abhipatthanīyattā pavaro
atk-s0515a0:1109_0: Kotthukoti jiraṇasiṅgālo. Sīhena migaraññā saddhinti kesarasīhena migarājena saha.
atk-s0515a0:1109_1: Taruṇakoti chāpako. Dhenupakoti khīrapako. Usabhenāti maṅgalasammatena usabhena.
atk-s0515a0:1109_2: Calakakunā saddhinti calamānakakunā saddhiṃ. Dhaṅkoti kāko. Garuḷena venateyyena
atk-s0515a0:1109_3: saddhinti ettha garuḷenāti jātivasena nāmaṃ. Venateyyenāti gottavasena. Caṇḍāloti
atk-s0515a0:1109_4: chavacaṇḍālo. Raññā cakkavattināti cātuddīpikacakkavattinā. Paṃsupisācakoti kacavarachaḍḍanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0515a0:1109_5: nibbattako yakkho. Indena devaraññā saddhinti sakkena devarājena saha. So hi bhagavā
atk-s0515a0:1109_6: mahāpaññotiādīni chappadāni heṭṭhā vitthāritāni. Tattha paññāpabhedakusaloti attano
atk-s0515a0:1109_7: anantavikappe paññābhede cheko. Pabhinnañāṇoti anantappabhedapattañāṇo. Etena paññāpabhedakusalattepi
atk-s0515a0:1109_8: sati tāsaṃ paññānaṃ anantabhedattaṃ dasseti. Adhigatapaṭisambhidoti paṭiladdhaaggacatupaṭisambhidañāṇo.
atk-s0515a0:1109_9: Catuvesārajjappattoti cattāri visāradabhāvasaṅkhātāni ñāṇāni patto. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:1110_0: “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ‘ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti, tatra vata maṃ samaṇo
atk-s0515a0:1110_1: vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
atk-s0515a0:1110_2: nimittametaṃ, bhikkhave, na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
atk-s0515a0:1111_0: “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti…pe… ‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā
atk-s0515a0:1111_1: dhammā vuttā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti…pe… yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo
atk-s0515a0:1111_2: desito, so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti, tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā
atk-s0515a0:1111_3: brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti
atk-s0515a0:1111_4: nimittametaṃ, bhikkhave, na samanupassāmi, etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, nimittaṃ asamanupassanto
atk-s0515a0:1112_0: Dasabalabaladhārīti dasa balāni etesanti dasabalā, dasabalānaṃ balāni dasabalabalāni,
atk-s0515a0:1112_1: tāni dasabalabalāni dhārayatīti dasabalabaladhārī, dasabalañāṇabaladhārīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1112_2: Etehi tīhi vacanehi anantappabhedānaṃ neyyānaṃ pabhedamukhamattaṃ dassitaṃ. Soyeva
atk-s0515a0:1112_4: Mahantaṭṭhena purisanāgo. Pajānanaṭṭhena purisājañño. Lokakiccadhuravahanaṭṭhena purisadhorayho.
atk-s0515a0:1113_0: Atha tejādikaṃ anantañāṇato laddhaṃ guṇavisesaṃ dassetukāmo tesaṃ tejādīnaṃ anantañāṇamūlabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1113_2: ca pabhāvavasena ca antavirahitañāṇo. Anantatejoti veneyyasantāne mohatamavidhamanena
atk-s0515a0:1113_5: mahantaṃ pavattapaññādhanamassāti mahaddhano. “Mahādhano”ti vā pāṭho. Dhanavāti pasaṃsitabbapaññādhanavattā
atk-s0515a0:1113_6: niccayuttapaññādhanavattā atisayabhāvena paññādhanavattā dhanavā. Etesupi hi tīsu
atk-s0515a0:1114_0: Evaṃ paññāguṇena bhagavato attasampattisiddhiṃ dassetvā puna paññāguṇeneva lokahitasampattisiddhiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1114_2: khemaṭṭhānaṃ netā. Tattha nayanakāle eva saṃvaravinayapahānavinayavasena veneyye
atk-s0515a0:1114_3: vinetā. Dhammadesanākāle eva saṃsayacchedanena anunetā. Saṃsayaṃ chinditvā saññāpetabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1114_4: atthaṃ paññāpetā. Tathā paññāpitānaṃ nicchayakaraṇena nijjhāpetā. Tathā nijjhāpitassa
atk-s0515a0:1114_5: atthassa paṭipattipayojanavasena pekkhetā. Tathāpaṭipanne paṭipattibalena pasādetā.
atk-s0515a0:1114_6: So hi bhagavāti ettha hi-kāro anantaraṃ vuttassa atthassa kāraṇopadese nipāto.
atk-s0515a0:1115_0: Anuppannassa maggassa uppādetāti sakasantāne nauppannapubbassa chaasādhāraṇañāṇahetubhūtassa
atk-s0515a0:1115_1: ariyamaggassa bodhimūle lokahitatthaṃ sakasantāne uppādetā. Asañjātassa maggassa
atk-s0515a0:1115_3: dhammacakkappavattanato pabhuti yāvajjakālā veneyyasantāne sañjanetā. Sāvakaveneyyānampi
atk-s0515a0:1115_4: hi santāne bhagavatā vuttavacaneneva ariyamaggassa sañjananato bhagavā sañjanetā
atk-s0515a0:1115_5: nāma hoti. Anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātāti aṭṭhadhammasamannāgatānaṃ buddhabhāvāya
atk-s0515a0:1115_6: kathābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ buddhabhāvāya byākaraṇaṃ datvā anakkhātapubbassa
atk-s0515a0:1115_8: ariyamaggassa akkhātā. Ayaṃ nayo paccekabodhisattabyākaraṇepi labbhatiyeva. Maggaññūti
atk-s0515a0:1115_9: paccavekkhaṇāvasena attano uppāditassa ariyamaggassa ñātā. Maggavidūti veneyyasantāne
atk-s0515a0:1115_10: janetabbassa ariyamaggassa kusalo. Maggakovidoti bodhisattānaṃ akkhātabbamagge vicakkhaṇo.
atk-s0515a0:1115_11: Atha vā abhisambodhipaṭipatti maggaññū, paccekabodhipaṭipatti maggavidū, sāvakabodhipaṭipatti
atk-s0515a0:1118_2: maggavasena ca yathākkamenettha yojanaṃ karonti. Maggānugā ca panassāti bhagavato
atk-s0515a0:1118_3: gatamaggānugāmino hutvā. Ettha ca-saddo hetuatthe nipāto, etena ca bhagavatā magguppādanādiguṇādhigamāya
atk-s0515a0:1118_4: hetu vutto hoti. Pana-saddo katatthe nipāto, tena bhagavatā katamaggakaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1118_5: hoti. Pacchā samannāgatāti paṭhamaṃ gatassa bhagavato pacchā sīlādiguṇena samannāgatā.
atk-s0515a0:1118_6: Iti thero “anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā”tiādīhi yasmā sabbepi bhagavato sīlādayo
atk-s0515a0:1118_7: guṇā arahattamaggameva nissāya āgatā, tasmā arahattamaggameva nissāya guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0515a0:1119_0: Jānaṃ jānātīti jānitabbaṃ jānāti, sabbaññutāya yaṃkiñci paññāya jānitabbaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0515a0:1119_1: taṃ sabbaṃ pañcaneyyapathabhūtaṃ paññāya jānātīti attho. Passaṃ passatīti passitabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1119_2: passati, sabbadassāvitāya taṃyeva neyyapathaṃ cakkhunā diṭṭhaṃ viya karonto paññācakkhunā
atk-s0515a0:1119_3: passatīti attho. Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti, passantopi
atk-s0515a0:1119_4: na passati, na evaṃ bhagavā. Bhagavā pana yathāsabhāvaṃ gaṇhanto jānanto jānātiyeva,
atk-s0515a0:1119_5: passanto passatiyeva. Svāyaṃ nayana pariṇāyakaṭṭhena cakkhubhūto. Viditatādiatthena
atk-s0515a0:1119_6: ñāṇabhūto. Aviparītasabhāvaṭṭhena vā pariyattidhammapavattanato hadayena cintetvā
atk-s0515a0:1119_7: vācāya nicchāritadhammamayoti vā dhammabhūto. Seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūto. Atha vā cakkhu
atk-s0515a0:1119_8: viya bhūtoti cakkhubhūto. Ñāṇaṃ viya bhūtoti ñāṇabhūto. Aviparītadhammo viya bhūtoti
atk-s0515a0:1119_9: dhammabhūto. Brahmā viya bhūtoti brahmabhūto. Yvāyaṃ dhammassa vacanato vattanato
atk-s0515a0:1119_10: vā vattā. Nānappakārehi vacanato vattanato vā pavattā. Atthaṃ nīharitvā dassanato
atk-s0515a0:1119_11: atthassa ninnetā. Amatādhigamāya paṭipattidesanato, amatappakāsanāya vā dhammadesanāya
atk-s0515a0:1119_12: amatassa adhigamāpanato amatassa dātā. Lokuttarassa dhammassa uppāditattā veneyyānurūpena
atk-s0515a0:1119_13: yathāsukhaṃ lokuttaradhammassa dānena ca dhammesu issaroti dhammassāmī. Tathāgatapadaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1120_0: Idāni “jānaṃ jānātī”tiādīhi vuttaguṇaṃ sabbaññutāya visesetvā dassetukāmo sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1120_1: sādhento “natthī”tiādimāha. Evaṃbhūtassa hi tassa bhagavato pāramitāpuññaphalappabhāvanipphannena
atk-s0515a0:1120_2: arahattamaggañāṇena sabbadhammesu savāsanassa sammohassa vihatattā asammohato sabbadhammānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1120_3: ñātattā aññātaṃ nāma natthi. Tatheva ca sabbadhammānaṃ cakkhunā viya ñāṇacakkhunā
atk-s0515a0:1120_4: diṭṭhattā adiṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi. Ñāṇena pattattā aviditaṃ nāma natthi. Asammohasacchikiriyāya
atk-s0515a0:1120_5: sacchikatattā asacchikataṃ nāma natthi. Asammohapaññāya phuṭṭhattā paññāya aphassitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0515a0:1121_0: Paccuppannanti paccuppannaṃ kālaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā. Upādāyāti ādāya, antokatvāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1121_1: Upādāyavacaneneva kālavinimuttaṃ nibbānampi gahitameva hoti. “Atītā”divacanāni ca
atk-s0515a0:1121_4: Ñāṇamukheti ñāṇābhimukhe. Āpāthaṃ āgacchantīti osaraṇaṃ upenti. Jānitabbanti padaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1122_0: Attattho vātiādīsu vā-saddo samuccayattho. Attatthoti attano attho. Paratthoti paresaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1122_1: tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ attho. Ubhayatthoti attano ca paresañcāti sakiṃyeva ubhinnaṃ attho.
atk-s0515a0:1122_2: Diṭṭhadhammikoti diṭṭhadhamme niyutto, diṭṭhadhammappayojano vā attho. Samparāye
atk-s0515a0:1122_3: niyutto, samparāyappayojano vā samparāyiko. Uttānotiādīsu vohāravasena vattabbo sukhapatiṭṭhattā
atk-s0515a0:1122_4: uttāno. Vohāraṃ atikkamitvā vattabbo suññatāpaṭisaṃyutto dukkhapatiṭṭhattā gambhīro.
atk-s0515a0:1122_5: Lokuttaro accantatirokkhattā gūḷho. Aniccatādiko ghanādīhi paṭicchannattā paṭicchanno.
atk-s0515a0:1122_6: Apacuravohārena vattabbo yathārutaṃ aggahetvā adhippāyassa netabbato neyyo. Pacuravohārena
atk-s0515a0:1122_7: vattabbo vacanamatteneva adhippāyassa nītattā nīto. Suparisuddhasīlasamādhivipassanattho
atk-s0515a0:1122_9: nakkileso. Kilesapaṭippassaddhattā ariyaphalattho vodāno. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatesu aggadhammattā
atk-s0515a0:1122_10: nibbānaṃ paramattho. Parivattatīti buddhañāṇassa visayabhāvato abahibhūtattā antobuddhañāṇe
atk-s0515a0:1122_11: byāpitvā vā samantā vā alaṅkaritvā vā visesena vā vattati.
atk-s0515a0:1123_0: “Sabbaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādīhi bhagavato ñāṇavisayataṃ dasseti. Ñāṇānuparivattīti ñāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1123_1: anuparivatti, ñāṇavirahitaṃ na hotīti attho. Appaṭihatanti nirāvaraṇataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0515a0:1123_2: Puna sabbaññutaṃ upamāya sādhetukāmo “yāvataka”ntiādimāha. Tattha jānitabbanti neyyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1123_3: Neyyapariyanto neyyāvasānamassa atthīti neyyapariyantikaṃ. Asabbaññūnaṃ pana neyyāvasānameva
atk-s0515a0:1123_4: natthi. Ñāṇapariyantikepi eseva nayo. Purimayamake vuttatthameva iminā yamakena visesetvā
atk-s0515a0:1123_5: dasseti, tatiyayamakena paṭisedhavasena niyametvā dasseti. Ettha ca neyyaṃ ñāṇassa
atk-s0515a0:1123_6: pathattā neyyapatho. Aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyinoti neyyañca ñāṇañca khepetvā ṭhānato
atk-s0515a0:1124_0: Āvajjanapaṭibaddhāti manodvārāvajjanāyattā, āvajjitānantarameva jānātīti attho. Ākaṅkhapaṭibaddhāti
atk-s0515a0:1124_1: ruciāyattā, āvajjanānantaraṃ javanañāṇena jānātīti attho. Itarāni dve padāni imesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1124_2: dvinnaṃ padānaṃ yathākkamena atthappakāsanatthaṃ vuttāni. Āsayaṃ jānātīti ettha āsayanti
atk-s0515a0:1124_3: nissayanti etthāti āsayo, micchādiṭṭhiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā kāmādīhi nekkhammādīhi vā
atk-s0515a0:1124_4: paribhāvitassa santānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sattasantānaṃ anusenti anupavattentīti
atk-s0515a0:1124_5: anusayā, thāmagatānaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃva etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Anusayaṃ jānātīti anusayakathā heṭṭhā vuttāyeva.
atk-s0515a0:1125_0: Caritanti pubbe katakusalākusalakammaṃ. Adhimuttinti sampati kusale akusale vā cittavosaggo.
atk-s0515a0:1125_1: Apparajakkheti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ rāgādirajo etesanti apparajakkhā. Appaṃ rāgādirajo
atk-s0515a0:1125_2: etesanti vā apparajakkhā, te apparajakkhe. Mahārajakkheti ñāṇamaye akkhimhi mahantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1125_3: rāgādirajo etesanti mahārajakkhā. Mahantaṃ rāgādirajo etesanti vā mahārajakkhā, te
atk-s0515a0:1125_4: mahārajakkhe. Tikkhindriye mudindriyeti tikkhāni saddhādīni indriyāni etesanti tikkhindriyā.
atk-s0515a0:1125_5: Mudūni saddhādīni indriyāni etesanti mudindriyā. Svākāre dvākāreti sundarā saddhādayo
atk-s0515a0:1125_6: ākārā koṭṭhāsā etesanti svākārā. Kucchitā garahitā asaddhādayo ākārā koṭṭhāsā etesanti
atk-s0515a0:1125_7: dvākārā. Suviññāpaye duviññāpayeti ye kathitaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti sukhena sakkā
atk-s0515a0:1125_8: honti viññāpetuṃ, te suviññāpayā. Tabbiparītā duviññāpayā. Bhabbābhabbeti bhabbe
atk-s0515a0:1125_9: ca abhabbe ca. Ariyāya jātiyā bhavanti jāyantīti bhabbā. Vattamānasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1125_10: Bhavissanti jāyissanti vāti bhabbā, bhājanabhūtāti attho. Ye ariyamaggapaṭivedhassa
atk-s0515a0:1125_11: anucchavikā upanissayasampannā, te bhabbā. Vuttapaṭipakkhā abhabbā.
atk-s0515a0:1126_0: Satte pajānātīti rūpādike ārammaṇe lagge laggite satte pajānāti. Sadevako lokoti
atk-s0515a0:1126_1: saha devehi sadevako. Saha mārena samārako. Saha brahmunā sabrahmako. Saha samaṇabrāhmaṇehi
atk-s0515a0:1126_2: sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī. Pajātattā pajā. Saha devamanussehi sadevamanussā. “Pajā”ti sattalokassa
atk-s0515a0:1126_7: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsaloko. Dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1127_0: Aparo nayo – sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito, samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaraloko,
atk-s0515a0:1127_2: sammutidevehi vā saha manussaloko, avasesasabbasattaloko vā. Api cettha sadevakavacanena
atk-s0515a0:1127_3: ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato sabbassapi lokassa antobuddhañāṇe parivattanabhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0515a0:1127_4: Tato yesaṃ siyā “māro mahānubhāvo chakāmāvacarissaro vasavattī, kiṃ sopi antobuddhañāṇe
atk-s0515a0:1127_5: parivattatī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “samārako”ti āha. Yesaṃ pana siyā “brahmā
atk-s0515a0:1127_6: mahānubhāvo, ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati. Dvīhi…pe… dasahi
atk-s0515a0:1127_7: aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati, anuttarañca jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1127_8: paṭisaṃvedeti, kiṃ sopi antobuddhañāṇe parivattatī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “sabrahmako”ti
atk-s0515a0:1127_9: āha. Tato yesaṃ siyā “puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇā sāsanapaccatthikā, kiṃ tepi antobuddhañāṇe
atk-s0515a0:1127_10: parivattantī”ti. Tesaṃ vimatiṃ vidhamento “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā”ti āha.
atk-s0515a0:1128_0: Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ antobuddhañāṇe parivattanabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā atha sammutideve avasesamanusse
atk-s0515a0:1128_1: ca upādāya ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena sesasattalokassa antobuddhañāṇe parivattanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1128_2: pakāsento “sadevamanussā”ti āha. Ayamettha anusandhikkamo. Porāṇā panāhu “sadevakoti
atk-s0515a0:1128_3: devatāhi saddhiṃ avasesaloko. Samārakoti mārena saddhiṃ avasesaloko. Sabrahmakoti
atk-s0515a0:1128_4: brahmehi saddhiṃ avasesaloko. Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu
atk-s0515a0:1128_5: pakkhipitvā puna dvīhākārehi pariyādātuṃ ‘sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā’ti
atk-s0515a0:1128_6: vuttaṃ. Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tena ākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnaṃ hotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1129_0: Antamasoti uparimantena. Timitimiṅgalanti ettha timi nāma ekā macchajāti, timiṃ gilituṃ
atk-s0515a0:1129_1: samatthā tato mahantasarīrā timiṅgalā nāma ekā macchajāti, timiṅgalampi gilituṃ samatthā
atk-s0515a0:1129_2: pañcayojanasatikasarīrā timitimiṅgalā nāma ekā macchajāti. Idha jātiggahaṇena ekavacanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1129_3: katanti veditabbaṃ. Garuḷaṃ venateyyanti ettha garuḷoti jātivasena nāmaṃ. Venateyyoti
atk-s0515a0:1129_4: gottavasena. Padeseti ekadese. Sāriputtasamāti sabbabuddhānaṃ dhammasenāpatitthere
atk-s0515a0:1129_5: gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Sesasāvakā hi paññāya dhammasenāpatittherena samā nāma
atk-s0515a0:1129_6: natthi. Yathāha – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1132_0: Pharitvāti buddhañāṇaṃ sabbadevamanussānampi paññaṃ pāpuṇitvā ṭhānato tesaṃ paññaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1132_1: pharitvā byāpitvā tiṭṭhati. Abhibhavitvāti sabbadevamanussānampi paññaṃ atikkamitvā,
atk-s0515a0:1132_2: tesaṃ avisayabhūtampi sabbaṃ neyyaṃ abhibhavitvā tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1133_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ pana “atighaṃsitvā”ti pāṭho, ghaṃsitvā tuditvāti attho. Yepi tetiādīhi
atk-s0515a0:1133_1: evaṃ pharitvā abhibhavitvā ṭhānassa paccakkhakāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tattha paṇḍitāti paṇḍiccena
atk-s0515a0:1133_2: samannāgatā. Nipuṇāti saṇhasukhumabuddhino sukhume atthantare paṭivijjhanasamatthā.
atk-s0515a0:1133_3: Kataparappavādāti viññātaparappavādā ceva parehi saddhiṃ katavādaparicayā ca. Vālavedhirūpāti
atk-s0515a0:1133_4: vālavedhidhanuggahasadisā. Vo bhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhigatānīti
atk-s0515a0:1133_5: vālavedhī viya vālaṃ sukhumānipi paresaṃ diṭṭhigamanāni attano paññāgamanena bhindantā
atk-s0515a0:1133_6: viya carantīti attho. Atha vā “gūthagataṃ muttagata”ntiādīsu viya paññā eva paññāgataṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1133_7: Diṭṭhiyo eva diṭṭhigatāni. Pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā abhisaṅkharitvāti dvipadampi tipadampi
atk-s0515a0:1133_8: catupadampi pucchaṃ racayitvā tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atibahukattā sabbasaṅgahatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1133_9: vuttaṃ. Gūḷhāni ca paṭicchannāni ca atthajātānīti pāṭhaseso. Tesaṃ tathā vinayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1133_10: disvā attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ pañhaṃ pucchantīti evaṃ bhagavatā adhippetattā pañhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1133_11: pucchanti. Aññesaṃ pana pucchāya okāsameva adatvā bhagavā upasaṅkamantānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:1134_0: “Te pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharonti ‘imaṃ mayaṃ pañhaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma,
atk-s0515a0:1134_1: sace no samaṇo gotamo evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ byākarissati, evamassa mayaṃ vādaṃ āropessāma,
atk-s0515a0:1134_2: evaṃ cepi no puṭṭho evaṃ byākarissati, evampissa mayaṃ vādaṃ āropessāmā’ti. Te suṇanti
atk-s0515a0:1134_3: ‘samaṇo khalu bho gotamo amukaṃ nāma gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā osaṭo’ti. Te yena samaṇo
atk-s0515a0:1134_4: gotamo tenupasaṅkamanti. Te samaṇo gotamo dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti
atk-s0515a0:1134_5: samuttejeti sampahaṃseti. Te samaṇena gotamena dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā
atk-s0515a0:1134_6: samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā na ceva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanti, kutossa vādaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1134_7: āropessanti, aññadatthu samaṇasseva gotamassa sāvakā sampajjantī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1135_0: Kasmā pañhe na pucchantīti ce? Bhagavā kira parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desento parisāya
atk-s0515a0:1135_1: ajjhāsayaṃ oloketi, tato passati “ime paṇḍitā gūḷhaṃ rahassaṃ pañhaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1135_2: katvā āgatā”ti. So tehi apuṭṭhoyeva “pañhapucchāya ettakā dosā, vissajjane ettakā,
atk-s0515a0:1135_3: atthe, pade, akkhare ettakāti; imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto evaṃ puccheyya, vissajjento
atk-s0515a0:1135_4: evaṃ vissajjeyyā”ti; iti ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā ānīte pañhe dhammakathāya antare pakkhipitvā
atk-s0515a0:1135_5: dasseti. Te paṇḍitā “seyyā vata no, ye mayaṃ ime pañhe na pucchimhā. Sacepi mayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1135_6: puccheyyāma, appatiṭṭhite no katvā samaṇo gotamo khipeyyā”ti attamanā bhavanti.
atk-s0515a0:1136_0: Api ca buddhā nāma dhammaṃ desentā parisaṃ mettāya pharanti. Mettāpharaṇena dasabalesu
atk-s0515a0:1136_1: mahājanassa cittaṃ pasīdati. Buddhā nāma rūpaggappattā honti dassanasampannā madhurassarā
atk-s0515a0:1136_2: mudujivhā suphusitadantāvaraṇā, amatena hadayaṃ siñcantā viya dhammaṃ kathenti. Tatra
atk-s0515a0:1136_3: nesaṃ mettāpharaṇena pasannacittānaṃ evaṃ hoti – “evarūpaṃ advejjhakathaṃ amoghakathaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1136_4: niyyānikakathaṃ kathentena bhagavatā saddhiṃ na sakkhissāma paccanīkaggāhaṃ gaṇhitu”nti
atk-s0515a0:1137_0: Kathitā vissajjitā vāti “evaṃ tumhe pucchathā”ti apucchitapañhānaṃ uccāraṇena te
atk-s0515a0:1137_1: pañhā bhagavatā kathitā eva honti. Yathā ca te vissajjetabbā, tathā vissajjitā eva
atk-s0515a0:1137_2: honti. Niddiṭṭhakāraṇāti iminā kāraṇena iminā hetunā evaṃ hontīti evaṃ sahetukaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1137_3: katvā vissajjanena bhagavatā niddiṭṭhakāraṇā eva honti te pañhā. Upakkhittakā ca
atk-s0515a0:1137_4: te bhagavato sampajjantīti khattiyapaṇḍitādayo bhagavato pañhavissajjaneneva bhagavato
atk-s0515a0:1137_5: samīpe khittakā pakkhittakā sampajjanti; sāvakā vā sampajjanti, upāsakā vāti attho;
atk-s0515a0:1137_6: sāvakasampattiṃ vā pāpuṇanti, upāsakasampattiṃ vāti vuttaṃ hoti. Athāti anantaratthe,
atk-s0515a0:1137_7: tesaṃ upakkhittakasampattisamanantaramevāti attho. Tatthāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne, tasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1137_8: adhikāre vā. Atirocatīti ativiya jotati pakāsati. Yadidaṃ paññāyāti yāyaṃ bhagavato
atk-s0515a0:1137_9: paññā, tāya paññāya bhagavāva atirocatīti attho. Iti-saddo kāraṇattho, iminā kāraṇenāti
atk-s0515a0:1141_0: 70. Navame māgaṇḍiyasuttaniddese paṭhamagāthāya tāva ajapālanigrodhamūle nānārūpāni
atk-s0515a0:1141_1: nimminitvā abhikāmaṃ āgataṃ māradhītaraṃ disvāna taṇhaṃ aratiṃ ragañca chandamattampi
atk-s0515a0:1141_2: methunasmiṃ nāhosi, kimevidaṃ imissā dārikāya muttakarīsapuṇṇaṃ rūpaṃ disvā bhavissati,
atk-s0515a0:1141_3: sabbathā pādāpi naṃ samphusituṃ na icche, kutonena saṃvasitunti.
atk-s0515a0:1142_0: Muttapuṇṇanti āhārautuvasena vatthipuṭantaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitamuttena pūritaṃ. Karīsapuṇṇanti
atk-s0515a0:1142_2: antāvasāne ṭhitavaccena puṇṇaṃ. Semhapuṇṇanti udarapaṭale ṭhitaekapattappamāṇena
atk-s0515a0:1142_3: semhena pūritaṃ. Ruhirapuṇṇanti yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā hadayavakkapapphāsānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1142_4: upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharantena vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamānena ṭhitena
atk-s0515a0:1142_5: ekapattassa pūraṇamattena sannicitalohitasaṅkhātena ca kesalomanakhadantānaṃ maṃsavinimuttaṭṭhānañceva
atk-s0515a0:1142_6: thaddhasukkhacammañca ṭhapetvā dhamanījālānusārena sabbaṃ upādiṇṇakasarīraṃ pharitvā
atk-s0515a0:1143_0: Aṭṭhisaṅghātanti sakalasarīre heṭṭhā aṭṭhīnaṃ upariṭṭhitāni sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni,
atk-s0515a0:1143_1: tehi aṭṭhīhi ghaṭitaṃ. Nhārusambandhanti sakalasarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitāni
atk-s0515a0:1143_2: nava nhārusatāni, tehi nhārūhi sambandhaṃ ābandhaṃ. Rudhiramaṃsāvalepananti saṃsaraṇalohitena
atk-s0515a0:1143_3: ca sādhikāni tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpetvā ṭhitena navamaṃsapesisatena ca anulittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1143_4: sarīraṃ. Cammavinaddhanti sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā pākaṭakilomakassa upari chaviyā
atk-s0515a0:1143_5: heṭṭhā ṭhitaṃ cammaṃ, tena cammena vinaddhaṃ pariyonaddhaṃ. “Cammāvanaddha”ntipi
atk-s0515a0:1143_6: pāḷi. Chaviyā paṭicchannanti atisukhumachaviyā paṭicchannaṃ chādetvā ṭhitaṃ. Chiddāvachiddanti
atk-s0515a0:1143_7: anekachiddaṃ. Uggharantanti akkhimukhādīhi uggharantaṃ. Paggharantanti adhobhāgena
atk-s0515a0:1144_0: 71. Tato māgaṇḍiyo “pabbajitā nāma mānusake kāme pahāya dibbakāmatthāya pabbajanti,
atk-s0515a0:1144_1: ayañca dibbepi kāme na icchati, idampi itthiratanaṃ, kā nu assa diṭṭhī”ti pucchituṃ
atk-s0515a0:1144_2: dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. Tattha etādisaṃ ce ratananti dibbitthiratanaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati.
atk-s0515a0:1144_3: Nārinti attano dhītaraṃ sandhāya. Diṭṭhigataṃ sīlavataṃ nu jīvitanti diṭṭhiñca sīlañca
atk-s0515a0:1144_4: vatañca jīvitañca. Bhavūpapattiñca vadesi kīdisanti attano bhavūpapattiṃ vā tuvaṃ kīdisaṃ vadesi.
atk-s0515a0:1145_0: 72. Ito parā dve gāthā vissajjanapucchānayena pavattattā pākaṭasambandhāyeva. Tāsu
atk-s0515a0:1145_1: paṭhamagāthāya saṅkhepattho – tassa mayhaṃ māgaṇḍiya dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatadhammesu
atk-s0515a0:1145_2: nicchinitvā “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti evaṃ idaṃ vadāmīti samuggahītaṃ na hoti
atk-s0515a0:1145_3: natthi na vijjati, kiṃ kāraṇā? Ahañhi passanto diṭṭhīsu ādīnavaṃ kañci diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0515a0:1145_4: saccāni pavicinanto ajjhattaṃ rāgādīnaṃ santibhāvena ajjhattasantisaṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva addasanti.
atk-s0515a0:1146_0: Ādīnavanti upaddavaṃ. Sadukkhanti kāyikadukkhena sadukkhaṃ. Savighātanti cetasikadukkhena
atk-s0515a0:1146_1: sahitaṃ. Saupāyāsanti upāyāsasahitaṃ. Sapariḷāhanti sadarathaṃ. Na nibbidāyāti na
atk-s0515a0:1146_2: vaṭṭe nibbindanatthāya. Na virāgāyāti na vaṭṭe virāgatthāya. Na nirodhāyāti na vaṭṭassa
atk-s0515a0:1146_3: nirodhatthāya. Na upasamāyāti na vaṭṭassa upasamatthāya. Na abhiññāyāti na vaṭṭassa
atk-s0515a0:1146_4: abhijānanatthāya. Na sambodhāyāti na kilesaniddāvigamena vaṭṭato sambujjhanatthāya.
atk-s0515a0:1146_5: Na nibbānāyāti na amatanibbānatthāya. Ettha pana “nibbidāyā”ti vipassanā. “Virāgāyā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1146_7: nibbānameva. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanā, tīsu maggo, tīsu nibbānaṃ vuttanti evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1146_8: vavatthānakathā veditabbā. Pariyāyena pana sabbānipetāni maggavevacanānipi nibbānavevacanānipi hontiyeva.
atk-s0515a0:1147_0: Ajjhattaṃ rāgassa santinti ajjhattarāgassa santabhāvena nibbutabhāvena ajjhattasantisaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1147_1: nibbānaṃ olokesiṃ. Dosassa santintiādīsupi eseva nayo. Pacinanti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1147_2: Vicinantoti saccāni vaḍḍhento vibhāvento. Pavicinantoti tāneva paccekaṃ vibhāvento.
atk-s0515a0:1147_3: Keci “gavesanto”ti vaṇṇayanti. Adassanti olokesiṃ. Adakkhinti vinivijjhiṃ. Aphassinti
atk-s0515a0:1147_4: paññāya phusiṃ. Paṭivijjhinti ñāṇena paccakkhaṃ akāsiṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1148_0: 73. Dutiyagāthāya saṅkhepattho – yānimāni diṭṭhigatāni tehi tehi sattehi vinicchinitvā
atk-s0515a0:1148_1: gahitattā “vinicchayā”ti ca attano paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvādinā nayena “pakappitānī”ti
atk-s0515a0:1148_2: ca vuccanti, te ve munī diṭṭhigatadhamme aggahetvā ajjhattasantīti yametamatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1148_3: brūsi, ācikkha me, kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ taṃ kathaṃ pakāsitaṃ dhīrehīti vadati.
atk-s0515a0:1149: Imissā gāthāya niddeso uttānattho ṭhapetvā paramatthapadaṃ. Tattha yaṃ paramatthanti yaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1150_0: 74. Athassa bhagavā yathā yena upāyena taṃ padaṃ dhīrehi pakāsitaṃ, taṃ upāyaṃ sapaṭipakkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1150_1: dassento “na diṭṭhiyā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha na diṭṭhiyātiādīhi diṭṭhisutiaṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇabāhirasīlabbatāni
atk-s0515a0:1150_2: paṭikkhipati. “Suddhimāhā”ti ettha vuttaṃ āha-saddaṃ sabbattha nakārena saddhiṃ yojetvā
atk-s0515a0:1150_3: purimapadattayaṃ netvā “diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ nāha na kathemī”ti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1150_4: Yathā cettha, evaṃ uttarapadesupi. Tattha ca adiṭṭhiyā nāhāti dasavatthukaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1150_5: vinā na kathemi. Tathā assutiyāti navaṅgaṃ savanaṃ vinā. Añāṇāti kammassakatasaccānulomikañāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1150_6: vinā. Asīlatāti pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ vinā. Abbatāti dhutaṅgavataṃ vinā. Nopi tenāti
atk-s0515a0:1150_7: tesu ekamekena diṭṭhiādimattenāpi na kathemīti evamattho veditabbo. Ete ca nissajja
atk-s0515a0:1150_8: anuggahāyāti ete ca purimadiṭṭhiādibhede kaṇhapakkhike dhamme samugghātakaraṇena
atk-s0515a0:1150_9: nissajja, pacchime adiṭṭhiādibhede sukkapakkhikepi atammayatāpajjanena anuggahāya.
atk-s0515a0:1150_10: Santo anissāya bhavaṃ na jappeti imāya paṭipattiyā rāgādivūpasamena santo cakkhādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1150_11: kañci dhammaṃ anissāya ekampi bhavaṃ na jappe, apihetuṃ apatthetuṃ samattho siyā,
atk-s0515a0:1151_0: Savanampi icchitabbanti suttādivasena suṇanampi ākaṅkhitabbaṃ. Sambhārā ime dhammāti
atk-s0515a0:1151_1: sammādiṭṭhiādikā ime dhammā upakāraṭṭhena sambhārā honti. Kaṇhapakkhikānanti akusalapakkhe
atk-s0515a0:1151_2: bhavānaṃ. Samugghātato pahānaṃ icchitabbanti sammā hananato samucchedato pahānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1151_3: ākaṅkhitabbaṃ. Tedhātukesu kusalesu dhammesūti kāmarūpārūpasaṅkhātesu tebhūmakesu
atk-s0515a0:1152_0: 75. Evaṃ vutte vacanatthaṃ asallakkhento māgaṇḍiyo “no ce kirā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1152_1: diṭṭhādīni vuttanayāneva. Kaṇhapakkhikāniyeva pana sandhāya ubhayatrāpi āha. Āha-saddaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1152_2: pana “no ce”ti saddena yojetvā no ce kira āha no ce kira kathesīti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1152_3: Momūhanti atimūḷhaṃ, mohanaṃ vā. Paccentīti jānanti. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttāno.
atk-s0515a0:1153_0: 76. Athassa bhagavā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pucchaṃ paṭikkhipanto “diṭṭhiñca nissāyā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1153_1: gāthamāha. Tassattho – tvaṃ māgaṇḍiya diṭṭhiṃ nissāya punappunaṃ pucchamāno yāni
atk-s0515a0:1153_2: te diṭṭhigatāni samuggahitāni, tesveva samuggahītesu pamohaṃ āgato tvaṃ ito ca mayā
atk-s0515a0:1153_3: vuttaajjhattasantito paṭipattito dhammadesanato vā aṇumpi yuttasaññaṃ na passasi,
atk-s0515a0:1153_4: tena kāraṇena tvaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ momūhato passasīti.
atk-s0515a0:1154: Lagganaṃ nissāya laggananti diṭṭhilagganaṃ allīyitvā diṭṭhilagganaṃ. Bandhananti diṭṭhibandhanaṃ. Palibodhanti diṭṭhipalibodhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1155_0: Andhakāraṃ pakkhandosīti bahalandhakāraṃ paviṭṭhosi. Yuttasaññanti samaṇadhamme yuttasaññaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1155_1: Pattasaññanti samaṇadhamme paṭiladdhasaññaṃ. Lagganasaññanti sañjānitasaññaṃ. Kāraṇasaññanti
atk-s0515a0:1155_2: hetusaññaṃ. Ṭhānasaññanti kāraṇasaññaṃ. Na paṭilabhasīti na vindasi. Kuto ñāṇanti
atk-s0515a0:1155_3: maggañāṇaṃ pana kena kāraṇena labhissasi. Aniccaṃ vāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena pañcakkhandhā
atk-s0515a0:1155_4: aniccaṃ. Aniccasaññānulomaṃ vāti “pañcakkhandhā aniccā”ti uppannā saññā aniccasaññā,
atk-s0515a0:1155_5: tāya saññāya anulomaṃ appaṭikkūlaṃ aniccasaññānulomaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Vipassanāñāṇaṃ. Dvinnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1156_0: 77. Evaṃ samuggahitesu pamohena māgaṇḍiyassa vivādāpattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesu aññesu
atk-s0515a0:1156_1: ca dhammesu vigatappamohassa attano nibbivādataṃ dassento “samo visesī”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:1156_2: Tassattho – yo evaṃ tidhā mānena vā diṭṭhiyā vā puggalena vā maññati, so tena mānena
atk-s0515a0:1156_3: tāya vā diṭṭhiyā tena vā puggalena vivadeyya. Yo pana amhādiso imāsu tīsu vidhāsu
atk-s0515a0:1156_4: avikampamāno, samo visesīti na tassa hoti, na ca hīnoti pāṭhaseso. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttānova.
atk-s0515a0:1157_0: 78. Kiñca bhiyyo – “saccanti so”ti gāthā. Tassattho – so evarūpo pahīnamānadiṭṭhiko
atk-s0515a0:1157_1: “mādiso ‘bāhitapāpattā’dinā nayena brāhmaṇo, idameva sacca”nti kiṃ vadeyya kiṃ vatthuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1157_2: bhaṇeyya, kena vā kāraṇena bhaṇeyya, “mayhaṃ saccaṃ, tuyhaṃ musā”ti vā kena mānena
atk-s0515a0:1157_3: diṭṭhiyā puggalena vā vivadeyya. Yasmiṃ mādise khīṇāsave “sadisohamasmī”ti pavattiyā
atk-s0515a0:1157_4: samaṃ vā, itaradvayabhāvena pavattiyā visamaṃ vā maññitaṃ natthi, samānādīsu kena
atk-s0515a0:1157_5: vādaṃ paṭisaṃyujeyya paṭipphareyyāti. Imissāpi gāthāya niddeso uttāno.
atk-s0515a0:1158_0: 79. Nanu ekaṃseneva evarūpo puggalo? “Okaṃ pahāyā”ti gāthā. Tattha okaṃ pahāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1158_1: rūpadhātvādiviññāṇassokāsaṃ tatra chandarāgappahānena chaḍḍetvā. Aniketasārīti rūpanimittaniketādīni
atk-s0515a0:1158_2: taṇhāvasena asaranto. Gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavānīti gāme gihisanthavāni akaronto.
atk-s0515a0:1158_3: Kāmehi rittoti kāmesu chandarāgābhāvena sabbakāmehi puthubhūto. Apurakkharānoti āyatiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1158_4: attabhāvaṃ anabhinibbattento. Kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirāti janena saddhiṃ viggāhikakathaṃ na katheyya.
atk-s0515a0:1159_0: Hāliddakānīti evaṃnāmako gahapati. Yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe
atk-s0515a0:1159_1: karaṇavacanaṃ. Tasmā yattha mahākaccāno, tattha upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1159_2: Yena vā kāraṇena mahākaccāno devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo, tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti
atk-s0515a0:1159_3: evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Kena ca kāraṇena mahākaccāno upasaṅkamitabbo? Nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamādhippāyena,
atk-s0515a0:1159_4: sāduphalūpabhogādhippāyena dijagaṇehi niccaphalitamahārukkho viya. Upasaṅkamīti ca
atk-s0515a0:1159_5: gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. Upasaṅkamitvāti upasaṅkamanapariyosānadīpanaṃ. Atha vā evaṃ gato
atk-s0515a0:1159_6: tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ mahākaccānassa samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1160_0: Abhivādetvāti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā. Idāni yenatthena mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1160_1: āgato, taṃ pucchitukāmo dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0515a0:1160_2: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantanti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso “visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattantī”tiādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1160_3: viya. Tasmā yathā nisinno ekamantaṃ nisinno hoti, evaṃ nisīdīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1160_4: Bhummatthe vā etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Nisīdīti nisajjaṃ kappesi. Paṇḍitā hi devamanussā
atk-s0515a0:1160_5: garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ nisīdanti. Ayañca gahapati
atk-s0515a0:1161_0: Kathaṃ nisinno ca pana ekamantaṃ nisinno hotīti? Cha nisajjadose vajjetvā. Seyyathidaṃ?
atk-s0515a0:1161_1: Atidūraṃ accāsannaṃ uparivātaṃ unnatappadesaṃ atisammukhaṃ atipacchāti. Atidūre nisinno
atk-s0515a0:1161_2: hi sace kathetukāmo hoti, uccāsaddena kathetabbaṃ hoti. Accāsanne nisinno saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1161_3: karoti. Uparivāte nisinno sarīragandhena bādhati. Unnatappadese nisinno agāravaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1161_4: pakāseti. Atisammukhā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, cakkhunā cakkhuṃ āhacca daṭṭhabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1161_5: hoti. Atipacchā nisinno sace daṭṭhukāmo hoti, gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhabbaṃ hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0515a0:1161_6: ayampi ete cha nisajjadose vajjetvā nisīdi. Tena vuttaṃ – “ekamantaṃ nisīdī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1162: Etadavocāti etaṃ avoca. Vuttamidaṃ bhante kaccāna bhagavatā aṭṭhakavaggiye māgaṇḍiyapañheti aṭṭhakavaggiyamhi māgaṇḍiyapañho nāma atthi, tasmiṃ pañhe.
atk-s0515a0:1163_0: Rūpadhātūti rūpakkhandho adhippeto. Rūpadhāturāgavinibandhanti rūpadhātumhi rāgena
atk-s0515a0:1163_1: vinibaddhaṃ. Viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ. Okasārīti gehasārī ālayasārī. Kasmā panettha
atk-s0515a0:1163_2: “viññāṇadhātu kho gahapatī”ti na vuttanti? Sammohavighātatthaṃ. “Oko”ti hi atthato
atk-s0515a0:1163_3: paccayo vuccati, purejātañca kammaviññāṇaṃ pacchājātassa kammaviññāṇassapi vipākaviññāṇassapi,
atk-s0515a0:1163_4: vipākaviññāṇañca vipākaviññāṇassapi kammaviññāṇassapi paccayo hoti, tasmā “kataraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1163_5: nu kho idha viññāṇa”nti sammoho bhaveyya. Tassa vighātatthaṃ taṃ aggahetvā asambhinnāva
atk-s0515a0:1163_6: desanā katāti. Apica vipākaārammaṇavasena catasso abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṭṭhitiyoti vuttāti
atk-s0515a0:1163_7: tā dassetumpi idha viññāṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1164_0: Upayupādānāti taṇhūpayadiṭṭhūpayavasena dve upayā, kāmupādānādīni cattāri upādānāni
atk-s0515a0:1164_1: ca. Cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayāti akusalacittassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtā ceva abhinivesabhūtā
atk-s0515a0:1164_2: ca anusayabhūtā ca. Tathāgatassāti sammāsambuddhassa. Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1164_3: ete pahīnāva, satthu pana khīṇāsavabhāvo loke atipākaṭoti uparimakoṭiyā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1164_4: Viññāṇadhātuyāti idha viññāṇaṃ kasmā gahitaṃ? Kilesappahānadassanatthaṃ. Kilesā hi
atk-s0515a0:1164_5: na kevalaṃ catūsuyeva khandhesu pahīnā pahīyanti, pañcasupi pahīyantiyevāti kilesappahānadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1164_6: gahitaṃ. Evaṃ kho gahapati anokasārī hotīti evaṃ kammaviññāṇena okaṃ asarantena anokasārī nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1165_0: Rūpanimittaniketavisāravinibandhāti rūpameva kilesānaṃ paccayaṭṭhena nimittaṃ, ārammaṇakiriyasaṅkhātena
atk-s0515a0:1165_1: nivāsaṭṭhena niketanti rūpanimittaniketaṃ. Visāro ca vinibandho ca visāravinibandhā.
atk-s0515a0:1165_2: Ubhayenapi hi kilesānaṃ patthaṭabhāvo ca vinibandhanabhāvo ca vutto, rūpanimittanikete
atk-s0515a0:1165_4: uppannena kilesavisārena ceva kilesavinibandhanena cāti attho. Niketasārīti vuccatīti
atk-s0515a0:1165_5: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena niketasārīti vuccati. Pahīnāti te rūpanimittanikete
atk-s0515a0:1166_0: Kasmā panettha pañcakkhandhā ca “okā”ti vuttā, cha ārammaṇāni “niketa”nti? Chandarāgassa
atk-s0515a0:1166_1: balavadubbalatāya. Samānepi hi etesaṃ ālayaṭṭhena visayabhāve okoti nippariyāyena
atk-s0515a0:1166_2: suddhaṃ gehameva vuccati, niketanti “ajja asukaṭṭhāne kīḷissāmā”ti katasaṅketānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1166_3: nivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ uyyānādi. Tattha yathā puttadāradhanadhaññapuṇṇagehe chandarāgo balavā
atk-s0515a0:1166_4: hoti, evaṃ ajjhattikesu khandhesu. Yathā pana uyyānaṭṭhānādīsu tato dubbalataro hoti,
atk-s0515a0:1166_5: evaṃ bāhiresu chasu ārammaṇesūti chandarāgassa balavadubbalatāya evaṃ desanā katāti veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:1167_0: Sukhitesu sukhitoti upaṭṭhākesu dhanadhaññalābhādivasena sukhitesu “idānāhaṃ manāpaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1167_1: cīvaraṃ manāpaṃ bhojanaṃ labhissāmī”ti gehassitasukhena sukhito hoti, tehi pattasampattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1167_2: attanā anubhavamāno viya carati. Dukkhitesu dukkhitoti tesaṃ kenacideva kāraṇena
atk-s0515a0:1167_3: dukkhe uppanne sayaṃ dviguṇena dukkhena dukkhito hoti. Kiccakaraṇīyesūti kiccasaṅkhātesu
atk-s0515a0:1167_4: karaṇīyesu. Voyogaṃ āpajjatīti upayogaṃ sayaṃ tesaṃ kiccānaṃ kattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0515a0:1168: Kāmesūti vatthukāmesu. Evaṃ kho gahapati kāmehi aritto hotīti evaṃ kilesakāmehi aritto hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1169: Anto kāmānaṃ bhāvena atuccho. Sukkapakkho tesaṃ abhāvena ritto tucchoti veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1170_0: Purakkharānoti vaṭṭaṃ purato kurumāno. Evaṃrūpo siyantiādīsu dīgharassakāḷodātādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1170_1: rūpesu evaṃrūpo nāma bhaveyyanti pattheti. Sukhādīsu vedanāsu evaṃvedano nāma. Nīlasaññādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1170_2: saññāsu evaṃsañño nāma. Puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu saṅkhāresu evaṃsaṅkhāro nāma. Cakkhuviññāṇādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1171_0: Apurakkharānoti vaṭṭaṃ purato akurumāno. Sahitaṃ me, asahitaṃ teti tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1171_1: asahitaṃ asiliṭṭhaṃ, mayhaṃ sahitaṃ siliṭṭhaṃ madhuraṃ madhurapānasadisaṃ. Adhiciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1171_2: te viparāvattanti yaṃ tuyhaṃ dīghena kālena paricitaṃ suppaguṇaṃ, taṃ mama vādaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1171_3: āgamma sabbaṃ khaṇena viparāvattaṃ nivattaṃ. Āropito te vādoti tuyhaṃ doso mayā āropito.
atk-s0515a0:1171_4: Cara vādappamokkhāyāti taṃ taṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā uttaraṃ pariyesanto imassa
atk-s0515a0:1171_5: vādassa mokkhāya cara āhiṇḍa. Nibbeṭhehi vā sace pahosīti atha sayameva pahosi, idheva nibbeṭhehīti.
atk-s0515a0:1172_0: 80. So evarūpo “yehi vivitto”ti gāthā. Tattha yehīti yehi diṭṭhigatādīhi. Vivitto
atk-s0515a0:1172_1: vicareyyāti ritto careyya. Na tāni uggayha vadeyya nāgoti “āguṃ na karotī”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:1172_2: nayena nāgo tāni diṭṭhigatāni uggahetvā na careyya. Elambujanti elasaññite ambumhi
atk-s0515a0:1172_3: jātaṃ kaṇṭakanāḷaṃ vārijaṃ, padumanti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā jalena paṅkena canūpalittanti
atk-s0515a0:1172_4: taṃ padumaṃ yathā jalena ca paṅkena ca anupalittaṃ hoti. Evaṃ muni santivādo agiddhoti
atk-s0515a0:1172_5: evaṃ ajjhattasantivādo muni gedhābhāvena agiddho. Kāme ca loke ca anūpalittoti duvidhepi
atk-s0515a0:1172_6: kāme apāyādike ca loke dvīhi silesehi anupalitto hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1173_0: Āguṃ na karotīti akusalādidosaṃ na karoti. Na gacchatīti agativasena na gacchati.
atk-s0515a0:1173_1: Nāgacchatīti pahīnakilese na upeti. Pāpakāti lāmakā. Akusalāti akosallasambhūtā.
atk-s0515a0:1173_2: Te kilese na punetīti ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese puna na eti. Na paccetīti paṭi
atk-s0515a0:1173_3: na upeti. Na paccāgacchatīti puna na nivattati.
atk-s0515a0:1174_0: Kharadaṇḍoti kharapattadaṇḍo pharusadaṇḍo. Cattagedhoti vissaṭṭhagedho. Vantagedhoti
atk-s0515a0:1174_1: vamitagedho. Muttagedhoti chinnabandhanagedho. Pahīnagedhoti pajahitagedho. Paṭinissaṭṭhagedhoti
atk-s0515a0:1174_2: yathā na puna cittaṃ āruhati, evaṃ paṭivissajjitagedho. Upari vītarāgādīsupi eseva
atk-s0515a0:1175_0: 81. Kiñca bhiyyo – “na vedagū”ti gāthā. Tattha na vedagū diṭṭhiyāyakoti catumaggavedagū
atk-s0515a0:1175_1: mādiso diṭṭhiyāyako na hoti, diṭṭhiyā gacchanto vā, taṃ sārato paccento vā na hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1175_2: Tattha vacanattho – yāyatīti yāyako. Karaṇavacanena diṭṭhiyā yāyatīti diṭṭhiyāyako.
atk-s0515a0:1175_3: Upayogatthe sāmivacanenapi diṭṭhiyā yātītipi diṭṭhiyāyako. Na mutiyā sa mānametīti
atk-s0515a0:1175_4: mutarūpādibhedāya mutiyāpi so mānaṃ na eti. Na hi tammayo soti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0515a0:1175_5: tammayo hoti tapparāyaṇo, ayaṃ pana na tādiso. Na kammunā nopi sutena neyyoti puññābhisaṅkhārādinā
atk-s0515a0:1175_6: kammunā vā, sutasuddhiādinā sutena vā so netabbo na hoti. Anūpanīto sa nivesanesūti
atk-s0515a0:1175_7: so dvinnampi upayānaṃ pahīnattā sabbesu taṇhādiṭṭhinivesanesu anupanīto.
atk-s0515a0:1176: Mutarūpena vāti ettha mutarūpaṃ nāma gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāni. Mānaṃ netīti asmimānaṃ na eti. Na upetīti samīpaṃ na eti. Na upagacchatīti upagantvā na tiṭṭhati. Tammayoti tappakato.
atk-s0515a0:1177_0: 82. Tassa ca evaṃvidhassa “saññāvirattassā”ti gāthā. Tattha saññāvirattassāti nekkhammasaññāpubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0515a0:1177_1: bhāvanāya pahīnakāmādisaññassa. Iminā padena ubhatobhāgavimutto samathayāniko adhippeto.
atk-s0515a0:1177_2: Paññāvimuttassāti vipassanāpubbaṅgamāya bhāvanāya sabbakilesehi vimuttassa. Iminā
atk-s0515a0:1177_3: sukkhavipassako adhippeto. Saññañca diṭṭhiñca ye aggahesuṃ, te ghaṭṭamānā vicaranti
atk-s0515a0:1177_4: loketi ye pana kāmasaññādikaṃ saññaṃ aggahesuṃ, te visesato gahaṭṭhā kāmādhikaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1177_5: ye ca diṭṭhiṃ aggahesuṃ, te visesato pabbajitā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭentā vicarantīti.
atk-s0515a0:1178_0: Yo samathapubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetīti yo puggalo samathapubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1178_1: katvā sahavipassanaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti, paṭhamaṃ samādhiṃ uppādetvā pacchā sahavipassanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1178_2: ariyamaggaṃ uppādetīti attho. Tassa āditoti tassa puggalassa paṭhamajjhānādito. Upādāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1178_3: paṭicca āgamma. Ganthā vikkhambhītā hontīti ganthā dūrīkatā bhavanti. Arahatte patteti
atk-s0515a0:1178_4: arahattaphalaṃ patte. Arahatoti arahattaphale ṭhitassa. Ganthā ca mohā cātiādayo
atk-s0515a0:1179_0: Yo vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṃ ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetīti yo puggalo vipassanaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1179_1: katvā ariyamaggaṃ bhāveti, paṭhamaṃ vipassanaṃ uppādetvā pacchā ariyamaggasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1179_2: samādhiṃ bhāvetīti attho. Tassa ādito upādāyāti tassa puggalassa vipassanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0515a0:1179_3: vipassanaṃ paṭicca. Mohā vikkhambhitā hontīti ettha vikkhambhitāti dūraṃ pāpitā saññāvasena.
atk-s0515a0:1179_4: Ghaṭṭentīti ye kāmasaññādiṃ gaṇhanti, te saññāvasena pīḷenti. Saṅghaṭṭentīti tato
atk-s0515a0:1179_5: tato pīḷenti. Idāni ghaṭṭente dassetuṃ “rājānopi rājūhi vivadantī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0515a0:1179_6: vitthāro vutto. Aññamaññaṃ pāṇīhipi upakkamantīti ettha aññamaññaṃ hatthehi paharanti.
atk-s0515a0:1179_7: Leḍḍūhīti kapālakhaṇḍehi. Daṇḍehīti aḍḍhadaṇḍakehi. Satthehīti ubhatodhārehi satthehi.
atk-s0515a0:1180_0: Abhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnattāti puññādiabhisaṅkhārānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. Gatiyā ghaṭṭentīti
atk-s0515a0:1180_1: gantabbāya patiṭṭhābhūtāya gatiyā pīḷenti ghaṭṭanaṃ āpajjanti. Nirayādīsupi eseva
atk-s0515a0:1184_0: 83. Dasame purābhedasuttaniddese kathaṃdassīti imassa suttassa ito paresañca pañcannaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1184_2: vuttanayeneva sāmaññato uppatti veditabbā. Visesato pana yatheva tasmiṃ mahāsamaye
atk-s0515a0:1184_3: rāgacaritadevatānaṃ sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desetuṃ nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā
atk-s0515a0:1184_4: sammāparibbājanīyasuttanta- mabhāsi, evaṃ tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye “kiṃ nu kho purā
atk-s0515a0:1184_5: sarīrabhedā kattabba”nti uppannacittānaṃ devatānaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ anuggahatthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1184_6: aḍḍhateḷasabhikkhusataparivāraṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ ākāsena ānetvā tena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
atk-s0515a0:1185_0: Kathaṃ? Buddhā nāma mahantā ete sattavisesā, yaṃ sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_1: mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā na kiñci katthaci nīlādivasena
atk-s0515a0:1185_3: saddādiārammaṇaṃ vā atthi, yaṃ etesaṃ ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ nāgacchati. Yathāha – “yaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1185_4: bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa…pe… sadevamanussāya diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_5: pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā, tamahaṃ jānāmi tamahaṃ abbhaññāsi”nti. Evaṃ sabbattha
atk-s0515a0:1185_6: appaṭihatañāṇo bhagavā sabbāpi tā devatā bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi. “Kammāvaraṇena
atk-s0515a0:1185_7: vā samannāgatā”tiādinā hi nayena vuttā sattā abhabbā nāma. Te ekavihāre vasantepi
atk-s0515a0:1185_8: buddhā na olokenti. Viparītā pana bhabbā nāma. Te dūre vasantepi gantvā saṅgaṇhanti.
atk-s0515a0:1185_9: Tasmiṃ devatāsannipāte ye abhabbā, te pahāya bhabbe pariggahesi. Pariggahetvā “ettakā
atk-s0515a0:1185_10: ettha rāgacaritā, ettakā dosādicaritā”ti cariyavasena cha koṭṭhāse akāsi. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_12: kathessāmi, dosacaritānaṃ kalahavivādasuttaṃ, mohacaritānaṃ mahābyūhasuttaṃ, vitakkacaritānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_14: kathessāmī”ti desanaṃ vavatthāpetvā puna taṃ parisaṃ manasākāsi “attajjhāsayena nu
atk-s0515a0:1185_15: kho jāneyya, parajjhāsayena, aṭṭhuppattikena, pucchāvasenā”ti. Tato “pucchāvasena
atk-s0515a0:1185_16: jāneyyā”ti ñatvā “atthi nu kho koci devatānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā cariyavasena pañhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_17: pucchituṃ samattho”ti “tesu pañcasatesu bhikkhūsu ekopi na sakkotī”ti addasa. Tato
atk-s0515a0:1185_18: asītimahāsāvake, dve aggasāvake ca samannāharitvā “tepi na sakkontī”ti disvā cintesi
atk-s0515a0:1185_19: – “sace paccekabuddho bhaveyya, sakkuṇeyya nu kho”ti. “Sopi na sakkuṇeyyo”ti ñatvā
atk-s0515a0:1185_20: “sakkasuyāmādīsu koci sakkuṇeyyā”ti samannāhari. Sace hi tesu koci sakkuṇeyya, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_21: pucchāpetvā attanā vissajjeyya. Na pana tesupi koci sakkoti. Athassa etadahosi –
atk-s0515a0:1185_22: “mādiso buddhoyeva sakkuṇeyya, atthi pana katthaci añño buddho”ti anantāsu lokadhātūsu
atk-s0515a0:1185_23: anantañāṇaṃ pattharitvā lokaṃ olokento na aññaṃ buddhaṃ addasa. Anacchariyañcetaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1185_24: idāni attanā samaṃ na passeyya, yo jātadivasepi brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena
atk-s0515a0:1185_25: attanā samaṃ apassanto “aggohamasmi lokassā”ti appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_26: aññaṃ attanā samaṃ apassitvā cintesi “sace ahaṃ pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_27: tā devatā na sakkhissanti paṭivijjhituṃ. Aññasmiṃ pana buddheyeva pucchante mayi
atk-s0515a0:1185_28: ca vissajjante accherakaṃ bhavissati, sakkhissanti ca devatā paṭivijjhituṃ, tasmā
atk-s0515a0:1185_29: nimmitabuddhaṃ māpessāmī”ti abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “pattacīvaraggahaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1185_30: ālokitaṃ vilokitaṃ samiñjitaṃ pasāritañca mama sadisaṃyeva hotū”ti kāmāvacaracittehi
atk-s0515a0:1185_32: nikkhamanto viya āgacchatū”ti rūpāvacaracittena adhiṭṭhāsi. Devasaṅgho taṃ disvā
atk-s0515a0:1185_33: “aññopi nu kho bho, cando uggato”ti āha. Atha candaṃ ohāya āsannatare jāte “na cando,
atk-s0515a0:1185_34: sūriyo uggato”ti. Puna āsannatare jāte “na sūriyo, devavimānaṃ eta”nti. Puna āsannatare
atk-s0515a0:1185_35: jāte “na devavimānaṃ, devaputto eso”ti. Puna āsannatare jāte “na devaputto, mahābrahmā
atk-s0515a0:1185_36: eso”ti. Puna āsannatare jāte “na mahābrahmā, aparopi bho buddho āgato”ti āha.
atk-s0515a0:1186_0: Tattha puthujjanadevatā cintayiṃsu – “ekabuddhassa tāva ayaṃ devatāsannipāto. Dvinnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1186_1: kīvamahanto bhavissatī”ti. Ariyadevatā cintayiṃsu – “ekissā lokadhātuyā dve buddhā
atk-s0515a0:1186_2: nāma natthi, addhā bhagavā attanā sadisaṃ aññaṃ ekaṃ buddhaṃ nimminī”ti. Athassa
atk-s0515a0:1186_3: devasaṅghassa passantasseva nimmitabuddho āgantvā dasabalaṃ avanditvāva sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0515a0:1186_4: samasamaṃ katvā māpite āsane nisīdi. Bhagavato bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāni, nimmitassāpi,
atk-s0515a0:1186_5: bhagavato sarīrā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamanti, nimmitassāpi, bhagavato sarīrarasmiyo
atk-s0515a0:1186_6: nimmitasarīre paṭihaññanti, nimmitassa rasmiyo bhagavato kāye paṭihaññanti. Tā dvinnampi
atk-s0515a0:1186_7: buddhānaṃ sarīrato uggamma bhavaggaṃ āhacca tato tato paṭinivattitvā devatānaṃ matthakamatthakapariyantena
atk-s0515a0:1186_9: cetiyagharaṃ virocittha. Dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā ekacakkavāḷe rāsibhūtā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1186_10: buddhānaṃ rasmiabbhantaraṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Nimmito nisīdantoyeva “kathaṃdassī
atk-s0515a0:1186_11: kathaṃsīlo, upasantoti vuccatī”tiādinā nayena adhipaññādikaṃ pucchanto gāthamāha.
atk-s0515a0:1187: Tattha pucchāya tāva so nimmito kathaṃdassīti adhipaññaṃ, kathaṃsīloti adhisīlaṃ, upasantoti adhicittaṃ pucchati. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
atk-s0515a0:1190: Na jīvati na nibbuto na mato, taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhā. ;
atk-s0515a0:1191: “Saṃsārakhīṇo na ca vantarāgo, na cāpi sekkho na ca diṭṭhadhammo;
atk-s0515a0:1192: Akhīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī, taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhā.
atk-s0515a0:1193: “Na dukkhasaccena samaṅgibhūto, na maggasaccena kuto nirodho;
atk-s0515a0:1194: Samudayasaccato suvidūravidūro, taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhā.
atk-s0515a0:1195: “Ahetuko nopi ca rūpanissito, apaccayo nopi ca so asaṅkhato;
atk-s0515a0:1196: Asaṅkhatārammaṇo nopi ca rūpī, taṃ puggalaṃ katamaṃ vadanti buddhā”ti. –
atk-s0515a0:1198_0: Tattha paṭhamagāthā nimmitabuddhaṃ sandhāya, dutiyagāthā pacchimabhavikabodhisattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1198_1: sandhāya, tatiyagāthā arahattaphalaṭṭhaṃ sandhāya, catutthagāthā arūpe nibbānapaccavekkhaṇamanodvārapurecārikacittasamaṅgiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1198_2: sandhāya vuttāti ñātabbā. Kīdisena dassanenāti kīdisavasena dassanena. Kiṃsaṇṭhitenāti
atk-s0515a0:1199_0: Yaṃ pucchāmīti yaṃ puggalaṃ pucchāmi, taṃ mayhaṃ viyākarohi. Yācāmīti āyācāmi. Ajjhesāmīti
atk-s0515a0:1199_1: āṇāpemi. Pasādemīti tava santāne somanassaṃ uppādemi. Brūhīti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1199_2: Ācikkhāti desetabbānaṃ “imāni nāmānī”ti nāmavasena kathehi. Desehīti dassehi. Paññapehīti
atk-s0515a0:1199_3: jānāpehi. Ñāṇamukhavasena hi appanaṃ ṭhapento “paññapehī”ti vuccati. Paṭṭhapehīti
atk-s0515a0:1199_4: paññāpehi, pavattāpehīti attho. Ñāṇamukhe ṭhapehīti vā. Vivarāti vivaṭaṃ karohi,
atk-s0515a0:1199_5: vivaritvā dassehīti attho. Vibhajāti vibhāgakiriyāya vibhāvento dassehīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1200_0: Atha vā ācikkhāti desanādīnaṃ channaṃ padānaṃ mūlapadaṃ. Desanādīni cha padāni etassa
atk-s0515a0:1200_1: atthassa vivaraṇatthaṃ vuttāni. Tattha desehīti ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ vasena saṅkhepato
atk-s0515a0:1200_2: paṭhamaṃ uddesavasena desehi. Ugghaṭitaññū hi saṅkhepena vuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttañca
atk-s0515a0:1200_3: paṭivijjhanti. Paññapehīti vipañcitaññūnaṃ vasena tesaṃ cittatosanena buddhinisānena
atk-s0515a0:1200_4: ca paṭhamaṃ saṃkhittassa vitthārato niddesavaseneva paññapehi. Paṭṭhapehīti tesaṃyeva
atk-s0515a0:1200_5: niddiṭṭhassa niddesassa paṭiniddesavasena vitthāritavasena ṭhapeti paṭṭhapehi. Vivarāti
atk-s0515a0:1200_6: niddiṭṭhassapi punappunaṃ vacanena vivarāhi. Vibhajāti punappunaṃ vuttassāpi vibhāgakaraṇena
atk-s0515a0:1200_7: vibhajāhi. Uttānīkarohīti vivaṭassa vitthārataravacanena vibhattassa ca nidassanavacanena
atk-s0515a0:1200_8: uttāniṃ karohi. Ayaṃ desanā neyyānampi paṭivedhāya hotīti.
atk-s0515a0:1201_0: 84. Vissajjane pana bhagavā sarūpena adhipaññādīni avissajjetvāva adhipaññādippabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:1201_1: yesaṃ kilesānaṃ upasamā “upasanto”ti vuccati, nānādevatānaṃ āsayānulomena tesaṃ upasamameva
atk-s0515a0:1201_2: dīpento “vītataṇho”tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi. Tattha ādito aṭṭhannaṃ gāthānaṃ “taṃ brūmi
atk-s0515a0:1201_3: upasanto”ti imāya gāthāya sambandho veditabbo, tato parāsaṃ “sa ve santoti vuccatī”ti
atk-s0515a0:1202_0: Anupadavaṇṇanānayo – vītataṇho purābhedāti yo sarīrabhedā pubbameva pahīnataṇho.
atk-s0515a0:1202_1: Pubbamantamanissitoti atītaddhādibhedaṃ pubbaantaṃ anissito. Vemajjhe nupasaṅkheyyoti
atk-s0515a0:1202_2: paccuppannepi addhani “ratto”tiādinā nayena na upasaṅkhātabbo. Tassa natthi purakkhatanti
atk-s0515a0:1202_3: tassa arahato dvinnaṃ purekkhārānaṃ abhāvā anāgate addhani purakkhatamapi natthi,
atk-s0515a0:1202_4: taṃ brūmi upasantoti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0515a0:1203_0: Purā kāyassa bhedāti karajakāyassa bhedato pubbeyeva. Attabhāvassāti sakalattabhāvassa.
atk-s0515a0:1203_1: Kaḷevarassa nikkhepāti kaḷevarassa nikkhepato sarīrassa ṭhapanato. Jīvitindriyassa
atk-s0515a0:1204: Pubbanto vuccati atīto addhāti pubbasaṅkhāto anto koṭṭhāso “atīto addhāti, atikkanto kālo”ti kathīyati. Atītaṃ addhānaṃ ārabbhāti atītakālaṃ paṭicca taṇhā pahīnā.
atk-s0515a0:1205_0: Aparampi bhaddekarattapariyāyaṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha. Tattha evaṃrūpo ahosinti
atk-s0515a0:1205_1: kāḷopi samāno indanīlamaṇivaṇṇo ahosinti evaṃ manuññarūpavaseneva evaṃrūpo ahosiṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1205_2: Kusalasukhasomanassavedanāvaseneva evaṃvedano. Taṃ sampayuttānaṃyeva saññādīnaṃ vasena
atk-s0515a0:1205_3: evaṃsañño. Evaṃsaṅkhāro. Evaṃviññāṇo ahosiṃ atītamaddhānanti tattha nandiṃ na samannānetīti
atk-s0515a0:1205_4: tesu rūpādīsu taṇhaṃ vā taṇhāsampayuttadiṭṭhiṃ vā nānupavattayati. Aparena pariyāyena
atk-s0515a0:1205_5: mahākaccānabhaddekarattapariyāyaṃ dassento “atha vā iti me cakkhu ahosī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:1205_6: Tattha cakkhūti cakkhupasādo. Rūpāti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpā. Iminā nayena sesāyatanānipi
atk-s0515a0:1205_7: veditabbāni. Viññāṇanti nissayaviññāṇaṃ. Na tadabhinandatīti taṃ cakkhuñceva rūpañca
atk-s0515a0:1205_8: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena nābhinandati. Iti me mano ahosi iti dhammāti ettha pana manoti
atk-s0515a0:1205_10: vācālapitañca kāyakīḷādikīḷitañcāti hasitalapitakīḷitāni. Na tadassādetīti tāni hasitādīni
atk-s0515a0:1205_11: nābhinandati. Na taṃ nikāmetīti kantaṃ na karoti. Na ca tena vittiṃ āpajjatīti tena
atk-s0515a0:1206_0: Taṃ taṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca uppannoti paccuppanno. Rattoti nupasaṅkheyyoti rāgena rattoti
atk-s0515a0:1206_1: gaṇanaṃ na upanetabbo. Uparipi eseva nayo. Evarūpo siyantiādīsu paṇītamanuññarūpādivaseneva
atk-s0515a0:1206_2: taṇhādiṭṭhipavattanasaṅkhātā nandī samannānayanā veditabbā. Na paṇidahatīti patthanāvasena
atk-s0515a0:1207_0: 85. Asantāsīti tena tena alābhato asantasanto. Avikatthīti sīlādīhi avikatthanasīlo.
atk-s0515a0:1207_1: Akukkucoti hatthakukkuccādivirahito. Mantabhāṇīti mantāya pariggahetvā vācaṃ bhāsitā.
atk-s0515a0:1207_2: Anuddhatoti uddhaccavirahito. Sa ve vācāyatoti so vācāya yato saṃyato catudosavirahitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1208_0: Akkodhanoti yañhi kho vuttanti “na kodhano akodhano kodhavirahito”ti yaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1208_1: taṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva kodhaṃ kathetukāmo “apica kodho tāva vattabbo”ti āha. Kodho tāva
atk-s0515a0:1208_2: vattabboti paṭhamaṃ kodho kathetabbo. Dasahākārehi kodho jāyatīti dasahi kāraṇehi
atk-s0515a0:1208_3: kodho uppajjati. Anatthaṃ me acarīti avaḍḍhiṃ me akāsi, iminā upāyena sabbapadesu
atk-s0515a0:1208_4: attho veditabbo. Aṭṭhāne vā pana kodho jāyatīti akāraṇe kodho uppajjati. Ekacco hi
atk-s0515a0:1208_5: “devo ativassatī”ti kuppati, “na vassatī”ti kuppati, “sūriyo tappatī”ti kuppati,
atk-s0515a0:1208_6: “na tappatī”ti kuppati, vāte vāyantepi kuppati, avāyantepi kuppati, sammajjituṃ asakkonto
atk-s0515a0:1208_7: bodhipaṇṇānaṃ kuppati, cīvaraṃ pārupituṃ asakkonto vātassa kuppati, upakkhalitvā
atk-s0515a0:1208_8: khāṇukassa kuppati. Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “aṭṭhāne vā pana kodho jāyatī”ti. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1208_9: heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte ārabbha uppannattā kammapathabhedo hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1209_0: Aṭṭhānaghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ na karoti. Cittaṃ āghātento
atk-s0515a0:1209_1: uppannoti cittassa āghāto. Tato balavataro paṭighāto. Paṭihaññanavasena paṭighaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1209_2: Paṭivirujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Kuppanavasena kopo. Pakopo sampakopoti upasaggavasena
atk-s0515a0:1209_3: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dussanavasena doso. Padoso sampadosoti upasaggavasena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1209_4: Cittassa byāpattīti cittassa vipannatā viparivattanākāro. Manaṃ padūsayamāno uppajjatīti
atk-s0515a0:1209_5: manopadoso. Kujjhanavasena kodho. Kujjhanākāro kujjhanā. Kujjhitassa bhāvo kujjhitattaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1209_6: Dussatīti doso. Dussanāti dussanākāro. Dussitattanti dussitabhāvo. Pakatibhāvavijahanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1209_7: byāpajjanaṃ byāpatti. Byāpajjanāti byāpajjanākāro. Virujjhatīti virodho. Punappunaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1209_8: virujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Viruddhākārapaṭiviruddhākāravasena vā idaṃ vuttaṃ. Caṇḍiko
atk-s0515a0:1209_9: vuccati caṇḍo, thaddhapuggalo, tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ. Na etena suropitaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1209_10: hoti, duruttaṃ aparipuṇṇameva hotīti asuropo. Kuddhakāle hi paripuṇṇavacanaṃ nāma
atk-s0515a0:1209_11: natthi, sacepi kassaci hoti, taṃ appamāṇaṃ. Apare pana “assujananaṭṭhena assuropanato
atk-s0515a0:1209_12: assuropo”ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ somanassassāpi assujananato. Heṭṭhāvuttaattamanatāpaṭipakkhato
atk-s0515a0:1209_13: na attamanatāti anattamanatā. Sā pana yasmā cittasseva, na sattassa, tasmā “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1210_0: Adhimattaparittatā veditabbāti adhimattabhāvo parittabhāvo ca, balavabhāvo mandabhāvoti
atk-s0515a0:1210_1: attho. Kañci kāleti ekadā. “Kañci kāla”ntipi pāṭho. Cittāvilakaraṇamatto hotīti cittassa
atk-s0515a0:1210_3: pāṭho, taṃ na sundaraṃ. Tassa cittakilamathakaraṇamattoti attho. Na ca tāva mukhakulānavikulāno
atk-s0515a0:1210_4: hotīti mukhassa saṅkocanavisaṅkocano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva hanusañcopano hotīti
atk-s0515a0:1210_5: dvinnaṃ hanūnaṃ aparāparaṃ calano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva pharusavācaṃ nicchāraṇo
atk-s0515a0:1210_6: hotīti paresaṃ mammacchedakaṃ pharusavācaṃ mukhato nīharaṇena bahi nikkhamano na
atk-s0515a0:1210_7: ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva disāvidisānuvilokano hotīti parassa abbhukkiraṇatthaṃ daṇḍādiatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1210_8: disañca anudisañca punappunaṃ vilokano na ca tāva hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1211_0: Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaparāmasano hotīti āghātanatthaṃ daṇḍañca ekatodhārādisatthañca
atk-s0515a0:1211_1: ādiyano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaabbhukkiraṇo hotīti vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1211_2: daṇḍasatthaṃ ukkhipitvā paharaṇo na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva daṇḍasatthaabhinipātano
atk-s0515a0:1211_3: hotīti etaṃ duvidhaṃ parassa paharaṇatthaṃ na ca tāva khipano hoti. Na ca tāva chinnavicchinnakaraṇo
atk-s0515a0:1211_4: hotīti daṇḍasatthādikhipanena parasarīraṃ dvidhākaraṇo ca vividhākārena vaṇakaraṇo
atk-s0515a0:1211_5: ca na tāva hoti. “Chiddavicchiddakaraṇo”tipi pāṭho. Na ca tāva sambhañjanapalibhañjano
atk-s0515a0:1211_6: hotīti sarīraṃ bhañjitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇakaraṇo na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva aṅgamaṅgaapakaḍḍhano
atk-s0515a0:1211_7: hotīti aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ sampaggahetvā apanetvā kaḍḍhano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva
atk-s0515a0:1211_8: jīvitā voropano hotīti jīvitindriyato voropano na ca tāva hoti. Na ca tāva sabbacāgapariccāgāya
atk-s0515a0:1211_9: saṇṭhito hotīti sabbaṃ parassa jīvitaṃ nāsetvā attano jīvitanāsanatthāya saṇṭhito
atk-s0515a0:1211_10: na ca tāva hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā aññaṃ jīvitā voropetvā attānaṃ jīvitā voropanatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1211_11: ṭhito, tadā sabbacāgapariccāgā nāma hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0515a0:1212: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0515a0:1214: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:1215_0: Yatoti yadā. Parapuggalaṃ ghāṭetvāti parapuggalaṃ nāsetvā. Attānaṃ ghāṭetīti attānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1215_1: māreti. Paramussadagatoti atibalavabhāvaṃ gato. Paramavepullappattoti ativipulabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1215_2: patto. Kodhassa pahīnattāti anāgāmimaggena vuttappakārassa kodhassa pahīnabhāvena.
atk-s0515a0:1215_3: Kodhavatthussa pariññātattāti kodhassa patiṭṭhābhūtassa kāraṇabhūtassa piyāpiyaaṭṭhānasaṅkhātassa
atk-s0515a0:1215_4: vatthussa ñātatīraṇapariññāhi byāpetvā ñātabhāvena. Kodhahetussa upacchinnattāti
atk-s0515a0:1216_0: Tāsīti bhāyanasīlo hoti. Uttāsīti atibhāyanasīlo. Parittāsīti samantato bhāyanasīlo.
atk-s0515a0:1216_1: Bhāyatīti bhayaṃ uppajjati. Santāsaṃ āpajjatīti virūpabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti. Katthī hotīti
atk-s0515a0:1216_2: attano vaṇṇabhaṇanasīlo hoti. Vikatthīti vividhā nānappakārato vaṇṇabhaṇanasīlo.
atk-s0515a0:1216_3: Jātiyā vāti khattiyabhāvādijātisampattiyā vā. Gottena vāti gotamagottādinā ukkaṭṭhagottena
atk-s0515a0:1216_4: vā. Kolaputtiyena vāti mahākulabhāvena vā. Vaṇṇapokkharatāya vāti vaṇṇasampannasarīratāya
atk-s0515a0:1216_5: vā. Sarīrañhi “pokkhara”nti vuccati, tassa vaṇṇasampattiyā abhirūpabhāvenāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1217_0: Kukkuccanti niddesassa uddesapadaṃ. Tattha kukkuccanti kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa
atk-s0515a0:1217_1: bhāvo kukkuccaṃ. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1217_2: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ, dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Hatthakukkuccampīti hatthehi kucchitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1217_3: kataṃ kukataṃ, tassa bhāvo hatthakukkuccaṃ. Pādakukkuccādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1218_0: Akappiye kappiyasaññitāti acchamaṃsaṃ sūkaramaṃsanti khādati, dīpimaṃsaṃ migamaṃsanti
atk-s0515a0:1218_1: khādati, akappiyabhojanaṃ kappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, vikāle kālasaññitāya bhuñjati,
atk-s0515a0:1218_2: akappiyapānakaṃ kappiyapānakanti pivati. Ayaṃ akappiye kappiyasaññitā. Kappiye akappiyasaññitāti
atk-s0515a0:1218_3: sūkaramaṃsaṃ acchamaṃsanti khādati, migamaṃsaṃ dīpimaṃsanti khādati, kappiyabhojanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1218_4: akappiyabhojananti bhuñjati, kāle vikālasaññitāya bhuñjati, kappiyapānakaṃ akappiyapānakanti
atk-s0515a0:1218_5: pivati. Ayaṃ kappiye akappiyasaññitā. Avajje vajjasaññitāti niddose dosasaññitā.
atk-s0515a0:1218_6: Vajje avajjasaññitāti sadose niddosasaññitā. Kukkuccāyanāti kukkuccāyanākāro. Kukkuccāyitattanti
atk-s0515a0:1218_7: kukkuccāyitabhāvo. Cetaso vippaṭisāroti cittassa virūpo paṭisaraṇabhāvo. Manovilekhoti cittassa vilekho.
atk-s0515a0:1219_0: Katattā ca akatattā cāti kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ katabhāvena ca kāyasucaritādīnaṃ akatabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:1219_1: ca. Kataṃ me kāyaduccaritanti mayā kāyena kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhu caritaṃ kāyena kataṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1219_2: Akataṃ me kāyasucaritanti mayā kāyena suṭṭhu caritaṃ na kataṃ. Vacīduccaritavacīsucaritādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:1220_0: Cittassāti na sattassa na posassa. Uddhaccanti uddhatākāro. Avūpasamoti na vūpasamo.
atk-s0515a0:1220_1: Ceto vikkhipatīti cetaso vikkhepo, bhantattaṃ cittassāti cittassa bhantabhāvo bhantayānabhantagoṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1220_2: viya. Iminā ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanaṃ kathitaṃ. Uddhaccañhi ekārammaṇe vipphandati,
atk-s0515a0:1220_3: vicikicchā nānārammaṇeti. Idaṃ vuccati uddhaccanti ayaṃ uddhatabhāvo kathīyati.
atk-s0515a0:1221_0: Musāvādaṃ pahāyāti ettha musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako vacīpayogo
atk-s0515a0:1221_1: kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0515a0:1222_0: Aparo nayo – musāti abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. Vādoti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1222_1: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā
atk-s0515a0:1222_2: cetanā musāvādo, taṃ musāvādaṃ. Pahāyāti imaṃ musāvādacetanāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ pajahitvā.
atk-s0515a0:1222_3: Paṭiviratoti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato orato viratova. Natthi tassa vītikkamissāmīti
atk-s0515a0:1222_4: cakkhusotaviññeyyā dhammā, pageva kāyaviññeyyāti iminā nayena aññesupi evarūpesu
atk-s0515a0:1223_0: Saccaṃ vadatīti saccavādī. Saccena saccaṃ sandahati ghaṭetīti saccasandho, na antarantarā
atk-s0515a0:1223_1: musā vadatīti attho. Yo hi puriso kadāci musā vadati, kadāci saccaṃ, tassa musāvādena
atk-s0515a0:1223_2: antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭiyati, tasmā so na saccasandho, ayaṃ pana na tādiso,
atk-s0515a0:1223_3: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ sandahatiyevāti saccasandho.
atk-s0515a0:1224_0: Thetoti thiro, thirakathoti attho. Eko hi puggalo haliddirāgo viya, thusarāsimhi
atk-s0515a0:1224_1: nikhātakhāṇu viya, assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na thirakatho hoti, eko pāsāṇalekhā
atk-s0515a0:1224_2: viya, indakhīlā viya ca thirakatho hoti, asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti, ayaṃ vuccati theto.
atk-s0515a0:1225_0: Paccayikoti pattiyāyitabbako, saddhāyitabbakoti attho. Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko
atk-s0515a0:1225_1: hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ
atk-s0515a0:1225_2: āpajjati. Eko paccayiko hoti, “idaṃ kena vuttaṃ, asukenā”ti vutte “yadi tena vuttaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1225_3: idameva pamāṇaṃ, idāni upaparikkhitabbaṃ natthi, evameva ida”nti vattabbataṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0515a0:1226: Avisaṃvādako lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādetīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1227_0: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ pahāyātiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tassa hadaye attano
atk-s0515a0:1227_1: piyabhāvaṃ parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇā vācā. Yāya pana attānampi parampi
atk-s0515a0:1227_2: pharusaṃ karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā, neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ pharusā
atk-s0515a0:1227_3: vācā. Yena samphaṃ palapati niratthakaṃ, so samphappalāpo. Yā tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi
atk-s0515a0:1227_4: pisuṇavācādināmameva labhati, sā eva ca idha adhippetā.
atk-s0515a0:1228_0: Imesaṃ bhedāyāti yesaṃ ito vuttānaṃ santike sutaṃ, tesaṃ bhedāya. Bhinnānaṃ vā sandhātāti
atk-s0515a0:1228_1: dvinnaṃ mittānaṃ vā samānupajjhāyakādīnaṃ vā kenacideva kāraṇena bhinnānaṃ ekamekaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1228_2: upasaṅkamitvā “tumhākaṃ īdise kule jātānaṃ evaṃ bahussutānaṃ idaṃ na yutta”ntiādīni
atk-s0515a0:1229_0: Anuppadātāti sandhānānuppadātā. Dve jane samagge disvā “tumhākaṃ evarūpe kule jātānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1229_1: evarūpehi guṇehi samannāgatānaṃ anucchavikameta”ntiādīni vatvā daḷhīkammaṃ kattāti
atk-s0515a0:1229_2: attho. Samaggo ārāmo assāti samaggārāmo, yattha samaggā natthi, tattha vasitumpi
atk-s0515a0:1229_3: na icchatīti attho. “Samaggarāmo”tipi pāḷi, ayamevettha attho. Samaggaratoti samaggesu
atk-s0515a0:1229_4: rato, te pahāya aññatra gantumpi na icchatīti attho. Samagge disvāpi sutvāpi nandatīti
atk-s0515a0:1229_5: samagganandī. Samaggakaraṇiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti yā vācā satte samaggeyeva karoti, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1230_1: nelāti elaṃ vuccati doso, nassā elanti nelā, niddosāti attho “nelaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
atk-s0515a0:1230_2: ettha vuttanelaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1230_3: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
atk-s0515a0:1230_4: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati apaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0515a0:1230_5: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī, pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī, purassa
atk-s0515a0:1230_6: esātipi porī, nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti, pitimattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1230_7: pitāti bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0515a0:1230_8: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0515a0:1231_0: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā samphappalāpo. Kālena vadatīti
atk-s0515a0:1231_1: kālavādī, vattabbayuttakālaṃ sallakkhetvā vadatīti attho. Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ tacchaṃ sabhāvameva
atk-s0515a0:1232_0: Nidhānaṃ vuccati ṭhapanokāso, nidhānamassa atthīti nidhānavatī, hadaye nidhātabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1232_1: vācaṃ bhāsitāti attho. Kālenāti evarūpiṃ bhāsamānopi ca “ahaṃ nidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1232_2: bhāsissāmī”ti na akālena bhāsati, yuttakālaṃ pana apekkhitvāva bhāsatīti attho. Sāpadesanti
atk-s0515a0:1232_3: saupamaṃ, sakāraṇanti attho. Pariyantavatinti paricchedaṃ dassetvā yathāssā paricchedo
atk-s0515a0:1232_4: paññāyati, evaṃ bhāsatīti attho. Atthasaṃhitanti anekehipi nayehi vibhajantena pariyādātuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1232_5: asakkuṇeyyatāya atthasampannaṃ bhāsati. Yaṃ vā so atthavādī atthaṃ vadati, tena atthena
atk-s0515a0:1232_6: sahitattā atthasaṃhitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, na aññaṃ nikkhipitvā aññaṃ bhāsatīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1232_7: hoti. Catuddosāpagataṃ vācaṃ bhāsatīti musāvādādīhi catūhi dosehi apagataṃ vācaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1232_8: bhāsati. Dvattiṃsāya tiracchānakathāyāti dvattiṃsāya saggamokkhānaṃ tiracchānabhūtāya kathāya.
atk-s0515a0:1233_0: Dasa kathāvatthūnīti appicchatādīni dasa vivaṭṭanissitāya kathāya vatthubhūtāni kāraṇāni.
atk-s0515a0:1233_1: Appicchakathanti ettha appicchoti icchāvirahito aniccho nittaṇho. Ettha hi byañjanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1233_2: sāvasesaṃ viya, attho pana niravaseso. Na hi khīṇāsavassa aṇumattāpi icchā nāma atthi.
atk-s0515a0:1234_0: Apicettha atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatā appicchatāti ayaṃ bhedo veditabbo – tattha
atk-s0515a0:1234_1: sakalābhe atittassa paralābhapatthanā atricchatā nāma, tāya samannāgatassa ekabhājane
atk-s0515a0:1234_2: pakkapūvepi attano patte patite na supakko viya khuddako viya ca khāyati, sveva pana
atk-s0515a0:1234_3: parassa patte pakkhitto supakko viya mahanto viya ca khāyati. Asantaguṇasambhāvanatā
atk-s0515a0:1234_4: pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā pāpicchatā nāma, sā “idhekacco asaddho samāno saddhoti
atk-s0515a0:1234_5: maṃ jano jānātū”tiādinā nayena atreva āgatāyeva. Tāya ca samannāgato puggalo kohaññe
atk-s0515a0:1234_6: patiṭṭhāti. Santaguṇasambhāvanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca amattaññutā mahicchatā nāma,
atk-s0515a0:1234_7: sāpi “idhekacco saddho samāno saddhoti maṃ jano jānātūti icchati, sīlavā samāno sīlavāti
atk-s0515a0:1234_8: maṃ jano jānātū”ti iminā nayena āgatāyeva. Tāya samannāgato puggalo dussantappayo
atk-s0515a0:1234_9: hoti, vijātamātāpissa cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0515a0:1237_0: Santaguṇanigūhanatā pana paṭiggahaṇe ca mattaññutā appicchatā nāma, tāya samannāgato
atk-s0515a0:1237_1: puggalo attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno “saddhoti maṃ
atk-s0515a0:1237_2: jano jānātū”ti na icchati. Sīlavā… pavivitto… bahussuto… āraddhavīriyo… samādhisampanno…
atk-s0515a0:1237_3: paññavā… khīṇāsavo samāno “khīṇāsavoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati seyyathāpi majjhantikatthero.
atk-s0515a0:1237_4: Evaṃ appiccho ca pana bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ thāvaraṃ karoti,
atk-s0515a0:1237_5: dāyakānaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti, yathā yathā hi so attano appicchatāya appaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā
atk-s0515a0:1237_6: tathā tassa vatte pasannā manussā bahū denti.
atk-s0515a0:1238_0: Aparopi catubbidho appiccho paccayaappiccho dhutaṅgaappiccho pariyattiappiccho adhigamaappicchoti.
atk-s0515a0:1238_1: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayaappiccho. So dāyakassa vasaṃ jānāti, deyyadhammassa
atk-s0515a0:1238_2: vasaṃ jānāti, attano thāmaṃ jānāti. Yadi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo,
atk-s0515a0:1238_3: dāyakassa vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo appo, dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa
atk-s0515a0:1238_4: vasena appaṃ gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1239_0: Dhutaṅgasamādānassa attani atthibhāvaṃ na jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma. Yo
atk-s0515a0:1239_1: pana bahussutabhāvaṃ na jānāpetukāmo, ayaṃ pariyattiappiccho nāma. Yo pana sotāpannādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1239_2: aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamaappiccho nāma.
atk-s0515a0:1239_3: Khīṇāsavo pana atricchataṃ pāpicchataṃ mahicchataṃ pahāya sabbaso icchāpaṭipakkhabhūtāya
atk-s0515a0:1239_4: alobhasaṅkhātāya parisuddhāya appicchatāya samannāgatattā appiccho nāma. “Āvuso,
atk-s0515a0:1239_5: atricchatā pāpicchatā mahicchatāti, ime dhammā pahātabbāti, tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0515a0:1239_6: evarūpaṃ appicchataṃ samādāya vattitabba”nti vadanto appicchakathaṃ katheti nāma.
atk-s0515a0:1240_0: Santuṭṭhīkathantiādīsu visesatthameva dīpayissāma, yojanā pana vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0515a0:1240_1: Santuṭṭhīkathanti itarītarapaccayasantosaṃ nissitaṃ kathaṃ. So panesa santoso dvādasavidho
atk-s0515a0:1240_2: hoti. Seyyathidaṃ – cīvare yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti
atk-s0515a0:1241_0: Tassāyaṃ pabhedavaṇṇanā – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā.
atk-s0515a0:1241_1: So teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0515a0:1241_2: Atha pana yo pakatidubbalo vā hoti, ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto
atk-s0515a0:1241_3: kilamati. So sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova
atk-s0515a0:1241_4: hoti. Ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso. Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti. So pattuṇṇacīvarādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1241_5: aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ, bahūni vā pana cīvarāni labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1241_6: idaṃ bahussutānaṃ anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ, idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1241_7: purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi
atk-s0515a0:1242_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1242_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana
atk-s0515a0:1242_2: attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, yenassa paribhuttena
atk-s0515a0:1242_3: aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0515a0:1242_4: samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso. Aparo
atk-s0515a0:1242_5: bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1242_6: datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1243_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā, so tena neva somanassaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1243_1: na domanassaṃ uppādeti, antamaso tiṇasanthārakenāpi yathāladdheneva tussati. Ayamassa
atk-s0515a0:1243_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā
atk-s0515a0:1243_3: senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
atk-s0515a0:1243_4: tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso.
atk-s0515a0:1244_0: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1244_2: santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso. Yopi “uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma
atk-s0515a0:1244_3: pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tattha nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa puna paṭibujjhato
atk-s0515a0:1244_4: pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0515a0:1244_5: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa
atk-s0515a0:1245_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so yaṃ labhati, teneva
atk-s0515a0:1245_1: tussati, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso.
atk-s0515a0:1245_2: Yo pana telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa
atk-s0515a0:1245_3: hatthato telaṃ gahetvā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1246_0: Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ labhati, so taṃ cīvaraṃ viya
atk-s0515a0:1246_1: theracirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhīgilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi
atk-s0515a0:1246_2: santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane catumadhuraṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ muttaharītakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1246_3: “gaṇha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0515a0:1246_4: atha muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena
atk-s0515a0:1246_5: bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti. Ayamassa gilānapaccaye yathāsāruppasantoso.
atk-s0515a0:1246_6: Imesaṃ pana paccekapaccayesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ santosānaṃ yathāsāruppasantosova aggo.
atk-s0515a0:1246_7: Arahā ekekasmiṃ paccaye imehi tīhipi santuṭṭhova.
atk-s0515a0:1247_0: Pavivekakathanti pavivekanissitaṃ kathaṃ. Tayo hi vivekā kāyaviveko cittaviveko upadhivivekoti.
atk-s0515a0:1247_1: Tattha eko gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya
