atk-s0515a0:1457_0: 156. Idāni evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ abbhānumodento tassa ca arahattassa
atk-s0515a0:1457_1: ādipaṭipadaṃ pucchanto nimmitabuddho “akittayī”ti gāthamāha. Tattha akittayīti ācikkhi.
atk-s0515a0:1457_2: Vivaṭacakkhūti vivaṭehi anāvaraṇehi pañcahi cakkhūhi samannāgato. Sakkhidhammanti
atk-s0515a0:1457_3: sakāyattaṃ sayaṃ abhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhadhammaṃ. Parissayavinayanti parissayavinayanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1457_4: Paṭipadaṃ vadehīti idāni paṭipattiṃ vadehi. Bhaddanteti bhaddaṃ tava atthūti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1457_5: ālapanto āha. Atha vā bhaddaṃ sundaraṃ tava paṭipadaṃ vadehītipi vuttaṃ hoti. Pātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1457_6: atha vāpi samādhinti tameva paṭipadaṃ bhinditvā pucchati. Paṭipadanti etena vā maggaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1458_2: dūrepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ dibbaṃ pasādacakkhu hoti. Idañcāpi vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1458_3: ñāṇacakkhu tādisamevāti dibbasadisattā dibbaṃ. Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā, attanā
atk-s0515a0:1458_4: ca dibbavihārasannissitattāpi dibbaṃ. Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbaṃ. Tirokuṭṭādigatarūpadassanena
atk-s0515a0:1458_5: mahāgatikattāpi dibbaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ saddasatthānusārena veditabbaṃ. Dassanaṭṭhena
atk-s0515a0:1458_6: cakkhu, cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhu, dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu.
atk-s0515a0:1458_7: Tena dibbacakkhunāpi vivaṭacakkhu. Idāni pañcavidhaṃ cakkhuṃ vitthārena kathetuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1458_9: pañcavaṇṇā saṃvijjantīti ettha sasambhārādikacakkhumhi buddhassa bhagavato pañca
atk-s0515a0:1459_0: Nīlo ca vaṇṇoti umāpupphavaṇṇo. Pītako ca vaṇṇoti kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇo. Lohitako ca
atk-s0515a0:1459_1: vaṇṇoti indagopakavaṇṇo. Kaṇho ca vaṇṇoti añjanavaṇṇo. Odāto ca vaṇṇoti osadhitārakavaṇṇo.
atk-s0515a0:1459_2: Yattha ca akkhilomāni patiṭṭhitānīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne akkhilomāni patiṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhitāni.
atk-s0515a0:1459_3: Taṃ nīlaṃ hoti sunīlanti ettha nīlanti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Sunīlanti antaravirahitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1459_4: suṭṭhu nīlaṃ. Pāsādikanti pasādajanakaṃ. Dassaneyyanti dassanīyaṃ. Umāpupphasamānanti
atk-s0515a0:1459_5: dakasītalapupphasadisaṃ. Tassa paratoti tassa samantā bāhirapasse. Pītakanti sabbasaṅgāhakaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1459_6: Supītakanti antaravirahitaṃ suṭṭhu pītakaṃ. Ubhayato ca akkhikūṭānīti dve ca akkhikoṭiyo.
atk-s0515a0:1459_7: Lohitakānīti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Sulohitakānīti apaññāyamānavivarāni suṭṭhu
atk-s0515a0:1459_8: lohitakāni. Majjhe kaṇhanti akkhīnaṃ majjhimaṭṭhānaṃ añjanasadisaṃ kaṇhaṃ. Sukaṇhanti
atk-s0515a0:1459_9: antaravirahitaṃ suṭṭhu kaṇhaṃ. Alūkhanti pāsādikaṃ. Siniddhanti paṇītaṃ. Bhaddāriṭṭhakasamānanti
atk-s0515a0:1459_11: attho. Odātanti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ. Suodātanti antaravirahitaṃ rajatamaṇḍalasadisaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1459_12: suṭṭhu odātaṃ. Setaṃ paṇḍaranti dvīhipi atiodātataṃ dasseti. Pākatikena maṃsacakkhunāti
atk-s0515a0:1459_14: purimesu tattha tatthuppannesu attabhāvesu kāyasucaritādikammunā uppāditena. Samantā
atk-s0515a0:1459_15: yojanaṃ passatīti samantato catugāvutappamāṇe yojane tirokuṭṭādigataṃ rūpaṃ āvaraṇavirahitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1460_0: Divā ceva rattiñcāti divasabhāge ca rattibhāge ca. Caturaṅgasamannāgatoti catūhi
atk-s0515a0:1460_1: aṅgehi samannāgato paripuṇṇaandhakāro ālokavirahito. Sūriyo vā atthaṅgatoti sūrabhāvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1460_2: janayanto uṭṭhito sūriyo vigato. Kāḷapakkho ca uposathoti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasīuposathadivaso
atk-s0515a0:1460_3: ca. Tibbo ca vanasaṇḍoti gahano ca rukkharāsi. Mahā ca kāḷamegho abbhuṭṭhitoti mahanto
atk-s0515a0:1460_4: kāḷamegho abbhapaṭalo ca uṭṭhito hoti. Kuṭṭo vāti iṭṭhakācayo vā. Kavāṭaṃ vāti dvāravātapānādikavāṭaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1460_5: vā. Pākāro vāti mattikādipākāro vā. Pabbato vāti paṃsupabbatādipabbato vā. Gacchaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1460_6: vāti taruṇagacchādigacchaṃ vā. Latā vāti karavindādi latā vā. Āvaraṇaṃ rūpānaṃ dassanāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1460_7: rūpārammaṇānaṃ dassanatthāya paṭisedhaṃ natthi. Ekañce tilaphalaṃ nimittaṃ katvāti
atk-s0515a0:1460_8: sace ekaṃ tilabījaṃ saññāṇaṃ katvā. Tilavāhe pakkhipeyyāti dve sakaṭe tilarāsimhi
atk-s0515a0:1460_9: khipeyya. Keci pana “vāho nāma kumbhātirekadvesakaṭa”nti vadanti. Taññeva tilaphalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1461_0: Dibbena cakkhunāti idaṃ vuttatthameva. Visuddhenāti cutūpapātadassanena diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttā
atk-s0515a0:1461_1: visuddhena. Yo hi cutimattameva passati na upapātaṃ, so ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo
atk-s0515a0:1461_2: upapātameva passati na cutiṃ, so navasattapātubhāvasassatadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. Yo pana
atk-s0515a0:1461_3: tadubhayaṃ passati, so yasmā duvidhampi taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ ativattati, tasmāssa taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1461_4: dassanaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhihetu hoti, ubhayañcetaṃ buddhaputtā passanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1461_6: rūpadassanena atikkantamānusakaṃ, mānusakaṃ vā maṃsacakkhuṃ atikkantattā atikkantamānusakanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1462_0: Tena dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passatīti manussamaṃsacakkhunā
atk-s0515a0:1462_1: viya satte oloketi. Cavamāne upapajjamāneti ettha cutikkhaṇe upapattikkhaṇe vā dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0515a0:1462_2: daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā. Ye pana āsannacutikā idāni cavissanti, te cavamānā. Ye ca gahitapaṭisandhikā
atk-s0515a0:1462_3: sampatinibbattāva, te upapajjamānāti adhippetā. Te evarūpe cavamāne upapajjamāne
atk-s0515a0:1462_4: ca passatīti dasseti. Hīneti mohanissandayuttattā hīne. Tabbiparīte paṇīte. Suvaṇṇeti
atk-s0515a0:1462_6: virūpeti attho. Sugateti sugatigate, alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane.
atk-s0515a0:1462_7: Duggateti duggatigate, lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne. Yathākammūpageti
atk-s0515a0:1462_8: yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ upacitaṃ, tena tena upagate. Tattha purimehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi dibbacakkhukiccaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1463_0: Tassa ca ñāṇassa ayamuppattikkamo – idha bhikkhu heṭṭhānirayābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0515a0:1463_1: nerayike satte passati mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāne, taṃ dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva.
atk-s0515a0:1463_2: So evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī”ti,
atk-s0515a0:1463_3: athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Tathā uparidevalokābhimukhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1463_4: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nandanavana missakavana phārusakavanādīsu satte passati mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1463_5: anubhavamāne. Tampi dassanaṃ dibbacakkhukiccameva. So evaṃ manasi karoti “kiṃ nu
atk-s0515a0:1463_6: kho kammaṃ katvā ime sattā etaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavantī”ti. Athassa “idaṃ nāma katvā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1463_7: taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ ñāṇamuppajjati. Idaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ nāma. Imassa visuṃ parikammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1463_8: nāma natthi. Yathā ca imassa, evaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇassāpi. Dibbacakkhupādakāneva hi
atk-s0515a0:1464_0: Ime vata bhontotiādīsu imeti dibbacakkhunā diṭṭhānaṃ nidassanavacanaṃ. Vatāti anusocanatthe
atk-s0515a0:1464_1: nipāto. Bhontoti bhavanto. Duṭṭhu caritaṃ, duṭṭhuṃ vā caritaṃ kilesapūtikattāti duccaritaṃ;
atk-s0515a0:1464_2: kāyena duccaritaṃ, kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ. Itaresupi eseva
atk-s0515a0:1465_0: Ariyānaṃ upavādakāti buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ antamaso gihisotāpannānampi
atk-s0515a0:1465_1: anatthakāmā hutvā antimavatthunā vā guṇaparidhaṃsanena vā upavādakā, akkosakā garahakāti
atk-s0515a0:1465_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha “natthi imesaṃ samaṇadhammo, assamaṇā ete”ti vadanto antimavatthunā
atk-s0515a0:1465_3: upavadati. “Natthi imesaṃ jhānaṃ vā vimokkho vā maggo vā phalaṃ vā”tiādīni vadanto
atk-s0515a0:1465_4: guṇaparidhaṃsanena upavadatīti veditabbo. So ca jhānaṃ vā upavadeyya ajhānaṃ vā,
atk-s0515a0:1465_5: ubhayathāpi ariyūpavādova hoti; atibhāriyaṃ kammaṃ, anantariyakammasadisaṃ, saggāvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1465_6: maggāvaraṇañca, satekicchaṃ pana hoti. Tasmā yo ariyaṃ upavadati, tena gantvā sace
atk-s0515a0:1465_7: attanā vuḍḍhataro hoti, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā “ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca avacaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1465_8: taṃ me khamāhī”ti khamāpetabbo. Sace pana navakataro hoti, vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
atk-s0515a0:1465_9: añjaliṃ paggahetvā “ahaṃ, bhante, tumhe idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me khamathā”ti khamāpetabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1465_10: Sace so nakkhamati, disāpakkanto vā hoti, sayaṃ vā gantvā saddhivihārike vā pesetvā
atk-s0515a0:1465_11: khamāpetabbo. Sace nāpi gantuṃ na pesetuṃ sakkā hoti, ye tasmiṃ vihāre bhikkhū vasanti,
atk-s0515a0:1465_12: tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sace vuḍḍhatarā,
atk-s0515a0:1465_13: vuḍḍhe vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitvā “ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ idañcidañca
atk-s0515a0:1465_14: avacaṃ, taṃ khamatu me so āyasmā”ti vatvā khamāpetabbo. Sammukhā akhamantepi etadeva
atk-s0515a0:1465_15: kātabbaṃ. Sace ekacārikabhikkhu hoti, neva tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ na gataṭṭhānaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0515a0:1465_16: ekassa paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā “ahaṃ, bhante, asukaṃ nāma āyasmantaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1465_17: idañcidañca avacaṃ, taṃ me anussarato anussarato vippaṭisāro hoti, kiṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0515a0:1465_18: vattabbaṃ. So vakkhati “tumhe mā cintayittha, thero tumhākaṃ khamati, cittaṃ vūpasamethā”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1465_19: Tenapi ariyassa gatadisābhimukhena añjaliṃ paggahetvā “khamathā”ti vattabbaṃ. Yadi
atk-s0515a0:1465_20: so parinibbuto hoti, parinibbutamañcaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā yāva sivathikaṃ gantvāpi khamāpetabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1465_21: Evaṃ kate neva saggāvaraṇaṃ na maggāvaraṇaṃ hoti, pākatikameva hotīti.
atk-s0515a0:1466_1: samādinnanānāvidhakammā, ye ca micchādiṭṭhimūlakesu kāyakammādīsu aññepi samādapenti.
atk-s0515a0:1466_2: Ettha ca vacīduccaritaggahaṇeneva ariyūpavāde, manoduccaritaggahaṇena ca micchādiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0515a0:1466_3: saṅgahitāyapi imesaṃ dvinnaṃ punavacanaṃ mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1466_4: Mahāsāvajjo hi ariyūpavādo ānantariyasadiso. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0515a0:1467_0: “Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, bhikkhu sīlasampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno diṭṭheva
atk-s0515a0:1467_1: dhamme aññaṃ ārādheyya, evaṃsampadamidaṃ, sāriputta, vadāmi. Taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1467_2: cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1468: Micchādiṭṭhito ca mahāsāvajjataraṃ nāma aññaṃ natthi. Yathāha –
atk-s0515a0:1469: “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃmahāsāvajjaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi. Micchādiṭṭhiparamāni bhikkhave, mahāsāvajjānī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:1470_0: Kāyassa bhedāti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā. Paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantarābhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe.
atk-s0515a0:1470_1: Atha vā kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassupacchedā. Paraṃ maraṇāti cuticittato uddhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1470_2: Apāyanti evamādi sabbaṃ nirayavevacanameva. Nirayo hi saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā
atk-s0515a0:1470_3: ayā apetattā, sukhānaṃ vā āyassa abhāvā apāyo. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggati,
atk-s0515a0:1470_4: dosabahulatāya vā duṭṭhena kammunā nibbattā gatīti duggati. Vivasā nipatanti tattha
atk-s0515a0:1470_5: dukkaṭakārinoti vinipāto, vinassantā vā ettha nipatanti sambhijjamānaṅgapaccaṅgātipi
atk-s0515a0:1470_6: vinipāto. Natthi ettha assādasaññito ayoti nirayo.
atk-s0515a0:1471_0: Atha vā apāyaggahaṇena tiracchānayoniṃ dīpeti, tiracchānayoni hi apāyo sugatito apetattā.
atk-s0515a0:1471_1: Na duggati, mahesakkhānaṃ nāgarājādīnaṃ sambhavato. Duggatiggahaṇena pettivisayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1471_2: dīpeti, so hi apāyo ceva duggati ca sukhato apetattā dukkhassa ca gatibhūtattā, na
atk-s0515a0:1471_3: tu vinipāto, asurakāyasadisaṃ avinipatitattā. Vinipātaggahaṇena asurakāyaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0515a0:1471_4: So hi yathāvuttena atthena apāyo ceva duggati ca sabbasamussayehi ca vinipatitattā
atk-s0515a0:1471_5: vinipātoti vuccati. Nirayaggahaṇena avīciādianekappakāraṃ nirayameva dīpetīti. Upapannāti
atk-s0515a0:1471_6: upagatā, tattha abhinibbattāti adhippāyo. Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1471_7: Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. Saggaggahaṇena
atk-s0515a0:1471_8: devagatiyeva. Tattha sundarā gatīti sugati. Rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo.
atk-s0515a0:1471_9: So sabbopi lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti ayaṃ vacanattho. Iti dibbena cakkhunātiādi
atk-s0515a0:1472_0: Evaṃ dibbena cakkhunā passatīti ayamettha saṅkhepattho – dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ parittapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:1473_0: Ākaṅkhamāno ca bhagavāti bhagavā icchamāno. Ekampi lokadhātuṃ passeyyāti ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1473_1: olokeyya. Sahassimpi cūḷanikanti ettha yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharanti, disā bhānti
atk-s0515a0:1473_2: virocamānā, tāva sahassadhā loko, esā sahassicūḷanikā nāma. Cūḷanikanti khuddakaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1473_3: Dvisahassimpi majjhimikaṃ lokadhātunti ettha sahassacakkavāḷānaṃ sahassabhāgena gaṇetvā
atk-s0515a0:1473_4: dasasatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇā dvisahassī majjhimikā lokadhātu nāma. Ettakena buddhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1473_5: jātikkhettaṃ nāma dassitaṃ. Bodhisattānañhi pacchimabhave devalokato cavitvā mātukucchiyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1473_6: paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase ca mātukucchito nikkhamanadivase ca mahābhinikkhamanadivase
atk-s0515a0:1474_0: Tisahassimpi. Mahāsahassimpi lokadhātunti sahassito paṭṭhāya tatiyāti tisahassī,
atk-s0515a0:1474_1: paṭhamasahassiṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitaṃ majjhimikaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitattā mahantehi
atk-s0515a0:1474_2: sahassehi gaṇitāti mahāsahassī. Ettāvatā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇo loko dassito
atk-s0515a0:1474_3: hoti. Gaṇakaputtatissatthero pana evamāha – “na hi tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā
atk-s0515a0:1474_4: etaṃ parimāṇaṃ. Idañhi ācariyānaṃ sajjhāyamūlakaṃ vācāya parihīnaṭṭhānaṃ, dasakoṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1474_5: pana ṭhānaṃ tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu nāmā”ti. Ettāvatā hi bhagavato āṇākkhettaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1474_6: nāma dassitaṃ. Etasmiñhi antare āṭānāṭiyaparitta- isigiliparitta- dhajaggaparitta-
atk-s0515a0:1474_7: bojjhaṅgaparittakhandhaparitta- moraparitta- mettaparitta- ratanaparittānaṃ āṇā pharati.
atk-s0515a0:1475_0: Yāvatakaṃ vā pana ākaṅkheyyāti yattakaṃ vā iccheyya. Iminā visayakkhettaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1475_1: Buddhānañhi visayakkhettassa pamāṇaparicchedo nāma natthi, natthikabhāve cassa imaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1475_2: upamaṃ āharanti – koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷamhi yāva brahmalokā sāsapehi pūretvā sace
atk-s0515a0:1475_3: koci puratthimāya disāya ekacakkavāḷe ekaṃ sāsapaṃ pakkhipanto āgaccheyya, sabbepi
atk-s0515a0:1475_4: te sāsapā parikkhayaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Na tveva puratthimāya disāya cakkavāḷāni. Dakkhiṇādīsupi
atk-s0515a0:1475_5: eseva nayo. Tattha buddhānaṃ avisayo nāma natthi. Tāvatakaṃ passeyyāti tattakaṃ olokeyya.
atk-s0515a0:1475_6: Evaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhagavato dibbacakkhūti dibbacakkhukathaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0515a0:1476_0: Kathaṃ bhagavā paññācakkhunāpi vivaṭacakkhūti kenappakārena paññācakkhunā apihitacakkhu?
atk-s0515a0:1476_1: Mahāpañño puthupaññotiādikaṃ tattha atirocati yadidaṃ paññāyāti pariyosānaṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0515a0:1477_0: Buddhacakkhunāti indriyaparopariyattañāṇena ca āsayānusayañāṇena ca. Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1477_1: ñāṇānaṃ buddhacakkhūti nāmaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassa samantacakkhūti, tiṇṇaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1477_2: dhammacakkhūti. Lokaṃ volokento addasa satteti satte addakkhi. Apparajakkhetiādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1477_3: yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ, te apparajakkhā. Yesaṃ taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1477_4: mahantaṃ, te mahārajakkhā. Yesaṃ saddhādīni indriyāni tikkhāni, te tikkhindriyā.
atk-s0515a0:1477_5: Yesaṃ tāni mudūni, te mudindriyā. Yesaṃ teyeva saddhādayo ākārā sundarā, te svākārā.
atk-s0515a0:1477_6: Ye kathitakāraṇaṃ sallakkhenti, sukhena sakkā honti viññāpetuṃ te suviññāpayā. Ye
atk-s0515a0:1477_7: paralokañceva vajjañca bhayato passanti, te paralokavajjabhayadassāvino nāma.
atk-s0515a0:1478_0: Uppaliniyanti uppalavane. Itaresupi eseva nayo. Antonimuggaposīnīti yāni antonimuggāneva
atk-s0515a0:1478_1: posiyanti. Udakaṃ accuggamma tiṭṭhantīti udakaṃ atikkamitvā tiṭṭhanti. Tattha yāni
atk-s0515a0:1478_2: yāni accuggamma ṭhitāni, tāni tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja
atk-s0515a0:1478_3: pupphanakāni. Yāni samodakaṃ ṭhitāni, tāni sve pupphanakāni. Yāni udakā anuggatāni
atk-s0515a0:1478_4: antonimuggaposīni, tāni tatiyadivaseva pupphanakāni. Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi
atk-s0515a0:1478_5: sarogauppalāni nāma atthi, yāni neva pupphissanti, macchakacchapabhakkhāneva bhavissanti,
atk-s0515a0:1478_6: tāni pāḷiṃ nārūḷhāni, āharitvā pana dīpetabbānīti dīpitāni.
atk-s0515a0:1479_0: Yatheva hi tāni catubbidhapupphāni, evameva ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti
atk-s0515a0:1479_1: cattāro puggalā. Yassa puggalassa udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0515a0:1479_2: puggalo ugghaṭitaññū. Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajīyamāne
atk-s0515a0:1479_3: dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū. Yassa puggalassa uddesato
atk-s0515a0:1479_4: paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0515a0:1479_5: hoti, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo neyyo. Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato
atk-s0515a0:1479_6: bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṃ vuccati
atk-s0515a0:1479_7: puggalo padaparamo. Tattha bhagavā uppalavanādisadisaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokento
atk-s0515a0:1479_8: ajja pupphanakāni ugghaṭitaññū, sve pupphanakāni vipañcitaññūti evaṃ sabbākārato
atk-s0515a0:1479_9: ca addasa. Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā
atk-s0515a0:1479_10: atthaṃ sādheti, padaparamānaṃ anāgatatthāya vāsanā hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1480_0: Rāgacaritotiādīsu rajjanavasena ārammaṇe caraṇaṃ etassa atthīti rāgacarito. Dussanavasena
atk-s0515a0:1480_1: ārammaṇe caraṇaṃ etassa atthīti dosacarito. Muyhanavasena ārammaṇe caraṇaṃ etassa
atk-s0515a0:1480_2: atthīti mohacarito. Vitakkanavasena ūhanavasena ārammaṇe caraṇaṃ etassa atthīti vitakkacarito.
atk-s0515a0:1480_3: Okappanasaddhāvasena ārammaṇe caraṇaṃ etassa atthīti saddhācarito. Ñāṇameva caraṇaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1480_4: ñāṇena vā caraṇaṃ, ñāṇassa vā caraṇaṃ, ñāṇato vā caraṇaṃ etassa atthīti ñāṇacarito.
atk-s0515a0:1480_5: Rāgacaritassāti rāgussadassa rāgabahulassa. Paratopi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1481_1: Vuttañhetaṃ – “asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā”ti. Mettābhāvanaṃ ācikkhatīti mettābhāvanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1481_2: cittasinehanaṃ katheti. Vuttañhetaṃ – “mettā bhāvetabbā byāpādassa pahānāyā”ti. Uddeseti
atk-s0515a0:1481_3: sajjhāyane. Paripucchāyāti aṭṭhakathāya. Kālena dhammassavaneti yuttappattakāle uttari
atk-s0515a0:1481_4: pariyattidhammassavane. Dhammasākacchāyāti aññehi saddhiṃ sākacchāya. Garusaṃvāseti
atk-s0515a0:1481_5: garūnaṃ payirupāsane. Nivesetīti ācariyānaṃ santike patiṭṭhāpeti. Ānāpānassatiṃ ācikkhatīti
atk-s0515a0:1481_7: vitakkupacchedāyā”ti. Pasādanīyaṃ nimittaṃ ācikkhatīti cūḷavedalla- mahāvedallā-
atk-s0515a0:1481_8: dipasādajanakaṃ suttaṃ katheti. Buddhasubodhinti buddhassa bhagavato buddhattapaṭivedhaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1481_10: aṭṭhavidhaariyasaṅghassa suppaṭipannatādisuṭṭhupaṭipattiṃ. Sīlāni ca attanoti attano
atk-s0515a0:1481_11: santakasīlāni ca. Ācikkhati vipassanānimittanti udayabbayādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ katheti.
atk-s0515a0:1481_12: Aniccākāranti hutvā abhāvākāraṃ. Dukkhākāranti udayabbayapaṭipīḷanākāraṃ. Anattākāranti avasavattanākāraṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1482_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani ṭhitova, na
atk-s0515a0:1482_1: hi tattha ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ abhimukhe gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi. Tathūpamanti
atk-s0515a0:1482_2: tappaṭibhāgaṃ selapabbatūpamaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho – yathā selapabbatamuddhanti
atk-s0515a0:1482_3: ṭhitova cakkhunā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya. Sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0515a0:1482_4: samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ paññāmayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1483_0: Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – yathā hi pabbatapādasāmantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā tattha
atk-s0515a0:1483_1: kedārapāḷīsu kuṭiyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyya, caturaṅgasamannāgatañca andhakāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1483_2: assa, atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato
atk-s0515a0:1483_3: neva khettaṃ na kedārapāḷiyo na kuṭiyo na tattha sayitamanussā paññāyeyyuṃ, kuṭikāsu
atk-s0515a0:1483_4: pana aggijālamattameva paññāyeyya. Evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattakāyaṃ olokayato
atk-s0515a0:1483_5: tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā, te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa
atk-s0515a0:1483_6: āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti, rattiṃ khittasarā viya honti. Ye pana katakalyāṇā veneyyapuggalā,
atk-s0515a0:1483_7: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ gacchanti, te eva aggi viya himavantapabbato viya
atk-s0515a0:1485: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:1486_0: Sabbaññutaññāṇanti ettha pañcaneyyapathappabhedaṃ sabbaṃ aññāsīti sabbaññū. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatādibhedā
atk-s0515a0:1486_1: sabbadhammā hi saṅkhāro vikāro lakkhaṇaṃ nibbānaṃ paññattīti pañceva neyyapathā honti.
atk-s0515a0:1486_2: Sabbaññussa bhāvo sabbaññutā, sabbaññutā eva ñāṇaṃ “sabbaññutāñāṇa”nti vattabbe “sabbaññutaññāṇa”nti
atk-s0515a0:1486_3: vuttaṃ. Sabbaññūti ca kamasabbaññū sakiṃsabbaññū satatasabbaññū sattisabbaññū ñātasabbaññūti
atk-s0515a0:1486_4: pañcavidhā sabbaññuno siyuṃ. Tesu kamena sabbajānanakālāsambhavato kamasabbaññutā
atk-s0515a0:1486_5: na hoti, sakiṃ sabbārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato sakiṃsabbaññutā na hoti, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1486_7: na hoti, parisesato sabbajānanasamatthatāya sattisabbaññutā vā siyā, viditasabbadhammattā
atk-s0515a0:1486_8: ñātasabbaññutā vā, sattisabbaññuno sabbajānanattaṃ natthīti tampi na yujjati, “na
atk-s0515a0:1486_9: tassa adiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñci…pe… samantacakkhū”ti vuttattā ñātasabbaññutā eva yujjati.
atk-s0515a0:1486_10: Evañhi sati kiccato asammohato kāraṇasiddhito āvajjanapaṭibaddhato sabbaññutameva
atk-s0515a0:1487_0: Puna aparena pariyāyena sabbaññubhāvasādhanatthaṃ “na tassā”ti gāthamāha. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1487_1: na tassa addiṭṭhamidhatthi kiñcīti tassa tathāgatassa idha imasmiṃ tedhātuke loke
atk-s0515a0:1487_2: imasmiṃ paccuppannakāle vā paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhaṃ nāma kiñci appamattakampi na atthi
atk-s0515a0:1487_3: na saṃvijjati. Atthīti idaṃ vattamānakālikaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ, iminā paccuppannakālikassa
atk-s0515a0:1487_4: sabbadhammassa ñātabhāvaṃ dasseti. Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ panettha da-kāro payutto.
atk-s0515a0:1487_5: Atho aviññātanti ettha athoti vacanopādāne nipāto. Aviññātanti atītakālikaṃ aviññātaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1487_6: nāma kiñci dhammajātaṃ nāhosīti pāṭhaseso. Abyayabhūtassa atthi-saddassa gahaṇe pāṭhasesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1487_7: vināpi yujjatiyeva. Iminā atītakālikassa sabbadhammassa ñātabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ajānitabbanti
atk-s0515a0:1487_8: anāgatakālikaṃ ajānitabbaṃ nāma dhammajātaṃ na bhavissati natthīti. Iminā anāgatakālikassa
atk-s0515a0:1487_9: sabbadhammassa ñātabhāvaṃ dasseti. Jānanakiriyāvisesamattameva vā ettha a-kāro. Sabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1487_10: abhiññāsi yadatthi neyyanti ettha yaṃ tekālikaṃ vā kālavinimuttaṃ vā neyyaṃ jānitabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1487_11: kiñci dhammajātaṃ atthi, taṃ sabbaṃ tathāgato abhiññāsi adhikena sabbaññutaññāṇena
atk-s0515a0:1487_12: jāni paṭivijjhi, ettha atthi-saddena tekālikassa kālavimuttassa ca gahaṇā atthi-saddo
atk-s0515a0:1487_13: abyayabhūtoyeva daṭṭhabbo. Tathāgato tena samantacakkhūti kālavasena okāsavasena
atk-s0515a0:1487_14: ca nippadesattā samantā sabbato pavattaṃ ñāṇacakkhu assāti samantacakkhu, tena yathāvuttena
atk-s0515a0:1487_15: kāraṇena tathāgato samantacakkhu sabbaññūti vuttaṃ hoti. Imissā gāthāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya
atk-s0515a0:1488_0: Na itihitihanti “evaṃ kira āsi, evaṃ kira āsī”ti na hoti. Na itikirāyāti “evaṃ kira
atk-s0515a0:1488_1: eta”nti na hoti. Na paramparāyāti paramparakathāyāpi na hoti. Na piṭakasampadāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1488_2: amhākaṃ piṭakatantiyā saddhiṃ sametīti na hoti. Na takkahetūti takkaggāhenapi na
atk-s0515a0:1488_3: hoti. Na ākāraparivitakkenāti “sundaramidaṃ kāraṇa”nti evaṃ kāraṇaparivitakkenapi
atk-s0515a0:1488_4: na hoti. Na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyāti amhākaṃ nijjhāyitvā khamitvā gahitadiṭṭhiyā
atk-s0515a0:1489_0: Atha vāpi samādhinti ettha samādhinti kusalacittekaggatā samādhi. Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti?
atk-s0515a0:1489_1: Samādhānaṭṭhena. Kimidaṃ samādhānaṃ nāma? Ekārammaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā
atk-s0515a0:1489_2: ca ādhānaṃ, ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā yassa dhammassa ānubhāvena ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā
atk-s0515a0:1489_3: samaṃ sammā ca avikkhippamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti, idaṃ samādhānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1492_0: Samādhi anāvilaacalabhāvena ārammaṇe tiṭṭhatīti ṭhiti. Parato padadvayaṃ upasaggavasena
atk-s0515a0:1492_1: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Api ca sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇamhi sampiṇḍetvā tiṭṭhatīti saṇṭhiti. Ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1492_2: ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhiti. Kusalapakkhasmiñhi cattārova dhammā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1492_3: ogāhanti saddhā sati samādhi paññāti. Teneva saddhā “okappanā”ti vuttā, sati “apilāpanatā”ti,
atk-s0515a0:1492_4: samādhi “avaṭṭhitī”ti, paññā “pariyogāhanā”ti. Akusalapakkhe pana tayo dhammā ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1492_5: ogāhanti taṇhā diṭṭhi avijjāti. Tenevete “oghā”ti vuttā. Cittekaggatā panettha na
atk-s0515a0:1492_6: balavatī hoti. Yathā hi rajuṭṭhānaṭṭhāne udakena siñcitvā sammaṭṭhe thokameva kālaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1492_7: rajo sannisīdati, sukkhante sukkhante puna pakatibhāveneva vuṭṭhāti, evameva akusalapakkhe
atk-s0515a0:1493_0: Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāro. Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva
atk-s0515a0:1493_1: gacchantaṃ cittaṃ vikkhipati nāma. Ayaṃ pana tathāvidho vikkhepo na hotīti avikkhepo.
atk-s0515a0:1493_2: Uddhaccavicikicchāvaseneva cittaṃ visāhaṭaṃ nāma hoti, ito cito ca harīyati, ayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1493_3: pana evaṃ avisāhaṭamānasassa bhāvoti avisāhaṭamānasatā. Samathoti tividho samatho
atk-s0515a0:1493_4: cittasamatho adhikaraṇasamatho sabbasaṅkhārasamathoti. Tattha aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
atk-s0515a0:1493_5: cittekaggatā cittasamatho nāma. Tañhi āgamma cittacalanaṃ cittavipphanditaṃ sammati
atk-s0515a0:1493_6: vūpasammati, tasmā so “cittasamatho”ti vuccati. Sammukhāvinayādisattavidho samatho
atk-s0515a0:1493_7: adhikaraṇasamatho nāma. Tañhi āgamma tāni tāni adhikaraṇāni sammanti vūpasammanti,
atk-s0515a0:1493_8: tasmā so “adhikaraṇasamatho”ti vuccati. Yasmā pana sabbe saṅkhārā nibbānaṃ āgamma
atk-s0515a0:1493_9: sammanti vūpasammanti vūpasammanti, tasmā taṃ “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti vuccati. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1493_10: atthe cittasamatho adhippeto. Samādhilakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti samādhindriyaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1493_11: Uddhacce na kampatīti samādhibalaṃ. Sammāsamādhīti yāthāvasamādhi niyyānikasamādhi.
atk-s0515a0:1494_0: 157. Athassa bhagavā yasmā indriyasaṃvaro sīlassa rakkhā, yasmā vā iminānukkamena
atk-s0515a0:1494_1: desiyamānā ayaṃ desanā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sappāyā, tasmā indriyasaṃvarato pabhuti paṭipadaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1494_2: dassento “cakkhūhī”tiādi āraddho. Tattha cakkhūhi neva lolassāti adiṭṭhadakkhitabbādivasena
atk-s0515a0:1494_3: cakkhūhi lolo neva assa. Gāmakathāya āvaraye sotanti tiracchānakathāya sotaṃ āvareyya.
atk-s0515a0:1495_0: Cakkhuloliyenāti cakkhudvāre uppannalolavasena cakkhuloliyena. Adiṭṭhaṃ dakkhitabbanti
atk-s0515a0:1495_1: adiṭṭhapubbaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ passituṃ yuttaṃ. Diṭṭhaṃ samatikkamitabbanti diṭṭhapubbarūpārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1495_2: atikkamituṃ yuttaṃ. Ārāmena ārāmanti pupphārāmādiārāmena phalārāmādiṃ vā pupphārāmādiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1495_3: vā. Dīghacārikanti dīghacaraṇaṃ. Anavaṭṭhitacārikanti asanniṭṭhānacaraṇaṃ. Anuyutto
atk-s0515a0:1495_4: hoti rūpadassanāyāti rūpārammaṇadassanatthāya punappunaṃ yutto hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1496_0: Antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhoti ummārabbhantaraṃ paviṭṭho. Vīthiṃ paṭipannoti antaravīthiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1496_1: otiṇṇo. Gharamukhāni olokentoti gharadvārāni avalokento. Uddhaṃ ullokentoti uparidisaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1497_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena
atk-s0515a0:1497_1: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Porāṇā panāhu – “cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā,
atk-s0515a0:1497_2: cittaṃ na passati acakkhukattā. Dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭe pana pasādavatthukena cittena
atk-s0515a0:1497_3: passati. Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti. Tasmā
atk-s0515a0:1497_4: cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamettha attho”ti. Nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1497_5: vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ chandarāgavasena gaṇhāti, diṭṭhamatteyeva
atk-s0515a0:1497_6: na saṇṭhāti. Anubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anuanubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato anubyañjananti
atk-s0515a0:1497_8: Yatvādhikaraṇamenantiādimhi yaṃkāraṇā yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu etaṃ puggalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1497_9: satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo
atk-s0515a0:1497_10: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ anuppabandheyyuṃ ajjhotthareyyuṃ. Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti
atk-s0515a0:1497_11: tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya na paṭipajjati. Evaṃbhūtoyeva ca
atk-s0515a0:1497_12: na rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ. Na cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatītipi vuccati. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1497_13: kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi. Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati
atk-s0515a0:1497_14: vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati. Apica yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0515a0:1497_15: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyāmanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā
atk-s0515a0:1497_16: uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ, tato manodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1497_18: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tadanantaraṃ javanaṃ javati.
atk-s0515a0:1498_0: Tatrāpi neva bhavaṅgasamaye na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā
atk-s0515a0:1498_1: atthi. Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā
atk-s0515a0:1498_2: kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati, asaṃvaro hoti. Evaṃ honto pana so “cakkhundriye asaṃvaro”ti
atk-s0515a0:1498_3: vuccati. Kasmā? Yasmā tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi
atk-s0515a0:1498_4: vīthicittāni. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo
atk-s0515a0:1498_5: saṃvutā, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti. Nagaradvārena
atk-s0515a0:1498_6: hi pavisitvā corā yadicchanti taṃ kareyyuṃ, evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0515a0:1498_7: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni.
atk-s0515a0:1499_0: Saddhādeyyānīti kammañca phalañca idhalokañca paralokañca saddahitvā dinnāni. “Ayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1499_1: me ñātīti vā, mittoti vā, idaṃ vā paṭikarissati, idaṃ vānena katapubba”nti vā evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1499_2: na dinnānīti attho. Evaṃ dinnāni hi na saddhādeyyāni nāma honti. Bhojanānīti ca desanāsīsamattametaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1499_3: atthato pana saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā cīvarāni pārupitvā senāsanāni sevamānā
atk-s0515a0:1500_0: Seyyathidanti nipāto. Tassattho, katamo hoti. Naccaṃ nāma yaṃkiñci naccaṃ, taṃ maggaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1500_1: gacchantenāpi gīvaṃ pasāretvā daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭati. Gītanti yaṃkiñci gītaṃ. Vāditanti
atk-s0515a0:1500_2: yaṃkiñci vāditaṃ. Pekkhanti naṭasamajjaṃ. Akkhānanti bhāratarāmāyanādikaṃ. Yasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1500_3: ṭhāne kathīyati, tattha gantumpi na vaṭṭati. Pāṇissaranti kaṃsatāḷaṃ, “pāṇitāḷa”ntipi
atk-s0515a0:1500_4: vadanti. Vetāḷanti ghanatāḷaṃ, “mantena matasarīruṭṭhāpana”ntipi eke. Kumbhathūṇanti
atk-s0515a0:1500_6: sobhanakaraṃ vā, paṭibhānacittanti vuttaṃ hoti. Caṇḍālanti ayoguḷakīḷā, “caṇḍālānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1500_7: sāṇadhovanakīḷā”tipi vadanti. Vaṃsanti veṇuṃ ussāpetvā kīḷanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1501_0: Dhovananti aṭṭhidhovanaṃ, ekaccesu kira janapadesu kālaṅkate ñātake na jhāpenti,
atk-s0515a0:1501_1: nikhaṇitvā ṭhapenti. Atha tesaṃ pūtibhūtaṃ kāyaṃ ñatvā nīharitvā aṭṭhīni dhovitvā
atk-s0515a0:1501_2: gandhehi makkhetvā ṭhapenti. Te nakkhattakāle ekasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhīni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1501_3: ṭhāne surādīni ṭhapetvā rodantā paridevantā suraṃ pivanti. Vuttampi cetaṃ “atthi
atk-s0515a0:1501_4: bhikkhave dakkhiṇesu janapadesu dhovanaṃ nāma, tattha hoti annampi pānampi khajjampi
atk-s0515a0:1501_5: bhojjampi leyyampi peyyampi naccampi gītampi vāditampi. Atthekaṃ bhikkhave dhovanaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1501_6: netaṃ natthīti vadāmī”ti. Ekacce pana “indajālena aṭṭhidhovanaṃ dhovana”nti vadanti.
atk-s0515a0:1501_7: Hatthiyuddhādīsu bhikkhuno neva hatthiādīhi saddhiṃ yujjhituṃ, na te yujjhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1501_8: na yujjhante daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati. Nibbuddhanti mallayuddhaṃ. Uyyodhikanti yattha sampahāro
atk-s0515a0:1501_9: diyyati. Balagganti balagaṇanaṭṭhānaṃ. Senābyūhanti senāniveso, sakaṭabyūhādivasena
atk-s0515a0:1501_10: senāya nivesanaṃ. Anīkadassananti “tayo hatthī pacchimaṃ hatthānīka”ntiādinā nayena
atk-s0515a0:1502_0: Na nimittaggāhī hotīti chandarāgavasena vuttappakāraṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti. Evaṃ sesapadānipi
atk-s0515a0:1502_1: vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbāni. Yathā ca heṭṭhā javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu
atk-s0515a0:1502_2: tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittānīti
atk-s0515a0:1502_3: vuttaṃ, evamidha tasmiṃ sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi
atk-s0515a0:1502_4: vīthicittāni. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā
atk-s0515a0:1502_5: honti, tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti, nagaradvāresu
atk-s0515a0:1502_6: pihitesu corānaṃ paveso natthi. Evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1502_7: hoti, bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīnipi vīthicittāni. Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi “cakkhundriye
atk-s0515a0:1502_8: saṃvaro”ti vutto. Ito paraṃ heṭṭhā ca upari ca vuttapariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1503_0: Visūkadassanāti paṭāṇīdassanato. Gāmakathāti gāmavāsīnaṃ kathā. Bāttiṃsāti dvattiṃsa.
atk-s0515a0:1503_1: Aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā kathāti tiracchānakathā. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1503_2: rājānaṃ ārabbha “mahāsammato mandhātā dhammāsoko evaṃ mahānubhāvo”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0515a0:1503_3: pavattā kathā rājakathā. Esa nayo corakathādīsu. Tesu “asuko rājā abhirūpo dassanīyo”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:1503_4: nayena gehassitakathāva tiracchānakathā hoti. “Sopi nāma evaṃ mahānubhāvo khayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1503_5: gato”ti evaṃ pavattā pana kammaṭṭhānabhāve tiṭṭhati. Coresupi “mūladevo evaṃ mahānubhāvo,
atk-s0515a0:1503_6: meghamālo evaṃ mahānubhāvo”ti tesaṃ kammaṃ paṭicca “aho sūrā”ti gehassitakathāva
atk-s0515a0:1503_7: tiracchānakathā. Yuddhepi bhāratayuddhādīsu “asukena asuko evaṃ mārito evaṃ viddho”ti
atk-s0515a0:1503_8: kāmassādavaseneva kathā tiracchānakathā. “Tepi nāma khayaṃ gatā”ti evaṃ pavattā pana
atk-s0515a0:1504_0: Api ca annādīsu “evaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ gandhavantaṃ rasavantaṃ phassasampannaṃ khādimha
atk-s0515a0:1504_1: bhuñjimha pivimha paribhuñjimhā”ti kāmassādavasena kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1504_2: pana katvā “pubbe evaṃ vaṇṇādisampannaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ sayanaṃ mālaṃ gandhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1504_3: sīlavantānaṃ adamha, cetiyapūjaṃ akarimhā”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Ñātikathādīsu pana
atk-s0515a0:1504_4: “amhākaṃ ñātakā sūrā samatthā”ti vā, “pubbe mayaṃ evaṃ vicitrehi yānehi vicarimhā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1504_5: vā assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā “tepi no ñātakā khayaṃ gatā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1504_6: vā, “pubbe mayaṃ evarūpā upāhanā saṅghassa adamhā”ti vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. Gāmakathāpi
atk-s0515a0:1504_8: vā evaṃ assādavasena vattuṃ na vaṭṭati, sātthakaṃ pana katvā “saddhā pasannā”ti vā,
atk-s0515a0:1505_0: Nigamanagarajanapadakathāsupi eseva nayo. Itthikathāpi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīni paṭicca
atk-s0515a0:1505_1: assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā, khayavayaṃ gatā”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Sūrakathāpi
atk-s0515a0:1505_2: “nandimitto nāma yodho sūro ahosī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati. “Saddho ahosi, khayavayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1505_3: gato”ti evameva vaṭṭati. Visikhākathāpi “asukā visikhā suniviṭṭhā dunniviṭṭhā sūrā
atk-s0515a0:1505_4: samatthā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati. “Saddhā pasannā, khayavayaṃ gatā”icceva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a0:1506_1: vā. Sāpi “pāsādikā, naccituṃ gāyituṃ chekā”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, “saddhā pasannā”tiādinā
atk-s0515a0:1506_2: nayena vaṭṭati. Pubbapetakathāti atītañātikathā. Tattha vattamānañātikathāsadisova vinicchayo.
atk-s0515a0:1507_0: Nānattakathāti purimapacchimakathāhi vimuttā avasesā nānāsabhāvā niratthakakathā.
atk-s0515a0:1507_1: Lokakkhāyikāti “ayaṃ loko kena nimmito? Asukena nāma nimmito. Kāko seto aṭṭhīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1507_2: setattā, balākā rattā lohitassa rattattā”ti evamādikā lokāyatavitaṇḍasallāpakathā.
atk-s0515a0:1508_0: Samuddakkhāyikā nāma kasmā samuddo sāgaro? Sāgaradevena khatattā sāgaro, “khato me”ti
atk-s0515a0:1508_1: hatthamuddāya sayaṃ niveditattā samuddoti evamādikā niratthakā samuddakkhānakathā.
atk-s0515a0:1508_2: Bhavoti vuddhi. Abhavoti hāni. Iti bhavo iti abhavoti yaṃ vā taṃ vā niratthakakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1509_0: Āvareyyāti āvaraṇaṃ kareyya. Nivāreyyāti ārammaṇato vāreyya. Saṃvareyyāti sammā nissesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1509_1: katvā vāreyya. Rakkheyyāti rakkhaṃ kareyya. Gopeyyāti saṃgopeyya. Pidaheyyāti pidahanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1510: Tena tena na tussantīti tena tena ambilādinā rasena na santosaṃ āpajjanti. Aparāparaṃ pariyesantīti uparūpari gavesanti.
atk-s0515a0:1511_0: 158. Phassenāti rogaphassena. Bhavañca nābhijappeyyāti tassa phassassa vinodanatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1511_1: kāmabhavādibhavañca na pattheyya. Bheravesu ca na sampavedheyyāti tassa phassassa
atk-s0515a0:1511_2: paccayabhūtesu sīhabyagghādīsu bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya, avasesesu vā ghānindriyamanindriyavisayesu
atk-s0515a0:1511_3: na sampavedheyya. Evaṃ paripūro indriyasaṃvaro ca vutto hoti. Purimehi vā indriyasaṃvaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1511_4: dassetvā iminā “araññe vasatā bheravaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā nappavedhitabba”nti dasseti.
atk-s0515a0:1512_0: Ekenākārenāti ekena kāraṇena. Bhayampi bheravampi taññevāti bhayanti ca bheravanti
atk-s0515a0:1512_1: ca khuddakampi mahantampi uttāsanimittameva. Tamevatthaṃ dassetuṃ “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:1512_2: Bhayanti tappaccayā uppannabhayaṃ. Bhayānakanti ākāraniddeso. Chambhitattanti bhayavasena
atk-s0515a0:1512_3: gattacalanaṃ. Lomahaṃsoti lomānaṃ haṃsanaṃ uddhaggabhāvo. Iminā padadvayena kiccato
atk-s0515a0:1512_4: bhayaṃ dassetvā puna “cetaso ubbego utrāso”ti sabhāvato dasseti. Ubbeggoti bhīruko,
atk-s0515a0:1512_5: utrāsoti cittakkhobho. Jātibhayanti jātiṃ paṭicca uppannabhayaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1512_6: Rājato uppannabhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Attānuvādabhayanti pāpakammino
atk-s0515a0:1512_7: attānaṃ anuvadantassa uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Parānuvādabhayanti parassa anuvādato uppajjanakabhayaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1513_0: Daṇḍabhayanti āgārikassa raññā pavattitadaṇḍaṃ, anāgārikassa vinayadaṇḍaṃ paṭicca
atk-s0515a0:1513_1: uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Duggatibhayanti cattāro apāye paṭicca uppajjanakabhayaṃ. Ūmibhayanti
atk-s0515a0:1513_2: mahāsamudde udakaṃ orohantassa pavattabhayaṃ. Mahāsamudde kira mahindavīci nāma saṭṭhi
atk-s0515a0:1513_3: yojanāni uggacchati, taraṅgavīci nāma paṇṇāsa yojanāni, rohaṇavīci nāma cattālīsa
atk-s0515a0:1513_4: yojanāni uggacchati. Evarūpā ūmiyo paṭicca pavattaṃ ūmibhayaṃ. Kumbhīlato pavattaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1513_5: bhayaṃ kumbhīlabhayaṃ. Udakāvaṭṭato bhayaṃ āvaṭṭabhayaṃ. Susukā vuccati caṇḍamaccho,
atk-s0515a0:1513_6: tato bhayaṃ susukābhayaṃ. Ājīvikabhayanti jīvitavuttito bhayaṃ ājīvikabhayaṃ. Asilokabhayanti garahato bhayaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1514: 159. Laddhā na sannidhiṃ kayirāti etesaṃ annādīnaṃ yaṃkiñci dhammena labhitvā “araññe ca senāsane vasatā dullabha”nti cintetvā sannidhiṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0515a0:1515_0: Odanoti sāli vīhi yavo godhumo kaṅgu varako kudrūsakoti sattannaṃ dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānañca
atk-s0515a0:1515_1: taṇḍulehi nibbatto. Kummāsoti yavehi nibbatto. Sattūti sāliādīhi katasattu. Maccho
atk-s0515a0:1515_2: dakasambhavo. Maṃsaṃ pākaṭameva. Ambapānanti āmehi vā pakkehi vā ambehi katapānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1515_3: Tattha āmehi karontena ambataruṇāni bhinditvā udake pakkhipitvā ātape ādiccapākena
atk-s0515a0:1515_4: pacitvā parissāvetvā tadahu paṭiggahitehi madhusakkarakappūrādīhi yojetvā kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1515_5: Jambupānanti jambuphalehi katapānaṃ. Cocapānanti aṭṭhikehi kadaliphalehi katapānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1515_6: Mocapānanti anaṭṭhikehi kadaliphalehi katapānaṃ. Madhukapānanti madhukānaṃ jātirasena
atk-s0515a0:1515_7: katapānaṃ. Taṃ pana udakasambhinnaṃ vaṭṭati, suddhaṃ na vaṭṭati. Muddikapānanti muddikā
atk-s0515a0:1515_8: udake madditvā ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Sālūkapānanti rattuppalanīluppalādīnaṃ sālūke
atk-s0515a0:1515_9: madditvā katapānaṃ. Phārusakapānanti phārusakehi ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Kosambapānanti
atk-s0515a0:1515_10: kosambaphalehi katapānaṃ. Kolapānanti kolaphalehi katapānaṃ. Badarapānanti mahākolaphalehi
atk-s0515a0:1515_11: ambapānaṃ viya katapānaṃ. Imāni ekādasa pānāni, tānipi ādiccapākāni vaṭṭanti.
atk-s0515a0:1516_0: Ghatapānanti sappipānaṃ. Telapānanti tilatelādīnaṃ pānaṃ. Payopānanti khīrapānaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1516_1: Yāgupānanti sītalādiyāgupānaṃ. Rasapānanti sākādirasapānaṃ. Piṭṭhakhajjakanti sattannaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1516_2: tāva dhaññānaṃ dhaññānulomānaṃ aparaṇṇānañca piṭṭhaṃ panasapiṭṭhaṃ labujapiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1516_3: ambāṭakapiṭṭhaṃ sālapiṭṭhaṃ khīravallipiṭṭhañcāti evamādīnaṃ piṭṭhehi kataṃ piṭṭhakhajjakaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1516_4: Pūvakhajjakampi etehiyeva kataṃ. Mūlakhajjakanti mūlakamūlaṃ khārakamūlaṃ cuccumūlanti
atk-s0515a0:1517_0: Na kuhanāyāti na vimhāpanāya. Na lapanāyāti paccayatthaṃ na lapanāya. Vihāraṃ āgate
atk-s0515a0:1517_1: manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā”ti bhikkhū nimantetunti. “Yadi evaṃ gacchatha,
atk-s0515a0:1517_2: ahaṃ pacchato gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti evaṃ na lapanāya. Atha vā attānaṃ upanetvā “ahaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1517_3: tisso, mayi rājā pasanno, mayi asuko rājā asuko ca rājamahāmatto pasanno”ti evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1517_4: na lapanāya. Na nemittikatāyāti yena kenaci paresaṃ paccayadānasaññājanakena kāyavacīkammena
atk-s0515a0:1517_5: na nemittikatāya. Na nippesikatāyāti yā paresaṃ akkosanādikiriyā yasmā veḷupesikā
atk-s0515a0:1517_6: viya abbhaṅgaṃ parassa guṇaṃ nippeseti nipuñchati, yasmā vā gandhajātaṃ nipisitvā
atk-s0515a0:1517_7: gandhamagganā viya paraguṇe nipisitvā vicuṇṇetvā esā lābhamagganā hoti, tasmā “nippesikatā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1517_8: vuccati. Na evarūpāya nippesikatāya. Na lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatāyāti ettha nijigīsanatāti
atk-s0515a0:1517_9: magganā, aññato laddhañhi aññattha haraṇavasena lābhena lābhamagganā nāma hoti. Na
atk-s0515a0:1518_0: Na dārudānenāti na paccayahetukena dārudānena vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā
atk-s0515a0:1518_1: rakkhitagopitadāruṃ “evaṃ me paccayaṃ dassantī”ti upaṭṭhākānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a0:1518_2: Evañhi jīvikaṃ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati, so diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1518_3: pāpuṇāti, samparāye ca apāyaparipūrako hoti. Attano puggalikaṃ dāruṃ kusalaṅgahatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1518_4: dadanto kuladūsakadukkaṭaṃ āpajjati, parapuggalikaṃ theyyacittena dadanto bhaṇḍagghena
atk-s0515a0:1518_5: kāretabbo. Saṅghikepi eseva nayo. Sace pana taṃ issaratāya deti, garubhaṇḍavissajjanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1518_6: āpajjati. Kataraṃ pana dāru garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, kataraṃ na hotīti? Yaṃ tāva aropimaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1518_7: sayaṃjātaṃ, taṃ saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ, tato paraṃ na garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1518_8: Ropimaṭṭhāne ca sabbena sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, pamāṇato sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1519_0: Na veḷudānenātiādīsupi na veḷudānenāti na paccayahetukena veḷudānenātiādi sabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1519_1: na dārudānenāti ettha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Veḷu pana pamāṇato telanāḷippamāṇo
atk-s0515a0:1519_2: garubhaṇḍaṃ, na tato heṭṭhā. Manussā vihāraṃ gantvā veḷuṃ yācanti, bhikkhū “saṅghiko”ti
atk-s0515a0:1519_3: dātuṃ na visahanti, manussā punappunaṃ yācanti vā tajjenti vā, tadā bhikkhūhi “daṇḍakammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1519_4: katvā gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati, veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1519_5: vāsipharasuādīni vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā denti, gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a0:1520_0: Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “daḍḍhagehā manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1520_1: Sace saṅghassa veḷugumbe veḷudūsikā uppajjati, taṃ akoṭṭāpentānaṃ veḷu nassati. “Kiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1520_2: kātabba”nti bhikkhācāre manussānaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ. Sace koṭṭetuṃ na icchanti, “samaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1520_3: bhāgaṃ labhissathā”ti vattabbā. Na icchantiyeva, “dve koṭṭhāse labhissathā”ti vattabbā.
atk-s0515a0:1520_4: Evampi anicchantesu naṭṭhena attho natthi, “tumhākaṃ khaṇe sati daṇḍakammaṃ karissatha,
atk-s0515a0:1520_5: koṭṭetvā gaṇhathā”ti vattabbā, veḷudānaṃ nāma na hoti. Veḷugumbe aggimhi uṭṭhitepi
atk-s0515a0:1521_0: Pattadāne garubhaṇḍatāya ayaṃ vinicchayo – pattampi hi yattha vikkāyati, gandhakārādayo
atk-s0515a0:1521_1: gandhapaliveṭhanādīnaṃ atthāya gaṇhanti, tādise dullabhaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1521_2: Esa tāva kiṃsukapattakaṇṇapiḷandhanatālapattādīsu vinicchayo. Tālapaṇṇampi imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0515a0:1521_3: ṭhāne kathetabbaṃ – tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṃjāte tālavane saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva
atk-s0515a0:1521_4: garubhaṇḍaṃ, na tato paraṃ, ropimatālesu sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṃ, tassa pamāṇaṃ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
atk-s0515a0:1521_5: aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako. Tiṇampi ettheva pakkhipitvā kathetabbaṃ. Yattha
atk-s0515a0:1521_6: pana tiṇaṃ natthi, tattha tālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti. Tasmā tānipi tiṇeneva
atk-s0515a0:1521_7: saṅgahitāni. Iti muñjapalālādīsu yaṃkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṃ tiṇaṃ. Nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1521_8: ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tattha jātaṃ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa tiṇavatthumhi
atk-s0515a0:1521_9: jātatiṇaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ vā garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Taṃ pana saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme
atk-s0515a0:1521_10: ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā vuttadāruveḷūsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1522_0: Pupphadāne “ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjitvā yāgubhattatthāya upanentu, ettakesu
atk-s0515a0:1522_1: senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū”ti evaṃ niyamitaṭṭhāneyeva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni
atk-s0515a0:1522_2: honti. Yadi sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṃ karonti, pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako
atk-s0515a0:1522_3: bhikkhu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti. So sampattaparisāya saṅghaṃ anāpucchitvāva
atk-s0515a0:1522_4: dātuṃ labhati. Asammatena pana āpucchitvā dātabbaṃ. Bhikkhuno pana kassa pupphāni
atk-s0515a0:1522_5: dātuṃ labbhati, kassa na labbhatīti? Mātāpitūnaṃ gehaṃ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi
atk-s0515a0:1522_6: “vatthupūjaṃ karothā”ti dātuṃ labbhati, piḷandhanatthāya na labbhati. Sesañātīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1522_7: pana haritvā na dātabbaṃ, pakkosāpetvā pūjanatthāya dātabbaṃ. Sesajanassa pūjanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1522_8: sampattassa apaccāsīsantena dātabbaṃ, pupphadānaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1523_0: Vihāre bahūni pupphāni pupphanti, bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā “vihāre
atk-s0515a0:1523_1: bahūni pupphāni pūjethā”ti vattabbaṃ, vacanamatte doso natthi, “manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_2: ādāya āgamissantī”ti cittena pana na vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati, khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_3: na paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Manussā attano dhammatāya “vihāre pupphāni atthī”ti pucchitvā
atk-s0515a0:1523_4: “asukadivase vihāraṃ āgamissāma, sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ mā dethā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0515a0:1523_5: Bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṃ kathetuṃ pamuṭṭho, sāmaṇerehi pupphāni ocitāni, manussā bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_6: upasaṅkamitvā mayaṃ tumhākaṃ asukadivase evaṃ ārocayimha “sāmaṇerānaṃ pupphāni ocinituṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_7: mā dethā”ti, kasmā na vārayitthāti? “Sati me pamuṭṭhā, pupphāni ocinitamattāneva,
atk-s0515a0:1523_8: na tāva pūjā katā”ti vattabbaṃ, “gaṇhatha pūjethā”ti na vattabbaṃ. Sace vadati, āmisaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_9: na paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Aparo bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṃ ācikkhati “asukagāmavāsino ‘pupphāni
atk-s0515a0:1523_10: mā ocinitthā’ti āhaṃsū”ti manussāpi āmisaṃ āharitvā dānaṃ datvā vadanti “amhākaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1523_11: manussā na bahukā, sāmaṇere amhehi saha pupphāni ocinituṃ āṇāpethā”ti. “Sāmaṇerehi
atk-s0515a0:1523_12: bhikkhā laddhā. Ye bhikkhācāraṃ na gacchanti, te sayameva jānissanti upāsakā”ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1523_13: Ettakaṃ nayaṃ labhitvā sāmaṇere putte vā bhātike vā katvā pupphāni ocināpetuṃ doso
atk-s0515a0:1524_0: Phaladāne phalampi pupphaṃ viya niyamitameva garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti. Vihāre bahukasmiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1524_1: phalāphale sati aphāsukamanussā āgantvā yācanti, bhikkhū “saṅghika”nti dātuṃ na ussahanti,
atk-s0515a0:1524_2: manussā vippaṭisārino akkosanti paribhāsanti, tattha kiṃ kātabbanti? Phalehi vā rukkhehi
atk-s0515a0:1524_3: vā paricchinditvā kathikā kātabbā “asuke ca rukkhe asuke ca rukkhe ettakāni phalāni
atk-s0515a0:1524_4: gaṇhantā, ettakesu vā rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhantā na vāretabbā”ti. Corā vā issarā vā
atk-s0515a0:1524_5: balakkārena gaṇhantā na vāretabbā. Kuddhā hi te sakalavihārampi nāseyyuṃ, ādīnavo pana kathetabboti.
atk-s0515a0:1525_0: Sinānadāne sinānacuṇṇāni koṭṭitāni na garubhaṇḍāni, akoṭṭito rukkhe ṭhitova rukkhataco
atk-s0515a0:1525_1: garubhaṇḍaṃ, cuṇṇaṃ pana agilānassa rajananipakkaṃ vaṭṭati. Gilānassa yaṃkiñci cuṇṇaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0515a0:1526_0: Na cuṇṇadānenāti vuttanayena sirīsacuṇṇādīnaṃ dānena. Mattikādānemattikā hi yattha
atk-s0515a0:1526_1: dullabhā hoti, tattheva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Sāpi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇāva,
atk-s0515a0:1527_0: Dantakaṭṭhadāne dantakaṭṭhaṃ acchinnakameva garubhaṇḍaṃ. Yesaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ saṅghato
atk-s0515a0:1527_1: dantakaṭṭhavāro pāpuṇāti, te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ dātuṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0515a0:1527_2: Yehi pana “ettakāni dantakaṭṭhāni āharitabbānī”ti paricchinditvā vārā gahitā, te
atk-s0515a0:1527_3: atirekāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ dātuṃ labhanti. Ekena bhikkhunā dantakaṭṭhamāḷakato
atk-s0515a0:1527_4: bahūni dantakaṭṭhāni na gahetabbāni, devasikaṃ ekekameva gahetabbaṃ. Pāṭiyekkaṃ vasantenāpi
atk-s0515a0:1527_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gaṇayitvā yattakāni attano pāpuṇanti, tattakāneva gahetvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1527_6: Antarā āgantukesu vā āgatesu disaṃ vā pakkamantesu āharitvā gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbāni.
atk-s0515a0:1528_0: Na cāṭukamyatāyātiādīsu cāṭukamyatā vuccati attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-s0515a0:1528_1: parassa khalitavacanampi saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ. Na muggasūpyatāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1528_2: na muggasūpasamānatāya. Muggasūpasamānatāti saccālikena jīvikaṃ kappanatāya etaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1528_3: adhivacanaṃ. Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā pākaṃ gacchanti thokā na gacchanti,
atk-s0515a0:1528_4: evameva saccālikena jīvikakappake puggale bahu alikaṃ hoti, appakaṃ saccaṃ. Yathā
atk-s0515a0:1528_5: vā muggasūpassa apavisanaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi, evameva saccālikavuttino puggalassa
atk-s0515a0:1528_6: appatiṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi. Siṅghāṭakaṃ viya icchiticchitaṭṭhānassa patiṭṭhāti. Tenassa
atk-s0515a0:1528_7: sā musāvāditā “muggasūpyatā”ti vuttā. Na pāribhaṭyatāyāti na paribhaṭakammabhāvena.
atk-s0515a0:1528_8: Paribhaṭassa hi kammaṃ pāribhaṭyaṃ, tassa bhāvo pāribhaṭyatā, alaṅkārakaraṇādīhi
atk-s0515a0:1528_9: dārakakīḷāpanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na pīṭhamaddikatāyāti na sahasā gharaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0515a0:1529_0: Na vatthuvijjāyātiādīsu vatthuvijjā nāma gāmanigamanagarādīnaṃ suniviṭṭhadunniviṭṭhajānanasatthaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1529_1: Tiracchānavijjā nāma aniyyānikattā saggamokkhamaggānaṃ tiracchānabhūtā aṅgasatthanimittādikā
atk-s0515a0:1529_2: avasesavijjā. Aṅgavijjā nāma itthipurisānaṃ subhagadubbhagalakkhaṇajānanaṃ. Nakkhattavijjā
atk-s0515a0:1530_0: Na dūtagamanenāti na dūteyyaṃ katvā gamanena. Na pahiṇagamanenāti na gihīnaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1530_1: gahetvā gharā gharaṃ pahitassa gamanena. Na jaṅghapesaniyenāti gāmantaradesantarādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1530_2: tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ sāsanapaṭisāsanaṃ haraṇena. Idañhi jaṅghapesaniyaṃ nāma attano
atk-s0515a0:1530_3: mātāpitūnaṃ, ye cāssa mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanti, tesaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā katthaci gamanavasena
atk-s0515a0:1530_4: vaṭṭati. Cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā attano vā kammaṃ karontānaṃ vaḍḍhakīnampi sāsanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1530_5: harituṃ vaṭṭati. Manussā “dānaṃ dassāma, pūjaṃ karissāma, bhikkhusaṅghassa ācikkhathā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1530_6: ca vadanti; “asukattherassa nāma dethā”ti piṇḍapātaṃ vā bhesajjaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā denti,
atk-s0515a0:1530_7: “vihāre pūjaṃ karothā”ti mālāgandhavilepanādīni vā dhajapaṭākādīni vā niyyātenti.
atk-s0515a0:1530_8: Sabbaṃ harituṃ vaṭṭati, jaṅghapesaniyaṃ nāma na hoti. Sesasāsanaṃ gahetvā gacchantassa
atk-s0515a0:1531_0: Na vejjakammenāti na vejjena hutvā kāyatikicchanādibhesajjakaraṇena. Bhesajjaṃ pana
atk-s0515a0:1531_1: pañcannaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ kātabbaṃ bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā sikkhamānāya sāmaṇerassa
atk-s0515a0:1531_2: sāmaṇeriyā. Samasīlasaddhāpaññānañhi etesaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu yuttānaṃ bhesajjaṃ akātuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1531_3: na labbhati. Mātāpitūnaṃ tadupaṭṭhākānaṃ attano veyyāvaccakarassa paṇḍupalāsassāti
atk-s0515a0:1531_4: etesaṃ pañcannampi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Jeṭṭhabhātu, kaniṭṭhabhātu, jeṭṭhabhaginiyā, kaniṭṭhabhaginiyā,
atk-s0515a0:1531_5: cūḷamātuyā, mahāmātuyā, cūḷapituno, mahāpituno, pitucchāya, mātucchāyāti etesaṃ pana
atk-s0515a0:1531_6: dasannampi karontena tesaṃyeva santakaṃ bhesajjaṃ gahetvā kevalaṃ yojetvā dātabbaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1531_7: Sace nappahoti, attano santakaṃ tāvakālikaṃ dātabbaṃ. Etesaṃ puttaparamparā yāva
atk-s0515a0:1531_8: sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā, tāva cattāro paccaye āharāpentassa akataviññatti vā, bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1531_9: karontassa vejjakammaṃ vā, kuladūsakāpatti vā na hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1532_0: Na piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakenāti ettha piṇḍapāto kassa dātabbo, kassa na dātabbo? Mātāpitūnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1532_1: tadupaṭṭhākānaṃ veyyāvaccakarassa paṇḍupalāsassa sampattassa dāmarikacorassa issarassāpi
atk-s0515a0:1532_2: dātabbo. Etesaṃ datvā pacchā laddhampi piṇḍapaṭipiṇḍaṃ nāma na hoti. Na dānānuppadānenāti
atk-s0515a0:1532_3: attano dinnakānaṃ na puna dānena. Dhammenāti dhammena uppannaṃ. Samenāti kāyasucaritādinā.
atk-s0515a0:1532_4: Laddhāti kāyena laddhā. Labhitvāti cittena pāpuṇitvā. Adhigantvāti sampāpuṇitvā.
atk-s0515a0:1532_5: Vinditvāti ñāṇena vinditvā. Paṭilabhitvāti punappunaṃ labhitvā.
atk-s0515a0:1533_0: Annasannidhinti ettha duvidhā annakathā vinayavasena ca sallekhavasena ca. Vinayavasena
atk-s0515a0:1533_1: tāva yaṃkiñci annaṃ ajja paṭiggahitaṃ aparajju sannidhikārakaṃ hoti, tassa paribhoge
atk-s0515a0:1533_2: pācittiyaṃ. Attanā laddhaṃ pana sāmaṇerānaṃ datvā tehi laddhaṃ ṭhapāpetvā dutiyadivase
atk-s0515a0:1533_3: bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, sallekho pana na hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1534: Pānasannidhimhipi eseva nayo. Ettha pānaṃ nāma ambapānādīni aṭṭha pānāni, yāni ce tesaṃ anulomāni.
atk-s0515a0:1535_0: Vatthasannidhintiādimhi anadhiṭṭhitāvikappitaṃ sannidhi ca hoti sallekhañca kopeti.
atk-s0515a0:1535_1: Ayaṃ pariyāya kathāva, nippariyāyato pana ticīvarasantuṭṭhena bhavitabbaṃ, catutthaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1535_2: labhitvā aññassa dātabbaṃ. Sace yassa kassaci dātuṃ na sakkoti, yassa pana dātukāmo
atk-s0515a0:1535_3: hoti, so uddesatthāya vā paripucchatthāya vā gato, āgatamatte dātabbaṃ, adātuṃ na
atk-s0515a0:1535_4: vaṭṭati. Cīvare pana appahonte satiyā paccāsāya anuññātakālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sūcisuttacīvarakārakānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1535_5: alābhena tato parampi vinayakammaṃ katvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati. “Imasmiṃ jiṇṇe puna īdisaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1535_6: kuto labhissāmī”ti pana ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ca hoti, sallekhañca vikopeti.
atk-s0515a0:1536_0: Yānasannidhimhi yānaṃ nāma vayhaṃ ratho sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā sivikā pāṭaṅkīti netaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1536_1: pabbajitassa yānaṃ. Upāhanā pana pabbajitassa yānaṃyeva. Ekabhikkhussa hi eko araññatthāya,
atk-s0515a0:1536_2: ekā dhotapādakatthāyāti ukkaṃsato dve upāhanasaṅghāṭā vaṭṭanti, tatiyaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0515a0:1536_3: aññassa dātabbo, “imasmiṃ jiṇṇe aññaṃ kuto labhissāmī”ti hi ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0515a0:1537_0: Sayanasannidhimhi sayananti mañco. Ekassa bhikkhuno eko gabbhe eko divāṭṭhāneti ukkaṃsato
atk-s0515a0:1537_1: dve mañcā vaṭṭanti, tato uttari labhitvā aññassa bhikkhuno vā gaṇassa vā dātabbo,
atk-s0515a0:1537_2: adātuṃ na vaṭṭati, sannidhi ceva hoti, sallekhañca kopeti.
atk-s0515a0:1538_0: Gandhasannidhimhi bhikkhuno kaṇḍukacchuchavidosādiābādhe sati gandho vaṭṭati. Tena
atk-s0515a0:1538_1: gandhena tasmiṃ roge vūpasante aññesaṃ vā ābādhikānaṃ dātabbo. Dvāre pañcaṅgulagharadhūpanādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1538_2: vā upanetabbo. “Puna roge sati bhavissatī”ti ṭhapetuṃ na vaṭṭati, gandhasannidhi
atk-s0515a0:1539_0: Āmisanti annādivuttāvasesaṃva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Seyyathidaṃ – idhekacco bhikkhu “tathārūpe
atk-s0515a0:1539_2: bhājanādīni āharāpetvā ṭhapeti. So vassakāle kālasseva sāmaṇerehi yāguṃ pacāpetvā
atk-s0515a0:1539_3: bhuñjitvā “sāmaṇera udakakaddame dukkhaṃ gāmaṃ pavisituṃ, gaccha asukakulaṃ gantvā
atk-s0515a0:1539_4: mayhaṃ vihāre nisinnabhāvaṃ ārocehi, asukakulato dadhiādīni āharā”ti peseti. Bhikkhūhi
atk-s0515a0:1539_5: “kiṃ, bhante, gāmaṃ pavisathā”ti vuttepi “duppaveso āvuso idāni gāmo”ti vadati. Te
atk-s0515a0:1539_6: “hotu, bhante, acchatha tumhe, mayaṃ bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā āharissāmā”ti gacchanti.
atk-s0515a0:1539_7: Atha sāmaṇeropi dadhiādīni āharitvā bhattañca byañjanañca sampādetvā upaneti, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1539_8: bhuñjantasseva upaṭṭhākā bhattaṃ pahiṇanti, tatopi manāpaṃ manāpaṃ bhuñjati. Atha
atk-s0515a0:1539_9: bhikkhū piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā āgacchanti, tatopi manāpaṃ manāpaṃ gīvāyāmakaṃ bhuñjatiyeva.
atk-s0515a0:1539_10: Evaṃ catumāsampi vītināmeti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhu “muṇḍakuṭumbikajīvikaṃ jīvati,
atk-s0515a0:1539_11: na samaṇajīvika”nti. Evarūpo āmisasannidhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1540_0: Bhikkhuno pana vasanaṭṭhāne ekā taṇḍulanāḷi eko guḷapiṇḍo catubhāgamattaṃ sappīti
atk-s0515a0:1540_1: ettakaṃ nidhetuṃ vaṭṭati akāle sampattacorānaṃ atthāya. Te hi ettakampi āmisapaṭisanthāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1540_2: alabhantā jīvitāpi voropeyyuṃ, tasmā sacepi ettakaṃ natthi, āharāpetvāpi ṭhapetuṃ
atk-s0515a0:1540_3: vaṭṭati. Aphāsukakāle ca yadettha kappiyaṃ, taṃ attanāpi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati. Kappiyakuṭiyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1540_4: pana bahuṃ ṭhapentassāpi sannidhi nāma natthi.
atk-s0515a0:1541: 160. Jhāyī na pādalolassāti jhānābhirato ca na ca pādalolo assa. Virame kukkuccā nappamajjeyyāti hatthakukkuccādikukkuccaṃ vinodeyya, sakkaccakāritāya cettha nappamajjeyya.
atk-s0515a0:1542: Ekattamanuyuttoti ekībhāvaṃ anuyutto. Paramatthagarukoti uttamatthagaruko. “Sakatthagaruko”ti vā pāṭho.
atk-s0515a0:1543_0: Paṭisallānārāmoti āramaṇaṃ ārāmo, tato tato ārammaṇato paṭisaṃharitvā ekībhāve paṭisallāne
atk-s0515a0:1543_1: ārāmo yassa so paṭisallānārāmo. Assāti bhaveyya. Tasmiṃ ratoti paṭisallānarato. Etehi
atk-s0515a0:1543_2: sīlesu paripūrakāritaṃ dasseti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sīlavipannassa ekaggatāpi na sampajjati.
atk-s0515a0:1543_3: Ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyuttoti attano cittasamathe yutto. Ettha hi ajjhattanti
atk-s0515a0:1543_4: vā attanoti vā etaṃ ekatthaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Bhummatthe panetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1544_0: Anirākatajjhānoti bahi anihatajjhāno avināsitajjhāno vā. Nīharaṇavināsatthañhi idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1544_1: nirākaraṇaṃ nāma. “Thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavuttī”tiādīsu cassa payogo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1544_2: Vipassanāya samannāgatoti sattavidhāya anupassanāya yutto. Sattavidhā anupassanā
atk-s0515a0:1544_3: nāma aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā nibbidānupassanā virāgānupassanā
atk-s0515a0:1544_4: nirodhānupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanāti. Tā visuddhimagge vitthāritā. Byūhetā suññāgārānanti
atk-s0515a0:1544_5: vaḍḍhetā suññāgārānaṃ. Ettha ca samathavipassanāvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā rattindivaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1544_6: suññāgāraṃ pavisitvā nisīdamāno bhikkhu “brūhetā suññāgārāna”nti veditabbo. Ekabhūmakādibhede
atk-s0515a0:1545_0: Sakkaccakārītiādīsu dānādīnaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ bhāvanāya puggalassa vā deyyadhammassa
atk-s0515a0:1545_1: vā sakkaccakāritāvasena sakkaccakārī. Assāti bhaveyya. Satatabhāvo sātaccaṃ, sātaccakāritāvasena
atk-s0515a0:1545_2: sātaccakārī. Nirantarakāritāya aṭṭhitakārī. Yathā nāma kakaṇṭako thokaṃ gantvā thokaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1545_3: tiṭṭhati, na nirantaraṃ gacchati, evameva yo puggalo ekadivasaṃ dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1545_4: vā katvā dhammaṃ vā sutvā samaṇadhammaṃ vā katvā puna cirassaṃ karoti, taṃ na nirantaraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1545_5: pavatteti. So “asātaccakārī, ṭhitakārī”ti vuccati. Yo pana evaṃ na hoti, so aṭṭhitakārī.
atk-s0515a0:1545_6: Anolīnavuttikoti nirantarakaraṇasaṅkhātassa vipphārassa atthitāya na olīnavuttiko.
atk-s0515a0:1546: Appaṭivānīti anivattanaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānanti kusalakaraṇe patiṭṭhābhāvo. Anuyogoti anuyuñjanaṃ. Appamādoti satiyā avippavāso.
atk-s0515a0:1547: 161. Tandiṃ māyaṃ hassaṃ khiḍḍanti ālasiyañca māyañca hassañca kāyikaṃ vācasikaṃ khiḍḍañca. Savibhūsanti saddhiṃ vibhūsāya.
atk-s0515a0:1548_1: tayo tathā divāti chabbidhaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā. Pañcakoṭṭhāsaṃ paṭijaggeyyāti rattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1548_2: majjhimayāmaṃ vissajjetvā avasesapañcakoṭṭhāsesu na niddaṃ okkameyya. Ekakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1548_3: nipajjeyyāti ekaṃ majjhimayāmakoṭṭhāsaṃ sato sampajāno nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkameyya.
atk-s0515a0:1549_0: Idha bhikkhu divasampi pubbaṇhe majjhanhe sāyanheti tayopi divasakoṭṭhāsā gahitā.
atk-s0515a0:1549_1: Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalaṃ divasaṃ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto cittassa
atk-s0515a0:1549_2: āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi vā. Cittaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1549_3: parisodheyyāti tehi dhammehi cittaṃ visodheyya. Ṭhānaṃ panettha kiñcāpi na gahitaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1549_4: caṅkamanisajjāsannissitaṃ pana katvā gahetabbameva. Paṭhamaṃ yāmanti sakalasmimpi paṭhamayāme.
atk-s0515a0:1550_0: Seyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā petaseyyā sīhaseyyā tathāgataseyyāti catasso seyyā.
atk-s0515a0:1550_1: Tattha “yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-s0515a0:1550_2: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi. “Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petā
atk-s0515a0:1550_3: uttānā sentī”ti ayaṃ petaseyyā. Appamaṃsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaghaṭṭitā ekena
atk-s0515a0:1550_4: passena sayituṃ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. “Sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā dakkhiṇena
atk-s0515a0:1550_5: passena seyyaṃ kappeti…pe… attamano hotī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā. Tejussadattā hi sīho
atk-s0515a0:1550_6: migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi
atk-s0515a0:1550_7: pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1550_8: matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati. Divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrasto pabujjhati,
atk-s0515a0:1550_9: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti. Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā
atk-s0515a0:1550_10: ṭhitaṃ hoti, “nayidaṃ tuyhaṃ jātiyā, na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā
atk-s0515a0:1550_11: tattheva sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati. Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa
atk-s0515a0:1550_12: ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1550_13: vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati. Catutthajjhānaseyyā pana
atk-s0515a0:1550_14: tathāgataseyyāti vuccati. Tāsu idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. Ayañhi tejussadairiyāpathattā uttamaseyyā nāma.
atk-s0515a0:1551_0: Pāde pādanti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṃ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṃ atikkamma ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0515a0:1551_1: Gopphakena hi gopphake, jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0515a0:1551_2: cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti, seyyā aphāsu hoti. Yathā pana na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṃ atikkamma
atk-s0515a0:1551_3: ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, seyyā phāsu hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – “pāde
atk-s0515a0:1551_4: pādaṃ accādhāyā”ti. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajānapaññāya ca samannāgato
atk-s0515a0:1551_5: hutvā. Iminā supariggāhakaṃ satisampajaññaṃ kathitaṃ. Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti
atk-s0515a0:1551_6: “asukavelāya nāma uṭṭhahissāmī”ti evaṃ uṭṭhānavelāparicchedakaṃ uṭṭhānasaññaṃ citte
atk-s0515a0:1551_7: ṭhapetvā. Evaṃ katvā nipanno hi yathāparicchinnakāleyeva uṭṭhāti.
atk-s0515a0:1552_0: Vīriyindriyaniddese cetasikoti idaṃ vīriyassa niyamato cetasikabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1552_1: idañhi vīriyaṃ “yadapi, bhikkhave, kāyikaṃ vīriyaṃ, tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, yadapi
atk-s0515a0:1552_2: cetasikaṃ vīriyaṃ, tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgoti. Itihidaṃ uddesaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1552_3: suttesu caṅkamādīni karontassa uppajjanatāya kāyikanti vuccamānampi kāyaviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1552_4: viya kāyikaṃ nāma natthi, cetasikameva panetanti dīpetuṃ “cetasiko”ti vuttaṃ. Vīriyārambhoti
atk-s0515a0:1552_5: vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho. Ayañhi ārambhasaddo kamme āpattiyaṃ kiriyāyaṃ vīriye hiṃsāyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1555_0: Ettha hi kammaṃ ārambhoti āgataṃ. “Ārambhati ca vippaṭisārī ca hotī”ti ettha āpatti.
atk-s0515a0:1555_1: “Mahāyaññā mahārambhā, na te honti mahapphalā”ti ettha yūpussāpanādikiriyā. “Ārambhatha
atk-s0515a0:1555_2: nikkamatha, yuñjatha buddhasāsane”ti ettha vīriyaṃ. “Samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ uddissa pāṇaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1555_3: ārambhantī”ti ettha hiṃsā. “Bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato hotī”ti ettha
atk-s0515a0:1555_4: chedanabhañjanādikaṃ vikopanaṃ. Idha pana vīriyameva adhippetaṃ. Tenāha “vīriyārambhoti
atk-s0515a0:1555_5: vīriyasaṅkhāto ārambho”ti. Vīriyañhi ārambhanavasena ārambhoti vuccati. Idamassa
atk-s0515a0:1555_6: sabhāvapadaṃ. Kosajjato nikkhamanavasena nikkamo. Paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanavasena
atk-s0515a0:1555_7: parakkamo. Uggantvā yamanavasena uyyāmo. Vāyamanavasena vāyāmo. Ussahanavasena ussāho.
atk-s0515a0:1555_8: Adhimattussahanavasena ussoḷhī. Thirabhāvaṭṭhena thāmo. Cittacetasikānaṃ dhāraṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:1555_9: avicchedato vā pavattanavasena kusalasantānaṃ dhāretīti dhiti.
atk-s0515a0:1556_0: Aparo nayo – nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāya. Parakkamo ceso bandhanacchedāya. Uyyāmo
atk-s0515a0:1556_1: ceso oghassa nittharaṇāya. Vāyāmo ceso pāraṃ gamanaṭṭhena. Ussāho ceso pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena.
atk-s0515a0:1556_2: Ussoḷhī ceso adhimattaṭṭhena. Thāmo ceso palighugghāṭanatāya. Dhiti ceso aṭṭhitakāritāyāti.
atk-s0515a0:1557_0: “Kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatū”ti evaṃ pavattikāle asithilaparakkamavasena
atk-s0515a0:1557_1: asithilaparakkamatā, thiraparakkamo daḷhaparakkamoti attho. Yasmā panetaṃ vīriyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1557_2: kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne chandaṃ na nikkhipati, dhuraṃ na nikkhipati, na otāreti na
atk-s0515a0:1557_4: vuttaṃ. Yathā pana tajjātike udakasambhinnaṭṭhāne dhuravāhagoṇaṃ “gaṇhathā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0515a0:1557_5: so jāṇunā bhūmiṃ uppīḷetvāpi dhuraṃ vahati, bhūmiyaṃ patituṃ na deti, evameva vīriyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1557_6: kusalakammakaraṇaṭṭhāne dhuraṃ na nikkhipati paggaṇhāti, tasmā “dhurasampaggāho”ti
atk-s0515a0:1557_7: vuttaṃ. Paggahalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti vīriyindriyaṃ. Kosajje na kampatīti vīriyabalaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1558_0: Tandīti jātiālasiyaṃ. Tandiyanāti tandiyanākāro. Tandimanakatāti tandiyā abhibhūtacittatā.
atk-s0515a0:1558_1: Alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ, ālasyāyanākāro ālasyāyanā. Ālasyāyitassa bhāvo ālasyāyitattaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1558_2: Iti sabbehi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1559_0: Vañcanikā cariyāti vañcanikā kiriyā. Mā maṃ jaññāti vācaṃ bhāsatīti jānaṃyeva paṇṇattiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1559_1: vītikkamanto bhikkhu bhāriyaṃ karoti, amhākaṃ pana vītikkamaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti
atk-s0515a0:1559_2: upasanto viya bhāsati. Kāyena parakkamatīti “mayā kataṃ idaṃ pāpakammaṃ mā keci jāniṃsū”ti
atk-s0515a0:1559_3: kāyena vattaṃ karoti. Vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanato cakkhumohanamāyā viyāti māyā, māyāvino
atk-s0515a0:1559_4: bhāvo māyāvitā. Katvā pāpaṃ puna paṭicchādanato ati assarati etāya sattoti accasarā.
atk-s0515a0:1559_5: Kāyavācākiriyāhi aññathā dassanato vañcetīti vañcanā. Etāya sattā nikarontīti nikati,
atk-s0515a0:1559_6: micchā karontīti attho. “Nāhaṃ evaṃ karomī”ti pāpānaṃ nikkhipanato nikiraṇā. “Nāhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1559_7: evaṃ karomī”ti parivajjanato pariharaṇā. Kāyādīhi saṃvaraṇato gūhanā. Sabbato bhāgena
atk-s0515a0:1559_8: gūhanā parigūhanā. Tiṇapaṇṇehi viya gūthaṃ kāyavacīkammehi pāpaṃ chādiyatīti chādanā.
atk-s0515a0:1559_9: Sabbato bhāgena chādanā paricchādanā. Na uttānaṃ katvā dassetīti anuttānīkammaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1559_10: Na pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetīti anāvikammaṃ. Suṭṭhu chādanā vocchādanā. Katapāpapaṭicchādanavasena
atk-s0515a0:1559_11: punapi pāpassa karaṇato pāpakiriyā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā
atk-s0515a0:1559_12: māyā nāma vuccati. Yāya samannāgato puggalo bhasmāpaṭicchanno viya aṅgāro, udakapaṭicchanno
atk-s0515a0:1559_13: viya khāṇu, pilotikāya paliveṭhitaṃ viya ca satthaṃ hoti. Ativelaṃ dantavidaṃsakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1559_14: hasatīti pamāṇātikkantaṃ dantaṃ vivaritvā paresaṃ dassetvā hāsaṃ somanassaṃ uppādetvā hasati.
atk-s0515a0:1560_0: Kāyikā ca khiḍḍāti kāyena pavattā kīḷā. Eseva nayo vācasikāyapi. Hatthīhipi kīḷantīti
atk-s0515a0:1560_1: hatthīhi kīḷitatthāya purato dhāvanaādhāvanapiṭṭhanisīdanādikīṭṭhāya kīḷanti. Eseva
atk-s0515a0:1560_2: nayo assarathesupi. Aṭṭhapadepi kīḷantīti ekekāya pantiyā aṭṭha aṭṭha padāni assāti
atk-s0515a0:1560_3: aṭṭhapadaṃ, tasmiṃ aṭṭhapade. Dasapadepi eseva nayo. Ākāsepīti aṭṭhapadadasapadesu
atk-s0515a0:1560_4: viya ākāseyeva kīḷanti. Parihārapathepīti bhūmiyaṃ nānāpathamaṇḍalaṃ katvā tattha
atk-s0515a0:1560_5: pariharitabbapathaṃ pariharantā kīḷanti. Santikāyapi kīḷantīti santikakīḷāya kīḷanti,
atk-s0515a0:1560_6: ekajjhaṃ ṭhapitā sāriyo vā pāsāṇasakkharāyo vā acālentā nakheneva apanenti ca upanenti
atk-s0515a0:1560_7: ca. Sace tattha kāci calati, parājayo hotīti.
atk-s0515a0:1561_0: Khalikāyāti jūtaphalake pāsakakīḷāya kīḷanti. Ghaṭikāyāti ghaṭikā vuccati dīghadaṇḍakena
atk-s0515a0:1561_1: rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharaṇakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Salākahatthenāti lākhāya vā mañjaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0515a0:1561_2: vā piṭṭhodakena vā salākahatthaṃ temetvā “kiṃ hotū”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā bhittiyaṃ vā taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1561_3: paharitvā hatthiassādirūpāni dassentā kīḷanti. Akkhenāti guḷena. Paṅkacīrenāti paṅkacīraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1561_4: vuccati paṇṇanāḷikā, taṃ dhamantā kīḷanti. Vaṅkakenāti gāmadārakānaṃ kīḷanakena khuddakanaṅgalena.
atk-s0515a0:1561_5: Mokkhacikāyāti samparivattakakīḷāya, ākāse vā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0515a0:1561_6: heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattantā kīḷantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Ciṅgulakenāti ciṅgulakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1561_7: vuccati tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ, tena kīḷanti. Pattāḷhakenāti
atk-s0515a0:1561_8: pattāḷhakaṃ vuccati paṇṇanāḷi, tāya vālikādīni minantā kīḷanti. Rathakenāti khuddakarathena.
atk-s0515a0:1561_9: Dhanukenāti khuddakadhanunā. Akkharikāyāti akkharikā vuccati ākāse vā piṭṭhiyaṃ vā
atk-s0515a0:1561_10: akkharajānanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Manesikāyāti manesikā vuccati manasā cintitajānanakīḷā,
atk-s0515a0:1561_11: tāya kīḷanti. Yathāvajjenāti yathāvajjaṃ vuccati kāṇakuṇikhujjādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ vajjaṃ,
atk-s0515a0:1561_12: taṃ taṃ payojetvā dassanakīḷā, tāya kīḷanti. Mukhabherikanti mukhasaddena bherī viya
atk-s0515a0:1561_14: pahatabherisaddakaraṇaṃ. Mukhavalimakanti oṭṭhamaṃsaṃ jimhaṃ katvā saddakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1561_15: “Mukhatalika”ntipi pāṭho, mukhaṃ parivattetvā dhamanaṃ. Mukhabheruḷakanti mukhena
atk-s0515a0:1561_16: bherivādanaṃ. Nāṭakanti abhinayaṃ dassetvā uggaṇhāpanaṃ. “Naṭṭaka”ntipi pāṭho. Lāpanti
atk-s0515a0:1561_17: ukkuṭṭhitakaraṇaṃ. Gītanti gāyanaṃ. Davakammanti hassakīḷākaraṇaṃ. Ayaṃ vācasikā
atk-s0515a0:1561_18: khiḍḍāti ayaṃ kīḷā vācāya jātā vacīdvāre uppannā.
atk-s0515a0:1562_0: Kesā ca massu cātiādīsu kesānaṃ kattarikāya ṭhānātirittāni akatvā kattarikāya chedanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1562_1: massūnaṃ dāṭhikaṃ ṭhapetvā kappāsanañca ekatovaṇḍikādimālā ca mūlagandhādigandhā
atk-s0515a0:1562_2: ca chavikaraṇavilepanā ca. Gīvādīsu piḷandhanaābharaṇā ca sīse paṭimuñcanapasādhanapiḷandhanā
atk-s0515a0:1563_1: nassati, tesaṃ sarīragandhaharaṇatthāya gandhacuṇṇādīhi ucchādenti, evarūpaṃ ucchādanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1563_2: na vaṭṭati. Puññavante pana dārake ūrūsu nipajjāpetvā telena makkhetvā hatthapādaūrunābhiādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1563_3: saṇṭhānasampādanatthaṃ parimaddanti, evarūpaṃ parimaddanaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a0:1564_0: Nhāpananti tesaṃyeva dārakānaṃ gandhādīhi nhāpanaṃ. Sambāhananti mahāmallānaṃ viya
atk-s0515a0:1564_1: hatthapāde muggarādīhi paharitvā bāhuvaḍḍhanaṃ. Ādāsanti yaṃkiñci ādāsaṃ pariharituṃ
atk-s0515a0:1564_2: na vaṭṭati. Añjanaṃ alaṅkārañjanameva. Mālāti baddhamālā vā abaddhamālā vā. Vilepananti
atk-s0515a0:1564_3: yaṃkiñci chavirāgakaraṇaṃ. Mukhacuṇṇakaṃ mukhalepananti mukhe kāḷapīḷakādīnaṃ haraṇatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1564_4: mattikākakkaṃ denti. Tena lohite calite sāsapakakkaṃ denti, tena dose khādite tilakakkaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1564_5: denti, tena lohite sannisinne haliddikakkaṃ denti, tena chavivaṇṇe ārūḷhe mukhacuṇṇakena
atk-s0515a0:1564_6: mukhaṃ cuṇṇenti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0515a0:1565_0: Hatthabandhādīsu hatthe vicitrasaṅkhakapālādīni bandhitvā vicaranti, taṃ vā aññaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1565_1: vā sabbampi hatthābharaṇaṃ na vaṭṭati. Apare sikhaṃ bandhitvā vicaranti, suvaṇṇacīrakamuttāvaḷiādīhi
atk-s0515a0:1565_2: ca taṃ parikkhipanti, taṃ sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati. Apare catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana
atk-s0515a0:1565_3: alaṅkatadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā vicaranti, tathā itthipurisarūpādivicittaṃ bhesajjanāḷikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1565_4: suparikkhittaṃ vāmapasse olaggenti, apare anekacitrakosaṃ atitikhiṇaṃ asiṃ, pañcavaṇṇasuttasibbitaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1565_6: keci ratanamattāyāmaṃ caturaṅgulavitthataṃ kesantaparicchedaṃ dassetvā meghamukhe
atk-s0515a0:1565_7: vijjulataṃ viya nalāṭe uṇhīsapaṭṭaṃ bandhitvā cūḷāmaṇiṃ dhārenti, cāmaravālabījaniṃ
atk-s0515a0:1566_0: Imassa vā pūtikāyassāti imassa cātumahābhūtamayassa kuṇapasarīrassa. Keḷanāti kīḷāpanā.
atk-s0515a0:1566_1: Parikeḷanāti sabbato bhāgena kīḷāpanā. Gedhitatāti abhikaṅkhitatā. Gedhitattanti
atk-s0515a0:1566_2: giddhabhāvo abhikaṅkhitabhāvo. Capalatāti alaṅkārakaraṇaṃ. Cāpalyanti capalabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1567: Savibhūsantiādīsu vibhūsāya saha savibhūsaṃ. Chavirāgakaraṇasaṅkhātena parivārena saha saparivāraṃ. Paribhaṇḍena saha saparibhaṇḍaṃ. Parikkhārena saha saparikkhāraṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1568: 162. Āthabbaṇanti āthabbaṇikamantappayogaṃ. Supinanti supinasatthaṃ. Lakkhaṇanti maṇilakkhaṇādiṃ. No vidaheti nappayojeyya. Virutañcāti migādīnaṃ vaṭṭetvā vassitaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1569_0: Āthabbaṇikāti parūpaghātamantajānanakā. Āthabbaṇaṃ payojentīti āthabbaṇikā kira sattāhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1569_1: aloṇakaṃ bhuñjitvā dabbe attharitvā pathaviyaṃ sayamānā tapaṃ caritvā sattame divase
atk-s0515a0:1569_2: susānabhūmiṃ sajjetvā sattame pade ṭhatvā hatthaṃ vaṭṭetvā vaṭṭetvā mukhena vijjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1569_3: parijappanti, atha tesaṃ kammaṃ samijjhati. Evarūpaṃ sandhāya “āthabbaṇaṃ payojentī”ti
atk-s0515a0:1569_4: āha. Tattha payojentīti yuttappayuttā honti. Nagare vā ruddheti nagare samantato
atk-s0515a0:1569_5: rundhitvā āvaritvā gahite. Saṅgāme vā paccupaṭṭhiteti raṇe upagantvā ṭhite. Paccatthikesu
atk-s0515a0:1569_6: paccāmittesūti paṭāṇībhūtesu verīsu. Ītiṃ uppādentīti sarīracalanaṃ kampanaṃ, tassa
atk-s0515a0:1569_7: uppādanaṃ karonti. Upaddavanti kāyapīḷanaṃ karonti. Roganti byādhiṃ. Pajjarakanti
atk-s0515a0:1569_8: jaraṃ. Sūlanti uddhumātakaṃ. Visūcikanti vijjhanaṃ. Pakkhandikanti lohitapakkhandikaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1570_0: Supinapāṭhakāti supinabyākaraṇakā. Ādisantīti byākaronti. Yo pubbaṇhasamayaṃ supinaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1570_1: passatītiādīsu accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ, pubbaṇhasamayeti attho. Evaṃ vipāko
atk-s0515a0:1570_2: hotīti iṭṭhāniṭṭhavasena evarūpo vipāko hoti. Avakujja nipannoti adhomukho hutvā
atk-s0515a0:1570_3: nipanno passati. Evaṃ supinapāṭhakā supinaṃ ādisanti.
atk-s0515a0:1571_0: Tañca pana supinaṃ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato
atk-s0515a0:1571_1: vā devatopasaṃhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti. Tattha pittādīnaṃ khobhakaraṇapaccayayogena
atk-s0515a0:1571_2: khubhitadhātuko dhātukkhobhato supinaṃ passati, passanto ca nānāvidhaṃ supinaṃ passati.
atk-s0515a0:1571_3: Anubhūtapubbato passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ passati. Devatopasaṃhārato
atk-s0515a0:1571_4: passanto devatānaṃ ānubhāvena ārammaṇāni passati. Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena
atk-s0515a0:1571_5: uppajjitukāmassa atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṃ supinaṃ passati. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1571_6: yaṃ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supinaṃ passati, na taṃ saccaṃ hoti. Yaṃ devatopasaṃhārato
atk-s0515a0:1571_7: passati, taṃ saccaṃ vā hoti alikaṃ vā. Kuddhā hi devatā upāyena vināsetukāmā viparītampi
atk-s0515a0:1571_8: katvā dassenti. Yaṃ pana pubbanimittato passati, taṃ ekantasaccameva hoti. Etesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1571_9: catunnaṃ mūlakāraṇānaṃ saṃsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva. Tañca panetaṃ catubbidhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1571_10: supinaṃ sekkhaputhujjanāva passanti appahīnavipallāsattā. Asekkhā na passanti pahīnavipallāsattā.
atk-s0515a0:1572_0: Kiṃ panetaṃ passanto sutto passati, udāhu paṭibuddho, udāhu neva sutto na paṭibuddhoti?
atk-s0515a0:1572_1: Kiñcettha – yadi tāva sutto passati, abhidhammavirodho āpajjati. Bhavaṅgacittena
atk-s0515a0:1572_2: hi supati, taṃ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṃ rāgādisampayuttaṃ vā na hoti, supinaṃ passantassa
atk-s0515a0:1572_3: ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti. Atha paṭibuddho passati, vinayavirodho āpajjati. Yañhi
atk-s0515a0:1572_4: paṭibuddho passati, taṃ sabbohārikacittena passati, sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame
atk-s0515a0:1572_5: anāpatti nāma natthi, supinaṃ passantena pana kate vītikkame ekantaṃ anāpatti eva.
atk-s0515a0:1572_6: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati, ko nāma passati. Evañca sati supinassa abhāvova
atk-s0515a0:1572_7: āpajjati, na abhāvo. Kasmā? Yasmā kapiniddāpareto passati. Vuttañhetaṃ – “majjhūpagato,
atk-s0515a0:1573_0: Kapiniddāparetoti makkaṭaniddāya yutto. Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti,
atk-s0515a0:1573_1: evaṃ yā niddā punappunaṃ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuviparivattā. Yassā pavattiyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1573_2: punappunaṃ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṃ hoti, tāya yutto supinaṃ passati. Tenāyaṃ supino
atk-s0515a0:1573_3: kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi. Tattha supinante cetiyavandanadhammassavanadhammadesanādīni
atk-s0515a0:1573_4: karontassa kusalo, pāṇātipātādīni karontassa akusalo, dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe
atk-s0515a0:1573_5: abyākatoti veditabbo. Svāyaṃ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ asamattho,
atk-s0515a0:1573_6: pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhito vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0515a0:1574_0: Maṇilakkhaṇādīsu evarūpo maṇi pasattho, evarūpo apasattho, sāmino ārogyaissariyādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1574_1: hetu hoti, na hotīti evaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena maṇiādīnaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ ādisantīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1574_2: Tattha āvudhalakkhaṇanti ṭhapetvā asiādīni avasesaṃ āvudhaṃ. Itthilakkhaṇādīnipi
atk-s0515a0:1574_3: yamhi kule itthipurisādayo vasanti, tassa vuddhihānivaseneva veditabbāni. Ajalakkhaṇādīsu
atk-s0515a0:1574_4: pana “evarūpānaṃ ajādīnaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditabbaṃ, evarūpānaṃ na khāditabba”nti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0515a0:1575_0: Api cettha godhāya lakkhaṇe cittakammapiḷandhanādīsupi “evarūpāya godhāya sati idaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1575_1: nāma hotī”ti ayampi viseso veditabbo. Kaṇṇikālakkhaṇaṃ piḷandhanakaṇṇikāyapi gehakaṇṇikāyapi
atk-s0515a0:1575_2: vasena veditabbaṃ. Kacchapalakkhaṇampi godhalakkhaṇasadisameva. Migalakkhaṇaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1575_3: sabbacatuppadānaṃ lakkhaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Evaṃ lakkhaṇapāṭhakā lakkhaṇaṃ ādisantīti
atk-s0515a0:1576_0: Nakkhattānīti kattikādīni aṭṭhavīsati nakkhattāni. Iminā nakkhattena gharappaveso
atk-s0515a0:1576_1: kātabboti gehappavesamaṅgalaṃ kātabbaṃ. Makuṭaṃ bandhitabbanti pasādhanamaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1576_2: kātabbaṃ. Vāreyyanti “imassa dārakassa asukakulato asukanakkhattena dārikaṃ ānethā”ti
atk-s0515a0:1576_3: āvāhakaraṇañca “imaṃ dārikaṃ asukassa nāma dārakassa asukanakkhattena detha, evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1576_4: etesaṃ vuḍḍhi bhavissatī”ti vivāhakaraṇañca vatvā vāreyyasaṅkhātaṃ āvāhavivāhamaṅgalaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1576_5: kātabbanti ādisanti. Bījanīhāroti bījānaṃ vappatthāya bahi nīharaṇaṃ. “Niharo”tipi
atk-s0515a0:1576_6: pāḷi. Migavākkanti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikanāmaṃ, sabbasakuṇacatuppadānaṃ rutañāṇavaseneva
atk-s0515a0:1576_7: vuttaṃ. Migavākkapāṭhakāti sakuntacatuppadānaṃ saddabyākaraṇakā. Migavākkaṃ ādisantīti
atk-s0515a0:1576_8: tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā byākaronti. Rutanti saddaṃ. “Ruda”nti vā pāḷi. Vassitanti vācaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1576_9: Gabbhakaraṇīyāti vinassamānassa gabbhassa puna avināsāya osadhadānena gabbhasaṇṭhānakārakā.
atk-s0515a0:1576_10: Gabbho hi vātena pāṇakehi kammunā cāti tīhi kāraṇehi vinassati. Tattha vātena vinassante
