atk-s0515a0:1796_1: ca “sītassa paṭighātāyā”tiādinā nayena vuttapaccavekkhaṇameva yoniso paṭisaṅkhāti
atk-s0515a0:1796_2: veditabbaṃ. Tattha cīvaranti antaravāsakādīsu yaṃkiñci. Paṭisevatīti paribhuñjati
atk-s0515a0:1796_3: nivāseti vā pārupati vā. Yāvadevāti payojanāvadhiparicchedaniyamavacanaṃ. Ettakameva
atk-s0515a0:1796_4: hi yogino cīvarapaṭisevane payojanaṃ, yadidaṃ sītassa paṭighātāyātiādi, na ito bhiyyo.
atk-s0515a0:1796_5: Sītassāti ajjhattadhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhā utupariṇāmanavasena vā uppannassa
atk-s0515a0:1797_0: Paṭighātāyāti paṭihananatthaṃ. Yathā sarīre ābādhaṃ na uppādeti, evaṃ tassa vinodanatthaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1797_1: Sītabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti. Tasmā sītassa
atk-s0515a0:1797_2: paṭighātāya cīvaraṃ sevitabbanti bhagavā anuññāsi. Esa nayo sabbattha. Kevalañhettha
atk-s0515a0:1797_3: uṇhassāti aggisantāpassa, tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo. Ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānanti
atk-s0515a0:1797_4: ettha pana ḍaṃsāti ḍaṃsanamakkhikā. “Andhamakkhikā”tipi vuccanti. Makasāti makasā
atk-s0515a0:1797_5: eva. Vātāti sarajaarajādibhedā. Ātapoti sūriyātapo. Sarīsapāti ye keci sarantā gacchanti
atk-s0515a0:1797_6: dīghajātikā sappādayo, tesaṃ daṭṭhasamphasso ca phuṭṭhasamphasso cāti duvidho samphasso;
atk-s0515a0:1797_7: sopi cīvaraṃ pārupitvā nisinnaṃ na bādhati. Tasmā tādisesu ṭhānesu tesaṃ paṭighātatthāya
atk-s0515a0:1797_9: Hirikopīnapaṭicchādanatthanti niyatapayojanaṃ, itarāni kadāci honti. Tattha hirikopīnanti
atk-s0515a0:1797_10: taṃ taṃ sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ. Yasmiṃ yasmiñhi aṅge vivariyamāne hirī kuppati vinassati,
atk-s0515a0:1797_11: taṃ taṃ hiriṃ kopanato hirikopīnanti vuccati. Tassa ca hirikopīnassa paṭicchādanatthanti
atk-s0515a0:1798_0: Piṇḍapātanti yaṃkiñci āhāraṃ. Yo hi koci āhāro bhikkhuno piṇḍolyena patte patitattā
atk-s0515a0:1798_1: “piṇḍapāto”ti vuccati. Piṇḍānaṃ vā pāto piṇḍapāto, tattha tattha laddhānaṃ bhikkhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1798_2: sannipāto, samūhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0515a0:1799_0: Senāsananti sayanañca āsanañca. Yattha yattha hi seti vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā,
atk-s0515a0:1799_1: taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha āsati nisīdati, taṃ āsanaṃ, taṃ ekato katvā “senāsana”nti
atk-s0515a0:1799_4: asappāyo utu senāsanapaṭisevanena vinodetabbo hoti, tassa vinodanatthaṃ ekībhāvasukhatthañcāti
atk-s0515a0:1799_5: vuttaṃ hoti. Kāmañca sītapaṭighātādināva utuparissayavinodanaṃ vuttameva. Yathā pana
atk-s0515a0:1799_7: bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ, evamidhāpi niyatautuparissayavinodanaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti
atk-s0515a0:1799_8: veditabbaṃ. Atha vā ayaṃ vuttappakāro utu utuyeva. Parissayo pana duvidho pākaṭaparissayo
atk-s0515a0:1799_9: ca paṭicchannaparissayo ca. Tattha pākaṭaparissayo sīhabyagghādayo, paṭicchannaparissayo
atk-s0515a0:1799_10: rāgadosādayo. Te yattha apariguttiyā ca asappāyarūpadassanādinā ca ābādhaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0515a0:1799_11: taṃ senāsanaṃ evaṃ jānitvā paccavekkhitvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso senāsanaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1800_0: Gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāranti ettha rogassa paṭiayanaṭṭhena paccayo, paccanīkagamanaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0515a0:1800_1: attho. Yassa kassaci sappāyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhisakkassa kammaṃ tena anuññātattāti
atk-s0515a0:1800_2: bhesajjaṃ. Gilānapaccayova bhesajjaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaṃ, yaṃ kiñci gilānassa
atk-s0515a0:1800_3: sappāyaṃ bhisakkakammaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādīti vuttaṃ hoti. Parikkhāroti pana “sattahi
atk-s0515a0:1800_4: nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhattaṃ hotī”tiādīsu parivāro vuccati. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro,
atk-s0515a0:1800_5: jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”tiādīsu alaṅkāro. “Ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā
atk-s0515a0:1800_6: samudānetabbā”tiādīsu sambhāro. Idha pana sambhāropi parivāropi vaṭṭati. Tañca gilānapaccayabhesajjaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1800_7: jīvitassa parivāropi hoti, jīvitanāsakābādhuppattiyā antaraṃ adatvā rakkhaṇato sambhāropi.
atk-s0515a0:1800_8: Yathāciraṃ pavattati, evamassa kāraṇabhāvato; tasmā “parikkhāro”ti vuccati. Evaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1800_9: gilānapaccayabhesajjañca taṃ parikkhāro cāti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāro, taṃ
atk-s0515a0:1800_10: gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ. Gilānassa yaṃ kiñci sappāyaṃ bhisakkānuññātaṃ telamadhuphāṇitādijīvitaparikkhāranti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1801_0: Uppannānanti jātānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nibbattānaṃ. Veyyābādhikānanti ettha byābādhoti dhātukkhobho
atk-s0515a0:1801_1: taṃsamuṭṭhānā ca kuṭṭhagaṇḍapīḷakādayo, byābādhato uppannattā veyyābādhikā. Vedanānanti
atk-s0515a0:1801_2: dukkhavedanā, akusalavipākavedanā, tāsaṃ veyyābādhikānaṃ vedanānaṃ. Abyābajjhaparamatāyāti
atk-s0515a0:1801_3: niddukkhaparamatāya. Yāva taṃ dukkhaṃ sabbaṃ pahīnaṃ hoti, tāvāti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1802_0: Santuṭṭho hotīti paccayasantosena santuṭṭho hoti. Itarītarena cīvarenāti thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1802_1: yena kenaci. Atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho.
atk-s0515a0:1802_2: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0515a0:1803_0: Vaṇṇavādīti eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti, eko na santuṭṭho hoti,
atk-s0515a0:1803_1: santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti, eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti,
atk-s0515a0:1803_2: eko santuṭṭho ca hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti, taṃ dassetuṃ “itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā
atk-s0515a0:1803_3: ca vaṇṇavādī”ti vuttaṃ. Anesananti dūteyyapahīnagamanānuyogappabhedaṃ nānappakāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1803_4: anesanaṃ. Appatirūpanti ayuttaṃ. Aladdhā cāti alabhitvā. Yathā ekacco “kathaṃ nu
atk-s0515a0:1803_5: kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto
atk-s0515a0:1803_6: uttassati paritassati, santuṭṭho bhikkhu evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati.
atk-s0515a0:1803_7: Laddhā cāti dhammena samena labhitvā. Agadhitoti vigatalobhavanto. Amucchitoti adhimattataṇhāya
atk-s0515a0:1803_8: mucchaṃ anāpanno. Anajjhāpannoti taṇhāya anotthaṭo apariyonaddho. Ādīnavadassāvīti
atk-s0515a0:1803_9: anesanāpattiyañca gadhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno. Nissaraṇapaññoti “yāvadeva
atk-s0515a0:1803_10: sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttaṃ nissaraṇaṃ eva pajānanto. Itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyāti
atk-s0515a0:1803_11: yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭhiyā. Nevattānukkaṃsetīti “ahaṃ paṃsukūliko, mayā upasampadamāḷeyeva
atk-s0515a0:1803_12: paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ gahitaṃ, ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti. Na paraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1803_13: vambhetīti “ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikā”ti vā “paṃsukūlikamattampi etesaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1803_14: natthī”ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti.
atk-s0515a0:1804_0: Yo hi tattha dakkhoti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose vaṇṇavādī, tāsu vā dakkho cheko byatto.
atk-s0515a0:1804_1: Analasoti sātaccakiriyāya ālasiyavirahito. Sampajāno paṭissatoti sampajānapaññāya
atk-s0515a0:1804_2: ceva satiyā ca yutto. Porāṇeti na adhunuppattike. Aggaññeti “aggo”ti jānitabbe. Ariyavaṃse
atk-s0515a0:1804_3: ṭhitoti ariyānaṃ vaṃse patiṭṭhito. Ariyavaṃsoti ca yathā hi khattiyavaṃso brāhmaṇavaṃso
atk-s0515a0:1804_4: vessavaṃso suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso, evaṃ ayampi aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso
atk-s0515a0:1804_5: ariyatanti ariyapaveṇī nāma hoti. So kho panāyaṃ ariyavaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1804_6: kāḷānusārigandhādayo viya aggamakkhāyati. Ke pana te ariyā yesaṃ eso vaṃsoti? Ariyā
atk-s0515a0:1804_7: vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca, etesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso.
atk-s0515a0:1804_8: Ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro
atk-s0515a0:1804_9: meṅkero saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā uppannā, te ariyā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1804_10: vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso. Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0515a0:1804_11: koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno…pe… imasmiṃ kappe kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo amhākaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1804_12: bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā, tesaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso. Api ca
atk-s0515a0:1805: Itarītarena piṇḍapātenāti yena kenaci piṇḍapātena. Senāsanādīsupi eseva nayo. Āyatanesūti cakkhādīsu āyatanesu.
atk-s0515a0:1806_0: Yatoti saññato. Yattoti yattavā. Paṭiyattoti ativiya yattavā. Guttoti rakkhito. Gopitoti
atk-s0515a0:1806_1: mañjūsāya viya paṭṭhapito. Rakkhitoti paṭisāmito. Saṃvutoti dvārasaṃvaraṇena pihito.
atk-s0515a0:1806_2: Khuṃsitoti garahito. Vambhitoti apasādito. Ghaṭṭitoti ghaṭṭanamāpādito. Garahitoti
atk-s0515a0:1807: Pharusenāti mammacchedanavacanena. Kakkhaḷenāti dāruṇena. Nappaṭivajjāti paṭippharitvā na katheyya.
atk-s0515a0:1808_0: 207. Jhānānuyuttoti anuppannuppādanena uppannasevanena ca jhānena anuyutto. Upekkhamārabbha
atk-s0515a0:1808_1: samāhitattoti catutthajjhānupekkhaṃ uppādetvā samāhitacitto. Takkāsayaṃ kukkuccañcupacchindeti
atk-s0515a0:1808_2: kāmavitakkādivitakkañca kāmasaññādikaṃ vitakkassa āsayañca hatthakukkuccādikukkuccañca upacchindeyya.
atk-s0515a0:1809_0: Anuppannassa vā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāyāti tasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannassa vā uppajjitvā
atk-s0515a0:1809_1: parihīnassa vā paṭhamajjhānassa uppādanatthaṃ attano santāne paṭilābhatthaṃ. Uppannaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1809_2: vā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ āsevatītiādīsu ettha ādarena sevati paguṇaṃ karoti bhāveti vaḍḍheti
atk-s0515a0:1810_0: Upekkhāti catutthajjhāne uppannā tatramajjhattupekkhā. Upekkhāti sabhāvapadaṃ. Upekkhanāti
atk-s0515a0:1810_1: upapattito ikkhanākāro. Ajjhupekkhanāti adhikā hutvā ikkhanā. Cittasamatāti cittassa
atk-s0515a0:1810_2: samatā cittassa ūnātirittataṃ vajjetvā samabhāvo. Cittappassaddhatāti cittassa appagabbhatā,
atk-s0515a0:1810_3: athaddhabhāvoti attho. Majjhattatā cittassāti na sattassa na posassa, cittassa majjhattabhāvoti
atk-s0515a0:1810_4: attho. Catutthe jhāne upekkhaṃ ārabbhāti catutthasmiṃ jhānasmiṃ uppannaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1810_5: paṭicca. Ekaggacittoti ekārammaṇe pavattacitto. Avikkhittacittoti uddhaccavirahito na vikkhittacitto.
atk-s0515a0:1811_0: Nava vitakkā vuttanayā eva. Kāmavitakkānaṃ kāmasaññāsayoti kāmavitakkaṃ vitakkentassa
atk-s0515a0:1811_1: uppannā kāmasaññā tesaṃ vitakkānaṃ āsayo vasanokāsoti kāmasaññāsayo. Byāpādavitakkādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1812_0: 208. Cudito vacībhi satimābhinandeti upajjhāyādīhi vācāhi codito samāno satimā hutvā
atk-s0515a0:1812_1: taṃ codanaṃ abhinandeyya. Vācaṃ pamuñce kusalanti ñāṇasamuṭṭhitaṃ vācaṃ pamuñceyya.
atk-s0515a0:1812_2: Nātivelanti ativelaṃ pana vācaṃ kālavelañca sīlavelañca atikkantaṃ nappamuñceyya.
atk-s0515a0:1812_3: Janavādadhammāyāti janaparivādakathāya. Na cetayeyyāti cetanaṃ na uppādeyya.
atk-s0515a0:1813_0: Idaṃ te appattanti idaṃ tava na pattaṃ. Asāruppanti tava payogaṃ asāruppaṃ. Asīlaṭṭhanti
atk-s0515a0:1813_1: tava payogaṃ na sīle patiṭṭhanti asīlaṭṭhaṃ, sīle ṭhitassa payogaṃ na hotīti vuttaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1813_2: hoti. Keci “asiliṭṭha”nti paṭhanti, amaṭṭhavacananti atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0515a0:1814_0: Nidhīnanti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1814_1: Pavattāranti kicchajīvike duggatamanusse anukampaṃ katvā “ehi sukhena te jīvanupāyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1814_2: dassessāmī”ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhaṃ jīvā”ti ācikkhitāraṃ
atk-s0515a0:1814_3: viya. Vajjadassinanti dve vajjadassino “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0515a0:1814_4: niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako ca aññātaṃ ñāpanatthāya ñātaṃ anuggaṇhatthāya sīlādinā
atk-s0515a0:1814_5: cassa vuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokanena ullapanasabhāvasaṇṭhito ca. Ayaṃ idha
atk-s0515a0:1814_6: adhippeto. Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti tajjetvā poṭṭhetvāpi nidhiṃ dassente
atk-s0515a0:1814_7: kopaṃ na karoti, pamuditova hoti, evameva evarūpe puggale asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā
atk-s0515a0:1814_8: disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo, tuṭṭheneva bhavitabbaṃ. “Bhante mahantaṃ vo kataṃ
atk-s0515a0:1814_9: kammaṃ, mayhaṃ ācariyupajjhāyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā ovadantehi punapi maṃ vadeyyāthā”ti pavāretabbameva.
atk-s0515a0:1814_10: Niggayhavādinti ekacco hi saddhivihārikādīnaṃ asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1814_11: me mukhodakadānādīhi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahati, sace naṃ vakkhāmi, na maṃ upaṭṭhahissati,
atk-s0515a0:1814_12: evaṃ mama parihāni bhavissatī”ti vattuṃ avisahanto na niggayhavādī nāma hoti, so
atk-s0515a0:1814_13: imasmiṃ sāsane kacavaraṃ ākirati. Yo pana tathārūpaṃ vajjaṃ disvā vajjānurūpaṃ tajjetvā
atk-s0515a0:1814_14: paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto vihārā nīharanto sikkhāpeti, ayaṃ niggayhavādī nāma
atk-s0515a0:1814_15: seyyathāpi sammāsambuddho. Vuttañhetaṃ – “niggayha niggayhāhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi,
atk-s0515a0:1814_16: pavayha pavayhāhaṃ, ānanda, vakkhāmi, yo sāro so ṭhassatī”ti. Medhāvinti dhammojapaññāya
atk-s0515a0:1814_17: samannāgataṃ. Tādisanti evarūpaṃ paṇḍitaṃ bhajeyya payirupāseyya. Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1814_18: bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyova hoti, na pāpiyo, vuḍḍhiyeva hoti, no parihānīti.
atk-s0515a0:1815_0: Ovadeyyāti uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma, anuppanne “ayasopi te siyā”tiādivasena
atk-s0515a0:1815_1: anāgataṃ dassento anusāsati nāma. Sammukhā vadantopi ovadati nāma, parammukhā dūtaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1815_2: vā sāsanaṃ vā pesento anusāsati nāma. Sakiṃ vadantopi ovadati nāma, punappunaṃ vadanto
atk-s0515a0:1815_3: anusāsati nāma. Ovadanto eva vā anusāsati nāmāti evaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyya. Asabbhāti
atk-s0515a0:1815_4: akusaladhammā nivāreyya, kusaladhamme patiṭṭhapeyyāti attho. Satañhi so piyo hotīti
atk-s0515a0:1815_5: so evarūpo puggalo buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ piyo hoti. Ye pana adiṭṭhadhammā avitiṇṇaparalokā
atk-s0515a0:1815_6: āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, tesaṃ asataṃ so ovādako anusāsako “na tvaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1815_7: amhākaṃ upajjhāyo, na ācariyo, kasmā amhākaṃ ovadasī”ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotīti.
atk-s0515a0:1816_0: Ekakammanti apalokanakammādikaṃ ekakammaṃ. Ekuddesoti nidānuddesādiko ekuddeso. Samasikkhatāti
atk-s0515a0:1816_1: samānasikkhatā. Āhatacittatanti kodhena pahatacittabhāvaṃ. Khilajātatanti thaddhabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1816_2: Pañcapi cetokhileti buddhadhammasaṅghasikkhāsabrahmacārīsu pañcasupi cittassa thaddhabhāve.
atk-s0515a0:1817_0: Ñāṇasamuṭṭhitaṃ vācanti ñāṇasampayuttacittena uppāditaṃ vākyaṃ. Muñceyyāti vissajjeyya.
atk-s0515a0:1817_1: Atthūpasaṃhitanti atthasahitaṃ kāraṇasahitaṃ. Dhammūpasaṃhitanti dhammena yuttaṃ.
atk-s0515a0:1817_2: Kālātikkantaṃ vācaṃ na bhāseyyāti kālātītaṃ vācaṃ na katheyya tassa kālassa atikkantattā.
atk-s0515a0:1817_3: Velātikkantanti mariyādātītaṃ vacanaṃ na bhaṇeyya vacanamariyādassa atikkantattā.
atk-s0515a0:1818_0: Yo ve kāle asampatteti attano vacanakāle asampatte. Ativelanti velātikkantaṃ katvā
atk-s0515a0:1818_1: atirekappamāṇaṃ bhāsati. Nihato setīti nigghātito sayati. Kokilāyeva atrajoti kākiyā
atk-s0515a0:1818_2: paṭijaggito kokilāya abbhantare jāto kokilapotako viya.
atk-s0515a0:1819_0: 209. Athāparanti atha idāni ito parampi. Pañca rajānīti rūparāgādīni pañca rajāni.
atk-s0515a0:1819_1: Yesaṃ satīmā vinayāya sikkheti yesaṃ upaṭṭhitassati hutvāva vinayanatthaṃ tisso sikkhā
atk-s0515a0:1819_2: sikkheyya. Evaṃ sikkhanto hi rūpesu…pe… phassesu sahetha rāgaṃ, na aññeti.
atk-s0515a0:1820: Rūparajoti rūpārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppanno rāgādirajo. Saddarajādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0515a0:1821_0: 210. Tato so tesaṃ vinayāya sikkhanto anukkamena – etesu dhammesūti gāthā. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:1821_1: etesūti rūpādīsu. Kālena so sammā dhammaṃ parivīmaṃsamānoti so bhikkhu yvāyaṃ “uddhate
atk-s0515a0:1821_2: citte samathassa kālo”tiādinā nayena kālo vutto, tena kālena sabbaṃ saṅkhatadhammaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1821_3: aniccādinayena parivīmaṃsamāno. Ekodibhūto vihane tamaṃ soti so ekaggacitto sabbaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1822_0: Uddhate citteti vīriyindriyavasena citte avūpasante. Balavavīriyañhi mandasamādhiṃ
atk-s0515a0:1822_1: vīriyassa uddhaccapakkhattā uddhaccaṃ abhibhavati. Evaṃ uddhate citte. Samathassa
atk-s0515a0:1822_2: kāloti samādhissa bhāvanāya kālo. Samāhite citteti upacārappanāhi citte samāhite.
atk-s0515a0:1822_3: Balavasamādhi hi mandavīriyaṃ samādhissa kosajjapakkhattā kosajjaṃ abhibhavati. Samādhi
atk-s0515a0:1822_4: vīriyena saññojito kosajje patituṃ na labhati. Vīriyaṃ samādhinā saññojitaṃ uddhacce
atk-s0515a0:1822_5: patituṃ na labhati. Tasmā tadubhayaṃ samaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ubhayasamatāya hi appanā hoti.
atk-s0515a0:1822_6: Vipassanāya kāloti evaṃ samāhite aniccādivasena vividhāya passanāya kālo, samādhikammikassa
atk-s0515a0:1822_7: balavatīpi saddhā vaṭṭati. Evaṃ saddahanto okappento appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Samādhipaññāsu
atk-s0515a0:1822_8: pana samādhikammikassa balavatī ekaggatā vaṭṭati. Evañhi so appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. Vipassanākammikassa
atk-s0515a0:1822_9: pana paññā balavatī vaṭṭati. Evañhi so lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ubhinnaṃ pana
atk-s0515a0:1823_0: Kāle paggaṇhati cittanti yasmiṃ samaye atisithilavīriyatādīhi līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
atk-s0515a0:1823_2: Niggaṇhatīti yasmiṃ samaye accāraddhavīriyatādīhi uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0515a0:1823_4: kālenāti yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānaṃ vigamena vā
atk-s0515a0:1823_5: nirassādaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena saṃvejeti. Aṭṭha
atk-s0515a0:1823_6: saṃvegavatthūni nāma – jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni cattāri, apāyadukkhaṃ pañcamaṃ, atīte
atk-s0515a0:1823_7: vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ anāgate vaṭṭamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ, paccuppanne āhārapariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1823_8: dukkhanti. Ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇenāssa pasādaṃ janeti. Ayaṃ vuccati “sampahaṃsati
atk-s0515a0:1823_9: kālenā”ti. Kāle cittaṃ samādaheti yasmiṃ samaye saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca
atk-s0515a0:1824_0: Ajjhupekkhati kālenāti yasmiṃ samaye sammā paṭipattiṃ āgamma alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ anirassādaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1824_1: ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tadāssa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
atk-s0515a0:1824_2: na byāpāraṃ āpajjati sārathi viya samappavattesu assesu. Ayaṃ vuccati “ajjhupekkhati
atk-s0515a0:1824_3: kālenā”ti. So yogī kālakovidoti eso vuttappakāro kammaṭṭhānayoge niyutto paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanasamādahanaajjhupekkhanakālesu
atk-s0515a0:1824_4: cheko byatto. Kimhi kālamhītiādinā paggahādikālaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0515a0:1825_3: niggaho. Nirassādagataṃ cittaṃ, sampahaṃseyya tāvadeti paññāpayogamandatāya vā upasamasukhānaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1825_4: vigamena vā assādavirahitaṃ gataṃ aṭṭhasaṃvegavatthupaccavekkhaṇena vā ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena
atk-s0515a0:1826_0: Sampahaṭṭhaṃ yadā cittanti yasmiṃ kāle vuttanayeneva sampahaṃsitaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Alīnaṃ
atk-s0515a0:1826_1: bhavati nuddhatanti vīriyasamādhīhi saññojitattā līnuddhaccavirahitañca hoti. Samathanimittassāti
atk-s0515a0:1826_2: samatho ca nimittañca samathanimittaṃ, tassa samathanimittassa. So kāloti yo so līnuddhaccavirahitakālo
atk-s0515a0:1826_3: vutto, so kālo. Ajjhattaṃ ramaye manoti jhānasampayuttaṃ cittaṃ kasiṇādigocarajjhatte
atk-s0515a0:1827_0: Etena mevupāyenāti etena vuttaupāyena eva. Ma-kāro padasandhivasena vutto. Ajjhupekkheyya
atk-s0515a0:1827_1: tāvadeti yadā upacārappanāhi taṃ cittaṃ samāhitaṃ, tadā “samāhitaṃ citta”nti jānitvā
atk-s0515a0:1827_2: paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpāraṃ akatvā tasmiṃ khaṇe ajjhupekkhanameva kareyya.
atk-s0515a0:1828_0: Idāni “kimhi kālamhi paggāho”ti puṭṭhagāthaṃ nigamento “evaṃ kālavidū dhīro”tiādimāha.
atk-s0515a0:1828_1: Kālena kālaṃ cittassa, nimittamupalakkhayeti kālānukālaṃ samādhisampayuttacittassa
atk-s0515a0:1828_2: ārammaṇaṃ sallakkheyya, upaparikkheyyāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva. Evaṃ
